title: Friendly's
description:
Need a fast & friendly meal? We've got you covered.  Friendly's online ordering lets you take that happy feeling with you wherever you go.  Join Friendly's BFF Club to be the first to learn of new promotions and events and access great offers! 

Download our app today to access the following features: 
-Restaurant Locator - Looking for a great breakfast, lunch, dinner or ice cream treat? Let us help you find your nearest Friendly's restaurant. 
-Online Ordering - From made-to-order Big Beef®Burgers to our famous Fribble® milk shakes, you can choose from our entire menu of mouth watering meals and fresh ice cream to go! 
-Friendly's BFF Club - Be the first to learn of new promotions, events and offers.  Get 25% off your order when you sign up and a Free medium sundae on your birthday! 
-What's New - Check out our new products and promotions! 
-Check in - Check in to let us know you've arrived to easily redeem your offers
descriptionHTML:
Need a fast & friendly meal? We've got you covered. Friendly's online ordering lets you take that happy feeling with you wherever you go. Join Friendly's BFF Club to be the first to learn of new promotions and events and access great offers!

Download our app today to access the following features:
-Restaurant Locator - Looking for a great breakfast, lunch, dinner or ice cream treat? Let us help you find your nearest Friendly's restaurant.
-Online Ordering - From made-to-order Big Beef®Burgers to our famous Fribble® milk shakes, you can choose from our entire menu of mouth watering meals and fresh ice cream to go!
-Friendly's BFF Club - Be the first to learn of new promotions, events and offers. Get 25% off your order when you sign up and a Free medium sundae on your birthday!
-What's New - Check out our new products and promotions!
-Check in - Check in to let us know you've arrived to easily redeem your offers
summary: Order online, locate a restaurant, and redeem offers
recentChanges: Improved app security
comments: The recent updates are better giving you more options but still not there. You need a type in field for written customizations, temp for burgers, being able to add a sauce like cheese whiz for a side with a burger for the fries not everyone wants them fully loaded on top especially with pickup where they get soggy, and the options for combo items like plain chicken fingers for munchie mania instead of Buffalo. Just a few suggestions but it is improving just can't use it with my picky family.
Update, Oct 19th. Now app won't even open! What happened to this app? (This past good review was back in July 2020 This app is so easy to use. The food is always ready when I arrive. . I Love It!)
App is so seamless and smooth. If you get invalid code just remember your login information and uninstall the app and install it again.
All I get is "invalid grant". So the app is not working at all. Wont be going to friendly's.
Worked good until 9.30.2020. Now when started it says invalid_grant. Looking foward to update and website ordering still works

title: OpenTable: Restaurants Near Me
description:
Book and enjoy extraordinary dining experiences in over 52,000 restaurants worldwide with the OpenTable App. Find the right restaurant for anything using our comprehensive and intuitive search filters. See menus, photos, and special promotions, while getting the inside scoop from our community of OpenTable diners. Book your reservation and invite a few friends to tag along, all in just a few taps. Plus, get personalized recommendations based on your preferences and earn points to redeem for dining rewards towards future meals, hotel discounts, and more.

Discover. OpenTable is the perfect travel companion—offering 52,000+ restaurants around the world so you can find a local gem wherever you are.

Find. Narrow down your search with dozens of filters including neighborhood, cuisine, price, and rating. Get a feel for the restaurant—view photos, menus, and reviews from diners like you! 

Book. In just a few taps, reserve, or modify your reservation—anytime, anywhere. You can also send an RSVP to friends right from the app.

Repeat. Re-book your favorite spots with ease or try something new from a list of personalized recommendations. 

Manage. Keep tabs on all your important OpenTable stats, dietary preferences, and Dining Points (which you can redeem for dining rewards and travel deals on KAYAK.com).

recentChanges:
Thanks for dining with OpenTable! Our app is regularly improved to better connect you with extraordinary dining experiences for each & every meal you share with OpenTable.

What’s new on the menu? In this release, we have cooked up new features and improvements just for you.
comments: List restaurants in a bizarre order - some 50 miles away mixed in with some up the road. Would work much better to have a limited search radius and map to find local restaurants more easily. Have managed to make a booking when I've finally found a restaurant I'm looking for, so 2 stars for that.

I really like this app and the few times I've used it. It just seems a hit hard to find places. I don't know if it's the search algorithm, or the presentation. It just feels like it takes longer to find a place than I'd like. Overall it's a great app and gets the job done. Great intigration too.
Superb app to find and book table around you. Doesn't work much in India but for international travel it's a great way to book table for client meeting.
Map search seems to have been removed. The rewards system only works in the US, not the UK. Overall, was good a few years ago, but getting worse in 2020.
The user interface on this app has gone down hill. Not all features are available. Ie: no map view, I had to log onto my computer to cancel reservation...

title: Restaurant Guru - food & restaurants near me
descriptionHTML:
Want to eat a tasty meal? Let us help you choose the best dining place in any city in the world: ranging from restaurants serving haute cuisine to places with the most favourable price-quality ratio. Discover new restaurants, cafes, bars in your city and while traveling. Compare ratings from Michelin, Frommer's, Zagat, Zomato, Yelp, Google, Foursquare, Facebook and make your choice.


Our app suits every occasion:

- you are a gourmet who prefers grande cuisine;
- you like to eat tasty and cheap meals;
- you need to eat something on the go;
- you want to find a place for a romantic evening;
- you are the one who values trends the most.

With Restaurant Guru, it’s really easy to find the best place to eat at:

- set the restaurant type: BBQ, fast food, café, cafeteria, club, dessert, pub & bars, restaurant, steakhouse;

- choose the cuisine: from the most popular (pizza, sushi, Vegetarian, Italian, Chinese, Mexican, French, Japanese) to the exotic ones (Lao, Oceanic, Philippine, Ecuadorian);

- filter the restaurant average check: from the cheapest to the most expensive places;

- study full information about any restaurant: menus, opening hours, contact details and addresses, photos, and links to official websites;

- form an objective impression on a place by reading reliable expert and visitor reviews;

- find a restaurant on the map and take a route to it;

- write a review of the restaurant you visited. It will be useful for other users!

- find a restaurant by indicating a dish you would like to try today. In any part of the world, it’s easy to find a place where you can order your favourite English breakfast or fish and chips for dinner;

- select a city or place of interest and have a look at the best restaurants in this location;

- enjoy the advanced search of restaurants and visitor opinions. Type ‘’delicious salmon’’ and discover places where you can try the tastiest fish in your location.

Have a nice meal!
summary: All the restaurants in one place!
developerAddress:
Commonwealth trust limited of P.O. Box
3321, Drake Chambers, Road Town, Tortola,
British Virgin Islands
recentChanges:
Implemented offline mode.
Now you can use the navigation menu to select map region and download all the restaurants in it to view their info and rating anywhere you go, even if there is no Internet connection.
comments: Three and a half stars really. It needs polish. My recommendation is that they add a customizable settings menu for all future searches. Add U.S. measurements as well. The app seems better than most finding what I want but I have to change all the filters every single time I seach for something. Make the app fully customizable! I can't even sort my "favorites." Please fix this and you will have a great app! (BTW, I often work in India. Will this app work in India or only U.S.A.?)

I registered as a user in this app using my email, however did  not get the confirmation email. Now, when I try to log in, I received the message "email unconfirmed". I sent an email to the administrator, but did not get a response. Looks like they have some gap in customer support. Hope finally get the response. As for app, it look good, however, as I cannot register, did not use it in full.
Installed and uninstalled the same day. Didn't like the UI and I don't see what this app can do that others are not already doing.
Simple to use app, and a great concept. Not totally easy to contact if you spot an error, but very helpful and responsive once they notice you waving. Very good.
Was fine until the latest version, which immediately shuts down after a search.

title: BringFido - Pet Friendly Hotels
description:
Looking for a pet-friendly hotel? How about an awesome dog park, trail or beach? BringFido is the #1 trusted resource for dog owners looking for the lowdown on the best hotels, attractions, and restaurants that welcome pets. Our app brings the best of the website to your phone, giving you free on-the-go access to pet-friendly information worldwide.

Our new app makes booking a pet-friendly hotel easier than ever. Search hotels near you, and sort by distance, popularity, rating and price. Traveling with a large dog or more than one pet? Use our filters to find hotels that welcome big dogs and multiple pets. You can even narrow results to browse hotels that don't charge a pet fee! With the BringFido.com Best Rate Guarantee, our customers are assured of finding the lowest prices on pet-friendly hotels. Get instant confirmation of your reservation booking, and, if you have a question, you can always call or email our team of Pet Travel Experts.

Find nearby attractions, upcoming dog events, and local resources such as dog walkers, groomers, sitters, veterinarians, and pet supply stores. Don't see your favorite place listed? Use our app to post a new pet-friendly location and share a photo of your dog enjoying his favorite spot. Browse our dog photo section and share pics with your dog-loving friends on Facebook and Twitter. You can even leave reviews of your favorite pet-friendly attractions.

Download the BringFido app today and use the coupon code FIDOAPP to save $5 on your next booking.

recentChanges:
By popular demand, the BringFido app has arrived on Android! Find pet friendly hotels and browse our dog travel directory wherever you go.

BringFido 1.1.1 adds stability fixes and minor UI improvements.
comments: This review is based solely on using the restaurant portion of the app. App is extremely laggy when searching in map mode or just crashes all together (using pixel 3 w/ Android 11). Half the places that pop up are not actually dog/pet friendly. A Google search and a phone call would be easier and save you the headache of showing up somewhere that doesn't allow animals. This app needs a ton of improvement. Until they fix these issues, this app doesn't save you any time finding pet friendly places
Had problems using the app had to uninstall every time I used it I ended up having to call the number on the app to get anything I needed to get done concerning reservations.

Easy to use and accurate search results. Every hotel they list does allow dogs, but not every hotel allows dogs in every room, which makes sense. The description of services and pet fees is accurate. We enjoyed using this app during a 3 week long road trip and it has proved priceless. Have not yet booked a stay through the app, as we are gun-shy of third-party booking services, but we will try it out on our next trip. Kudos to the BringFido developers!
BringFido is a wonderful app. It allows me to see a wide variety of places that I can bring my pooch! Resturants, Hotels, Parks, etc. I highly reccomend this app to other dog owners.

Great but could use some work. When searching for hotels you have to reset the filters every time you get done looking at a hotel and if your comparing places it can get really frustrating and annoying. Other then that the people are great and and the app is super helpful in finding a place that takes dogs especially large or multiple dogs.

title: BarkHappy
description:
Attention Dog Lovers! The app your dog has been waiting for is finally here!  Experience life with your dog!

BarkHappy is a location based app to help you discover the dog friendly world around you! Take your dog and Go!

-DISCOVER DOG FRIENDLY PLACES ON THE MAP
Find thousands of dog friendly restaurants, bars, hotels, parks, and more. Even see their pet policies and amenities like whether they have dog treats, water bowls, or allow dogs indoors. Add more places youself

-CONNECT WITH DOGS NEARBY
Create a profile for your dog and see others near you!  Send wags, messages, or invite others for a play date!

-ATTEND DOG FRIENDLY EVENTS & HOST YOUR OWN
Schedule your own private group play dates and invite your pack friends, plus see fun dog friendly events from BarkHappy or its its partners!

-LOST &  FOUND ALERTS
Report lost or found dogs and alert other users with the dogs photo, details and contact information- all based on where you dog was last seen

-Exclusive offers, Daily matches, and much more..!

BarkHappy is now available Nationwide and is completely free!

Be sure to let us know any feedback, suggestions, or issues you find!  Our Support team is ready to help anytime. We're always trying to improve and we hope you and your dog enjoy it!

You can also follow us on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter!

Thanks for your patience and support!

If any issues please contact us! We always work on every single support request.

developerAddress: Chicago, IL
recentChanges: General performance improvements.
comments: A VERY big portion of the dog owners that use this app are a bit too far from me, so I can't really schedule playdayes with this app, (which is weird, since I live in NYC). However, this app serves as a MASSIVE upgrade from Google Maps, since it allows me to find dog runs, dog parks, and other dog friendly places much more easily, which I think is fantastic.

Definitely an issue with lack of people on here - I live in a 9 million person metropolis, and have only 2 dogs within a 10 mile range of me. The low stars are for the app itself though; spammy, business rather than dog oriented, weird configurations, a lame ripoff of Facebook. I guess I see why not many people sign up.
Seems to be a great app but there's no doggies close to my town to schedule play dates.. maybe advertise it more would really help? Other than that it seems like a wonderful app.

I've met some great people and some amazing dogs on here!! The only downside is you can't look up dogs by age. Most dogs can't keep up with my puppies energy level. I waste a lot of time looking for dogs her age hoping to find another high energy puppy.
Changed to 5 stars love this app! The team that runs this app is very responsive and efficient. Thank you so much for fixing my issue!

title: Find Restaurants Near Me - Free
description:
Find Restaurants searches and navigates near by hotels , bars , fast food around your location.
Auto detect user location by GPS.
Now works even without GPS , by detecting the mobile tower location.
8 categories available
Bar, Cafe, Fast Food ,Liquor Store, Meal Delivery, Meal Takeaway, Restaurant, Bakery
Works for any city in the world (GPS should be enabled)
Address, Phone, Website option for each item.
One touch directions for each item though maps.
Find Restaurants data is collected and organized through various online resources.

comments: This app is garbage. I downloaded it after reading the reviews, and it doesn't work. When I try to search any of the categories using my location, I receive an error. The app won't even allow me to enter a custom location.
I like this app But, it does not allow you to select cuisine and the find fast food option DOES NOT WORK AT ALL.
great application, finds most every restaurant near you. well worth a download
Its really good app, with it finding restaurant is simple
When you select fast food it brings up recreational centers. Uninstalling app. Doesn't work.

title: wiPet - Find pet friendly places & pet buddies
description:
With this free app you will be able to find and rank pet friendly places. Download it now and take a look for yourself! We have every kind of interesting places to go with dogs, cats, and any pet! Do you have any ideas, suggestions or you found a bug? We will be available at info@mywipet.com. What if…

Do you need to find a hotel to go with your dog? Type in our search bar and you will find the best pet friendly hotels, apartments and any pet friendly accomodation. Bars, restaurants, everything for the pet in the city! Near home, or wherever you are going holidays for you to enjoy. Do you need a pet hair salon? Type the place where you are looking at and find it. Need the closest pet shop to you? Just be geolocated and take a look at the map. And anything you are looking for, open the card on the map and find valuable information from other users. You can choose the best ranked vet or follow the comments to choose a hotel, doctor or any pet care. And of course, upload your favorite places and leave your comments for others to know.

In the map you will find people with the same interests, to go for a walk with your pets, chat, create groups… You will be able to take a look at the map and see who is in the park right now!

Lost pet? Never mind, you will find your cat or dog with the help of the community in the app. And soon, you will have a GPS for dogs and a pet tracker available. No more lost cats or dogs. If you are using wiPet app, you will have the chance to be the first one in receiving it!

Why use wiPet?
- NO HIDDEN FEES or payments: You just need to download the app and start enjoying.
- PRIVACY GUARANTEED: We don't reveal any personal information like your email, phone number or real name to other users. Go to the privacy settings in our menu and share only what you want to share.
- 100% ADVERTISING FREE: We will never send you advertising from other brands, you won't find an annoying pop-up when using the app. We want your experience to be the best for you to enjoy your pet.
- SHADOW AREAS: Set up a shadow area in your home, in your working place… Even if your privacy settings are "visible to everybody" you will disappear from the map when in a shadow area. This way, the other users will never know where you live or work. In wiPet we take your privacy very seriously, have we told you? ;)

comments: Couldn't even find vets or dog parks I know of, much less ones I haven't found yet.
Sign up and it doesnt show you anything. Their help section is all in another language so I can't even figure out what to do.
Doesn't show anything, help section is in a different language
signed up, did a search and nothing within 500 miles
Not of use in Scotland

title: DogMap - collection of dog friendly places
description:
DogMap is a collection of dog-friendly places, rated and reported places among you, and places in this application where you do not want to go alone, but also bring your family pet! You will find: shops, pet shops, dog cosmetics, parks, dog showers, pubs, restaurants and even veterinarians.

Don't you like to leave your pet alone at home? Do you always have a problem where to go together so you don't have to leave home? The DogMap app helps you do that.
Users of the app can recommend new dog-friendly places, share their comments, and even rate any dog-friendly places to help the dog-friendly community!
Every dog-friendly place is kept up to date by the community. For example, from parks or dog runners, you always know how much grass or how many dog ​​dirt you have

Do you often search for a chip reader location? You never know where the nearest scanner is? Not only is she a vet, she has plenty of dog-friendly space with a chip reader. You can now find these places in the Dog Map application. Download now for your Android phone or tablet and become the newest member of an emerging dog-friendly community!

comments: not up to date theres so many places near me that are dog friendly. when I pull up the map it says theres no dog friendly anything near me. not true. im uninstalling . keeps shutting down.
It couldn't open without crashing. What little i saw of the app before the first crash showed a typo on the first page you (should be able to) see.
Horrible app! Won't let me "sing up" (words used in app first red flag). For every tab it said there was no place dog friendly, when I know of several farm supply stores near by are.
first opened to a crash. great first impression. broken English in the app text. not going well. empty maps. uninstall
This app doesn't work for me. It doesn't show any dog friendly locations, including 2 nearby dog parks. Worthless.

title: Food Street - Restaurant Management & Food Game
description:
Food Street is a restaurant simulation and management game that lets you create, design and decorate your own restaurant! Build, bake and design in a restaurant game that puts you in charge of your very own business. Make it you own bakery, cafe or food truck game!

Start farming your own ingredients, cook food and prepare original recipes in a stunning 3D city filled with delightful characters! This food game lets you create and serve food for all your customers while you run your own kitchen.

Make sure your restaurant is designed to hold tons of hungry customers and feed them too! Master this restaurant management game and have endless cooking fun!

What will your restaurant story be?

---------------------------

FOOD STREET FEATURES

🏘️ Build Your Restaurants!
~ Build your restaurant and garden from the ground up! 
~ Expand your kitchen with new stations for different foods.
~ Design your restaurants by purchasing items and staff uniforms to give your cafe a personal touch, even for the holidays!
~ Make a number of unique and cool restaurants, whether it is cafe, diner, or bakery themed, by purchasing decoration. You can even make it a food truck game.

🌾 Farm Your Own Ingredients!
~ Farm for ingredients in your own garden and use them in all of your dishes!
~ Start farming and building more farm plots to grow more ingredients!
~ Search for more land to expand your farm and growing restaurant! 
~ Raise your own cute pets to attract customers, build a cafe or diner and adopt dogs, horses, pigs and more

👩‍🍳 Cook Amazing Food!
~ Cooking and baking made easy with simple gameplay and fun characters.
~ Cook food on your own schedule without the stress of time limits and start serving your customers!

😃 Serve Your Customers!
~ In this food game you’re the chef! Start cooking food for your customers and keep them happy.
~ Serving games let you cook for free in this fun restaurant game with stunning 3D graphics!

🌶️ Restaurant Management!
~ Fans of food games and cafe games will love managing their own restaurant!
~ Create multiple restaurant layouts to promote your business in a fast-growing tasty town.
~ Decorate your restaurants using Food Street’s restaurant upgrades!
~ Experience fun and exciting restaurant management games without the pressure of a time limit.

✨ Online Food Management!
~ Manage your restaurants story like no other food games: Collaborate in restaurant Food Clubs to compete in friendly competitions.
~ Play food games and cafe games in online Food Clubs where you and your friends trade recipes and cook together.
~ Participate in restaurant games with your friends!

Food Street is the perfect restaurant management game for any fan of baking, farming or food games. Design your own restaurant city and decorate it according to your style! Don’t wait any longer. Make your own resturant in the finest tasty town! Download Food Street today!

PLEASE NOTE: Food Street is free to download. However, purchases can be made in the game for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings and play your food games for free. A network connection is required to play and manage your resturant.

---------------------------
SUPPORT
If you’re having problems with Food Street, we’re very sorry. Our friendly resturant team is ready to help you run your tasty town and enjoy your food games for free! Please visit: http://www.supersolid.co.uk/forum/index.php?forums/feedback.26/

Privacy Policy:
http://supersolid.com/privacy/

Terms of Service:
http://supersolid.com/tos/
descriptionHTML:
Food Street is a restaurant simulation and management game that lets you create, design and decorate your own restaurant! Build, bake and design in a restaurant game that puts you in charge of your very own business. Make it you own bakery, cafe or food truck game!

Start farming your own ingredients, cook food and prepare original recipes in a stunning 3D city filled with delightful characters! This food game lets you create and serve food for all your customers while you run your own kitchen.

Make sure your restaurant is designed to hold tons of hungry customers and feed them too! Master this restaurant management game and have endless cooking fun!

What will your restaurant story be?

---------------------------

FOOD STREET FEATURES

🏘️ Build Your Restaurants!
~ Build your restaurant and garden from the ground up!
~ Expand your kitchen with new stations for different foods.
~ Design your restaurants by purchasing items and staff uniforms to give your cafe a personal touch, even for the holidays!
~ Make a number of unique and cool restaurants, whether it is cafe, diner, or bakery themed, by purchasing decoration. You can even make it a food truck game.

🌾 Farm Your Own Ingredients!
~ Farm for ingredients in your own garden and use them in all of your dishes!
~ Start farming and building more farm plots to grow more ingredients!
~ Search for more land to expand your farm and growing restaurant!
~ Raise your own cute pets to attract customers, build a cafe or diner and adopt dogs, horses, pigs and more

👩‍🍳 Cook Amazing Food!
~ Cooking and baking made easy with simple gameplay and fun characters.
~ Cook food on your own schedule without the stress of time limits and start serving your customers!

😃 Serve Your Customers!
~ In this food game you’re the chef! Start cooking food for your customers and keep them happy.
~ Serving games let you cook for free in this fun restaurant game with stunning 3D graphics!

🌶️ Restaurant Management!
~ Fans of food games and cafe games will love managing their own restaurant!
~ Create multiple restaurant layouts to promote your business in a fast-growing tasty town.
~ Decorate your restaurants using Food Street’s restaurant upgrades!
~ Experience fun and exciting restaurant management games without the pressure of a time limit.

✨ Online Food Management!
~ Manage your restaurants story like no other food games: Collaborate in restaurant Food Clubs to compete in friendly competitions.
~ Play food games and cafe games in online Food Clubs where you and your friends trade recipes and cook together.
~ Participate in restaurant games with your friends!

Food Street is the perfect restaurant management game for any fan of baking, farming or food games. Design your own restaurant city and decorate it according to your style! Don’t wait any longer. Make your own resturant in the finest tasty town! Download Food Street today!

PLEASE NOTE: Food Street is free to download. However, purchases can be made in the game for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings and play your food games for free. A network connection is required to play and manage your resturant.

---------------------------
SUPPORT
If you’re having problems with Food Street, we’re very sorry. Our friendly resturant team is ready to help you run your tasty town and enjoy your food games for free! Please visit: http://www.supersolid.co.uk/forum/index.php?forums/feedback.26/

Privacy Policy:
http://supersolid.com/privacy/

Terms of Service:
http://supersolid.com/tos/
summary: 🍕Build & manage your own restaurant in Food Street, a restaurant city game!🍔

recentChanges:
- Local Roots - Time for a hoedown on the farm!
- Bone Appetit - Turn your restaurant into the most spirited place on Food Street!
- Call of the Wild - We're off on a safari adventure!
- Steampunk Kitchen - Cogs away!
comments: Been playing this games since a little after they first came out and it's a great game , free world play ehh kinda lol endless customizations, and there's ALWAYS something to do ! Great time killer and casual game give it a try !
Great way to pass the time! Always enough players when you need help without having to try to get friends to play.

Just want to play a simple game. Takes to long to complete simple task. Growing food sucks. Theres never enough. Take way to long to level up. ITS JUST A GAME. I hate this game to slow and long. So Im uninstalling.
Nice game but not enough space for machines, decorations and animals. You have to cramp everything in the small space available.

Original complaint: Completely unstable game. I crashed 6 times during the tutorial, swapped to a different system and redownloaded... crashing continued. The game itself looks really fun and in between the crashes was enjoyable, hence why the crashing is even more aggravating. I really WANT to play. EDIT 10/12/20: Asking your players to contact support via your in-game support functionality when they report that the game is crashing and inaccessible shows how unobservant (or simply automated) these responses are. I tried to submit an in-game support request, lo and behold... the game crashed again and won't send anything.

title: Tripadvisor Hotel, Flight & Restaurant Bookings
description:
Plan your vacation and book an amazing trip, with millions of travel recommendations and reviews from travelers like you on hotels, must-do experiences, top places to eat and other nearby vacation hidden gems. Tripadvisor is the perfect travel planner, helping you book a table at restaurants and compare low prices when booking hotels and flights for your next trip.

The Tripadvisor app is the ultimate travel planner, and is free and easy to use:

• Access over 830 million reviews of hotels, flights, things to do, vacation rentals, and restaurants from travelers like you
• Use our planning tool, Trips, to save and organize your travel ideas for hotels, restaurants, tours and attractions and see them together on a map
• Find great deals on hotels by comparing the lowest prices from more than 200 booking sites worldwide
• Search and book the world’s largest collection of tours, attractions and experiences
• Modify or cancel most tour, attraction and experience bookings for free
• Access mobile tickets for booked tours and activities
• Use Google Pay or PayPal to make tour or activity bookings
• Find great food wherever you are and reserve tables at local restaurants
• Compare airfares and find great deals on flights
• Browse and book Travelers’ Choice award-winning hotels, experiences, restaurants and more
• Get answers on specific questions from other like-minded travelers in the Tripadvisor forums
• Add your own reviews and photos of places you’ve visited
• Quickly discover nearby hidden gem travel recommendations, find and book must-see things to do while on your trip as well as reserve tables at great restaurants
• View traveler and local recommended places on a map while on your trip

While on a trip, use the app to view nearby hidden gems, hotels, restaurants and top vacation tours and attractions on a map -- then save ideas for later, or book your favorites on the spot and visit a city later. The Tripadvisor travel planner app uses your location to send you great travel recommendations and we  share this information with trusted third party partners to provide you with a better experience. Note that your location is collected even if the app is in the background.

recentChanges:
We frequently update the Tripadvisor app to make it even more useful to travelers like you. Here’s what’s new:

• Various performance improvements and bug fixes to help you find great places nearby, wherever you are
comments: The 'Go to App' when away from home. I like to read several reviews on anywhere I may visit. Gain a picture of what to expect & look for possible pointers for what to try, see or sample. We are all different & "one man's meat is another man's position." Any venue can have an, "off day" ditto waiter, receptionist, chiefs, etc. It's an 'over view' I seek, a feel for a place. NB: don't just read reviews of places - but also reviewers reviews! Be aware of 'planted' (paid) reviews & reviewers.

Good with booking a hotel, bad for booking a flight on Tripadvisor. The reason being is that I look on a different booking site for flight prices, compared this to expedia and expedia is the best bet for booking a flight as their prices make sense to me. Step up your A-game in the case of booking a flight Tripadvisor please!

The best app for finding your way around a new place. It has all the restaurants and is almost always reliable, and is very useful for finding other things like attractions too. I wish it would remember more things when you switched off the app (ie switching to WhatsApp and then back) as its a pain to have to find the page you were just on, but it's still really a great app.

You ruined the app. It used to be my go to app for restaurants and hotels, now it can't even find a location less than 1km from me. Not only that, when I did pull it from the map (which is also wrong) it said it was closed. What a joke. Don't expect me to use this app anymore.
Frustrating at times, asks if you want to limit your results to the specific area you search for, but even when you do that, it still includes loads of suggestions that are further away....

title: Find Restaurants Near Me
description:
Find Restaurants Near Me is a simple apps that helps you find the nearest restaurants places/spots (such as Thai food, Seafood, Chinese food and many more) based on your current location.
Once you found the place, you can then find the location details such as rating, address, telephone, direction and website link.

Guide:
E.g. You are around the San Francisco, and you need to find seafood restaurant nearby you location.
1) Select the "Seafood" options from the above selection.
2) The restaurants finder will display all the seafood restaurants marker.
3) Find your way there and enjoy your food.

Features:
1) Enable the location searches which let you search other location (E.g. Eiffel Tower, Paris) instead of the your current location.
2) You can now select the places from the lists, or by input your own searches (E.g "Hamburger Fast Food").
3) Traffic indicator that shows current road traffic condition.
4) Show direction to the destination.
5) Share places to your family and friends.
6) Places now has star rating that shows the current place's rating.
7) Share apps with your family and friends.

This application may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the application with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising from partners include banner and interstitial advertisements.

Notice:
Instead of rating 1 or 2 star,please email to heliumix.ronnie@gmail.com or leave a comment so that we can fix or improve it.
Leaving comments such as “Doesn't work.” and rating 1 star surely won't get you any help. Kindly contacting us directly is proven to give much better results, and higher levels of satisfaction for everybody. :)
Please write an email if you have any problems, questions or feature requests. We can not answer on comments in the market.
Due to the vast amount of android devices it might not work perfectly on everyone's device, but we are working hard to get it there. If you have problems on your device contact heliumix.ronnie@gmail.com and we will try to fix your problem in the next version.

Sucks

I want to find restaurants near me. It should have a setting to select all so I can .... Oh I don't know ..... Find restaurants near me. It makes you pick the type of cuisine American, Italian, etc. 1st. If I knew was near me I would not need the app. Unfortunately can't give zero stars.

title: Fidilio: Cafes & Restaurants
description:
Never miss a single delicious experience!

The new Fidilio app lets you check-in to different restaurants and get rewarded with new delicious things. You can discover new exciting venues or follow professional foodies in order to keep updated about their opinions on the restaurants, cafes, confectioneries and …

Fidilio directory of venues which now include more than 6,000 restaurants and cafes in major cities across Iran, is known as the most complete and up-to-date resource for cafes and restaurants in Iran since 2007 and has been awarded several times at various festivals.

Fidilio helps you have a better chilling experience by introducing the best cafes, restaurants, confectionaries and ice-cream shops nearby. No matter what kind of restaurant you’re looking for, with Fidilio you can easily find the best ones and check out the menu and pricing before you get there.

New features in this version:
- Check-in: Keep track of places you or your friends go.
- Check-in Offers: Some restaurants and cafes listed on Fidilio always have some discounts or rewards. Now, you can get these delicious offers for free just by checkin in at these venues.
- Fidilio Lists: Fidilio always composes some lists of the best restaurants, cafes and even the special meals in different venues by using its users’ opinions and reviews; now you can easily use these lists as a guide. Lists like “The Best Cafes In Which You Can Play Board Games” or “The List of Restaurants with Discount and Special Offers” and dozens of more exciting lists!
- Users’ Lists: You can have your own personalized lists as well and if you’re cool enough, you can create amazing lists that other users would follow them too. These lists can include the places you usually go or even your personal recommendations.
- Search on the map: Now you can easily search an area on the map to find a venue there.
- Fidilio Mag: Read professional reviews and analysis of restaurants and cafes, or the hottest stories about various foods, recipes and dozens of other charming contents related to the food industry.

Features improved in this version:
- Search: We’ve rebuilt the search section so that you can easily find what you’re looking for faster than before.
- Review: Now you, individually or along with your friends, can rate and review the restaurants and cafes you’re going and share them with others.
- Hot Venues of the Week: Find new and trending venues that are mostly welcomed by the users during the past week.

It's very useful and helpful app to find the best cafe. really deserves 5 stars
I find it easy to work with and it's fun.
keep crashing with any click

title: Restaurant Locator / Restaurant Finder
description:
Find restaurants near your location and anywhere in the world. The app displays restaurants in a list as well as on a map and lets you easily navigate to an item by one click.
Never become desperate again while searching at a foreign location, just start this app and instantly locate what you are looking for! At home, under way or at the holiday resort: This app also works abroad, use it worldwide!

The app combines multiple databases making it very reliable and robust. It is completely ad-free and offers a variety of features for free. Purchase the PRO version to go even further and unlock additional features:
[✓] Anywhere search including voice search and search via map
[✓] Settings, e.g. to get more results

By purchasing the PRO version you actively support further development and help to keep this service ad-free! Thank you very much!

Another favorite app. Let's you find all the restaurants within an area or distance. I use it a lot when traveling.

title: Vegan Finder – Local Restaurants Near Me
description:
Tired of finding cruelty-free, safe and healthy food restaurants near you? Ditch the trouble of asking for vegan food recommendations from your friends, restaurant servers or internet browsers as this app has reserved a collection of more than 90000 different vegan/vegetarian restaurants worldwide. Use the interactive vegan restaurant finder to search restaurants, read and leave reviews or view/add photos to pick the best restaurant that caters your preferences. 

Vegan Restaurant Finder

Are you looking for safe and healthy vegan restaurants near you? Join the cruelty-free diet club and transform into an ambassador of nature by switching to vegan diet. No need to cook vegan food at home as you can go out and dine in the famous vegan restaurants nearby. What’s even more exciting is that you can invite your friends and family members for day outs, dinners and lunches without making any reservations for vegan food. 

Find healthy food

Steer clear of your food worries as this app has the vast collection of only safe and healthy vegan and vegetarian hubs in different areas all over the globe. You can use the search bar tags to find healthy food and enjoy it as you go.

Add vegetarian restaurants

You can not only find, view and rate existing vegan restaurants but also get to add new restaurants in the global network of more than 90000 vegan restaurants. Simply tap on the add icon, add relevant information and set up your profile in jiffy!

How to use Vegan Finder – Local Restaurants near me
•	Download and launch the food finder vegan apps
•	Enable location settings and create your profile
•	Use restaurant finder search bar to find vegan and vegetarian food nearby
•	Add your best restaurants into the vegan restaurant finder favorites list
•	Add new restaurants by tapping on the added button
•	Leave a review or add photos for any existing vegetarian restaurant in directory
•	Find, eat and enjoy vegan!

Features of Vegan Finder – Local Restaurants near me

•	Simple and easy vegan apps UI/UX
•	Hassle-free restaurant finder layout featuring smooth and responsive controls
•	Find healthy food options from over 90000 vegan/vegetarian options globally
•	Safe and secure location tracking to show you vegetarian food options nearby
•	Interactive food finder search bar featuring wholesome search filters
•	Use app as a restaurant owner/new experience sharer
•	Use it as a restaurant finder to find nearby vegan/vegetarian restaurants 
•	Leave a review and share your opinion on any vegetarian restaurant
•	Add name, location, search tags, opening hours and images to display your restaurant in the restaurant finder section
•	Add places and restaurants of interest in the favorites section by tapping on the heart icon
•	View restaurant locations on an interactive food finder map
•	View restaurant details like opening and closing hours, location, address and read ratings and reviews
•	Add food photos for your favorite restaurants
•	Customize your profile in just a few taps on the screen

Are you ready to ditch the unhealthy diet for some amazing healthy food vegetarian/vegan options? If yes, you have found one of the most amazing vegan apps for your device and lifestyle. Download and use Vegan Finder – Local Restaurants near me today!


Vegan Finder's terms and conditions can be found at
https://vegan-finder.com/terms

Vegan Finder's privacy policy can be found at
https://vegan-finder.com/privacy

Any questions or feedback?
Please contact
hello@cosmicbytelabs.com 

You can also use the contact form at
https://vegan-finder.com/contact

comments: Decent start, but there's no option to search by name or view on a map so not really very useful. There's also something really fishy about all these glowing 5-star reviews left within a short period of a week or two. It asked for permission to read files on my device the first time I opened it, which I denied. Proceed with caution!
Great and simple app to find nearby vegan restaurants. Love the filtering and easy to use favorites. Clean design, no ads. Just great! 👍

The best vegan restaurant finder app in my opinion. Appears to be a pretty new / fresh one. I’ve been searching for a decent app for finding nearby vegan food locations but never found a good one. Working on my diet and eating habits was one of the key points for living a healthier live. So this app is pretty essential to me because I can also attend to add new and edit locations and be part of a great community. You also have a lot of vegan related reviews. I’m also travelling a lot so it is important to me to always have access to the latest vegan restaurants and locations. It is completely Ad-free, intuitive and easy to use.

Easy to use, many filtering options to narrow your searches; Also, it is easy to participate. I've added two places and this app is inspiring me to keep looking for more places in my little town, to share with others! Absolutely helpful, thank you for a wonderful app.

This is actually really informative and useful. If you're not vegan, use it for when you have vegan friends over. If you are, use it to quickly find ideas of things you can eat that you don't just see on the shelf at the store.

title: Quandoo: Restaurant Bookings
description:
Looking to make a free restaurant reservation or want to discover a new favourite dining out spot? You’ve come to the right place.

With Quandoo, you can conveniently book tables at eateries in your area in next to no time.

Michelin-starred restaurants, charming bistros, cosy cafes – you name it, Quandoo’s got it.

What’s more, you can also manage reservations on the go and read menus and reviews before you dine. The power is at your fingertips.

Quandoo is active in the major cities of 12 countries around the world, so whether you’re in Manchester, Milan or Melbourne, you’re just a few taps away from enjoying a delicious meal.

Want to secure a seat at the top tables in your neighbourhood? Download the Quandoo app today!

-----

How to reserve a restaurant table with Quandoo:

Open the app on the Discovery page 
Browse through a list of featured restaurants or navigate to the Search page
Filter your search by district, cuisine type and/or table availability 
Choose a restaurant and read menus & reviews
Input the important details (date, time, number of guests etc.)
Tap ‘Reserve’ and receive a booking confirmation message instantly

-----


Dine Out Like A Local
Breakfast in Berlin? Lunch in London? Dinner in Singapore? Wherever you find yourself in the world, Quandoo’s expert tips and interactive map will guide you to the must-visit restaurants and cafes near you.


Be In The Know Before You Go
Check out restaurant photos, read what other foodies have to say and peruse menus to see what signature dishes you should order.


Take Control Of Your Bookings
Make, edit and manage reservations in one shared space – no queues, no answering machines.


Make Things Personal
Create lists of your favourite places to eat so you can rebook in seconds and keep tabs on your loyalty points total. 


Quandoo is active in 12 countries around the world:
Australia
Austria
Germany
Finland
Hong Kong
Italy
Luxembourg
Netherlands
Switzerland
Singapore
Turkey
United Kingdom


So whether you’re looking for a table for two, you or the whole crew, take the hassle out of finding a restaurant and download the Quandoo app now!

recentChanges:
1. Similar Restaurants
▶ No tables available at your favourite restaurant? No problem. We’re rolling out a new feature on our booking screen that offers you the chance to reserve at a similar restaurant in next to no time. So if you’re in need of a Plan B, we’ve got you covered.

2. Improvements
▶ We’ve also spruced things up with a few design tweaks and we’ve waved bye-bye to some pesky bugs.

Happy updating!
comments: Really easy to use and never have any technical problems

Can't log in via the app. Downloaded, signed up online and it won't allow me to sign in via the app. Uninstalled, downloaded again, checked password and still no joy. It won't let me log into the app or create a new account as I have one already through the website.
Some room for improvement: Near me, doesn't show the closest restaurants by default. Also doesn't accept eSIM phone number.
Easy to use app. Get rewarded for using the same old premise for dining in and out. Love it.
As someone with anxiety and phone call phobia 😂. This was a godsend when I needed to make a booking for a family dinner! The app is straight forward and easy to use. So glad I've found it!

title: Grubhub: Local Food Delivery & Restaurant Takeout
description:
Get food delivery 🚚 right to your door from the largest selection of restaurants and amazing Perks with Grubhub.

Grubhub is dedicated to your safety. Order food with contact-free delivery to support your favorite restaurants while staying safe at home.


Find new local deals and restaurant specials. Perks from Grubhub helps you find delivery deals and exclusive rewards that you’ll love! 💎 Get food discounts, free items and more from your favorite restaurants with Perks.

Find food and get fast food delivery from your favorite restaurants, from Applebee’s to Red Robin. Get restaurant deals and discounts, including free delivery (up to $4 off) on your first order of $15 or more with the promo code "GRUBHUBAPP."

Grubhub now gets you even better deals on food with Grubhub+! Order food and get exclusive Perks, unlimited free delivery from restaurants nearby and access to premium Grubhub features. Grubhub will even match your donations when you join Grubhub+! Join now for a 14-day free trial or get Grubhub+ for $9.99/month.

Food delivery is just a few taps away in the Grubhub app! Order food from the restaurants you love, delivered. In the mood for Dunkin’ or Taco Bell🌮? Grubhub delivers exactly what you need with special discounts you won’t want to miss.

Want to order food for takeout🥡? We also offer curbside pickup. Order food from your favorite local spot, a restaurant with a little more fame, or a new place you want to try. Grubhub has the eats you’re looking for.

What Grubhub offers:

🍔RESTAURANT DELIVERY🍔
- Grubhub offers the largest selection of restaurants in the nation
- Whether it’s Chinese food, Greek, Italian, or any other food type you’re craving, it’s covered.
- We deliver food from exclusive restaurant partners, so you’ll find that mom and pop shop AND the national spot you love.
- Contact-free food delivery


💎LOCAL DEALS AND SPECIALS💎
- Free delivery, exclusive Perks and more with Grubhub+
- Order food with exclusive deals
- NEW Perks help you find up to $100 in deals and specials!


🍟FOOD DELIVERY MADE EASY🍟
- Order food using the Grubhub app and avoid the hassle of over-the-phone mistakes
- Grubhub’s customer support is there for you 24/7
- Pay through a variety of options including credit cards, Grubhub gift cards and Venmo

🍜FOOD ORDERING OPTIONS🍜
- The Grubhub app provides lots of great features
- Order food now or preorder your next meal
- Takeout or delivery

🥐NO HIDDEN FEES🥐
- What you see is what you get: upfront pricing with no hidden fees

🥠RESTAURANT RATINGS AND REVIEWS🥠
- Grubhub has the most restaurant ratings & reviews, so you can count on getting the best food in your area

🍗FOOD DELIVERY WITH REAL-TIME TRACKING🍗
- Grubhub offers real-time order tracking so you know exactly when to dash to the door for your delicious meal


ORDER FOOD FROM THE LARGEST SELECTION OF RESTAURANTS
Each Grubhub city has different restaurants that you know and love, including:
- Applebee’s
- Auntie Anne’s 🥨
- BJ’s Restaurants
- Buffalo Wild Wings
- Burger King 🍔
- Del Taco 🌮
- Denny’s
- Dunkin’ 🍩
- Firehouse subs 🥪
- Five Guys
- IHOP 🥞
- Jack in the Box
- McDonalds (NYC only)
- Panda Express 🥡
- Panera 🍞
- Red Robin
- Shake Shack
- Sonic
- Taco Bell
- White Castle
- and many more!

Ready to start ordering with Grubhub?
• Download the app
• Sign in or set up your account (you can even use Facebook)
• Choose from your favorite restaurants or try something new
• Pick your perfect meal
• Enjoy a discount on your first order!


We suggest you post up with your mates and order your next food delivery in these Grubhub cities:

Albany, Atlanta, Austin, Baltimore, Boston, Bridgeport, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Hartford, Houston, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, Minneapolis, Nashville, New York City, Orlando, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Portland, San Diego, San Francisco, San Jose, Seattle, St. Louis, Sacramento, Tampa, Washington DC

comments: Haven't used the app yet, but I did just install it. I would like to point something out about the picture posted on the apps page that says "checkout quickly with no surprises" at the top. I was surprised (pun intended) that the tip math in the photo is incorrect. A 15% tip on a $22.37 tab is NOT $5.21, it's actually $3.36. Hope that's not how the apps calculator really does math.

The user interface is janky. Why do I have a scrolling list with all items instead of categories with selectable menus that open separate menus then a scrolling list within the menu with items in that category. It just takes forever. Also why are menu options missing. Also I cant customize individual items. For example an notes block where I can type in "no onions" ect. Not bad not good...

Probably better to put a more accurate status for the track order function. I love that it actually follows the driver on the map but before that I have no idea what is going on other than my order is "in the works". Maybe have it correctly update status with, order received, order being made, order ready/waiting on driver, on the way. If the order is delayed I want to know why. Order is still being made? Order was incorrect and is being redone? Driver in traffic?

Don't get me wrong, I line the app and itz easy to use. But here's my current issue. Used to, users could customize their orders to their liking, but now they don't. For example, if I order from Burger King and I ask for extra mayo and extra onions, I don't get the option to ask for it. Any reason why, other than the Covid thing? Can we get this option back pleeze?; Thank you!

Still not fixed: "Go to" system is completely inaccurate, can't read full reviews if long, and can't easily find your own in the review section or in past orders. Order page kicks you out of app if you hit the back button and you STILL can't rate individual menu items or restaurant overall. Scrolling through restaurants you can't see where you've eaten or what you rated them. Can't sort by "tastes good" or "on time," and these problems have been problems for years. Submitted multiple times.

title: What's the Restaurant? Guess Restaurants Quiz Game
description:
Can you guess all the restaurants? Challenge yourself and your friends in this fun, free restaurant and food quiz! 

There are over 200 restaurant logos in this quiz, and we’re guessing you won’t be able to guess ALL the restaurants. If you’re stumped, your friends and family are welcome to try too!

Ready to see if you can guess all 200 restaurants?

• FREE AND ADDICTING WORD TRIVIA GAME •

-▸ From everyday fast food restaurants, to more obscure restaurants, this word trivia game has them all. 

• INSTANT FUN •

-▸ Download and get started guessing right away. It’s an easy to play word game. Plus, it’s free! 

• GAME WITH FRIENDS •

-▸ Know a foodie? Ask friends who really know their food or restaurants for help on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram. It’s simple and easy to game with friends! 

• PERFECT FOR FAMILY AND FRIENDS •

-▸ This is a fun, family-friendly quiz game that’s perfect for the whole family. Kids and adults will love this restaurant and food word game!

• GET HELP TO GUESS THE RESTAURANT •

Don’t worry, with our coin feature, you’ll never really get stuck on a challenging trivia question. Earn coins along the way that can be used to help you get out of a bind later. 

• CONSTANTLY UPDATED •

We’re constantly updating What’s the Restaurant based on feedback and to add even more trivia features. Don’t worry, more fast food and other fun restaurants are always being added. 

• NOSTALGIC FAVORITES AND NEW ADDITIONS •

Relive your favorite memories eating at these restaurants as you guess. Or, get some new inspiration on where to eat next! Find your next favorite restaurant while testing your mind in this fun trivia game.

• FREE TO PLAY WORD GAME •

You’ll have a blast trying to guess some of the trickier restaurant logos. If you do guess all the restaurants, feel free to call yourself a restaurant connoisseur, because you’ve earned it.

-▸ Download now for free and start playing right away!

title: Food Button - Quickly Find Restaurants Nearby
description:
*THE FASTEST WAY TO FIND GREAT FOOD ON ANDROID, 100% FREE AND AD-FREE*
 
Got the munchies? Then Food Button has got you covered! Hit the button, find a great restaurant to eat at. Done.
 
***FEATURES***
 
QUICK AND EASY
Food Button is designed to streamline the food finding process as much as possible. Hitting the giant red button makes the app grab your current location and find an awesome restaurant nearby in seconds. Click the "Start Heading Here" button on any restaurant page to immediately start navigating there in Google Maps. Everything you want to do is just one click away!
 
FILTER
Want to customize your search experience? No problem. Despite its simple design, Food Button also has powerful filter options. You can filter your search by free-form input or categories and sort them by relevance, distance, or rating. You can also restrict results to be within a certain radius of you, customize the search location, and only show restaurants with deals.
 
FAVORITES
If you find a restaurant you like, simply hit the star in the toolbar to save it to your favorites, which will allow you to view that restaurant's information at all times, even when you're offline. Swipe left on any favorite to quickly share its information or unfavorite it. If you have a lot of favorites and need to sort through them, you can filter them by both category and location.
 
DECISION MAKING
I originally built this app, because my friends and I would often times have trouble deciding on a place to eat. That's why I've included the ability to choose a restaurant randomly wherever possible. You can have the search results be returned to you in a random order from the filter and jump to a random restaurant from both the search results page and your favorites page.
 
SLEEK UI
This app adheres to Google's Material Design standards, and I even backported all of the app's material elements so the app looks silky smooth no matter how old your Android device is.
 
If there are any bugs or additional features you would like, please let me know in your review!
 
This app is powered by Yelp: https://www.yelp.com/

recentChanges: - Bug fixes
comments: Helps find a place to eat when you can't agree and I like that it has directions and yelp reviews
fixes an irritating problem, so 👍
nice

The app doesn't really do much - compiles a litte restaurant information from Yelp.  So the value is in the presentation.  Hit the button: get a quick recommendation.  I wish it limited results to places open now or soon; that would be in keeping with the immediacy feature that defines the app.  "I want to eat NOW", not tomorrow at 11:00AM.  The cool feature is when you're out with someone and want to avoid the "I don't know, where do you want to eat" thing.

I've never been disappointed with what I've found.  I'm s much more adventurous eater than my husband but the gas really helped him expend his tastes and keeps me from eating at the same places all the time.

title: Sirved - Restaurant Menus
description:
View over 450,000 menus on Sirved – Finding your food has never been easier.

Sirved is a restaurant discovery tool that focuses on helping people find restaurant menus. Sirved provides a FREE food menu app that connects people to their ideal restaurant anywhere they go in North America.

Sirved is the best menu app on the market because of its powerful menu-based search engine. Sirved makes it easy to find your food by location, cuisine, craving or restaurant. You can also search by dietary needs which makes our iOS restaurant app unique amongst our competition. Sirved will provide critical restaurant information such as distance, address, contact info, photos and more. Read reviews and browse photos from multiple sources, so you can make an educated decision on where to eat, all in one app.

• Use the discover tiles to browse restaurants by: Patios, Delivery, Gluten Free, Vegan or Vegetarian, Late Night, Breakfast, Drinks, Walking Distance and more.

• View search results in 3 unique ways: 1) Our photo driven list view 2) Map view 3) Just the photo itself (no reviews, no logo, no distractions) 

• Customize your experience with the Profile page. Tell us what foods you like, and we’ll use it to make searching easier.

• Favourite any restaurant you’d like to visit in the future by making curated lists that are specific to you. Or search different cities for restaurants to favourite and make lists for future trips.

• View ratings from multiple sources, so that you can compare and make educated decisions.

All of these features are neatly packed into the perfect menu app for all occasions. Maybe you’re looking to spice up your dining experience locally. Perhaps you’re out of town and don’t know about the local hidden gem restaurants. No matter where you are in North America the options are limitless, so be sure you download the best restaurant app available in the iOS app store.

recentChanges:
With so many restaurants affected by COVID-19, we’ve made some important updates to keep our users informed about any changes to restaurants on Sirved.

• Non-contact delivery banner on participating restaurant pages
• Find restaurants offering takeout with our updated discover tiles
• Order delivery from participating restaurants through partnered delivery companies

Are you happy with the features we've added? Rate us. We'd love to hear your feedback so we can continue to make Sirved better.
comments: Great app! Easy to use! Tons of restaurants with menus. Great to use while on vacation.
Wonderful app has made looking for and discovering great places to eat, or dine out easy
Great for researching while traveling or just a night out. It's my go to.

Tried to sign in through Google and then through Facebook. Once I gave it permission to access my Facebook information such as my email address, it still wanted me to register. I see this as a scam to get email addresses.
Convenient way to find a place to eat when you are on the run!

title: Restaurant Order Taking App
description:
This app can be used only if you already have an account. If you don't have an account, contact your local partner 
or https://www.globalfoodsoft.com .


Restaurant owners worldwide can now freely download this amazing app for their smartphones and tablets to ease up the process of taking online orders. We have created the world’s simplest online food ordering system to be used by small and medium restaurants. This app transforms your smartphone or tablet into an order-receiving machine and streamlines your process of taking online orders for both pickup and delivery.

Note: To be able to use this app, you need to login with your given restaurant’s username and password.
Use the login details obtained from your local partner or get this yourself from the admin area of your restaurant account.

If you don’t have an account you may get one from a local partner or contact us. 


How it works:
==========
After you put the “Order Online” button on your website or your Facebook page your customers can place orders. You will be able to take all orders straight on your smartphone or tablet. This orders-taking app turns your smartphone or tablet into an order-receiving device and gives easier and better control over the order-taking process.

Each time a customer places an order via your website or your Facebook page, you will get an audio notification on your smartphone/tablet.

After clicking on the pending order, the tablet will display all relevant details concerning the order: customer details (name, phone number, address) and delivery details (address etc.).

You fill in the estimated time of order pickup or delivery, click accept and start cooking. Your customer will instantly receive an email with the confirmation of the order, together with the estimated time for pickup or delivery. 


Features:
=======
- The assigned tablet or smartphone becomes an order receiving machine
- You receive orders from your website widget or the Facebook app
- You receive visual and sound notification when orders arrive on your smartphone or tablet, even when the app is closed
- You can view customer and delivery details: name, phone number, address, client location on the map
- You can view order details: product name, quantity and price, payment method, delivery or pick-up instructions
- You Accept or Reject new orders: confirmation is then sent to your customer in an email
- You set delivery or pickup time: this info is added in the confirmation email received by the customer
- You can receive special request about ordered items, for example: gluten free, no pepper
- You can receive special request about the delivery, for example: buzzer not working
- User friendly: displays all orders and other important details at a glance, in a single screen

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements
comments: They have a good platforms but some bugs to fix. The ringtone volume can not be adjusted and it is too loud. Everyone in the area gets disturbed due to this
Good app but, why it always on display every 2 minutes the display on and give sound notification... We want only sound notification when customer order service...

Anyone who does not give this 5 stars is too anal for their own good! Best FREE app you will ever find with SO many capabilities! so easy to use! I was taking orders in under 3 hours with this!! AMAZING job. I highly recommend adding any paid options to this app! so worth it. for those who do not know what these platforms run monthly should refrain from lame negative reviews about; "too loud" of notification! Cmon!! Miss the order... miss the $$! If I could give this higher stars: I would!

The app is great and the WordPress plugin both work together seamlessly, however, the notification sound is obtrusive and obnoxious! I contacted the developer about plans to allow users to change the volume themselves and the answer was essentially "no, connect to a speaker" I don't understand why they can't add a volume management feature on the app. Judging by other reviews this would be a very welcome feature and would certainly boost my review to 5 stars, until then it will be 2 stars.

The app is very intrusive. It has a loud clanging notification sound that CANNOT be turned off, even if you shut off ALL notifications. Infact it even rings when the phone is in silent mode. Just makes it unusable. Also its always trying to put wifi on or off irrespective of the wifi connection. Its a battery hog and is consistently the top user of the battery everyday, even more than the display, Nearly a 40% reduction in battery life. As it does so many underhand things had no option but to uninstall it

title: TheFork - Restaurants booking and special offers
description:
10€ discount on your next meal!
Make a 1st booking on the app with the code APP19 and receive 1000 Yums. These can be converted into a 10€ discount on your next meal*.

Book your next table with the app, FREE & SIMPLE 
No need to call the restaurant to get a table, you can book online and you will even receive a confirmation by mail & SMS.

Enjoy exclusive offers up to 50% off your meal 
A lot of restaurants have special offers up to 50% off your meal. No surprise, the offer is directly applied on the bill.

Find the best restaurants around you 
Brunch, pizza, romantic setting, with friends, etc. choose your table among 55 000 restaurants thanks to detailed information on the restaurant (photos, menus, price, reviews).

You are traveling around? Don't worry, you can find our service in most European big cities like Madrid, Geneva, Barcelona, Roma, Brussels, Stockholm or Copenhagen. You can also find the best restaurant around you by enabling your geolocation!
 
Let us guide you with our 4 million of reviews 
Rely on a foodie community with more than 11 million reviews and 40 000 food pictures to make up your mind. 
On TheFork, you are the guide! Only the clients who went to the restaurant can leave a review and post food pictures.

Your fidelity rewarded! 
Win Yums at each booking.
1 booking = 150 Yums
1000 Yums = 10€ discount at a partner restaurant!
2000 Yums = 25€!

Please continue to send us your comments and remarks to contact@lafourchette.com

*Exclusive and personal offer valid after entering the code APP19 at the moment of the booking. This code is valid only for the person who never made a booking through the app (Android). The code APP19 is valid once and only on the app TheFork (Android). 7 days after the meal date, 1000 Yums will be credited in your personal fidelity space. These 1000 Yums can then be converted into a 10€ discount in a partnered restaurant.

recentChanges:
We constantly update TheFork app to provide you a flawless in-app experience and help you find the right restaurant for your moment.
Any updates of our app contains performance and reliability improvements. Thanks for choosing and using TheFork!
comments: Excellent app. However it is currently experiencing several bugs such as not being able to modify a booking properly, the app automatically add 2 hours to the newly selected time. I lost a promo code because I had to cancel and rebook to be able to effectively modify my booking. I'm deeply confused regarding this bug because it used to work perfectly.

Wouldn't recommend. Ok that you can book tables easily. However, you can only spend the loyalty points at ~7 average looking restaurants in central London. I'm in Devon, it's not very useful to me! Have the TripAdvisor app and it's just as easy to book tables through that.
Easy to book tables, but to be honest we're all here for the great discounts. I love it!

Awesome! DawnIaod (WHAFF) App for FREE MONEY. Absolutely, love it! Genius level game. I am nowlevel we.put one annozing thing about this game is that the rest team has got much betterweapons than the left team. I've been getting more feed back whatsoever regarding my game that freezes i out of mgames to play. I lost a lot of points because of this issued, and thereis absolutely nothing wrong with my internet connection. The game completely freezing.Please mix this, this has been going on since theold version oni anniversary.

Works as expected. I haven't experienced any problems with it so far. When I book with a discount, restaurants are always aware of it. I like the fact that I can even book directly within Google Maps without opening TheFork app.

title: Seated: 30% Off Restaurant Reservations & Delivery
description:
Earn rewards up to 30% on restaurant reservations, food delivery & pickup from your favorite local restaurants when you use Seated. We make it easy for you to find restaurants you’ll love, make a reservation, order pickup or delivery, enjoy a meal, and earn rewards.

Make reservations or place orders for pickup or delivery with Seated:

• Earn up to 30% back on your favorite restaurants for dining reservations, pickup, and delivery.

• Thousands of delicious restaurants across the U.S.

• Fast reservations to secure an open table at the hottest restaurants.

• Delivery and pickup from your favorite local restaurants.

• Use Seated at Home pickup for takeout orders, skip the line, and enjoy anywhere!

DISCOVER NEW RESTAURANTS

Discover new restaurants and search for food by mood, price, cuisine, restaurant name, Michelin stars, Yelp, ratings, Infatuation approved, and more!  We have wide variety of restaurants and food available including: Pizza. Burritos. Burgers. Thai food. Sushi. Chinese food. Steakhouses. Mexican food. Easy reservations to find you an open table, fast delivery, or easy pickup nearby.

PICKUP OR DELIVERY

Now you can order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select pickup, add food items to your order and go to the restaurant to get your food. Or, choose the delivery option and we'll deliver an incredible meal from your favorite restaurants to your door in a dash.

RESTAURANT RESERVATIONS

Make dinner reservations at exciting restaurants in a dash.  You can make a reservation for multiple guests, schedule a walk-in, or reserve an open table for yourself.   We make it easy to cancel or modify your restaurant reservations directly from the app.  Or get in touch with our concierge for assistance with corporate events, parties, or other needs.

EARN REWARDS ON YOUR RESERVATIONS AND FOOD DELIVERY

You'll earn rewards up to 30% on every reservation, delivery, or pickup.  Seated has rewards brands including Starbucks, Dunkin, Uber Eats, Airbnb, NYC Restaurant Relief Fund, and more!

CUSTOMER SERVICE

Need help with a reservation or food delivery? Our concierge team is available 24/7 to provide you with the best experience during your delivery, pickup, or reservation!

ACTIVE IN MAJOR US CITIES

Atlanta, Boston, Brooklyn, Chicago, Jersey City, Hoboken, Manhattan, New York City, Philadelphia, Queens, and more cities coming soon!

developerAddress: 36 West 20th Street, NY NY 10011
recentChanges:
This release introduces a few enhancements:
- Party size picker in restaurant details screen limited to restaurant’s allowed maximum
- Date/time pickers reflect Seated city’s time zone, not your time zone
- Full-screen image gallery view now available from restaurant details screen
As always, don’t forget to upload your receipt to get your reward.
Love the app? Rate us! We appreciate your feedback. Bon Appétit!
comments: On Android 10, Samsung S10e, cant even register with a phone number. Garbage...
Sadly cannot use in UK despite being available on Play Store - App will not accept UK mobile number :(

It's a great app when it's working. I got a new phone and the app won't allow me to login. But I recall having issues creating an account on my old phone too. Please fix these things guys! Update: They fixed the bug as stated above. This concept is great for the user and restaurants. The incentive to get out and eat is wonderful, we are going to need apps like these in the post COVID-19 age, if we ever get there.

Excellent dining app - this has effectively replaced my use of Open Table in the cities that Seated is available. My only feedback is to keep the Seated Partner program (I don't see it in the beta test app). It encourages us to tell our friends and family about it, win-win situation. Here's hoping that COVID-19 dies down and we return to restaurants!

This was working fine until the recent updated. Every time I start the application, I receive an error "whoops" screen. I contacted support and was told my account has been suspended due to fraudulent activities and no other explanation. I have yet to even use the rewards that i received and all the places I went to had proper receipts. I do not understand what is going on as support is not providing anymore details. Until an explanation and solution is provided, this will remain a *. EDITED: Still no explanation as to why this occurred after contacting support. I can verify everything through my credit card transactions and have yet to redeem anything still.

title: Near Me Restaurants
description:
Near Me Restaurants lets you find the best restaurants and places where you can enjoy meals together and chill out with your family and friends. This app not only helps you in finding different restaurants at a place near you but also Cafes, Bars, Night Clubs, Bakeries and many more. You can just type the name of the place or may be foods like Pizza, Chinese Food, Vegan Food etc. you want to have and a list of restaurants will appear with the name of the food you entered. It helps you in locating the address or zip code you typed with the help of GPS locator and let the app give you desired results. 

Additionally, Near Me Restaurants provides information regarding these search results like Pizza places, delivery restaurants etc. from where you want your food item to be delivered to your place. You can select a result and see its location on a Map. Selection can be made by you depending on distance from your location, reading the reviews of the restaurant, cafe, bar etc., that appears with the search results.

So, this app can become your ideal companion on a daily basis by letting you search for your near me places to share some dining space and hangout with your dear ones. Get Near Me Restaurants and make your search easier. Download the free version of this app now.
