title: Yelp: Find Food, Delivery & Services Nearby
description:
Yelp has over 199 million business and restaurant reviews worldwide. Whether you’re looking for a new pizzeria, a great coffee shop nearby, a new salon, or the best handyman in town, Yelp is the city and travel guide to finding the perfect places to eat, shop, drink, relax, visit and play.

Read online reviews, browse photos and menus, order takeout from favorite spots, make reservations, see hours, locations, and other important information for any business you’re looking for. 

Yelp puts great local businesses right at your fingertips. Discover new foods, hot spots, places for shopping and local businesses near me! While traveling or at home. Plus, order delivery or pickup. 

Yelp features: 
🍕 Local Eats: Find Restaurants and Food Delivery Near Me  🍕
• Find where to eat. Yelp shows all the newest, hottest and top rated places to eat and bars to drink nearby 
• Dine at local restaurants for breakfast, lunch and dinner, or get something to go
• Order timely food delivery
• Make quick reservations, book a table, order pickup or food delivery, view restaurant menus—all from your phone
• Read restaurant reviews from other Yelp users and scroll through photos to help you decide where to go
• Get amazing food deals for dining and delivery places nearby, plan dinner reservations for trips in advance

✍️ Review, Discover, and Add Photos 📸
• Discover local events, businesses and services like body shops and hair salons
• Look up addresses and phone numbers for businesses near me
• Read and write reviews, check-in to local businesses, upload photos and add tips for other Yelp users
• Browse photo galleries and add photos to share experiences
• Redeem great check-in offers in the area or sign up for cash back

🚗 Find Shops Around Me, Get Quotes, and Hire Professionals 🛠
• Find the coolest stores and top rated body shops complete with customer reviews and contact info 
• Hire local professionals for home renovation, car repair, car transport, landscaping, moving, and other hiring services
• Get quotes from professionals, message contractors nearby, and book appointments with a click
• Read millions of user reviews and recommendations by the Yelp community
• Filter searches by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, location, and hours of operation 

💅 Beauty - Pamper Yourself 💇
• Find highly-rated salons, spas, massage therapists, acupuncturists, and offers around me 
• Book appointments through Yelp at the most relaxing staycation destinations or find deals when traveling

🔍 Search Filters 🔍
• Filter search results by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, open now, and other specifics like good for groups, full bar, cuisine type etc.
• Look up addresses and phone numbers, call a business, order food delivery and make quick reservations directly from the Yelp app
• Find the top rated food, hotels or hiring services nearby or in cities like New York, Chicago, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Houston, Phoenix, Philadelphia

🍩 Features 🎨
• Read millions of expert user reviews and browse through beautiful photos of each business
• Write and read online reviews, check-in to local businesses, order pickup or delivery, upload photos, book appointments, find a new activity, and add tips for other Yelp users
• Use Yelp as a travel guide and as a food guide for eating, drink, things to do, to see, to shop and relax

Need Help? Contact Yelp at https://www.yelp-support.com/?l=en_US 
Note: Continued use of GPS running can dramatically decrease battery life. 

This software uses code of FFmpeg (http://ffmpeg.org) licensed under the LGPLv2.1 (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/lgpl-2.1.html) and its source can be downloaded here: https://github.com/Yelp/ffmpeg-android

Find top local restaurants, bars, hotels, events and other things to do around me, read customer reviews, order pickup or delivery, and search for services near me, all from the Yelp app.

• Look up addresses and phone numbers for businesses near me
• Read and write reviews, check-in to local businesses, upload photos and add tips for other Yelp users
• Browse photo galleries and add photos to share experiences
• Redeem great check-in offers in the area or sign up for cash back

🚗 Find Shops Around Me, Get Quotes, and Hire Professionals 🛠
• Find the coolest stores and top rated body shops complete with customer reviews and contact info
• Hire local professionals for home renovation, car repair, car transport, landscaping, moving, and other hiring services
• Get quotes from professionals, message contractors nearby, and book appointments with a click
• Read millions of user reviews and recommendations by the Yelp community
• Filter searches by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, location, and hours of operation

💅 Beauty - Pamper Yourself 💇
• Find highly-rated salons, spas, massage therapists, acupuncturists, and offers around me
• Book appointments through Yelp at the most relaxing staycation destinations or find deals when traveling

🔍 Search Filters 🔍
• Filter search results by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, open now, and other specifics like good for groups, full bar, cuisine type etc.
• Look up addresses and phone numbers, call a business, order food delivery and make quick reservations directly from the Yelp app
• Find the top rated food, hotels or hiring services nearby or in cities like New York, Chicago, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Houston, Phoenix, Philadelphia

🍩 Features 🎨
• Read millions of expert user reviews and browse through beautiful photos of each business
• Write and read online reviews, check-in to local businesses, order pickup or delivery, upload photos, book appointments, find a new activity, and add tips for other Yelp users
• Use Yelp as a travel guide and as a food guide for eating, drink, things to do, to see, to shop and relax

Need Help? Contact Yelp at https://www.yelp-support.com/?l=en_US
Note: Continued use of GPS running can dramatically decrease battery life.

This software uses code of FFmpeg (http://ffmpeg.org) licensed under the LGPLv2.1 (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/lgpl-2.1.html) and its source can be downloaded here: https://github.com/Yelp/ffmpeg-android

Find top local restaurants, bars, hotels, events and other things to do around me, read customer reviews, order pickup or delivery, and search for services near me, all from the Yelp app.
summary: Discover which restaurants are now open for reservations, takeout, or delivery!
recentChanges:
Sometimes your gutters get clogged, your chimney needs sweeping, and your trees get so overgrown the branches start scraping your bedroom window like the opening scene of a Halloween movie. Fortunately, this update can help with all that and more.

Search Yelp to find the right pro for all that work you need done around the house. We'll help match you with local contractors and make it easy to book a consultation with just a few clicks.

And other minor bug fixes and improvements too, of course.
comments: After the app updates on 10/29/20 a new review I posted indicated "save review as draft" when i chose "post review". Then it wouldn't allow me to update or post the draft. I exited and re-entered the app to find the review already posted. The notifications I received were incorrect. I've also attempted three times to update my profile pic for Halloween, and that's having issues. (Android user, yes I rebooted several times after yesterday's updates)

Yelp just cost me $75 in overages on my data plan because it's CONSTANTLY running in the background! It sucked 5.5 GB in one day! Apparently my phone settings were reset during an update, but this should NEVER have happened! Why do you need that much data from me?!
This app used 5 gb of my data from the background. I haven't even opened the app over a month but it's running in the background for some reason and takes up a lot of your data.

Uninstalled. I don't feel I have a use for your service anymore because of the recent unnecessary expansion of your business to implement a system of extrajudicial shaming/punishment, based solely on likely false or dubious accusations & without any semblance of due process, thru the awarding of special badges to businesses you feel are run or owned by those that you alone declare as undesirables. Try to not be too obvious with this badge however by making it a yellow star, pink triangle, etc.

Yelp has gotten worse then GOOGLE search when it comes to searching for the nearest business you search for. Your looking for a shell gas station then they put a station 3 times farther then you wanted as the 1 search! You drive past 3 stations to get to their 1 search results! I hope everyone who screwed up the yelp app to make more money instead of being actually a useful app dies of a horrible disease!

title: Restaurant Renovation
description:
Welcome to our restaurant🍷 and help us to revive this best restaurant ever!

Jessie’s Uncle, Bobby, is one of the best master chef👨‍🍳 in the world. Because of poor management, the restaurant traded brisk. Can you and Jessie help Bobby get the restaurants back to business💸 and attract more and more customers.

Practice your cooking🍴 techniques and management skills. Clear colorful🎨 match-3 levels to renovate and decorate the restaurant. Which styles of the decoration do you like? It’s all up to you!

We innovate a new gameplay of match-3----Paper Plane✈️. Make a square of four, and they'll turn into a paper plane and matching a paper plane with tiles of the same color will add layers to it. You will love this gameplay when you set them up, it’s really amazing!🎉

-HOW TO PLAY-
●Swap to match 3 or more similar tiles in a line to crush them.
●Make a square of four to create the paper plane.
●Match 5 or more to create amazing bombs.
●Collect energy to create the rainbow.
●Find different kinds of powerful combos is the key to solve puzzles and beat the levels.

-FEATURES-
●Completely free game to play;
●A huge, beautiful restaurant waiting for you renovating;
●Various interesting events in every week;
●Vivid character including a cute pet in our restaurant;
●Unique gameplay in match-3 game;
 
What are you waiting for?🤔
Download Now!
Join us and build your dream restaurant!😍

recentChanges:
-Update 70 new levels

comments: Edit... ok now I am deleting! That was ridiculous! I got a free hour and literally played a level 32 times and came NO where even close to solving. They say on here to contact them when stuck on a level, I did and they told me I needed to buy boosters. Also they ask for suggestions to make the game better. . Shove it up your..... delete

This game started out great but now after playing for several months it constantly crashes!!! Really takes the fun out of playing, especially when it does it while I am in the middle or towards the end of a level!! Uninstalling it.

Level 492 is seriously glitched. You're supposed to collect red and blue to fill up the bottles, but they dont fill up so it is bot possible to complete the level. Other than that, fun game. But this level needs to be looked at and fixed.

I read the reviews but thought I'd try anyway. Unless you pay, ads are forced. The game coding makes it so you either play many times to pass a level or pay-to-play if you don't have enough boosters or coins. A lot of the gamer's responses state they are a small company and the ads help them. They also state that they are looking at making improvements in subsequent updates, yet at the time I installed this game, no improvements or changes were made - compared to the comments in the reviews.

Love 3 match games..having the renovation was extra.. Made it to level 289.. It stop being fun when you take an upscale steak house and clutter the landscape with a childrens playground(waste of time).. The wedding venue space is to small for all the decorations added.. The match 3 is harder as u advance and is not that exciting..takes to long to get stars needed to do a task..

title: Uber Eats: Food Delivery
description:
Find Food Options For Your Budget. 

Hungry? Find the food you crave and order from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your food order in real-time. Get your food delivered by delivery people using the Uber Eats app.

FIND YOUR FAVORITE RESTAURANTS
Browse nearby restaurants and search for food by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, meal. Choose from a variety of food to order: Pizza. Burritos. Burgers. Sushi. Chinese food. Skip the line and reservations. Order food using the Uber Eats app now.

SIMPLE ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Order food to be delivered by delivery people as soon as possible.
Or, schedule your food order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER AHEAD, PICKUP, OR DELIVERY
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and go to the restaurant to get your food. Or, choose the new no-contact delivery option and request your order be left at your doorstep.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated delivery time to your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY
Join the thousands of others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order their favorites restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Abu Dhabi, Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Bogota, Brisbane, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Dubai, Hong Kong, Johannesburg, Glasgow, Liverpool, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Moscow, Mumbai, Nashville, New Delhi, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, Rio de Janeiro, San Diego, San Francisco, Sao Paulo, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Vienna, Warsaw, and Washington DC.  Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in Australia, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, Colombia, France, Japan, India, Mexico, New Zealand, Poland, Russia, South Africa, Spain, Taiwan, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States, and more.

THE APP CHOICE OF MILLIONS

Over 1 billion orders have been delivered by delivery people using the Uber Eats app. Join the millions who choose to order food using the Uber Eats app to get their favorite food today.
The Uber Eats app was selected as a Google Play "Editor's Choice" and was part of the "Best of 2018 Awards" for User’s Choice.

Visit ubereats.com for more details!

recentChanges:
We update the Uber Eats app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps the Uber Eats running.

Have a question? Tap Help in the Uber Eats app or visit help.uber.com.
comments: The app keeps crashing. It closes suddenly. I thought it was because of my buggy old phone, but now I'm using another phone model and it works well but the app keeps closing. I asked my friends and they told me it also occurs with them. I can't even order. Plus the attendance is the worse. I lost one account because I lost my old phone and the number was gone as well, then I couldn't recover it, I asked for help and the support never came. iFood never did that to me.

I pay for the monthly pass... And I am pissed off because it won't connect. And yes I've uninstalled and reinstalled. I've turned my phone one and off.... I needed up using Doordash with no problems only it cost me more money because I don't have a pass there. I'd like my 10 bucks back at this point. Uber needs help and no matter who I email I never hear anything back.

After half a year, the app didn't improve. Application is full of bugs. Even cannot register in the system. A Year ago it didn't accept my email address, half a year ago it did, but didn't show the keyboard for the first name/last name fields. Half a year later (oct 2020) still the same issue. Guys, how is it possible to create such a bad app? Shame

Worst app. Doesn't even run properly. App tries to connect to server but can't. After half an hour finally connects and asks for address and looks for food and bang no response. Just the same screen with address option. Looks like it is searching for food in Mars that's why there is no food around me. And the same process repeat again and again.

I can't get the app to open when on wifi. I have to take it off wifi on my android in order for it to work. Otherwise I get the same message "try again" and no matter how many times you click it , it won't open the app. I have a brand new S20 Ultra and it hasn't worked on my previous android wither.

title: Find Vegan Restaurants & Vegetarian Food- HappyCow
description:
Top vegan app in 180+ countries, this FREE healthy food locator is Android’s #1 vegan and vegetarian restaurant app guide! Use HappyCow to find gluten-free, vegan, or vegetarian restaurants near you and see 700,000+ reviews, or search up plant-based restaurants anywhere in the world when traveling. Our healthy dining finder is easy and free, and can be used for your 21 Day Vegan Kickstart! 

SEARCH:
★ Find 130,000+ vegan, vegetarian, plant-based, and gluten-free restaurants
★ Discover local health food stores, grocery stores, and farmers’ markets
★ Help plan a healthy diet, weight loss, or your 21 Day Vegan Kickstart
★ Search by location on an interactive map, perfect when planning a trip or traveling
★ Read 1,000,000+ reviews/photos to see users’ feedback, use it to find a top-rated cafe or restaurant
★ Get hours, directions, photos, and reviews of restaurants and grocery stores with vegan food

COMMUNITY/ENGAGE:
★ Share your favorite healthy restaurants with your friends
★ Upload photos of your delicious plant-based or gluten-free meals 
★ Submit reviews and advice for fellow users
★ Language support for Chinese, Dutch, English, French, German, Hebrew, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Spanish, and Portuguese

With the FULL / UPGRADED version you also get:
1) SAVE listings to your device for offline viewing, when you don't have Internet connection. Add places to visit to your Trips and Favorites lists.
2) SYNC & BACKUP  your Trips and Favorites lists with your member account.
3) FILTER businesses that are OPEN NOW only, so you don’t show up hungry at a closed restaurant! 
4) SEARCH by Keyword (i.e. Pizza, Organic, Japanese, Bakery, Mexican, Gluten-Free, Raw). It’s especially useful in big cities with too many options!
5) ALL Reviews. See all of our member reviews, not just the first 3.
6) NO Ads.
7) GOOD KARMAfor supporting this project and furthering the cause! Be happy with HappyCow.

You can use our app to plan meal prepping, healthy eating, diet, weight loss, or your 21 Day Vegan Kickstart. With HappyCow, it’s EASY and FREE to lead a healthy, plant-based lifestyle! 

Find vegan, vegetarian, veg-friendly, gluten-free, healthy restaurants, and health food markets and other vegetarian businesses nearby: whether you’re going to work, school, or traveling! Our top vegan app provides lists and maps of healthy dining in 180+ countries. 

Additionally, you can discover veg businesses like a vegan bakery or vegan store, vegetarian B&B, vegan catering, food trucks and farmers market. Featuring 1 million+ photos & reviews by vegetarians and vegans you can trust.

Currently not working in China without a VPN.

*********

NEED SUPPORT OR HAVE FEEDBACK?
Please contact us before leaving feedback or rating -- we’d like to help you.
Most issues resolved by uninstalling, restarting your device, then reinstalling.

Questions & feedback- please email: android@happycow.net

Please consider supporting HappyCow and this project by upgrading to the full version!

---

Q&A:

Why are permissions needed?

Location:
The app uses your device location to find restaurants near you. We do not store your  location on our servers.

Photos/Media/Files:
The app allows you to upload photos from your phone/tablet. We never access your photos until you choose to view them from within the app.

Camera:
The app allows you to take photos of your favorite restaurants. The app stores these photos with your other pictures on your device so you may admire them whenever you please, or upload at a later date. We never access your camera or save photos until you perform those actions from within the app.

Other:
We communicate with the HappyCow database to bring you the best vegan and vegetarian restaurants in the world!

---
Vegan-powered by HappyCow.com

Amazing App!!!!! Probably my favourite on my phone now, makes life so much easier for finding places to eat 👍👍👍

Extremely helpful! Especially when travelling! A must have app!
Opens an ad. The ad has nothing to do with vegan restaurants or veganism (advertising a financial service). There's no way to close the ad and get into the apps UI. What's this? Greed maybe?

description:

If you’re interested in using this app, You can call us on (or) say "Hi" on whatsApp

Watch & subscribe to MCOOK YouTube channel for product demo & latest updates.
=======================

MCOOK restaurant management app is the fastest way to handle restaurants' orders. MCook makes the life of waiters, managers, cooks and owners easier. Orders of customers can be taken in seconds. The kitchen receive the orders as soon as the manager take them. The app is recommended for any restaurant who doesn't want to fumble around with pen and paper.

MCOOK is an affordable and easy-to-use Point of Sale (POS) + web portal which is sync with the app so owners or manager can instantly know what's going on his restaurant on their web screen. It's perfect for every restaurant, bar, coffee shop, pub, pizzeria, Deli, Bistro and other business in the food industry.The app is also helpful to save your customer details and helpful in building the brand of your restaurant.

MCOOK is the most user-friendly restaurant POS for Android devices. The app doesn't require any initial long setup. Spend less time configuring the POS and more time making your restaurant and menu charming.

title: Arby's
description:
Arby’s the restaurant is now Arby’s the app on your phone. Well, it’ll be on your phone once you download it. Browse sandwiches, sides, drinks and desserts on Arby’s menu, find Arby’s restaurants near you and be sure to create an account to get deals found only on an app made by Arby’s.
Guests not visiting test restaurants will be able to find their nearest Arby’s location, browse the restaurant’s menu, and enjoy digital exclusive national offers by showing the in-app offer to an Arby’s team member.
descriptionHTML:
Arby’s the restaurant is now Arby’s the app on your phone. Well, it’ll be on your phone once you download it. Browse sandwiches, sides, drinks and desserts on Arby’s menu, find Arby’s restaurants near you and be sure to create an account to get deals found only on an app made by Arby’s.
Guests not visiting test restaurants will be able to find their nearest Arby’s location, browse the restaurant’s menu, and enjoy digital exclusive national offers by showing the in-app offer to an Arby’s team member.
summary: Find your favorite Arby’s location, get offers, and browse the menu.
recentChanges: This update includes a handful of bug fixes and enhancements that we hope improves your app experience.
comments: This app is completely useless! Not only can you not buy anything through it they're too lazy to update their hours. You have to call to see if the store is open when the app says. The one store that I go to sometimes was supposed to be open until 11:00. I got there shortly after 9:00 and it was already closed even though the app still says that they're open until 11:00 weekdays and 12:00 on weekends.

Like others, the few times I've been able to sign into the app, I expected some deals if some sort. I. An rarely get into the app...consistently get "user not found". When in a store an Arbys employee said sometimes you have to uninstall/reinstall the app to get it to work. Have done that a few times now. Was also told sometimes resetting the password helps... have done that as well. Can't get in at all now after trying all those things. Worthless app

App is only good for menu item information. There is no option for mobile orders and no information on current promotions. There are no deals like all other apps. Basically if you want product info, great then its a 5 star app. If you want to use it for anything else its a zero. Followed the steps in the faq area to resolve the app issues with no results. Cleared cache, cleared data and even uinistalled / reinstalled and the app still works the same. Now time to remove for the last time.

Completely pointless. Seriously just an app to view the menu. There are never any offers and you literally can't do anything else on it besides select your nearest Arby's... for no reason whatsoever. Seriously I've gotten promotional emails for coupons before but there's nothing in the app. SMH. I like Arby's but this is just stupid.

The app does nothing but show a menu, poorly presented. You can't order and pay online, the two BASIC things necessary for it to be useful. Just about every other fast food app has this functionality. I did see a coupon where you need to show your phone to the cashier to redeem it; that earns it the 2nd star, a generous rating based on its competition.

title: A&W Restaurants
description: A&W mobile app ordering is only available in select markets in California, Idaho, Iowa, Kansas, Michigan, Wisconsin and Kentucky. With the A&W Restaurants app, ordering your favorite food to-go has never been easier. Simply open the app, browse the menu, select your items, and voila! Special features include: restaurant info, full menu access, order ahead, special instructions, tipping, and saving your account info as well as Android Pay for easy checkout. Download. Order. Eat. Repeat.

comments: Actually zero stars but the review doesn't give that choice. I want to delete all my data from and uninstall the app because the app doesn't work at all. Please advise how to do that ASAP!! :/

The app is all but non-functional without a third party account. GPS is locked out, you can't even put in your address to see if there are any locations close by(there's one about 10 minutes from my house) and it doesn't show up on the map at all. Pretty much useless unless you hand over personal data to a company(ChowHound) that I've never heard of. No thanks. A&W with another swing and a miss
I can see why it got so low ratings! It only gives me the option to shop "near me" which lists it 357 mi away and it won't let me change it! Useless, uninstalling!

This app is terrible. The location says the nearest a&w is 400 miles aways and I'm only about 5 miles away from an a&w. You can't enter a location because the address form doesn't work. VERY DISSATISFIED
Horrible allowed for location ,but wouldn't let me add my address. App say there are only six locations in all of US , I know that there are at least two in my area . Fix your app

title: Locate HappyPlate - Menu Finder, Restaurant Finder
description:
Our revolutionary menu finder provides the most comprehensive database of restaurants and nearby menus, with unprecedented searchability.  Users select the cuisine, their desired course and/or the dishes they are craving and Locate HappyPlate returns the matching nearby restaurants as well each restaurant’s current menu. 

Locate HappyPlate is highly efficient as both a restaurant finder and a menu finder, and now has the added feature of restaurant alcohol availability. Now you can know ahead of time if a nearby restaurant has a full bar, beer and wine, or no alcohol available. 

The Locate HappyPlate restaurant and menu finder is like having a personal dining concierge at your fingertips. One of the most convenient features is the speed at which the menus and nearby restaurants are accessible. Users have access to nearby menus much faster than going to websites and clicking on their menu or searching the internet and popular review sites.

Locate HappyPlate is a convenient app for everyone in the continental US, and is very useful in situations where everyone is wanting something different to eat. Just input the food that each person is craving and the app will not only show you the nearby restaurants that can accommodate all of the requests, but Locate HappyPlate also displays the restaurant’s menu with the desired items highlighted on the menu. The app is a great time saver for vacations, as the user can find all nearby restaurants and their menus, both chains and local spots.

Our system does not support or include reviews from any source, because everyone's experience is unique. We have all been to a place because of reviews and it did not live up to expectations at all, as well as been to a great restaurant and looked it up afterwards and to see it had a bad rating and bad reviews. 

Over 1000 different restaurants, 98,000 locations, 45,000 dishes, millions of different dining option combinations and growing. Searching nearby menus has never been so easy! Locate HappyPlate’s all-American teams verify all menus regularly to ensure that all menu options and locations stay up-to-date. . 
Locate HappyPlate's menu finder database contains most of the national restaurant chains, and is currently adding regional restaurants to the restaurant finder. Our app data and development teams are working hard to add all of the local restaurants across the United States.

The 9.14.18 update was the biggest yet with 365 local restaurants added from the NWFL area, bringing the NWFL local restaurant count to over 800. Each restaurant listing has the menu and directions, plus the  restaurant's alcohol availability.
All cities from Escambia to Bay County  including Pensacola, Gulf Breeze, Navarre, Navarre Beach, Milton, Crestview, Fort Walton Beach, Destin, Niceville, DeFuniak Springs, Freeport, Santa Rosa Beach, Grayton Beach, Seaside, Rosemary Beach, Alys Beach, Shalimar, Miramar Beach, Lynn Haven, Panama City and Panama City Beach are now represented.

recentChanges:
V 0.0.5- Multi-selection in the cravings box is now available. Alcohol availability of restaurants added and the database has been extensively curated for quality of data. Locally, the NWFL local restaurant count is over 800. All cities from Escambia to Bay County are now represented.

comments: Great idea for menus however when you click on a restaurant it would be helpfull if it showed the location and distance away. Instead you have to click on the car icon and that takes you to goggle maps and this is way to time consuming and Im not going to do this for ever restaurant im interested in.
Super tool for finding new restaurants. easy and fast. so far haven't had a single issue. Never seen a way to search menus like this app before
Awesome! No more searching the web for menus or getting bored with the same old spots... This app has become my go to when eating out!
Yay, no more searching around on the internet for menus! This app also makes it easy to find vegetarian meals.
Very useful and helpful for me and for those who are first timers to the area.

title: My Cafe — Restaurant game
description:
Join more than 50 million coffee lovers around the world and unleash your entrepreneurial spirit in this FUN and RELAXING restaurant game. Decide on your cafe or restaurant business STRATEGY and earn income, even when you are offline!

RESTAURANT GAME SIMULATION
• With My Cafe you can own and grow a coffee shop or a restaurant of your dreams 
• Decorate your coffee shop as you wish, hire and train staff, decide on cafe menu items and even set prices as you see fit

CAFE MAKEOVER
• Do you have a knack for design? Hone your interior design skills and do a total cafe or a restaurant makeover
• In this cooking game, you can choose from numerous decor styles, position furniture as you wish, and make a coffee shop totally yours by accentuating with elements that show your true self

INTERACTIVE STORYLINES IN YOUR CAFE
• As a true coffee shop owner, you will get to meet your customers from various backgrounds and get to help them navigate through life. In this restaurant game you can pick between different lines of dialogue with customers and see where your story takes you! 
• Do you like drama? Romance? In My Cafe, the choice is all yours!

GO SOCIAL WITH MY CAFE
• Play my cafe with friends and meet like-minded coffee lovers to form townships and compete against owners of other coffee shops
• Fulfill festival tasks and lead your town to success together!

COFFEE AND CAFE MANIA: Do you love coffee as much as we do? 
• Unleash your barista superpower and create custom coffee and tea drinks for all your guests
• Unlock unique coffee recipes and spice up everyone’s life in your cafe with distinctive coffee drink combinations

••••••••••••••••••••••
My Cafe: Recipes & Stories is FREE to download and play with no obligations to pay. However, some in-game items can be purchased for real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off in-app purchases in your device’s settings
••••••••••••••••••••••
Note: An internet connection is required to play the game

Follow our official page to get the latest news and helpful tips on how to develop your cooking game:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame

developerAddress: 105, Agion Omologiton Avenue, 1080 Nicosia, Cyprus
recentChanges:
Psst, everybody!

Do you want to sell a recipe with any spices to a customer? Maybe you're tired of manually recharging machines and you wish the coffee shop earned bigger profits?

Boosters will help you in these and other situations. Win them in the Bunny Game, get them when you reach a new level, or look for them in special offers and gifts.

You can read more in our social network groups. Have fun!
comments: I don't like spending money on games, but I do watch a lot of ads. This game can be easily played without spending money (you just have to be VERY patient and use some kind of strategy), but unfortunately in the new updated they have been replacing features that were free with the same features, but paid. I don't mind that they sell stuff, but removing the features that already exist to make people pay more is very greedy and rude. I hope they fix this but so far I am very disappointed.

This use to be a very nice game. Honestly, I fell in love with the ease of everything which led me to feel fine about spending some real money on certain things. Why not, right? Well...this game has become a nightmare. They completely began to change everything around, without warning or hesitation, to basically charge players for anything and everything they can. Their customer service is terrible, and there customer care base is at a solid zero. I would seriously not suggest anyone play this

This was my first review with 5 stars: This is the first game that i didnt feel bored at all. Now, i'm changing my rating to 1 star! The update was horrible. This game has become more and more expensive to play. I am vip 7 but im getting tired of playing. The devs seem to make it a money making game now. It's not fun anymore! They took minimize the gifts in the bunny game. Now they made it hard for everyone to play without spending!

Don't download the game. I've been playing it almost from the beginning but this game is not worth anymore! If you don't spend you will not enjoy it at all. I am a VIP player and I never complained about any update,not even about almost every bug that came with a new update but this one is a big bul*s*it! They made the game not fun anymore,and if you are a nin-VIP is even worse. Again,choose any other game to play but not this one.

It's OKAY. I've installed and reinstalled a few times, and this time I started from the beginning (my fault). It does try to make you pay to play A LOT. They've recentydone this thing where when you ask the customers what they want and you tap on that recipe it shows you the ingredients needed on the bottom left side of your screen. I prefer to make the recipe thru memory that way it's more challenging and fun! I love this game, but pls make it more fun and easier for the no-pay players to play!

title: AllergyEats
description:
Trusted by food-allergic diners since 2010, AllergyEats is the leading guide to allergy-friendly restaurants in the U.S. Free and easy-to-use, AllergyEats provides valuable peer-based ratings reflecting how well (or poorly) restaurants accommodate food-allergic guests. This sharing of real experiences from other food-allergic diners allows you to quickly and easily find restaurants that have been the most willing and best able to properly address the unique needs of food-allergic guests.

• Discover allergy-friendly restaurants at home, on vacation or on the road - anywhere in the U.S.
• Customize your search results for major allergens and dietary restrictions
• View AllergyEats’ proprietary “allergy-friendliness” restaurant ratings
• Read restaurant reviews from other food-allergic diners
    •	Access the menus of over 400,000 restaurants, as well as the allergy menus for some as well
• Find places to dine in Disney World parks and hotels on AllergyEats Disney World
• Use AllergyEats NYC or AllergyEats DC to locate restaurants near popular landmarks in those cities (with more to come)
• Make reservations at over 20,000 U.S. restaurants via one-click OpenTable links
• Earn recognition points for rating, sharing, and adding comments

Find. Rate. Share. We Are All In This Together!

***Love our free app? Please take a moment to review it in this app store! *** Don’t like it? Contact us at contact@allergyeats.com.

*Please note that AllergyEats is a guide, not a guarantee. Restaurant ratings are based on the opinions of food-allergic diners, not allergy experts. Always carry emergency medication and discuss your allergies with restaurant staff in advance. Please see the Dining Tips on the AllergyEats app for more detailed advice.

recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: It's a good idea, but was entirely useless for me. I entered my location and allergen (just dairy) and it didn't seem to filter the results at all. Most of the results say nothing about the dairy allergen and some that I knew for sure had no dairy free options. If it worked it would also be nice to have menu links in the app.

This app lasted about 5 minutes on my phone. I live in a large metro area, and there are only 5 restaurants listed in a 5 mile search. When doing a location-based (not zip code) search, restaurants show up all out of order, not by closest ones. I will just continue looking up each restaurant's allergy menus online. One way this could actually be effective is for only non-chain restaurants to be listed that don't have their information online.

The app is great!! I only wish more info was available. When we are planning to go somewhere and there is no info because no one has rated the restaurant it would be great to have info based on other related stores or just general info about the restaurant policies and procedures relating to allergies easily available.

This app is great, you can type in your or your child's allergies and the city and state. The options come up and what is great is it is not just a star rating system it also has the reviewers allergies and comments directly from them. And you know how the establishment handled those specific allergies! So great!

I always have this app on hand when traveling to choose a place that others have eaten at safely. There aren't quite enough restaurant ratings yet (but there are a lot: there are more here than anywhere else), so please download this app and rate the restaurants your eat at: for my sake, if not for your own! :)

title: Scan menu
description:
ScanMenu

Scan menu è una applicazione per la visualizzazione dei menu di locali e per il take away.

Caratteristiche principali dei Menù:
Visualizzazione menù tramite lettura del QRCode.
Consultazioni dei menù di tutti i ristoranti presenti in ogni momento.
Numero illimitato di menu per ogni ristorante.
3 foto al massimo per ogni ristorante.
Una foto per ogni piatto.
14 allergeni associabili ad ogni piatto.
Prezzo in euro per ogni piatto.
4 lingue di traduzioni disponibili (inglese, francese, spagnolo e tedesco).
Categorie personalizzabili per ogni menu con possibilità di associargli una icona.

Caratteristiche Take Away
Funzione di asporto disponibile per i ristoranti che aderiscono, il cliente seleziona i piatti e le quantità da ordinare e tramite delle notifiche sul proprio cellulare riceve la conferma dell’ordine dal ristorante.

La configurazione della app avviene tramite una web app (Internet Explorer, Chrome e Firefox) all’indirizzo  http://topgate.it:8084/ScanMenu oppure inviando una email a topgate2011@gmail.com compilando un apposito modulo.

Costi
Funzione di visualizzazione menù tramite QRCode gratis per i primi 3 mesi, poi 10 euro + iva al mese
Funzione di Take Away: 10 euro al mese + iva.

Per ulteriori informazioni inviare email topgate2011@gmail.com lasciando un recapito telefonico
Per abilitare la versione test cliccare sul ? in altro a destra (vedi prima foto)

Descrizione dettagliata

Seleziona QRCode: Leggendo il QR Code del ristorante si accede direttamente al menù del ristorante. I ristoranti possono essere filtrati per categoria. Nel menù è disponibile la funzionalità di cerca piatto. Per cambiare lingua cliccare sulla bandiera del paese disponibile

Seleziona Ristorante: Si accede ai menù di tutti i ristoranti presenti nella App, questa funzione serve per dare ai clienti la possibilità di visualizzare i menù in ogni momento.
I ristoranti possono essere filtrati per categoria. All’interno del menù è disponibile la funzionalità di cerca piatto. Per cambiare lingua cliccare sulla bandiera del paese disponibile.
Per visualizzare la descrizione gli allergeni di ogni piatto cliccare sulle icone degli allergeni, si aprirà una finestra con le descrizioni complete nella lingua selezionata.

Take away: Funzione di asporto disponibile solo per i ristoranti che hanno aderito a questa offerta. 
Vengono visualizzati solo i ristoranti che hanno la funzione di asporto. Cliccare sulla immagine del ristorante dal quale si vuol ordine per l’asporto. Cliccare il menu desiderato, per ogni piatto sono disponibili i pulsanti + e – che permettono di determinare la quantità da ordinare.
In alto a destra è presente l’icona del carrello che visualizza in tempo reale le quantità da ordinare.
Premendo sul carrello viene visualizzato il riepilogo dell’ordine. Selezionare la fascia oraria desiderata per il take away dell’ordine, digitare un nome di riconoscimento, scrivere delle eventuali note e procedere a registrare il proprio numero di telefono.  Aspettare una notifica di conferma sul proprio numero di cellulare precedentemente inserito e digitare il codice di conferma ricevuto con la notifica. Successivamente alla conferma o all’annullamento dell’ordine da parte del ristorante verrà inviata al numero di cellulare precedentemente inserito una notifica di conferma o di annullamento dell’ordine.

Seleziona Ristorante: Si accede ai menù di tutti i ristoranti presenti nella App, questa funzione serve per dare ai clienti la possibilità di visualizzare i menù in ogni momento.
I ristoranti possono essere filtrati per categoria. All’interno del menù è disponibile la funzionalità di cerca piatto. Per cambiare lingua cliccare sulla bandiera del paese disponibile.
Per visualizzare la descrizione gli allergeni di ogni piatto cliccare sulle icone degli allergeni, si aprirà una finestra con le descrizioni complete nella lingua selezionata.

Take away: Funzione di asporto disponibile solo per i ristoranti che hanno aderito a questa offerta.
Vengono visualizzati solo i ristoranti che hanno la funzione di asporto. Cliccare sulla immagine del ristorante dal quale si vuol ordine per l’asporto. Cliccare il menu desiderato, per ogni piatto sono disponibili i pulsanti + e – che permettono di determinare la quantità da ordinare.
In alto a destra è presente l’icona del carrello che visualizza in tempo reale le quantità da ordinare.
Premendo sul carrello viene visualizzato il riepilogo dell’ordine. Selezionare la fascia oraria desiderata per il take away dell’ordine, digitare un nome di riconoscimento, scrivere delle eventuali note e procedere a registrare il proprio numero di telefono. Aspettare una notifica di conferma sul proprio numero di cellulare precedentemente inserito e digitare il codice di conferma ricevuto con la notifica. Successivamente alla conferma o all’annullamento dell’ordine da parte del ristorante verrà inviata al numero di cellulare precedentemente inserito una notifica di conferma o di annullamento dell’ordine.
summary: App for viewing restaurant menus via QR Code reading.
recentChanges: Delivery e take-away. Bug fix
comments: Did not function

title: BLACK FOODIE FINDER: RESTAURANTS NEAR ME
description:
Are you looking for black community owned café, bar or restaurant in your area? Will you like to explore the black people foodie culture by attending local events? How about trying out new recipes shared by black chefs? The Black Foodie Finder – Restaurants Near Me is an ideal food finder app for black people who want to try something true to their culture and inherent taste. 

BFF is a fantastic food directory app that offers a one in all solution for anyone who is looking for black owned restaurants, food trucks and eateries across the United States. This user friendly app is exclusively designed to help people who are specifically looking for black owned food places. 

What’s amazing about this black owned restaurant app is the fact that it covers over 5,000 locations! Black Foodie Finder offers the most extensive listing of black owned restaurants that gives users with a plethora of choice to pick from. 

Apart from helping you find black owned restaurants, the BFF app also provides you with a listing of chefs and catering services. So, whether you need to find chef, recipes or any food products catering to the needs of the black community, BFF covers it all!

Eat Out is South Africa's premier restaurant discovery, booking and review app, from the creators of SA’s best guide to SA’s best food, www.eatout.co.za .

title: Foodlocate - Restaurants around you
description:
Foodlocate is the comprehensive platform for restaurants and good food - with images, reviews, menus, prices, addresses, recipes and table booking.

We strive to provide the most comprehensive database about food and restaurants. It is the one stop place for everyone trying to retrieve information on food - where to eat, what to eat, what it costs and what to consider. Browse through the endless list of options, narrow down the search results by choosing from the categories such as cuisines, amenities, pricing, online table booking and reviews.

Learn about new dishes, recipes, locations and other useful information. Foodlocate is constantly expanding and currently available in 20 countries around the world in six languages.

title: R2N – Discount on restaurants & Cafes
description:
Restaurant 2 Night provides you with restaurant experiences at a great price if you book the restaurants' last available tables. Every day there is a wide selection of great deals on everything from cozy cafes to exclusive gourmet restaurants.

No discount menus! 
With R2N you always get to choose from the whole menu, and your discount applies to both food and drinks. Please remember that a 25% discount on the entire bill often is better than 50% of the food - especially if you enjoy a good bottle of wine.

Here is no discrimination! 
By reading the many reviews written by other R2N users, you can see that you will get the same good treatment as the other guests, although you get the special offer.

With the app, you can:
- Book a table with discount on the total bill. 
- Search restaurant deals by distance or make specific searches such as name or area
- Sort search results by distance, reviews, value for money, cuisine type and more
- View menus, photos and descriptions of the restaurants
- Read reliable user reviews from other R2N users

There are restaurants for every taste and for every occasion. Common to them all is that they give you a good discount if you book when they have tables available that evening.

We negotiate with the restaurants to get you the best possible deals, so everyone wins: the restaurant optimizes its sales by filling the empty tables, and you benefit from getting a good price.

Bon appetite!

recentChanges:
Voila! The R2N development team is ready to serve a new and cutting edge update for you 🙂

Improvements in the app:

• Get tips on particularly good offers near you (remember to turn on location services)
• See which restaurants have won the R2N Dining Awards
• Improved map view
• Minor bug fixes and speed improvements

If you are happy with our free service, the whole R2N team would greatly appreciate your review of the app.

Thank you for using R2N.
comments: This is an amazing app to help go out enjoy life at fullest. We have experienced so many new restaurants we wouldn't have been able to find otherwise. Saving money and exploring new food is among my favorite things.

Booked a table at l'Alsace and had a great experience in the cozy restaurant in the old part of Copenhagen. At the end of the meal the waiter came out with a big smile and told me descretely that the 25% discount had been taken off the bill, ofcourse including the bottle of wine we had shared for dinner. Have used the app before which was ok, but the new version is easy to navigate, appetising and really user friendly.
Vores foretrukne discount app for restauranter i Storkøbenhavn Grafisk brugerflade kunne den være mere moderne ellers 5 stjerner
Genial app, til at prøve nogle nye restauranter af.

Super app. Den udvikles hele tiden i retning af større fleksibilitet og er meget intuitiv at bruge. God til planlagte såvel som mere spontane restaurantbesøg - og fremragende til at give inspiration til og variation af kulinariske oplevelser i byen.

This App basically works but it does not allow me to fully select which restaurants I want on the wheel. I keep deleting Wendys, Gordos, and Arbys and replacing them but they keep reappearing. It is nice that you can create multiple wheels, I would like it if more restaurants could be put on the same wheel.
Unable to select your location so you are unable to choose restaurants near you. Everytime I search it brings up restaurants in New Delhi, India, which is not my location.

comments: The game is fun but 120 rubies to add more time on the level that you're on and maybe only one away from going on to the next level. If you only have 20 rubies now you have to buy more my grandchildren don't have enough allowance to spend on buying more rubies come on guys think about that because now they need an adult to spend a lot of money on a game.

The statement " We create levels different in complexity to make the game more interesting and exciting. All levels are tested manually and possible to pass. Boosters and other extra materials of the game you can get in daily gift or buy in store." is BS! Who is testing these games? The time levels especially the ice cream levels takes so many tries to beat. The time shouldn't start until the people order shows. The coins should be used for boosters or gems. Addictive but NOT WORTH IT!

This started off very well. But then it was frustrating as the booster were impossible to get and the upgrades were way to expensive. I just wanted to play a game where you do not have to pay to get stuff. This is just not right.

Levels are hard to pass without boosts or added time too soon...they want you to spend money ... just like most of these free cooking games. I enjoy the game and the graphics but I don't enjoy it enough to spend money on it.... time to find a new game again.

This game is insane. I make the food and it wont let me click it to serve it to the customer. Im on level 250 or something. And this just started. Its very frustrating. Very disappointed because i enjoyed this game. Ige checked for updates and have even deleted and re downloaded the game. Still wont work properly.

title: Where Chefs Eat
description:
Third edition of the global restaurant guidebook. Forget the restaurant guides with entries chosen by a panel of 'experts'. This guide is by the real specialists, featuring over 7,000 recommendations for more than 4,500 restaurants in more than 70 countries from more than 650 of the world's best chefs, including: Jason Atherton, Shannon Bennett, Helena Rizzo, Stephen Harris, Yotam Ottolenghi, Yoshihiro Narisawa, and hundreds more. 

Download this app now and access the best places to eat near you or research the best places to eat for your next trip. Broken down by recommendations for the best places for breakfast, late night, regular neighbourhood, local favorite, bargain, high end, wish I’d opened and worth the travel. Additional information for each restaurant from opening times, style and cuisine will help you select the best eateries near and far.
descriptionHTML:
Third edition of the global restaurant guidebook. Forget the restaurant guides with entries chosen by a panel of 'experts'. This guide is by the real specialists, featuring over 7,000 recommendations for more than 4,500 restaurants in more than 70 countries from more than 650 of the world's best chefs, including: Jason Atherton, Shannon Bennett, Helena Rizzo, Stephen Harris, Yotam Ottolenghi, Yoshihiro Narisawa, and hundreds more.

Download this app now and access the best places to eat near you or research the best places to eat for your next trip. Broken down by recommendations for the best places for breakfast, late night, regular neighbourhood, local favorite, bargain, high end, wish I’d opened and worth the travel. Additional information for each restaurant from opening times, style and cuisine will help you select the best eateries near and far.
summary: International Restaurant Guide
developerAddress:
18 Regents Wharf
All Saints Street
London N1 9PA
recentChanges: Stability and performance improvements
comments: Navigation is clunky to use as the back arrow isn't linked to the android back arrow button. Map is REALLY slow - I dont understand why as it's just using Google maps. Worst of all I want to look at restaurants in Cambridge, UK - it shows me Cambridge, Massachusetts, USA. I cant even look at restaurants in my home town!
difficult to navigate app, needs better design. when getting back to see other surrounding restaurants it zooms all the way out and forces you to refind the restaurant.
Terrible interface and usability is terrible. I own all the books and thought the app would be good to use out and about. No way worth 9.99
Not free. Once you install it you need to purchase the guide. No trial avail.
Had it on the I phone and it was amazing. Now had to buy it again for android and it's awful can't even use it. Such a shame.

title: Waiter POS Restaurant POS Bar Point of Sale
description:
Waiterio Restaurant POS is the fastest way to handle restaurants' orders.

Waiterio makes the life of waiters and cooks easier. Orders of customers can be taken in seconds. The kitchen receive the orders as soon as the waiters take them. The app is recommended for any waiter and cook who doesn't want to fumble around with pen and paper.

Waiterio is an affordable and easy-to-use Point of Sale (POS). It's perfect for every restaurant, bar, coffee shop, pub, pizzeria, Deli, Bistro and other business in the food industry.

Waiterio is the most user friendly restaurant POS app. The app doesn't require any initial long setup. Spend less time configuring the POS and more time making your restaurant and menu charming.


"Very cool. The app works splendidly, really saves you the hassle of writing everything"
waiter from Franco's Little Italy restaurant


► TAKE ORDERS FASTER
A couple of taps and there you go, the customer's order was taken and sent to the kitchen.

► CREATE THE BEST MENU
Customize your menu with categories and extra toppings and share it with all the rest of the staff.

► INVITE YOUR FELLOW CO-WORKERS
Invite your colleagues to use Waiterio so orders and menu are automatically shared.

► RECEIVE PAYMENTS
Waiterio is a fully functional POS system. Calculate the total for an order and receive the payments by cash or credit card.

► PRINT THE ORDER AND YOU ARE DONE
Waiterio can print orders in the kitchen and invoices for customers.

► REPORTS TO REACH PERFECTION
Check the revenues of the day/week/month. Discover which dishes are doing great and which ones should be removed from the menu.
 
► TABLET AT TABLE
You can leave a tablet at a customer's table. The customers will be able to read the menu and order their food directly from the tablet.
 

MORE FEATURES:
- note for item
- extra topping for item
- courses
- split bill
- service charge
- tax
- print daily report
- export report to .csv
- login with PIN
- print using thermal printers


WORKS AS:
- Restaurant POS System
- Restaurant Point of Sale Free
- Restaurant Software
- Ordering system
- Table management system
- Point of Sale Bar
- Coffee shop POS
- Cafe Point of Sale
- pub POS
- Bistro POS

Waiterio works with all thermal printers that support the ESC POS protocol.

Waiterio is also available for iOS:
itunes.apple.com/us/app/waiterio/id848943564

Waiterio is also available for PC and Mac:
Visit www.waiterio.com/downloads to download the installer for your OS.

Contact us at any time
info@waiterio.com

Follow Waiterio on Facebook
www.facebook.com/waiterio

recentChanges: Fixed sound notification for new or changed order
comments: 1. It seems to work OK, have not tried the import function, nor the printer function yet. 2. The total comes out correctly, including tax, however, it does not look like the food receipt that we are familiar to, which shown sub-total for each food item, shown the sub-total for all food items, the applicable tax, then the grand total. 3. I have tried a few other POS app., and this is the best that I see so far. 4. I hope that you could consider the suggestions provided above.

Infuriating rubbish! Spent ages setting up my tables and entering my menu (dont get me started on why on earth you should have to download secondary apps to gain LAN codes for something that should be straightforward such as a a bluetooth printer connection). However my real gripe is after entering g the bills for 16 guests - who pay weekly, ALL table bills were cleared overnight; regardless of whether they had paid or not, the app decided in its Infinite wisdom to delete all my guests tabs.
I think this is a great app, easy to use and has the right functions. One thing I would REALLY like is to have a voucher system, where if you apply one, it removes the amount of money. Thanks!
Love the app. Sure handy. Would like to be able to have more than 1 menu (lunch and dinner) and would also like to be able to add more than 1 note to an item.
by far the best and easiest pos apps to use, perfect for my business... too bad credit card is the only method of payment for upgrade

title: Bakery Story™
description:
Mix🍰, Bake🍞, Serve🍽!, and Earn💰 in this free baking, restaurant game! Choose to bake from over a thousand different delicious restaurant level recipes.  As the Master Baking Chef you get to decide what to bake, how much of it to bake, and who gets to eat the baked goods! Baking in this bakery game is only half the fun! You also get to design your restaurant any way you want in this baking game! Design a corner Coffee Cafe ☕, design an upscale Patisserie 🥐, or design a good old fashioned bread Bakery🥖, we give YOU the chance to design the bakery, diner, or restaurant of your dreams!

New content will be released EVERY WEEK for your baking pleasure, so the game continually gets even better🌈! You can bake pizza, bake pies, bake salmon.  We let you bake whatever you want! It’s YOUR baking game! If you want to cook some spaghetti on the baking top, that works too!

Get baking all the recipes your Mama loves! All baking games are not all the same.  Bakery Story has the most baking game options out there! Cook the best food by baking it first! Or cook the food first and then finish it off by baking it! Cooking games are not all the same.  This cooking game let’s you bake, design, and have fun all in the same cooking game restaurant!

- Design and build a unique bakery with stunning variety and creativity.
- Customize and choose to bake a restaurant-class menu to suit your tastes.
- Showcase your bakery and or restaurant and earn extra-special tips at your restaurant by baking the best food possible.
- Invite your Facebook friends to view your newly designed restaurant game.
- Exchange secret baking recipes with your friends at your restaurant.
- Simple and easy-to-use restaurant baking game tap interface.
- FREE updates with new restaurant level pastries, restaurant level decorations, restaurant themes and more EVERY WEEK!
- It's a free cooking game that lets you design your restaurant for  FREE!

PLEASE NOTE:
- This is an online game only.
-Baking Gamers wanted!
-#1 Baking Games
-#1 Cooking Game for your pleasure!
-Remember, baking is a state of mind!

Please note that BAKERY STORY™ is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to Settings Menu -> General -> Restrictions option. You can then simply turn off In-App Purchases under "Allowed Content". In addition, BAKERY STORY™ may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have access to your information through such services.

Storm8 Studios is the #1 Mobile Social Game Developer on Android.

Use of this application is governed by the Storm8 Studios Terms of Service. Collection and use of data are subject to Storm8 Studios Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at http://www.storm8-studios.com/terms/ and http://www.storm8-studios.com/privacy/

Follow Storm8
www.storm8-studios.com
facebook.com/storm8
twitter.com/storm8
http://www.storm8.com/game/bakery-story/

comments: I would rate higher, but there are goals that require you buy things that don't exist anymore. (Sweetco) chairs. pretty much all of those goals in the beginning. And goals that want you to download games for gems that don't exist. So, without spending actual money on gems you're just stuck on goals and never move forward. That's the issue I'm facing right now.

I would rate higher, but there are goals that require you buy things that don't exist anymore. (Sweetco) chairs.. pretty much all of those goals in the beginning. And goals that want you to download games for gems that don't exist. So, without spending actual money on gems you're just stuck on goals and never move forward. That's the issue I'm facing right now.

Sucks even worse than restaurant story. Constantly glitching, I'll have thousands of coins worth of food that should last for days and days come back an hour later and it's all gone. I do get the coins for it but that's not the point. I need food to last more than a frikin hour. And just like restaurant story I start food and come back and it's not actually started cooking yet. So aggravating especially when it comes to goals! If I haven't completed a goal its because of the ridiculousglitching!

I have been playing this game for so long and there is an issue for now. I didn't receive all the notification in the game for the food is done and whatever, even I turn everything on and I have tried to uninstall it an download it again. It still have the same issue. Please solve it ASAP.

Game needs major changes I had a bunch of gems and was swiping to see the expansion prices and sizes and the game thought i clicked on purhcase a crate for 24 gems. I had to send them a email. The swiping is extremely sensitive and anyone can accidentally hit a crate without meaning to. Please fix this because I've been a player of this game for about 9 years. If its not a money hungry company I hope they fix it. I sent them an email so they can give me my refund or ill have to dispute.

title: My Cooking - Restaurant Food Cooking Games
description:
Join My cooking, a well-made cooking game, which can be completed all by just tapping with one finger. 
Easy to operate & Rich in dishes. Manage time properly to operate your own worldwide restaurant chain!

Cooking Delicacies From Around The World In Crazy Fever Cooking Games
- Hundreds of fresh ingredients for cooking into delicious dishes!
- Cook savory cookies, grill tasty tender steaks and delicious hot dogs.
- Fry, Bake, Boil, Steam, Simmer and Grill magical cook method.
- Sweet donuts, pizza, waffles and shrimp - the recipes grow with opening city!

Opening Special Theme Restaurants  In New Cooking Games For Free
- Elegant Cafe, delicious Burger Shop, sweet Dessert Shop are waiting to unlock!
- Improve cooking skill and manage time efficiently to become the best chef!
- Upgrade kitchen appliances and ingredients to earn more money.
- More amazing restaurants and new cities will be added regularly! 

Proficiency in Cooking Techniques & Strategies
- Create more combos: Get big bonus and achievements.
- Upgrade ingredients & kitchenware: Increase income & Reduce cooking time.
- Use useful boots appropriately: Complete special cooking goals smoothly.

More Features:
+ More than 6 featured theme restaurants are available!
+ 85+ ingredients to create over 50 dishes from around the world!
+ 150+ well-designed levels with 3 kinds of difficulties!
+ Interesting and magical boots help you pass the levels.
+ Hundreds of kitchenware and ingredients are waiting for upgrading.
+ Wi-Fi not needed: No internet needed after the initial install.
+ Enjoy time-management game play in your pocket anytime for Free!
+ There are more restaurants and delicacies coming soon!

How to Play:
Don't worry! You can do all the steps just with one finger: 
According to the food on the customer's order, tap the ingredients to cook food in order. 
Click the finished dishes to complete all the orders.

What are you waiting for? Come and try!

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/My-Cooking-114689119908044/

Any question? Contact us: MyCookingTeam@hotmail.com

comments: Wrost game ever,Don't install dis...every time When I'm in the level 35, it take me level 1 in the next morning rapidly 😠😠🤬🤬😡😡 I installed it again by giving them a third chance. But it Again take me level 1 though i was in level 35 Worst , worst i repeat worst game ever hey there,i did not log into fb before uninstalling it,yes level 35 was in first town in third restaurant, hope u will fixed this soon

Every time i close the game for the night it starts all the way back over again at level 1. I have went all.the way to level 10 and the next time i open the game i am put back at level one. The game did not save any of my progress, even i was connected to facebook.

You can have made it thru 3 restaurants and for some reason if you don' t get on it for a day and even sometimes when you play it daily it wants to start you over from the beginning and before I start over I would rather remove the game.
Enjoying the game, until a certain level, anytime I try and get into it, it takes me back to the start to level 1. Iv uninstalled it and downloaded it, but still happening. Very annoying
I repeated the same boards 3 days in a row. When you close the game out its not saving, I suppose to be in the next world already. Then I'm paying for bundles and loosing those as well

title: Table Planner | Restaurant Seating Reservations DD
description:
** New Feature Released! Send client confirmations by WhatsApp or by SMS **

DreamDiners' Table Planner is a collaboration tool that organizes and optimizes your restaurant table reservations.
Developed by Restaurateurs – for Restaurateurs!
With a smart algorithm in the cloud, and in one glance, the Planner will show you all reservations, on which tables, on which hour, and if any table is free...
The Table Planner is a cross-platform multi-device system running in the cloud that will robust your restaurant reservations control.

Get started:
- By setting your tables and activity hours
- By changing your business name and logo
- By adding your Hosts (Optional, if you need your staff to share the main reservation board)
- By setting your language
- By editing your personal SMS & WhatsApp message for clients confirmations
Learn more here: http://dreamdiner.io/table-planner/#get_started

Main Features:
- Easy & Simple UI
Designed as a simple Spreadsheet – clear and simple – no need to be a tech expert.

- No subscriptions, no commitments, no extra charges (NEW)
Pay as you go! Based on Credits which can be purchased with Google Play In-App-Purchase. Each Reservation + SMS = 1 Credit.

- Send Client Confirmation by SMS or WhatsApp (NEW)
Edit your own message and Business name sender as well 

- Customize your own: Tables & Activity hours
Open as many tables as needed, change the Main Board working hours

- Share & Synchronize between Devices
Multiple users can share the data and update the main board in parallel

- Real-time synchronization
Any new reservation will immediately  be updated on all your users' main boards

- Multi-platform
App available for Android and iOS devices (including Tablets & iPads)

- History + CSV file
View all your reservations or download a friendly CSV file 

- Upcoming reservations
Set reservations for days ahead

- Staff Plan
Column summaries will show total expected guests per each hour, and each table

- Current Time Indicator (NEW)
Lights the relevant time column on Main Board to focus on current reservations 

- "One-Tap Reservation"
Tap any cell on Main Board to  instantly open a new reservation for this table and time

Learn more here: http://dreamdiner.io/table-planner/#features

Enjoy using the Table Planner!
The DreamDiner Team
www.DreamDiner.io

Questions? Comments?
help@dreamdiner.io

- Send Client Confirmation by SMS or WhatsApp (NEW)
Edit your own message and Business name sender as well

- Customize your own: Tables & Activity hours
Open as many tables as needed, change the Main Board working hours

- Share & Synchronize between Devices
Multiple users can share the data and update the main board in parallel

- Real-time synchronization
Any new reservation will immediately be updated on all your users' main boards

- Multi-platform
App available for Android and iOS devices (including Tablets & iPads)

- History + CSV file
View all your reservations or download a friendly CSV file

- Upcoming reservations
Set reservations for days ahead

- Staff Plan
Column summaries will show total expected guests per each hour, and each table

- Current Time Indicator (NEW)
Lights the relevant time column on Main Board to focus on current reservations

- "One-Tap Reservation"
Tap any cell on Main Board to instantly open a new reservation for this table and time

Learn more here: http://dreamdiner.io/table-planner/#features

Enjoy using the Table Planner!
The DreamDiner Team
www.DreamDiner.io

Questions? Comments?

title: Cafe Management my Restaurant Business Story Food
description:
Enter the wonderful world of restaurant management and start your own cafe business today. Cook delicious food and serve it to your customers in the warmest atmosphere in town. Grow your business and expand your building, decorate it in hip ways and get more kitchen appliances, tables and chairs to be able to provide service to more and more customers. Visit the town to unlock new restaurants. Level up and purchase furniture like grill, stove, oven to cook delicious cake, burger, pizza or steak as well as cupcakes. Grow your cafe into a legendary location where people have fun and eat great food with their friends and loved ones. Always upgrade your kitchen tables and chairs to provide the best comfort to the people visiting your restaurant cafe. Create a comfy cozy atmosphere in my cafe to leverage it and gain more and more money increasing your revenue. Level up and keep unlocking new restaurants, furniture, design objects, as well as restaurant kitchen chef appliances. Paint your walls in the trendy vibes and re tile your kitchen and restaurant floor with matching style. Decorate the interior with some of the many decorations available. Continue to earn money and grow your business to provide better and better my restaurant experience to your customers. A cafe restaurant can not be called a cafe if it does not serve good coffee and cupcakes or other forms of desserts. Make sure you always have the best food type available for your customers to eat and enjoy. Make your restaurant cafe a place of warship and cook fabulous recipes always upgrading your food recipes. As you level up and increase your business management skills, more and more people will com to eat and chat at your diner cafe so make sure you never stop improving your cooking and restaurant management skills. We hope you will enjoy our restaurant simulation games and that this will give you real life skills in the kitchen as well as managing your own cafe one day. Cook with passion and love and your food will always be delicious! Expand your size of restaurants and create my chains of cafe. Manage your locations and make them as profitable as possible.
Play Cafe Management my Restaurant Business Story Food today for the best simulation experience!

comments: Why Im stuck in level 31?? Anyone?? This is my 3rd time to install and uninstall this game. Hoping it will fix the level bug. But here it is for the 3rd time around! Im stuck again! The screen saying im leveling up to 32 wont go off.

It had potential. However, it lagged a lot, and the screen froze quite a bit. Trying to exit the game landed me in a never ending loop that put me back into the cafe every single time. I couldn't zoom out, so being able to see anything was difficult. I had to uninstall. I hope you'll work on your game because it could have been good.

I have been looking for a game with this concept for a while but there are too many glitches. The cooking time cannot possibly supply the ridiculous speed the customers are coming in and staying at their table for the meal. There's no tutorial or guide to choosing what and when to upgrade. Trying to upgrade equipment and furniture is not as smooth as I would like. Game has potential!

Was enjoying it .. but theres a glitch it keeps coming up saying next level ...and I cant do anythink cos the message is in middle of screen ... also it keeps show advert for new cameos one after another ..as if its stuck on rewind ..so it wont let me play the game Also I dont understand what the car symbol is for .. I click it and it just shows me rooftops of buildings an a arrow pointing above my cafe ...not sure if its supposed 2 do anythink else ...lastly can u neighbours if so how
This game is horrible! I was expecting a nice tutorial but I couldn't figure out anything.

title: Eat - Restaurant Reservations and Discovery
description:
Eat is the ultimate restaurant guide & reservations app in Dubai and Bahrain. Our service makes it easy to discover the best restaurants, explore menus and photos, and reserve your table. Bookings take just 3 clicks to complete.
 
Eat is great for last minute lunch or brunch ideas or for reserving that perfect dinner in advance. We provide you with a hand picked list of the best restaurants in your city so you don’t have to waste time scrolling though endless restaurant profiles. Eat is free to download and use today.
 
We work closely with top restaurants to bring you an exceptional dining experience. Because we’re synced with restaurant’s booking systems, you’re able to discover the region’s famous food culture and cuisine though your Android device, without the usual hassle of finding and calling to book tables.
 
What you get:

- Instantly confirmed reservations at Bahrain and Dubai's best fine-dining restaurants. New restaurants added every week. Select when and where you want to dine and eat confirms your booking through the app.
 
- Search by cuisine type, price range, location and table availability. See restaurants near you in map view.
 
- Browse & discover restaurants with photos, menus and descriptions. Perfect for both tourists and locals. Find restaurants, pubs and hotels near you. We’re your guide to Bahrain and Dubai’s best new and established eating spots.  
 
- Manage your reservations whenever you want; adjust the date, cancel or amend a special request.  
 
- Share your eat reservations with friends seamlessly through
What’sApp.  
 
- Directions to the restaurant through integrated maps.
 
- Get rewarded with free Uber rides, special discounts and promotions exclusively for eat users.
 
So far, we’ve seated over 3 million diners. Download eat for free today.

Love it? Need help? Have a suggestion? We’d love to hear from you! Please contact us.

title: Find Me Gluten Free
description: The best gluten free restaurant finder out there! Find Me Gluten Free helps you easily eat gluten free. Whether you're celiac, gluten sensitive, or just on a gluten free diet, easily find restaurants, fast food, bars, cafes, grocery stores and more! Easily find dedicated gluten free places with one tap. Search your current location or a specific address. View menus, call, or get directions for each business. View others' ratings and reviews and submit your own.  We're constantly adding businesses, so suggest your favorites. Happy gluten free dining!
