summary: Helping you live gluten free!
developerAddress: 900 OGDEN AVE. #132, DOWNERS GROVE, IL 60515
recentChanges: New review format!
comments: This really is a great app. Especially if you are visiting an unknown location. I would give this 5 stars except for one thing: you charge for premium for content that is largely gathered by your customers. I understand the need for the income, but see no compensation for the contributers. I would like to see something like 'free short-term premium for X reviews/additions'.

Awesome app. Have been using for years, and they have the most expansive reviews in even off the main road areas. Have used in other countries and was really helpful in our first trip to Barcelona. Travel in states we have used for first time trips - Chicago, Nashville, Kingsport, road trips between cities, Portland, Oregon Coast, Oahu just as examples.

must have for anyone with celiac disease or gluten sensitivity. I'm not thrilled with the new "premium" features, but I spoke to the developer and understand why he implemented them. and there are a couple ways around using them, if you're cash-strapped like me and don't eat out enough to need them.

It has definitely been useful in some countries, but not in others. Really needs a lot more input from users to be as helpful as possible. Frequently I have to add new places as there are no reviews - and the app fights you tooth and nail when you try to add places. But we will get there! And I would still say it is a "must have" for a traveling celiac.

Every useful feature is now behind a pay wall. Used to have several features I've paid for off and on over the years, now there is absolutely no point to the free version of the app. And the price isn't worth it for questionable crowd sourced information that might be detrimental to your health.

title: Cooking Diary®: Best Tasty Restaurant & Cafe Game
description:
Become the chef of your own restaurant in an exciting and FREE time management game! Cooking Diary is the best cooking game recognized by prestigious awards, loved and supported by MILLIONS OF PLAYERS around the world! Caution: this game can cause real culinary fever!

Welcome to Tasty Hills—a city where everyone loves to cook! It's your turn to keep a cooking diary. Help your grandpa save his family restaurant chain and build his reputation back up! Don't give your competitors a single chance to cook up evil plans, while you find true friends, manage restaurants and cafés, and cook top-quality dishes! Join fascinating events in the city's vibrant lifestyle, and gain fame as a great chef!

Features:
● COOK hundreds of delicious recipes from around the world!
● OPEN dozens of restaurants and cafés in all the districts of Tasty Hills and decorate them to your taste!
● AMAZE the whole world by trying on ultra-stylish looks!
● MAKE FRIENDS with cute and amazing pets of all kinds!
● WIN in various culinary competitions with lots of prizes!
● INTERACT with the residents of the city and immerse yourself in an exciting story!

🏆 Winner of the WEBBY PEOPLE'S VOICE AWARD 2020 for Strategy/Simulation Game
🏆 International Mobile Gaming Awards 2019 People's Choice Award winner

Play with your friends to cook and have fun together! Cooking Diary is a game that unites lovers of delicious and beautiful food from all over the world! Meet and chat with like-minded people—a love of cooking is a great starting point for a good friendship.

You can cook at restaurants and enjoy culinary adventures offline as well!

Tasty Hills is waiting for the grand opening of your restaurant! Etch your name in culinary history right now, Chef!

Join us on social media to keep up with the latest news from Tasty Hills:

SPECIAL EVENTS

comments: The feedback by developers that "levels are balanced and can be completed without purchases" is bogus. That's like saying you can walk 20 miles to work if you don't have a car. Technically true, practically untenable. Unless you don't care about quickly progressing through levels and don't mind saving up measly 2-ruby daily rewards...skip this. It's an awesome game but without making constant in-app purchases, it's too frustrating to be worth anyone's time. Also the house/pet features are dumb.

It's fun but can get get frustratingly difficult. It's annoying how many gems you need to upgrade your restaurants later when you barely get any. I wish they would change it so you can buy the pet stuff with coins instead of gems, because I don't want to waste my precious gems on them. I know you can get pet stuff via challenges but it can be difficult.

I did so much progress in this game, unlocking new restaurants and having so much equipment and upgraded stuff, I don't remember when or why, but I uninstalled it, now I remembered it and I installed it again, as expected everything was gone, I just made a character and did the tutorial, afterwards, it showed my saves, and it showed that other save and I thought it would bring back all the progress I'd done but it didn't, I just want to know how to restore everything.

I love how there seems to be endless levels without in-app purchases. But... when I first started to play upgrading the interior of the restaurants cost way less bank notes. I don't want to spend hard earned gems on that. I'm saving those for the kitchen. Why did you guys jack up the prices of things? Plus the new house thing. The shear amount of gems I'd need to purchase ONE piece of furniture is rediculous!! So i pretty much ignore that feature. And why do in-app purch cost so much?

I honestly really enjoyed this game to begin with. It was fun, interesting and I really like the guild feature. But I've been playing for maybe a week or so and now it's asking me to pay rubies to upgrade things. I don't have a lot of rubies and I think it's really silly that that are so expensive! You don't earn nearly enough rubies to actually make it worth the wait. The entire game is centered around them and it's really not fun to play anymore as everything gets more expensive! :(

title: Cooking Games for Kids and Toddlers - Free
description:
Become a professional chef in your very own kitchen with this guided cooking game for kids. Prepare delicious dishes and serve it to the customers. FUN experience for kids is guaranteed! If you are in search in for a fun baking and cooking game for your kids & toddlers, then this is the perfect app for you! These fun restaurant games will give your toddlers endless play time. Become the next big chef by playing amazing cooking games!

Take orders from hungry little animals and prepare the food that they want to eat. Which dish will the animals pick from the menu? Find out in this app! Help our little friend Obbie to run his restaurant successfully. Learn to chop veggies and assemble the ingredients! Make delicious recipes and feed the hungry animals right away. Help them pay the bill too! Everything in this restaurant game works just like an actual restaurant! :D

Features of the app are:

🍔 Cooking games for kids and toddlers have an interactive user interface.
🍔 No internet required. Kids can enjoy this game anytime, anywhere.
🍔 Cute animations and hilarious reactions from the characters!
🍔 100% Kid safe environment. You don't have to worry about your child stumbling upon unsafe content!
🍔 You can enjoy playing with this app for FREE!
🍔 We have NO ADS or annoying pop-ups in this app!

Why you should download this app for your kids:
- Kids will learn various recipes which they can recreate in real life along with parents! Make burgers, pizzas and cupcakes!!
- Watch Obbie transform into various kitchen tools! Kids will learn the purpose of kitchen tools through these games.
- Kids will learn to make the right choices of ingredients.
- Learn how things work in a restaurant's kitchen - the fun way!
- Kids will enhance creativity and imagination while playing with Obbie and all the awesome animals!

So go ahead and DOWNLOAD the app NOW to have fun in this restaurant!

Its a very good game but the reason i rate it 4 stars was because of the recipes. There's only 3 recipes and are kinda boring but still its mind developing in some way. My only suggestion is to improve your recipes in an interesting way....😃😃😃

title: SmartServe® Restaurants
description:
Food ordering made simple.

Experience true control, don’t compromise your time & convenience when eating your favourite foods. Whether dining in or on the go, SmartServe® makes food ordering simple.

Do you feel you are not in full control of your food eating experience whether you are dining in or on the go? Tired of waiting to order, waiting to pay or waiting to get the wait staff’s attention? How about tired of downloading 3-4 different apps to get access to 3-4 different features? What about splitting the bill with your family or friends when you are paying cash or card, gosh it takes forever doesn’t it?

Besides solving the obvious problems above, here’s a couple of more reasons why you need SmartServe® in your phone:

Dine-in
•    Scan table QR-code to view the menu in full HD photos, price and description
•    Select your food & send your order straight to the kitchen
•    Request a service, request the bill or send a 5-word service request to the wait staff - 
      all through your phone. How cool is that?
•    Pay for your meal or split the bill
•    Tip individual wait staff or the restaurant
•    Tip a specific amount or a % of your total bill

Reservation
•    Search for top-rated restaurants near you
•    Filter by cuisine, distance, price and reviews. 
•    View menus in HD photos, price, description and peoples reviews before you book
•    Easily book tables, update bookings, cancel or re-book for free

Delivery or Pick-up
•    Order delivery or arrange a pick-up or pre-order before a restaurant opens
•    Search for restaurants that suit your mood anytime, anywhere 
•    Filter by cuisine, distance, price and reviews
•    Save your address

Rewards
•    You don’t have to look for Happy Hours anymore because we bring them to you! 
      Simply head over the Rewards section to find out what restaurants are offering 
      exclusive to SmartServe® users
•    Reward availability closest to your location

Loyalty
•    Earn loyalty points with every SmartServe® restaurant you dine with or order from 
      & redeem your points against future orders
•    Add your favourite restaurants to your List

Payments
•    Flexible payment options
•    Pay by Cash, Debit or Credit Card from your phone
•    Securely store your payment details for a faster checkout

Live updates
•    Track the progress of your order - from cooking to delivery or pick-up - in real-time
•    Receive notifications on your phone that let you know when there are discounts or 
      special offers available at your favourite restaurants

Order History
•    Re-order from your order history on your next visit to save time
•    Remind your self of what you ordered before
•    Email receipts to yourself for personal or business reasons

Mentioned in:
•	Huffington Post
•	CNBC
•	ExecRanks
•	Business Wire
•	Restaurant Tech Live
•	Travel In Taste
•	Geeky Gadgets
•	Financial Buzz
•	Business Computing World
•	Prysm & much more

Download our free app today & enjoy full control of your food eating experience. 

Not in your city or favourite restaurant yet? We hope to be soon! Head to https://smartservetech.com/referabusiness/ and refer them to us, we’ll take care of the rest.

title: Best restaurants Paris
description:
The guide to the best restaurants in Paris

Go out with the best 250 parisian tables in your pocket !

Usefull, user friendly, practical, efficient, this app will allow you finding THE restaurant you have been looking for.

Want to go to the nearest restaurant around?
Need a place for a business lunch ?
Want to travel through food ?

If you want to eat well, this application is made for you.

We have curated for you more than 250 restaurants among the best in Paris, France, and let you pick the one according to your desire, your budget or your location.


3 searching methods :
• By criteria (cooking type, budget, area, keyword, ...)
• By location, using your geolocation
• By suggestion (advices, ideas, recommandations,…)


The advantages :
• You can see restaurant menus
• Clear display of prices
• HD photos

The Best Restaurants Paris app is free, in English and French

title: BeyondMenu Food Delivery
description:
Order food online with no waiting line! With the BeyondMenu App you can search restaurants online and order for pickup, delivery or even make reservations without ever having to pick up the phone.  Choose from thousands of different local restaurants and over 35 different cuisines. It’s time you try something new and explore the restaurant community around you to see what you’ve been missing out on all this time. You can browse restaurant delivery menus, read reviews, checkout the local coupons and order takeout right from the palm of your hand. Since we’re nationwide, you can use the App anywhere you go!

Other awesome app features include:
- Easily enter your location with GPS location services
- Save as many different addresses as you need
- Filter results by cuisine, order type, distance and more
- Explore coupons and restaurant offers and apply to your cart before ordering
- View past orders and re-order with the click of a button
- Easily check out with a scan your credit card function
- Share our app with your network of friends, family and co-workers via messaging, Facebook and more
- Have access to a large network of support representatives
- New updates and features to be released continuously
 
Cities/Areas Served:
Baltimore, Denver, Los Angeles, New York, Phoenix, San Francisco, Boston, Houston, Miami, Omaha, Portland, Seattle, Chicago, Las Vegas, New Jersey, Philadelphia, San Diego, Washington DC, and more!

10400 W Higgins Rd Ste 205

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: This is a great app to have and the restaurants that's affiliated with this app is also awesome, the food is amazing, is always hot when you get it plus you're not paying an arm, leg or eye for delivery. I recommend this app.

Every time I try to place an order, I can't add my credit card information, so cash is only option. I've tried to contact the developer but haven't gotten any reply. Fortunately, I can phone the restaurant directly and can use my card. I'm giving them one last chance and if the experience is unsatisfactory, I'm deleting their app. Addendum: months later, updated the app; still can't add CC info!
Ordering was easy. Sometimes I wish the menu would include more details on the food. It's a little too vague but that's probably just each restaurant's issue, not the app.

So I like the app for the one restaurant I use it for, I'm with the others I wish it described the food more...BUT I can only find one restaurant on the app. Every time I try to find another place it says no results. 🤔🤔🤔🤔
Real simple to use. No guest access to pay, no pickup time other than ASAP, and no status update after payment confirmation email so had to guess how long the restaurant would take.

title: Quick Cuisine

Quick Cuisine
Food Delivery & Takeout

Welcome to the awesomeness of Quick Cuisine, Hawaii's local restaurant delivery service. We're the guys who actually know what we're doing.

Order from the best restaurants on the Island – from local hot spots to national favorites, Whether it's a big Ulua order, or just a Manini, we'll deliver your food fast, right to your door.

title: Restaurants & Cafe: Near Me
description:
Restaurants & Cafe has More than 100 million restaurant and business reviews worldwide. Whatever you’re looking for Either lunch or dinner or breakfast,  a great coffee shop nearby, Restaurants & Cafe: Near Me is your guide to finding the perfect places to eat, shop, drink, relax, and play.
	Meet to Eat Business ,Party, Dating, Outing, Fun with Kids , Birthday Party, Chilling With Friends , Family , Bechlor’s party all plans solve with Just one app. 

	Read reviews, browse photos and menus, order takeout, Open close status, locations, and other important information for any business you’re looking for. 

	Restaurants & Cafe puts great local businesses right at your fingertips. Discover new foods, hot spots, and local businesses near you! Plus, order delivery or pickup. The Restaurants & Cafe :Near me app is available in every country.

	Restaurants & Cafe :Near me features: 
-Food Near You: Find Restaurants, Wine shops, Coffe shops, Cakeshops, Hotels.
- Find the newest and the hottest spots to eat and drink nearby 
- Dine at local restaurants or get something to go
- Read restaurant reviews from other Expert users and scroll through photos to help you decide where to go?
-See the street views of your search if available! You can check your Environment through it.
	 Search Filters
• Filter your search results by neighborhood, distance, rating, Location, open now or closed now. 
• Look up addresses and phone numbers, call a business, and make reservations directly from the app

 Features 
• Read millions of expert user reviews and browse through beautiful photos of each business
• Write and read reviews, check-in to local businesses, order pickup or delivery, upload photos, book appointments, find a new activity, and add tips for other Restaurants & Cafe users

Find local restaurants, read customer reviews, order pickup or delivery, and search for businesses near you, all from the Restaurants & Cafe app.

title: Foursquare City Guide
description:
Foursquare City Guide will lead you to the perfect spot -- anywhere in the world.  Get helpful, positive tips from our trusted global community and keep track of where you you've been and where you want to go, all in one place.

Looking to check in or become Mayor of your local coffee shop? Download our sister app, Foursquare Swarm. 

With Foursquare City Guide you can:
-Join a community of people just like you who love to explore and seek out hidden gems. 
-Read short tips written by real people all over the world. (No negative rants or businesses paying for positive reviews.)
-Make lists for any occasion! Keep a running to-do of neighborhood hot spots, or places you want to try while traveling.
-Add tastes, rate places, and lifelog where you’ve been to get hyper-personalized recommendations.
-Follow friends, brands, and influencers and uncover the best experience possible with millions of tips about off-the-menu items, speakeasy entrances, wifi passwords, and much more.
-Keep a history of the places you’ve been. Never forget a memory, photo, or the name of that incredible pizza place you went to while visiting Rome. 
-Find exactly what you’re looking for. Faster.

A note on battery:
We've spent years developing the location technology that powers Foursquare City Guide, making it extremely power efficient. But, as with all apps of this type, please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

By using Foursquare you agree to the Terms of Service (http://foursquare.com/legal/terms), Privacy Policy (http://foursquare.com/legal/privacy) and Cookie Policy (http://foursquare.com/legal/cookiepolicy).

comments: Man, this app has problems. Created a list of places, but when I click on the on the icon to view it on a map it says "Hm, something went wrong. Try again." It also says that I have not been to any of these places even though I have clicked that I HAVE been to said places. The lists is kind of the whole reason I downloaded this app. It will only allow you to sign up using a Facebook or Google sign-in. If you don't have one of those, or don't want to use one, then tough luck! Probably uninstall..

I can't upload photos of the places, successfully! The updates about the places are not reflected/ reflecting after giving enough time say more than 24 hours! And so, rated only 3 stars! Fixing the issue i might ready to give 5 rates, for this app!
Love the app. However, it is missing one major component, which I think would be extremely useful and helpful... Adding "pet friendly" to the list of filters.

The best tool for browsing bars, restaurants and other interesting POIs, my daily driver. If some place exists on this planet, you can bet it will be shown in Foursquare. Used to have a perfect integration with both Navigon and Sygic Truck navigations. Sadly, it has been removed from Sygic Truck lately, making my life much harder, as I depend on pois due to my job. Amazing app, 6 stars if possible!!!

I have been using the app for more than 2 years. I wish the visuals were updated and screens became more intuitive. For example I cannot access my menu when browsing, I have to go back to the home screen. Also there is a bug if you want to upload a photo of a cafe. I have a feeling the app was never touched/improved since 2 years.

title: DogTrekker
description:
DogTrekker.com® takes best in show when it comes to planning dog-friendly adventures in California. We have sniffed out the best dog-friendly hotels, dining, hikes, beaches, attractions, wineries and local services where you and your best friend will have lots of safe, tail-waggin’ fun. 

More: Our new mobile app embodies the same 4-Paw Promise that has made the award-winning DogTrekker.com website the most user-friendly and dog-friendly. That promise: to deliver the most local and accurate listings, provide engaging content from veteran travel writers and stand behind our commitment to support the animal welfare organizations in the areas we serve.

This free mobile app provides ‘Nearby’ lodging, dining, hikes, splash zones, attractions and local services, including emergency services, wherever you are in California. Switch over to the ‘Explore’ mode and you will be able to plan your trips throughout California’s 15 regions, 58 counties and hundreds of cities. Within these destinations, you’ll not only find listings, but over 1,000 associated stories pulled from the DogTrekker.com editorial library.

You will also have listing information, including website links, descriptions, contact information and directions. Finally, you can sign up for DogTrekker.com’s DogCation® sweepstakes, a chance to win overnight stays at some of the most dog-friendly lodging properties in California.

Download the DogTrekker app today and take us with you on your next adventure.

title: allo - find restaurants near you.
description:
"allo" lets you search for and discover restaurants around you. Browse through restaurant by nearby and use the map feature to guide you there or simply click "allo" to make your order over the phone.

Features:


- Explore offline without internet connection as "allo" sync restaurants in your city in a very light database on your mobile for maximum 2MB storage space.

- Search easily for Restaurants and Cafes by location, cuisine (e.g. Chinese, Italian, Indian), name.

- Explore every restaurant in your city, including the ones near your current location, and use search to find the one that suits you best.

- Follow your favorite restaurants.

- Get offers and vouchers from your favorite chains.

- Simply one click on navigate button will help you driving to your selected restaurants.

- New in the city? No problem, just sync your new city data and explore lovely restaurants around you.

 - Explore weekly editor's choices 

- Use the map view to explore restaurants around you.

- Follow your favorite restaurants to receive new updates, vouchers and offers.

Permissions Requested:

- Location - To identify your location and show the restaurants closest to you.


"allo" is now available in over 30+ cities 

United States: New York City, Los Angeles 

England: London

Canada: Toronto, Montreal 

Australia: Sydney, Melbourne 

Brazil: Sao Paulo 

France: Paris

Spain: Madrid, Barcelona

Italy: Roma, Milano 

United Arab Emirates: Dubai, Abu Dhabi 

Egypt: Cairo, Alexandria, Sharm Elsheikh, North coast, Mansoura, El Gouna

Saudi Arabia: Riyadh, Jeddah, Mecca, Madina, Dammam 

Kuwait: Kuwait City

Qatar: Doha, Wakrah 

Lebanon: Beirut

Jordan: Amman

Turkey: Istanbul

Malaysia: Kuala Lumpur

title: eatigo – discounted restaurant reservations
description:
Eatigo is a restaurant reservation app which offers time-based discounts of up to 50% off, every day at all of its 4500+ restaurants. There are no pre-payments or hidden cost, eatigo is 100% free. It’s simple to use: search, reserve, enjoy! 

Available in Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Hong Kong, India, Philippines and Indonesia, eatigo has seated over 5 million diners across the region and is Southeast Asia’s no. 1 restaurant reservation app. 

Endless Selection
Enjoy an expansive list of more than 4500 restaurants ranging from 5-star hotel locations, Michelin recommended restaurants to popular food chains and small-scale eateries. Eatigo offers a wide variety of cuisines and price ranges all with discounts of up to 50% off.

Reserve in 3 easy steps
1. Browse for restaurants on our curated categories, top & new restaurant tabs, or use ‘here & now’ feature to see nearby restaurants, or simply search for the restaurant you are looking for. 
2. Select the restaurant you would like to dine in
3. Pick a time, date & discount and confirm your reservation. An instant booking confirmation will be sent to you on the app, email and sms.

Dine in 3 easy steps
1. Arrive at the restaurant on time and show the booking code digitally
2. Order any food items from the menu and enjoy the discount (drinks are excluded from eatigo’s discount).
3. Pay for the bill with discount already automatically deducted

Fuss-Free Reservation with no pre-payment
It’s 100% free, with none of that credit card information requirement nonsense. You’ll find all the restaurant info you need on the app, like menus, recommendations, reviews and how to get there. Choose from over 20 food categories like Japanese, Sushi, Pizza, Cafes, Burgers, Hotpot, All-You-Can Eat, Hotel Buffets and many more!

Preview of our top restaurant partners
Bangkok – Godiva, Kyochon, Chu Chocolate Bar, Outback Steakhouse, Jamie's Italian, Feast @ Royal Orchid Sheraton, Atelier @ Pullman, River Café Terrace @ The Peninsula

Singapore – Morganfield’s, Crystal Jade Kitchen, Harry’s, Pho Street, Yoogane, Swensen’s, Suki-Ya

Kuala Lumpur –  Lemon Garden @ Shangri-La, Cinnamon Coffee House @ One World Hotel, The Mill Cafe @ Grand Millennium, Rocku Yakiniku, Yoogane Dak Galbi

Hong Kong –  The Continental, JW Café @ JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong, PizzaExpress, YumCha

Mumbai – Mezzo Veg Lounge, Angrezi Dhaba The Wholesale Theka @ Nakshatra Mall Dadar

Pune – Aufside, Barbeque Village, Falak, Cafe 1730, Eighty Eight @ Hyatt, TJ's Brew Works

Philippines – Heat @ Edsa Shangri-la, The Pantry @ Dusit Thani Manila,  The Cafe @ Hyatt City of Dreams,  Ramen Nagi, Barcino, Pancake House, VENGO, Banh Mi Kitchen

Jakarta – Gyu-Kaku Prime @ Plaza Indonesia, Pasola @ The Ritz-Carlton Pacific Place, Lewis & Carroll @ Blok M, Le Gran Cafe @ Gran Mahakam, Ramen 38 Sanpachi, Amigos, Seorae, Hong Tang, Amigos Bar & Cantina, Sunny Side Up

Features
- Find the best deals based on your location, availability and interest with our multifunctional search tool 
- Browse restaurants based on popularity and trending places 
- Find restaurants and real-time offer near you with “Here & Now” feature
- Manage your reservations, personal details and favourite restaurants
- Keep track of reservation notifications, blog updates and new promotions from eatigo in your Notification Hub.

The app uses external storage to store information locally. This ensures your user experience is fast and streamlined. Our Here & Now tool uses your device’s location to bring the best restaurant deals near you. Your phone’s call function also allows us to help you better connect with restaurants and your reservations.

We seek your permission to use these functions to give you the best eatigo experience possible. You may change these anytime in your phone’s app permission settings.

Bug fixes (we hate bugs as much as you!) Enjoy using our app?
We would love it if you could review us on the Google Play.
comments: App not is NOT working properly for the last week or so.....slow to a halt, even typing 1 letter takes 5seconds.

The takeaway service isn't as convenient as the reservation. Even though I paid through the app, the restaurant wasn't aware of this and asked us to pay again. There was no active helpline/representative to mediate in the evening. Good for reservations, takeaway needs a lot of work.

No response from agent when requesting for chat. Need to buck up the service. The promo discount is good but very limited participants. Wanted to share with friends this app but can't do it. Don't know why & agent don't response at all..

Tried to login with Facebook then asked me for my mobile number. Received an OTP but after keying it in it said number already registered, please log in. Tried to reset password and only allowed me to provide email.
Easy to book and get discounts. Hope to have more restaurants coming up to increase the variety of choices.

title: Cafeland - World Kitchen
description:
Design your cafe world and join cooking with Chef Eva's restaurant game! Write your own restaurant story in Cafeland today, Chef! Master your cooking and design your 5 star cafe to be the top chef in the world! Run your own restaurant and get carried away in a cooking fever! Home cooked meals and fresh coffee are waiting for the customers. Just say “I’ll decorate my cafe and I’ll also add a lovely garden!” and your cafe will thrive! FROM A SNACK BAR TO A WORLD FAMOUS CAFE!

Decorate and design the place of your dreams in this cafe game! Cook tasty food to keep your customers happy - From the creators who brought you Cafeland, it’s a fun-tastic new cooking game! 

In Cafeland, you have dozens of different dishes; desserts, appetizers, fast food and many more which make this the perfect kitchen game! Not to mention that there are hundreds of shiny new items to decorate your place. Are you ready to be the owner of your cafe business? recentChanges:
Thanks for updating!

- New Floor Tiles and Wallpapers added!
- The ALL tab in Inventory will no longer jump to the beginning of the list when an item is placed in the cafe

- Performance improvements
comments: Playing for years. I like the updates. Love my team and the tournaments keep me coming back. If you don't have a team join one. Not everyone can have their own team...then there would be no team members. I love that my team interacts and helps fill catering orders as well as online. We give each other tips on what works and it makes it so much more fun. Go team "No Doze Cafe"!

I have been playing this game now for almost two years I have alot of time and money invested into it. One of the recent game updates has really about ruined the game with the events we should be able to pick our own prizes instead of the 40,000 surprise box I don't like this an I feel like other players would agree. We're working for the rewards we should be able to pick what we want. I was looking forward to getting my Halloween tiles and now it's impossible please change the events back

Owned this game before on a different phone. Got a new phone somehow didn't save to Google play games. I love it and hate that I had to start over. I already gave it five stars,but if I could ever regain the level I was on before I had to get a new phone I would find a way to give it 100 stars Ok so either yall know god or yall put me back on the level I was!!!! Thanks. #1 game ever!!!!

It is awesome playing cafeland, but can get back the theme box shop, that comes for 12 days. The old one is good to buy. Can u please, get it back. I noticed u made change on the game with 40,000 box. I definitely do not like this, we should be able to pick out our own prizes. We're are doing the work and putting in money. Please change it back,or I will not play. It's cheating, that you're taking our choices away frm us. Still u hv not updated, pls change that

Horrible changes in the last few months. Special event items are now mystery item. Multiple times I've paid the 40k just to receive an item I already have that you can only have 1 of. Doors are a perfect example. Decorating was my favorite part of the game and is now impossible due to not being able to chose your items. I've stopped playing almost entirely.

title: Free Restaurant & Food POS (QSR) - Zobaze KDS
description:
Zobaze KDS (Kitchen Display System) Along with Zobaze POS (point of sale) is for a café, bar, restaurant, & caterer to inform a Chef to see the summary of all the running orders at a glance. Improve your ticket system by times and accuracy with the Zobaze kitchen display app. it communicates in Real-time by using time-based, color codes and also the cooking staff can change the cooking status by taping.
Manage and Display your kitchen Order Tickets (KOT /KDS) information, items, and modifiers on any android devices to improve ticket time and order consistency track from POS

Best for owners who are looking for Restaurant POS cum billing, Quick Service Restaurant (QSR), Food Truck and more

Features:

✔ Painless, intuitive and Very easy-to-use Checkout interface Designed for chefs with POS.

✔ Monitor order at the counter and the KOT / KDS  gets printed or Displayed on Smartphone at the kitchen from POS

✔ Use a strong Kitchen Display System to View and manage Kitchen Order Tickets (KOTs / KDS) through a mobile/tablet app.

✔ Get orders to kitchen Automatically(real-time), faster and with No Errors to prepare fresh food

✔ Better and streamlined more efficient workflows that Fit naturally to your restaurant management POS

✔ Easily notice long-due orders with color-coded views interface.

✔ See all tickets at a glance with colors indicating the waiting time and also on POS

✔ Everything is sync in real-time between Zobaze POS and the Zobaze kitchen display system.

How it works:

➡ Download the Zobaze POS app on Android.
➡ Wirelessly connect just by downloading Zobaze KDS with POS.
➡ Orders appear on the screen as the sale is completed from POS.
➡ Orders change color from green to red based on time also seen on POS
➡ Simply tap on order and it’s gone and POS gets closed tag

Benefits :
★ Eliminate the confusion caused by handwritten orders. When ordering through a handheld device by using Zobaze POS

★ A KDS system saves printing costs and helps to intelligently plan your kitchen orders & out of the kitchen fast.

★ Hassle-free setup with a simple tap & go for pairing wirelessly by mobile Zobaze POS.

★ It saves time for captains, waiters, chefs, bartenders, and cashiers by Zobaze POS. 

★ It helps in quick food delivery that provides an amazing experience to your Customers  

★ An awesome user interface that requires zero training. The first time the user starts taking orders in minutes.

★ It Avoids conjunction & have consistency, avoided unnecessary Queue by managing software intelligently

Who Can Use:

Cafeteria
Café & Pubs
Waitress
Chaff
Food Stall
QSR
Barman
Bistro
Eatery
Ambrosia
Shopkeeper
Brasserie
Buffet
Carryout
Canteen
Carvery
Coffee bar
Food truck
Snack bar
Tea shop
Trattoria
Tiffin centers
Fast food restaurants
Daily Restaurants E-POS/PDV
BOT (Bar Order Taking Application)


Think Zobaze KDS, Think Next-generation kitchen management!

Level up your kitchen management with smart kitchen display’s through a simple application. The Kitchen display notifies incoming orders neatly based on the first-come-first-serve basis. Chefs can easily tap on processed items to mark completion.
 Download Zobaze POS (Point of sale) and set up in an instant. Use the same account you’ve been using for Zobaze POS.

Register it Now

Zobaze POS helps Hotels, restaurants, retail food shops to increase the Sales of business

Billing management (invoice/receipt)
Inventory management (fast-moving, low stock, bar code)
Customer management (loyalty/ campaigns)
Staff management (Give Access-based Requirement)

It’s a One-stop solution for all your business needs on the go. Save trees and go green - Less paper, less mess.

 This is cashpoint app & software which is cloud-based point-of-sale

SEND FEEDBACK

We are always looking for ways to improve the app, please send us your feedback or feature request from the app it’s self or email us to android@zobaze.com

title: My Restaurant Empire - 3D Decorating Cooking Game
description:
Welcome to the adventure of building a great Restaurant Empire, the newest top 3D cooking game of the time-management game series in 2020.
 
Grown out of the Rising Super Chef series downloaded by millions of players, My Restaurant Empire is an evolution of cooking games. Play fun cooking game levels and renovate to get restaurants back to business in the town with your gift of cooking game and management skills as a hero chef. Cook & serve delicious meals as fast as you can, win prizes to renovate the house, design new furniture, and decorate the restaurant. Dive into the cooking craze, feel the cooking madness as a master chef, find grandpa’s cooking diary, dash from restaurant to restaurant, beat every challenging level in the cooking adventure, design new restaurant decor, follow the story and meet fun people, win love and friendship, build a dream restaurant empire.

3D Game Play
• Exiquisite designed 3D characters and scenes.
• Hundreds of tasty foods and recipes in the cooking diary.
• A high-performance rendering engine brings you more realistic cooking game experience than 2D cooking games.
• 3D charaters play fun story plots.
• Decorate the food truck, restaurants and gardens with a variety of furnitures in a flexible way, that you can build an exclusive thriving restaurant city of your own.

Cook & Serve in a variety of settings
• Hundreds of fast-paced time-management levels with a variety of cooking game modes.
• Scramble to feed the feverish customers.
• Endless extremely fast levels in the challenge mode.
• Play online funny quizzes everyday and share with friends to win more stars.

Play a hero chef
• Start from a food truck, figure out what happened to the town and people, try to fix the restaurants and relationships.
• Get cooking fever in the cooking game levels and earn big tips to renovate and decorate restaurants.
• Heal the relationships between the loved ones, see what future can you bring to the town.

Connect with us! Join our communities:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/my.restaurant.empire
Discord: https://discord.gg/keZGbqn

recentChanges:

comments: This game gives you so much content. You can definitely play for a while at a time. Usually I only stop if I get frustrated with how fast paced it is! It's challenging, fun, and cute! And it's so fun to finally have found a good design/renovation game that isn't a match 3. I'd purchase a game like this for console if I could find it!

I love the game but feel cheated when I don't get the cash that I've earned on the customers who've come through already(if you don't clear a level). And the closing time speeds up...but I know I've had enough customers come through there to clear that level. You only offer a diamond at a time when you watch an ad. You're keeping the coins and making it hard to get diamonds to where a person has to buy your diamonds to upgrade the game that ain't right.

I love this game. Its addicted! But now i've been stuck at Cafe, i had to use my hats to complete the task that i've completed before. I can't move to other level bcoz it says i have to complete all task while i have no level left to play and gain new hat. What should i do? I dont want to lose my progress.

I have played so many of these kind of games but for some reason I really enjoy this game . I like the kitchen and I enjoy the story line . The levels are however abit difficult and the cost of the stuff you have to buy is abit expensive so one has to complete a lengthy amount of levels just to get one item....but other than that I really do enjoy this game . Thank you Chantelle Fivaz

Love the concept but too slow to progress. I do about 3 levels, earn my chef hats then am suddenly stuck on one. Unless you use your diamonds there are lots of levels you just cannot get passed. I have to wait for a few days to get enough to move on. It would get expensive if I was purchase these. Lost interest now so may look for another similar app.

title: EazyDiner - Restaurant Finder & Food Ordering App
description:
EazyDiner has been created by a team that is extremely passionate about food, wine and all things fine. As a collective group of Chefs and Hoteliers who have worked in some of the best hotels and restaurants around the world, we were always on the lookout for new dining experiences and exciting cuisines. It is this love and passion for eating and exploring that brought us together to create EazyDiner.


How often do you find yourself wondering, where you should go eat on a special occasion? What are the newest and top eateries in town? What are the things you absolutely must try when visiting a particular restaurant? Can you save some money while still dining at top restaurants of the city?


EazyDiner has all the answers for the most enjoyable, authentic and friction-free table booking experience. With an instant confirmation of less than 18 seconds, you can now book over 10,000 restaurants in Delhi NCR, Mumbai, Bengaluru, Pune, Chennai, Kolkata, Goa, Ahmedabad, Jaipur, Hyderabad, Chandigarh and over 150 cities in India &  Dubai on our swanky website or mobile app. For bookings in India, we also provide a 24 x 7 complimentary concierge service.

 

With every meal you book through EazyDiner, there comes a phenomenal deal ranging from free alcoholic drinks to up to 50% off on your total bill. With no membership fees or reservations charge, what is best is that these eye-popping deals are not for just one person, but are applicable on the entire table! Now, this is what I call a real deal!

 

EazyDiner is evolving each day to become your daily dining app by providing pre-paid discounted meals and vouchers, including upto 50% off at Chaayos, Burger King and many others! If we had our way, these prepaid meals would be the only gifts our families would be giving us!

 

With exclusive and expert reviews by top critics helmed by our co-founder, the iconic Vir Sanghvi, EazyDiner serves as a curated guide to an extensive range of dining options and is your reliable guide to eating out. 


With each booking, you also earn EazyPoints, which can be redeemed for an array of delicious treats. You earn points for booking through EazyDiner as well as by leaving user reviews on restaurant profiles. The more points you earn, the more delicious and exciting the rewards become!



Do take the time to #ThankTheStars - an initiative by EazyDiner which allows you to acknowledge the efforts of your servers and chefs at the restaurant and help them win amazing rewards while you get 200 EazyPoints for every review. It’s a total win-win.

If you're looking for large group bookings of more than 10 guests, suggestions, ideas or recommendations on eating out; just call our  24 hour EazyConcierge at 786 100 4444, all 7 days a week!

 

Take the Eazy way out and become an EazyDiner for life!

comments: I was charged my subscription even after cancellation in may month itself... Completely dissapointed with it but after speaking with the customer service they refunded it...So thanks and please don't let anything like this happen again
Fantastic app, I am very excited. I would always use it for future booking.
The experience was very user friendly and helpful, the variety of restaurants are there to be chosen from.
An amazing app to explore the bestest of the locations for lunch and dinner with your family and loved ones.
Worst app.. Eazydiner keeps deducting prime membership charges even when I disabled auto renewal... Happened 3rd time now... There is no way to cancel it... It is cheating deliberately. Beware

title: My Restaurant
description:
My Restaurant is a user friendly app designed to allow a restaurant to complete their checklists on an android phone or tablet.  My Restaurant allows for remote monitoring of completion of the checklists that are vital to ensuring customer safety.

Features include:
- Customized Templates
- Conducting Forms with options to add photos, comments and view reference materials
- Export Completed Forms

Try our software free with no obligations for 30 days.  If you are interested please send an email to rmd@antares-corp.com with your name and restaurant information.

title: Smart Restaurant Management
description:
Smart Restaurant is a smart restaurant management app. It is a management tool that any restaurant manager or restaurant should own. In addition to helping managers or employees manage their dining tables and help them order items in the usual way, Smart Restaurant also brings a whole host of exciting new features.
Why use Smart Restaurant?
- Order fast: Smart Restaurant offers printer connection via wifi. Employees just select the table and dish and click the submit button. Instant, the coupon will be placed in the kitchen. Saves a lot of time and money for restaurants.
- Simple Export: Smart Restaurant offers one-touch export capability. The bill will be kept until customers.
- Nice interface, easy to use: Our design team is based on test users to create a sophisticated and user-friendly interface.
- Optional requirements: Staff can add the quantity of items as well as individual customer requirements to ease each dish.
- Management anytime, anywhere: Managers will not always be present at the restaurant can also update information about the dishes, sales as well as keyboard status and staff at the restaurant (This function only for managers)
- Manage everything in your restaurant: Smart Restaurant offers the best manager: from staff, dining tables, food for the food store.
- Easy statistics: Smart restaurant allows managers to know the business by the turnover of each employee by shift, by date, by month, ...
- And many of their other functions are being upgraded in the future.
Hiển thị trong test này chạy phiên bản của chế độ Offline. The Publisher Intelligence Beta allows users to sign in to 2 Employees and Appraisers.
- With staff: Account: 0, Password: 0
- With handler: Account 1, Password: 1
Smart Restaurant is running trial so can not avoid the shortcomings. So, we are looking forward to receiving enthusiastic feedback, please direct your order to product more perfect. For more information, please send to mail: i2s.team.coding@gmail.com

title: BigDish - Restaurant Deals & Table Reservations
description:
Book a table, get restaurant deals and save on your meals with BigDish! Get hourly restaurant discounts of up to 50%, with no paid membership necessary. Whether you're looking for lunch deals or want to discover local restaurants nearby, you can get great savings with our dining deals.

Book a table and instantly save on your meals with our exclusive restaurant deals. The BigDish app is simple to use: select a restaurant, add the time, date and number of people for your booking - and that's it!

Restaurant discounts are applied automatically, so you don’t have to worry about a thing. We have amazing dining deals for every booking - just open the app to see what's available in your area!

Find restaurants nearby, book a table & get restaurant discounts. Here’s why users love our app:

✓Restaurant deals & savings: Get Up to 50% off meals, with no hidden costs
✓ Book a table on the go: Make your restaurant reservation online with instant booking confirmation

title: resOS - Restaurant Booking Software
description:
Modern, effective and very user-friendly booking system making restaurant management easier than ever before.. Set up your restaurant in 1 minute for free.
 
✓ Get an overview of bookings
Bookings, guests and special opening hours in a simple calendar.
 
✓ Keep track of the day
The schedule makes it easy for waiters to stay in control if you use table management.  If you want to accept bookings and/or manage tables manually, a separate list view with filters is available.
 
Using table management makes it easier for waiters to handle bookings, control reservations, and walk-ins. You can manage your bookings completely within your preferences - automatically or manually.
 
✓ Create and edit bookings quickly
A clean interface makes it easy and fast to add and edit bookings.
 
✓ Communicate with guests and add notes
Send and receive messages to give your guests a better experience and limit no-shows. By adding internal notes your team won't forget anything.
 
✓ Get better reviews automatically
With our automatic guest feedback system, you gather valuable customer insight and get better reviews. Catch unsatisfied guests before they write a bad review and get more happy guest to write reviews where you want and it really counts, on Facebook, Google, Yelp, TripAdvisor and more.
 
✓ Automatic, manual or without table management
Handle tables the way you want and accept new online bookings automatically or manually.
 
✓ Get more guests with online table booking
By allowing guests direct access to reserving tables on your website, Facebook and Google, the chance of guests choosing your restaurant is higher. We guide you through the easy set up process and helps you implement the system.
 
The booking form can be added anywhere as a link or integrated as a widget. To make sure your guests don’t get lost in the process, it is optimized and tested to be as easy as possible to complete and access through mobile, tablet and computer.
 
✓ Follow your business with reports
Get an overview of your bookings and social media ratings with up-to-date reports.
 
✓ Fast and friendly support included
Our support team is ready to help you use our restaurant software, save time and get more satisfied  guests.

✓ Works seamlessly on any device
The exact same system and features are available and data is synchronized live across any mobile, tablet, iOS, Android, Mac and PC.
 
✓ Works anywhere in the world
Available in English in the 🇺🇸United States, 🇬🇧United Kingdom, 🇦🇺Australia and the rest of the world. Danish in 🇩🇰Denmark. Swedish in 🇸🇪Sweden.

Give it a try now!

title: Pronto Restaurant
description:
Do you love to order food online from your favorite restaurant? Use this app to keep in touch faster, easier and better with the restaurant you eat frequently from. If you are a loyal customer of one of our member-restaurants, this is the online food ordering app for you.
    
Features:
- order online your food from your chosen restaurant(s)
- based on location, the app automatically displays the restaurant(s) you order from
- you can see if restaurant is ready to take orders now and quickly browse their menu
- your contact details will be pre-filled so next time you order easier and faster
- your order confirmation includes pickup/delivery time estimation, provided by the restaurant staff especially for you and your order.
- your order will be confirmed in real time as member restaurants are directly handling your order immediately.

No middle-man, no confusing call-center, no over-promises. This is just between you and your chosen restaurant.

title: TouchBistro Dine
description:
TouchBistro Dine
Discover and reserve at your favourite restaurants.

TouchBistro Dine is the digital reservations platform designed to connect you with your next great meal. With TouchBistro Dine, you can easily browse the best restaurants in your city, book and manage your reservations from anywhere, customize your dining preferences, and read reviews from food-lovers just like you. 

Introduced in 2019 by TouchBistro – the iPad POS and integrated payments solution built for restaurant people, by restaurant people – TouchBistro Dine connects restaurants across North America with diners looking for memorable and personalized dining experiences. 

So whether you’re looking to discover and share a new restaurant with friends, celebrate a special occasion, or visit your go-to venue, TouchBistro Dine connects you with restaurants that know true hospitality starts with a reservation. 

Discovering your next great meal is simple. Easily browse the best restaurants, make and manage your reservations, and share your experience with others.

- Easily browse the best restaurants by name, location, cuisine, and much more!
- Book reservations anywhere from the web, mobile app, or directly through Google.
- Need an opinion? See what people are saying by checking the restaurant’s ratings and reviews.
- Get a customized dining experience, when the restaurant accepts your notes about allergies, dining preferences, and much more!
- Connect directly with the restaurant to confirm, edit or update your reservation at the press of a button. 
- Share your thoughts on the experience with others by providing a rating and review after your visit.

comments: Was transferred from another dining reservation app to this app. Tried to find restaurants and make a reservation - available restaurants never were displayed. I have no idea what restaurants in my area are using the reservation system - since I can't get a list of restaurants for a reservation, restaurants using this app have lost my business.
Excellent alternative to other reservation apps and won't cost your favorite mom and pop resto some % of the bill. Keep more money in their pocket in times like these.

So far, a terrible app. Made a reservation for 7 PM, when I go to their app it says 4 PM. This app also does not show up in websites properly. Parts of the calendars are cut off so I can't see futures dates.
Glaciers move faster than this app- it is completely unusable
Amazing app - great features and I love how easy it is to use!

title: SUBWAY®
description:
Hungry? With the SUBWAY® App you can order ahead to access Express Pickup, get digital coupons, earn on purchases, scan to pay and more -- all in seconds!


EARN: With Subway MyWay™ Rewards built right into the app, you can earn on every purchase, plus get Surprise Rewards, exclusive deals and more. Consider it a "token" of our appreciation for you!

SAVE: Get digital deals sent right to your app, personalized just for you.

CUSTOMIZE: Like extra olives? Us too. Customize your sandwich just like you would in the restaurant. Swap your cheese, pick your toppings, toast your bread – the opportunities are endless. 

TOP IT OFF: Not sure what to add to your sandwich? Leave it to the experts. Add a sandwich with suggested toppings directly to your bag - keeping decisions low but deliciousness high. 

SAVE A FAVE: Have a “usual”? Don’t waste time digging through past orders. Name and save your fave to make reordering a snap. 

PAY: No wallet? No problem. Pay for your food ahead of time through the App or in-store using your mobile wallet. 

FIND: On-the-go? We got you. Find a SUBWAY® Restaurant near you, get directions, view hours and other things you want to know – like if the restaurant has a drive thru or serves breakfast. 

What are you waiting for? Download the App and start eating and earning! 

For any questions, you can contact us here: AppFeedback@subway.com
            
Mobile ordering is only available at Participating restaurants. 

SUBWAY® is a registered trademark of Subway IP LLC
© 2020 Subway IP LLC All Rights Reserved

summary: Find a store, order and pay! We're always adding stores so keep checking in.
recentChanges:
Now, Curbside Pickup is Even Easier
Get ready for Footlong Season with the Subway App, and order the food you love while staying safe with Contactless Curbside Pickup. This release includes:
- New Curbside Features: Tap your car’s model and color, and then send a message saying “I’m Here” directly from the app.
- Introducing Promo Codes: Take advantage of mobile-exclusive deals at checkout.
- Tap to Toast: It’s even easier to tell us to toast your sub - perfect for a cool fall day.
comments: Difficult to get my sandwich exactly right with the app. They don't always see the "special instructions" I put in. The selection of chips and cookies in the app is very limited compared to what is actually available in the store. None of my favorite flavors are there. I don't think I'll use it anymore for those reasons specifically. OBTW, I waste more time trying to use the saved favorites in the app than just ordering previous orders or making a completely new one.

For the most part, it's a good app. Not the most user friendly, but not the worst. Gives a limited amount of characters for special notes, but no way to make those notes elsewhere, i.e. no way to tell them you want bacon well done when adding it to a sandwich or that you wish the sandwich to be heated, except in the notes. And the staff don't always pay attention to the notes

Great when it works, but it's been messing up my saved favourites. First, it forgot my saved customizations. Then it submitted my ordered favourite wrap as nothing but meat, despite all the toppings on my list. When I reported it, they passed it to the restaurant to resolve, nevermind they made exactly what the subway app had incorrectly forwarded them. I no longer trust this app to get my order right, or expect them to help if there any problems.

App is Disappointing! I loved it when I got text rewards... usually had a buy one get one free and all I had to do was click the link, hit redeem and show them the code at the register. NEVER had a problem. Now buy one get one is super rare and when it does come up the app wants you to order online and THEN it will tell you if the coupon is available at your location... good luck finding a subway that accepts the coupon! sigh. I used to eat subway once or twice a week. now its rare!

No help with problems. Launch the app and get an error that there is a problem with my account and to contact support. Guess what, called a toll free number provided by the store and they do not support the app. Who supports it? Who can help me? When I click on contact support it takes me to complete a survey for the store. Pitiful. If anyone reads this that can help please contact me!

title: Restaurant Equipment World
description:
The Restaurant Equipment World App is a reference guide featuring 400,000+ restaurant equipment and foodservice supply items. It's the perfect tool for restaurant owners, managers and chefs to find foodservice supplies for their commercial kitchen operation. You can view photos, read detailed products descriptions and even download full product PDF specification sheets. It features a bi-lingual interface both in English and Spanish languages. Our app is the most comprehensive in the kitchen equipment industry and will quickly become your go-to reference guide for in-depth foodservice equipment product information.

FEATURES & BENEFITS:

- 400,000+ Kitchen Equipment and Supply Items
- Full PDF Specification Sheets
- Extensive Product Images

- Search by Product Description
- Easy to Use Category Navigation
- Product Filtering by Manufacturer

- Voice Search Option
- Bi-lingual Interface (English/Spanish)

- Exclusive Offers for App Users

- The Most Comprehensive App in the Industry

title: Airbnb
description:
Unforgettable travel experiences start with Airbnb. Find travel adventures and new places to go far away or near to you, and access vacation home rentals, new experiences, and places to visit all around the world. Book everything for your trip, or start earning money as a host. 

BOOK TRAVEL EXPERIENCES
Go on local experiences led by native experts, whether it’s for multiple days or just an afternoon. Explore Seoul's underground music scene, hunt for truffles in a Tuscan forest, or give back to the community with a social impact experience.

BOOK VACATION HOMES
Choose from over 6 million vacation home rentals across 191+ countries. Search by price, neighborhood, amenities, and more.

POPULAR DESTINATIONS
Experience the beautiful sights & find local guides for the perfect vacation:
• Rio – Explore the birthplace of Samba or hang glide over the sights
• Paris – Find your fill in some of the best culinary tours and museums
• Barcelona – Discover the cities beauty with guided walking tours

For travelers: 
• Book vacation home rentals and travel experiences for your next solo journey, family vacation, or business trip
• Search for last minute travel accommodations or long term rentals
• Save your favorite rental homes, experiences, and places—and invite friends and family to plan the trip with you
• Add experiences and events to your itinerary
• Message your host and get directions to your home

For hosts:
• Share your extra space or lead experiences that showcase what makes your city great
• Update your listing and calendar availability
• Share what’s special about your neighborhood with a host guidebook
• Message guests and manage their reservations

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: UI has confusing layout. Political posturing on the front page but no 'check in' button to be seen. Cancels reservations over BS "identity verification" or something with two days of notice. I have verified ID in app and 6 stays, only thing that happened is my card blocked an attempted charge one time. I verified that card and nope, still denied. Support claims the host rejected my request, they are lying. I have two days to find something else and my car was just totaled. These dinks unreliable

We have used Airbnb many times both for overnight stays and experiences. The site itself is ready to use and accurate. I appreciate the feature that shows what the total will be because sometimes cleaning fees are extreme and a person needs to know that before they commit. I also like when there is clarity about specific cancellation fees for each location.

Today I am very pissed off. I booked a location through this app about a week ago and today I am trying to make another reservation and they are saying my account has been locked for security proposes. Every time I try to review my account to it sends me back to the same log in screen. There is no number to call and fix the problem and I can't get around the log in screen.

I have been using Airbnb application for more than three years and the fact that it has the same bugs from time to time is unacceptable. The switch account button appears and disappears. Even when it "decides" to appear some of the times it does not "remember" the codes of the switched account. But to make it even better after I log in to the other account I see in the listings panel listings of the previous account I just logged out. If I had space I would write more. Totally unprofessional.

I love the idea, and regularly use Airbnb, but I'm keen to jump ship for the first competitor who allows me to access the original posting for the booked trips within the app. I find it incredibly irksome to be forced to a computer for one of the most frequently desired actions that logically should be available in the app. I often need to revisit to confirm details from the pictures etc but you simply can't here. If it wasn't for communicating with hosts, I'd uninstall and do desktop only.

title: Bite Squad - Restaurant Food Delivery
description:
Get restaurant food delivered to your door in minutes with the Bite Squad app.


KEY FEATURES

Bite Squad provides a wide range of restaurants to choose from, along with handy filtering tools and a search bar to help you efficiently find the dishes you’re craving. We also offer low booking fees, speedy delivery and accurate orders.


HOW TO ORDER

Ordering restaurant delivery with the Bite Squad app couldn’t be easier. Simply download the app, type in your address, choose your favorite restaurant dishes and quickly check out with your credit card.


And if you create an account, we’ll securely save your address, order preferences and payment information for a speedier checkout the next time you order.


THE BITE SQUAD DIFFERENCE

After you’ve placed your order, you can watch its progress on our live tracking system so you know exactly when your food will arrive. If you have any order changes or questions, our Live Chat customer support team will be able to help you in real-time.


Whether you need your food on-demand or would like to schedule an order in advance, the Bite Squad app will get restaurant food to you when you want it.


ABOUT BITE SQUAD

Bite Squad restaurant delivery service is consistently rated best in the category by our customers. Our dedicated delivery squad works hard to bring more choices to our customers who want a great meal from their favorite restaurant delivered to their home or office.


Bite Squad was founded in 2012 in Minneapolis, Minnesota, and today, operates in more than 100 cities and delivers from more than 10,000 restaurants nationwide.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: The app is fine. The service sucks. They charge a fee and they jack the menu price up, too! Not to mention it takes forever to get your food. First 35 minutes then 55 now 96 minutes. I won't use them again. ***As to the reply. Ask your local restaurant. 8 out of 10 will tell you bite squad increases the menu price.

Terrible experience and will not be using the app again. My order got canceled because I never received a notification from the app that I needed to respond to an email that was sent to confirm information. Didn't find out there had been an issue until we went to pick up our food at the restaurant and had to reorder everything and wait even longer because it had gotten canceled. There really needs to be in app notifications in regards to this.
Terrible service. They often get orders wrong. The app has issues like getting locked out for 5 minutes if you miss one password attempt...

edit: Even after reaching out the issue is still present. Brand new Note20Ultra and the app sticks on the splash page. I have had this app installed for on multiple devices, tablets and phones, and it just doesn't start. The splash screen comes up but nothing else happens. The web app works though.

We've ordered through Bite Squad numerous times. The app it easy and we love the tracking feature. We can see where the driver is, a picture of them, and prepare for their arrival. The food arrives warm. I get notifications of deals and delivery fee savings frequently. It's so convenient, we spend probably more money on "eating out" than we should! It's so worth it though.

title: AirBrush: Easy Photo Editor
description:
Who says we can’t have perfection in our photos? We believe all users should have the best editor and filter technology at their fingertips, and AirBrush continually updates with new features and effects to stay up to date with editing standards. AirBrush was designed to be the best photo editor with user-friendly retouch tools, cool filter options, and natural, beautiful results!

Features:

Blemish and Pimple Remover
** Say goodbye to pimples and blemishes! With our blemish remover, you can eliminate pimples and unwanted spots with the tap of a finger. Add a swipe of blush to add radiance and charm.

Whiten Teeth and Brighten Eyes
** Whitening your teeth takes your smile to the next level! Our teeth whitening function lets you brighten your smile without over-whitening.
** Our “brighten” function enhances your eyes to instantly light up your features.

Perfect Skin in Every Photo
** Retouch, edit and even tan your skin to achieve perfect, glowing perfection in just a few swipes! Your skin will look naturally radiant in all of your selfies and photos! For an added bonus, swipe on a cool blush or rouge to give your cheeks an extra glow.

Slim, Reshape and Lengthen Your Selfie or Photo
** Instantly slim, lengthen or reshape any area of your photo with a few swipes of your finger.

Artistic Retouching Features
** In addition its HD editing features, the AirBrush editor also includes tools that let you blur, crop, stretch, slim and tune your pics for an artistic, beautiful and dramatic touch. Choose to automatically retouch your pictures or fix them manually.

Add Depth and Style to Your Photos
** Our “Blur” editing tool lets you retouch any photos to give it more depth and keep only the things that matter in focus. Your photos and pics will embody the cool perfection seen in professional photography.

Real-Time Editing Technology
** Edit your selfie before taking the picture with real-time editing tools. See your shot on your phone, choose your edits and filters, then snap the photo for a perfect pics every time!

Natural, Radiant Filters
** AirBrush beauty filters were professionally designed to enhance even the best pictures and selfie photos for a perfect, beautiful finishing touch. Some filters can add natural-looking makeup to your pics, like blush or mascara!

Ready to Share?
** This is the editing tool that really gets your picture ready for sharing. When you’re done editing, share your pics to popular social sites like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Snapchat right from AirBrush!

Follow us on our official accounts and share your selfies, pictures and comments with us!

• Facebook
• Twitter
• Instagram
• Website

recentChanges:
Pumpkin spice up your life with our newest update!

We made some improvements and bug fixes!
comments: Been my favorite "go-to" photo editing app. Wish there was the same features for videos. But I dont take many of those. So I don't mind keeping it strictly to photo edits. My only issue is the price. I feel for photo editing thats not as extreme or precise as something similar to photoshop; shouldn't cost more than photoshop. But thank you for providing with an app I do find enjoyment with!

I have had this app for a couple of years now. Unfortunately have had to change phones which included switching back and forth from iPhone to Android. Even though I've already paid it now won't let me use features on my new phone unless I pay again which I was going to be a sucker and do but it tells me I have the wrong password. Google says I'm using the correct pw. So looking for an alternative app. Super annoyed. Over it.

I love this app! Especially the part where when you do the smooth it doesn't turn you into looking like weird deformed baby! Like a lot of other places do! I often have to do some things on here and then go to PicsArt to do others but between two apps just amazing! that maybe we could have figured out how to do the things on this one that I can do over there but other than that I highly recommend this app!

I really think that this app is unique and has so many features that you literally can play with your pictures for hours on end changing every little detail and having so much fun doing it!! I went the extra mile and paid for a whole year of premium and lemme tell you, when that year is up, I will be paying for another one!! My favorite feature is the skin tone adjustment. It's really amazing and makes your skin just glow beautifully!!

I really enjoyed this app. Even paid for the subscription for the year. 2 stars because after about 2 months into my 12 months it told me I had to pay for premium features again. I tried emailing but no one got back to me and I still can't use premium features. Super disappointing.

title: Buvvas - Restaurant Management App
description:
Buvvas Business apps believes food is an integral part of life. It has no religion, region or language.Our ideology revolves around two important points.  connect people to food and let the food makers concentrate on making quality food while we do the rest they need to go online. Away from the legacy, Buvvas business apps, is a unique interchange of connecting people with restaurants while setting up everything that a restaurant needs inside out to go on-line. In other words your restaurant, great customers and awesome food. Instead of going to multiple vendors or third party food consolidators we do it all for you. By the way that's where we start and then go a long way from there. Our business applications are designed with a fresh thought process and specifically for the industry. Our versions of the software will aptly fit, individual restaurants ,multi franchise chains big and small. 

Some features of Buvvas Business apps include:

Mobile apps  and webapps for customers and restaurant owners
Online ordering
Customer Engagement
Admin Dashboard
Restaurant automation
Analytics and customer insights

If you want to know more contact us at info@buvvas.com

title: Open Restaurant - Start your own Restaurant
description:
Now a days everyone wants to check out different restaurants nearby to their place. For this purpose, we had made a very conformist application for the user to get all the nearby restaurants and check their available items they have. This restaurant app mainly helps you to give you all the information including the contact info and all the food the selected restaurant is offering. 
How to Use?
	You need to choose a sign up for your restaurant or select customer tab to do a user-based sign up.
	Restaurant registration: You need to fil out all the sign-up form by inserting your restaurant name, location of restaurant, email address, country, opening and closing times of your restaurant.

	Customer Registration: For an individual person sign up you just need to give your basic info like name, email address, phone number. You can also do it with google sign in process.

	Now Restaurant can display all items they have in there. These items may include Pizza, chicken burgers, rice, Hot dogs, Ice cream and many more deserts.

	For customer the main thing this application do is it will show you all the items and will display the prices as well.


Placing an Order: 
	Now you can select any restaurant select an item or items and select the quantity and place an order.
	For example, you want to have a pizza now firstly select a restaurant after that you have to go for the quantity. 
	Place the order if the restaurant have those items then they will accept your request and will give you the time to collect it from them.
	Reminder: You have to pick up the order by yourself from the targeted restaurant you have selected.
	After the collection of order, you will be given a receipt and your order will be shown in your history data.

Using this application will help you to know about the items you want to eat just by remotely means. All the orders can be seen in the orders tab easily. Restaurants can take advantage by many ways by having a promotion of there restaurants by following and registering them selves in the application. They can get more sales and visitors to there place. Customer can get food items easily at any time remotely and can pick up their food items from the restaurant once their order is ready. Suppose You want to have some deserts in your lunch or dinner this application may help you regarding this as it can give you many items to choose and can give you the comfort to pick up your favorite items and select them to eat.

title: Seamless: Restaurant Takeout & Food Delivery App
description:
Order food delivery from your favorite restaurants with the app that knows New York best 🗽. Local deals for burgers, tacos, sushi and more are a tap away with Seamless. 🍕 Celebrate the New Year with restaurant gift cards, special deals and perks you’ll love! 

Seamless is the food delivery and takeout app that New York loves, and for good reason. Order food with a quick and easy online ordering service that will make calling in from paper menus a thing of the past.

Start the year right with free food delivery on your first order of $15 or more. Get food delivery throughout New York and find great deals at the places you love through 2020 and beyond.

Get food deals from the restaurants you love with Perks! Order food with Seamless and earn points, which you can use to get up to $100 in great deals.

Get food delivery from great restaurants, full menus, and no hidden fees. Seamless delivers food throughout New York, whether you’re in Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, the Bronx or Staten Island. Order food from your NY favorites like Tenzan, Insomnia Cookies or that local joint you love in any borough.

Find food deals you won’t get anywhere else. Search the food finder for burgers 🍔, sushi 🍣, tacos 🌮, pasta 🍝 or anything else, and you can find a New York restaurant that will bring it right to your door. Want vegetarian or low carb options? In the mood for McDonalds, Panera, or Dunkin’? Seamless delivers it all.

Want to find local deals while walking around NYC and get your food to go? 🥨 Order food for takeout with Seamless, grab your food from a local restaurant and go.

Seamless offers:

🍕ORDER FOOD EASILY: 🍕
- Order food with just a few taps.
- Want Atomic Wings? Type “wings” into search and a list of the nearest local joints will pop up.
- Pick your restaurant, order food and wait for your delivery.
- Pay faster with Android Pay, PayPal, or a good old-fashioned credit card.

🥨NY RESTAURANT DELIVERY & TAKEOUT🥨
- Order food from New York restaurants and chains to have them delivered right to your door.
- Order takeout and pick up your food when it’s ready.
- Stay up to date with push notifications for real-time order updates.

💎RESTAURANT DEALS & SPECIAL OFFERS💎
- Order food with exclusive deals available through Seamless
- Food deals for the restaurants you love are just a tap away
- NEW: Perks and exclusive rewards – earn up to $100 in food deals and special offers!

🍝PREORDER & EXPRESS REORDER🍝
- Order food from two hours to up to four days in advance to get your delivery right when you know that you’ll need it.
- Got a low carb pasta that’s never let you down? Tap "Express Reorder" to quickly bring a previously ordered meal straight to checkout.

🍔LOCAL RESTAURANTS RATINGS & REVIEWS🍔
- The Seamless community submits ratings and reviews of our restaurants, giving you access to local insights that you can trust.

🍪SEAMLESS GIFTS🍪
- Give the gift of great food with our Seamless eGift cards, available for any occasion.


DELIVER FOOD FROM ALL YOUR FAVORITES
- Atomic Wings
- Avocado Sushi 🍣
- BJ’s Restaurants
- Buffalo Wild Wings 🍗
- Burger King 🍔
- Del Taco
- Denny’s
- Dunkin’
- Five Guys
- Hu Kitchen
- IHOP
- Insomnia Cookies 🍪
- Jack in the Box
- McDonalds (NYC only)
- Panda Express
- Panera
- Panino Rustico
- Pick a Bagel
- Pinkberry
- Red Robin
- Shake Shack
- Silver Rice
- Sonic
- Sweetgreen
- Tenzan
- Toasties
- Wawa
- White Castle
- And more!

See how New Yorkers eat in your neighborhood with Seamless, available in Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, the Bronx, and Staten Island.

Terms of Use: https://grhb.me/3buNiTD
Privacy Policy: https://grhb.me/3cBR7GH
CA Notice: https://grhb.me/3cCwrhG
Do Not Sell My Info: https://grhb.me/3bBnvt2
