summary: Order food, get restaurant delivery, or pick up food from restaurants near you!
recentChanges: We've cooked up some improvements and successfully squished some little bugs we found. And as always, we encourage you to order something delicious.
comments: Needs better service and needs restaurants that you can get food delivered to your location without having to refund all the time and update has taken away the best food places and the favorites. The old version was ten times better than the new one.

Apparently app has updated and removed favorites/my Seamless, which is infuriating and makes it pretty useless if you live somewhere with lots of options and want to keep track of places you like. Make a browser list of what you've tried and would order from again, and check you're not going through a third party for maximum small business support. If there's no convenience factor, dump the app. And no, I'm not offering additional personalized recommendations to the app developers. 😑
Too many glitches in the update. Not good. No. I will not send you a note. I just told you in my review. 10/28 You really need to fix this app. There are constant errors and timing out issues.

Not sure what happened the look, the ease of finding restaurants by your location is gone. Anything I saved is gone. This is not useful or helpful. I've gone back to searching for menus online or in person. This app is just taking space on my phone.
Great app! I really hate calling the restaurant and placing the order. This makes it a lot easier, and more visibility to order status. Also, fantastic customer service!

title: Keto Restaurant Guide & List
description:
Keto Restaurant Guide & List is your go to guide to find Keto diet, Atkins diet, and Low Carb diet friendly food options at your favorite restaurants. Keto Dieters can also find great new products and tasty recipes in our frequently updated News Section. 

Keto Restaurant Finder:
For your convenience, we also have an interactive map to each of the restaurants so you can find which one is closest to you!

summary: Find KETO friendly menu items at your favorite restaurants. A Keto Diet must!
recentChanges: Fixed loading Error
comments: Back button closes the app instead of going back. Absolutley NO listing of carbs, protein, fats etc. The only thing was a up/down thumb for us to rate the food.
Love the app. I can see people are contributing and there are more items added every day. It would be cool if you can search by location. Otherwise it is great.
They need to add a delete for menu items. Some obviously non-keto contributors have added items that are definitely not ketogenic.
The only Keto guide that shows actual reataurant menu items. It is fun adding my own suggestions.
Great way to find keto options at different restaurants.

title: Restaupos Point of Sale - POS System
description:
RESTAUPOS  POS – Restaurant Point of Sale 

RESTAUPOS POS point of sale system instead of a cash register is a full-featured In Flight point of Sale Device, affordable Point of Sale with Business Management tools - saving time and money & Stock Control. 

ANDROID Simplicity+ WIRELESS technologies + INTUITIVE interface = easiest to learn, most powerful POS available.

- Full Featured Business Tools -
Designed to accommodate  restaurant chains as well as individual mobile food trucks, nightclubs and coffee shops or pizzeria , RESTAUPOS POS IS  full-featured restaurant POS App and continues to lead the revolution in innovation and integration.

With detailed reports, wireless printing , RESTAUPOS POS is much more than an App. It is a smart, complete solution that fulfills a wide range of Point of Sale needs.

- BENEFITS of using RESTAUPOS POS -

• Easy to Learn – simple, intuitive interface
• No Contracts –  
• Language Packs – translations available
• Mobile and Wireless - Increased efficiency and sales

Using this App, your Restaurant staff can  place orders, perform customer checkouts, email receipts and more. The sleek and user-friendly interface allows you to take and send orders and perform guest checkouts wirelessly throughout the restaurant or your coffee shop. This eliminates the need to run tickets to the kitchen which allows for more server time at the table – which leads to higher sales

RESTAUPOS POS  allows you to turn your tablet or Smartphone POS, Mobile POS as a affordable point of Sale system. 

FEATURES

- Work in offline mode 
- Manage table, categories, item and kitchen note .
- Multi kind of taxes
- Synchronization you backup on or cloud secure server with one click
- Dine in, takeout and delivery
-Split or Transfer order
- Create an order and Complete at later time
-Number of people
- Order saved automatically


- Assign taxes on items
- the possibility of partial payment by cash or card
-Split Payment
- multiple tax options
- register a sale without typing a single word
- Email Text Receipts
- Work with most printers 

PRINTING

Supports an unlimited number of receipt or kitchen printers,This feature lets
you define at the item-level which station it gets routed to .Submit order , and food orders
go to the kitchen, drink orders go to the bar. Send any item to anywhere, automatically
 

REPORT

* Payment Report
* Period Sales
* Daily Time Clock Details
* Employee Revenue Summary
* sales reports by categories ,users ; sequence
* Category Amount Report
* send report

At the end of a working day the last thing you want to do is sit down with all your paper
bills and calculate your business performance
Restaupos offers a comprehensive reporting through the back office to instantly generate
report in real time. You also have the ability to filter and analyse individual performance
Restaupos is a pos system : Easy,simple,fast,No cloud and no lock in your data is private.-----


RESTAUPOS is also referred as 

No Cloud Point of sale system (formerly Cash Register)

Restaurant POS point of sale app  Affordable as Bar Point of Sale, Cafe POS ,Restaurant POS , Bakeshop Point of Sale , Truck food POS
 , Pizzeria or PIZZA POS, Tablet POS or Mobile POS System

You don’t need to be an
IT guy to get started with Restaupos the easy cash register for restaurant bar or pos system for food truck
Do what you’re passionate about and leave the rest to us

Cash register is easy to Setup your Menu items in the pos system for restaurant (Point of Sale application ) , Organize products by category,you can Update menu at Anytime.
Restaupos is a restaurant business pos system android solution is for restaurant owners by restaurant owners so you end up with the
best dynamic point of sale system and flexible solution for cash register and pos system

If you like the app then please give us a good rating.

comments: Thanks for this application. But the application doesn't allow making changes or arranging in category list like rename or changes positions name in one category list from down to up or from up to down. And if you put icon for owner can buy things for his shop. With icon compared between how much bought and sale.. I think when you do this update your application will be better Thanks

Love how it is set up, but personally would prefer a more direct cash register appearance. Love how I can adjust the sales price, asks for every customers name, phone #, address, & even email address. Would like it to be just a little bit more basic though. :)

99 usd i think is too much, after testing this app i found it has too many bugs and is not worth a dime until fixed.. The POS allows only small icons which have to be low quality photos 128x128 the pos looks like a disaster..
Good app but garments shop ka update hona chaye...

One of the best (if not the best) POS app(s), thank you so much for this great effort, keep it up! There's only one issue but I can't stress on it. if the printed text could be in UTF-8, so I can print in Arabic. I tried and it printed garbage!

title: Restaurant Finder : Near By Me
description:
Restaurant Finder offers a convenient way to find restaurants around you.
This app works well worldwide.
Request : connect to internet or Enble GPS.
The Restaurants Near By Me uses your current GPS location and displays a list of restaurants, if it does not return any results, please make sure your location services are enabled or not.
Find Restaurants searches and navigates near by hotels , bars , fast food around your location.
Auto detect user location by GPS.
This application is also free and fast, it will zoom into the map and instantly return results for your chosen search.
Finding place nearby your location has never been this easy.
Find Restaurants data is collected and organized through various online resources.

Categories :
- Restaurants,
- Hotels,
- Bar / Wine Shop/ Liqure Shop,
- Bakery,
- Cake Shop,
- Coffee Shop,
- Cafe,
- Fast Food,
- Desi Dhaba,
- Ice Cream Shop.

Features :
- Search places nearby which is display in categories,
- Show Details of place like Address, Phone Number, Ratings, Reviews, Map, Website, Location, Distance, Time from you to place nearby, Open Hours etc.
- Navigation from your current location to selected place,
- View map : hydrid,normal,terrain,statelite,
- Save Favourite Place,
- Share app with your family and friends,

Settings :
- Search by Radius Note : Maximum Radius is 50km,
- Show places distance in Km/Mile.

title: MenuEgg: Foodie Restaurant Finder, Around Me, Dine
description:
Have you ever asked yourself, are there any good places to dine around me? Hungry? Don`t know where to eat or what to eat? MenuEgg Restaurant Finder Foodie App is here to make it easier for you! Whether you like vegetarian food, or are in the mood to eat a steak, or if you prefer healthy food, we have a solution for you! MenuEgg provides recommendations to dine to for dishes on menus at local restaurants near you. 

The best Restaurant Finder Foodie app, MenuEgg, provides you with the ability for to select your persona as well as your favorite type of restaurant. With this information, MenuEgg will instantly provide top dishes to eat nearby! All supported by a machine learning and artificial intelligence algorithm!

When we are thinking of food, the most common questions are: What to eat? Where to eat? Is there something interesting around me? MenuEgg finds you the perfect dish! Use MenuEgg Restaurant Finder Foodie app to see ratings and recommendations that other users have rated right at your fingertips. It is quickly becoming the #1 menu recommendation app! Join for free, explore local restaurant menus, and find the right dish to eat by either the choice of Dining at local restaurants, or taking some food on the go.

🍕🍕Main features of our Restaurant Finder Foodie app:🍕🍕

✔️ Dish Recommendations. If you don't know what to eat, let us suggest what we believe you'll enjoy the most with only 1 click!
✔️ Foodie Persona. Choose which type of persona are you: Carbolicious, Food Coma, Heart Healthy, Protein Rich or Sweet Tooth. Based on this, we will find local restaurants, and recommend to you what to eat!
✔️ Platform for owners to add and modify their menu. Any owner can now claim their business and build their custom menu for customers to see and use.
✔️ Restaurant Coupons. Owners can now add coupons as well as see how many users have used them!
✔️ Owners now have the ability to target selected users that we believe would be interested in the type of food and dish that they offer. They can then target coupons to those users.
✔️ Analytic view. Owners can see how their coupons are performing
✔️ User inbox. Users now see messages sent to them. They will receive coupons that owners have promoted for them as well as receive updates and news from the MenuEgg team on latest information.
✔️ Gift cards. Users can redeem gift cards through points that they have accumulated.
✔️ b>Places around me. Ability to search for places in any city with a built-in autocomplete field. ----Ability to search in any city with a built-in autocomplete field.----
✔️ Search for other users
✔️ Follow users
✔️ Introduced a new feed button to see people you're following and their recent posts
✔️ Can call restaurants from the app
✔️ Redesign of profile page to include following and followers tab

If you still don`t know what to eat and where to eat, pick your inner food persona and let MenuEgg’s restaurant finder algorithm do the work for you! Go out and eat while enjoying fine dining!

We’ve add 3 new categories to select from - diabetic, high blood pressure, and Keto!

Enjoy!!

Performance and UI is awesome. This application is really perfect. Easy to find restaurant I like. Highly recommend!!!

title: Alice's Restaurant - Fun & Relaxing Word Game
description:
Alice's Restaurant is a fun and relaxing word game with a UNIQUE story which is happening at a restaurant owned by Alice with her friends and family members.

One day when Alice heard the news that the restaurant run by her parents would be closed, she asked you("The Restaurant Rescuer") for help. You and Alice decided to make plans and renovate the restaurant back to life...

In this restaurant, you have to collect ingredients and recipes for making nice cuisines, customize all the furniture and decorations. You and Alice will also make new friends here to experience amazing stories together. You can use the "Camera" to capture all the great moments in this game.

Based on the classic word search(word find) and crossword gameplay, it allows you to enjoy thousands of challenging word cross puzzles in your hand.


➤ Highlights

★ SUPER RELAXING WORD GAME:
 Addictive word puzzle games based on classic gameplay
 Creative and unique story based on running a restaurant
 Nice & Clear gaming graphics and user interfaces
 Thousands of word puzzles are ready for you to challenge

★ AMAZING REWARDS & BOOSTERS: 
 Constantly find out correct words to make "Combos"
 A "Rocket"  helps you to find a word at a time
 A "Bulb" helps you find one letter in a certain block
 A "Lightening" helps you to find 5 letters in different blocks

★ MAKE MORE ACHIEVEMENTS:
 Pass more levels to unlock themes
 Collect ingredients and recipes to make cuisines
 Challenge to find "Extra Words" as many as possible
 Collect more items and themes for decoration
 More characters and various themes are waiting for you to discover


➤ How to Play

- Swipe from one letter to another to line up words on the board vertically or horizontally 
- Use a certain booster(such as "Shuffle", "Lightening", "Rocket", "Bulb") for help when you get stuck
- Challenge to find all the hidden "Extra Words" as many as possible 
- Purchasing items to decorate and renovate the restaurant
- Share to your friends for help when you get stuck


➤ Contact Us
support@wordgame.freshdesk.com


Are you bored with the ordinary word games?
Here is a CHANCE for you to experience a nice and exciting journey with word search puzzles! You’ll never have a dull moment after you try these addicting word puzzles! 
★★★ NOW, you can DOWNLOAD & PLAY it for FREE! ★★★

comments: The game started out alright, but since the last update I havent been able to do anything other than play levels. When I try to do the tasks it tells me I need to restart to claim the update reward, but restarting doesn't do anything. I would definitely change the rating if this was fixed.

I absolutely love this game but it needs a few changes.First y'all absolutely must get rid of the current decorating set-up where 2 of the 3 choices must be purchased with in game currency. It needs to either be where you use your earned stars for completing decorating tasks or you use in game currency not both.Also it's frustratingly difficult to earn coins&hints, plus the coins you do earn from game play go into a bank that once full must be bought with real money.
A really great game, graffics are detailed, music is OK, game play is great fun, and the restaurant really takes shape as you progress, all in all a game worth returning to time after time.
Great game but the only issue I have is that I can't see the dialogue to read what the characters are saying to each other....please fix

It's really fun to play this game.. The reason I gave four star is bcuz even if the character (Alice) have to take rest, or just drink something, it take 1 star to do it, it's reasonable cuz the cross word is easy to play and we can gain many stars so that's not an issue. For me the real reason is that they talk a lot ( I mean the story line ) n it gets boring to read so I just skip it.. But it's really a fun game to play in free time.

title: Restaurant Finder - Food Finder
description:
What will you do if you want to go out for a meal and not sure where to eat? You will use a restaurant finder app to find nearby restaurants! Where will you find the best restaurant finder app?

You need not to go anywhere! Here is the best restaurant finder app for your device. Download and install “Restaurant Finder” and find nearby restaurants when you are traveling or just want to go out for dining! Use “Restaurant Finder”, to find the best restaurants around you.

“Restaurant Finder” is a great way to find restaurants around you. You can search for restaurants nearby or type in an address or zip code and the app will give you a list of all the restaurants near you. You can select one of them based on their menu and reviews. This restaurant guide app works well worldwide, especially in USA, UK, Ireland, Canada, Germany, Italy, France, Spain, Denmark, India, Australia, Brazil, Malaysia and Thailand. The app uses your location and tells you what restaurants are nearby and where to eat. You can search by restaurant, café, takeaway, bakery and much more. 

You will find all the information you need about the restaurant such as opening hours, phone numbers, reviews by other customers, hygiene rating and menus etc. 

Key Features:
• Universal app, optimized for all Android devices including tabs
• Simple UI and easy to use
• Easily search and find the best restaurants, cafes around you using restaurants around me feature
• Use Saved feature and save the places where you’d like to visit again
• Find all the information needed about a restaurant including opening hours, reviews etc

You can use this best Restaurant Finder app to find other businesses rather than nearby restaurants. You can find cafes, pubs, hotels, night clubs, grocery stores and super markets, taxis and cabs, ATMs, gas stations and much more. comments: Challenging and fast game. Highly recommend this game, if you're up for a challenge. You can earn coins and gems by just playing, no need to spend any money. You can earn enough to upgrade food and equipment, and boosters. You'll definitely need to use the boosters on some of the food trucks. There are some trucks that are very challenging, it's a good thing that there's an option to switch from hard to easy once it becomes stressful.

Funniest cooking game on here, music fits in with the theme, great graphics, however, this game makes my phone extremely too hot, I try to reopen the app and it won't let me off, it's dang near impossible to exit out, and not to mention the customers are getting impatient because the game lags, I said it, lags. This game needs to be fixed, because it is like I said a great game, but the heat, the lagging and not being able to exit out is a huge problem, not to mention I have to restart my phone.

I was looking for games with a Halloween theme and I've always enjoyed cooking games so I decided to try this out. Very pleasantly surprised! The graphics are good, the recipes are imaginative, and funny, and the game play is smooth. I haven't run into any glitches. So far completely free to play which is why I will buy something so I can support the game developers. I see they have another game with a Christmas cooking theme and I will probably check that one out too. Great Job GameiCreate!

I really like this game but there is one bug that confuses me. On level 386, Cake Shop, there's one customer that will ask for a blank, one layered cake but after you make it, they won't take it and you'll end up failing the level. Other than that the game is amazing.

I absoulutly love this game.I'm on the 5th truck.Only one thing is my complaint-after you get a few trucks in it gets almost impossible to keep up but it is fun to work on.It gives you a ton of diamonds the more you play so you don't have to buy them like other games.

title: YP - The Real Yellow Pages

YP – the even-more-powerful Yellow Pages, helps you connect instantly with great local businesses. Find over 20 million business listings, browse menus, search by cuisine, book a table, see showtimes, find cheap gas, and navigate with maps. YP always helps you get it done, in a snap.

What else?

•	Access showtimes and buy movie tickets directly from the app with our Fandango® integration

•	See service menus for doctors, attorneys, salons, auto repair and more – with pricing and other helpful details

•	Browse ratings, reviews and photos

title: Tap Tap Now
description:
Tap Tap Now allows its users to locate Haitian restaurants worldwide. The app  offers a Take-Out option for Haitian restaurants in the United States (US) and Canada. 
Tap Tap Now has a comprehensive database of all the Haitian restaurants in the US, Canada, Chile, Dominican Republic, France and of course Haiti.

 If you live or  are planning to visit any of the following cities Tap Tap Now is the app that will guide you to the nearest restaurant.
In the US and Canada, you can find Haitian food and restaurants in most cities and states: Atlanta,Hawaii, Tennessee, Kansas City, North Carolina, Boston, Washington DC, Baltimore, Indianapolis, Chicago, New York, New Jersey,Orlando, Tampa, Miami, Fort Lauderdale, Naples, Ft Myers, Port Charlotte, Jacksonville, Toronto, Montreal, Laval, Los Angeles. New locations being added daily 

The app will allow users to prepay for their food using the app and simply pick up once the food is ready. The restaurant has a the capability to update their menu in real time.

The app was built in Haiti by a team of software engineers, please continue to support our effort to help grow the tech sector in Haiti.

title: McAlister's Deli
description:
The McAlister’s app puts everything you crave about our deli right at your fingertips—a user-friendly experience that offers what you want, exactly how you want it, plus a little something extra. And now our app is better than ever with some exciting new features:

- Get your favorites even faster with quick reorder

- Make your order truly yours with easy item customization

- Save your McAlister’s restaurant for easy ordering plus local news & offers by choosing a favorite location


Plus, earn and keep track of your McAlister’s Rewards. With McAlister’s Rewards you can:

- Get a free tea just for signing up

- Earn points with every purchase towards any item on the menu

- Redeem rewards when and how you want

- Get special offers like a birthday treat

In addition to these new features and rewards, you can still explore our menu, find your nearest McAlister’s, order ahead to skip the line, let us know how we’re doing and more.

McAlister’s mission is to give friends and family a reason to get together over great food that’s handcrafted just for them. And we want our app to bring the same smile to your face that our sandwiches, spuds, soups, salads, desserts and famous tea do. Enjoy!

comments: When it works, it's great. Half the time, though, when I try to start an order, it hangs up endlessly on loading the select a location page. Just now I uninstalled and reinstalled but can't log in to my account. Getting the "oops, something went wrong, try again later" message both at login and at request a new password. Can't order without being logged in. Too bad because I love y'alls food but am relying on contactless payment and curbside pickups for any restaurant meals these days.

Updated review: After a bad experience, I gave the app a second chance. I was able to place an order with zero problems from selecting menu items and payment. I am disappointed, though, that I was not able to select curbside pickup. However, I'm not going to penalize on stars this time as the food was immediately ready when I stepped in the restaurant.
Used to work fine now it keeps telling me give 5 minutes before scanning. I have it 5 hours, than 24 hours! It will only let you do it up to 3 days. Please fix the app!
App stopped scanning receipts, so I uninstalled and reinstalled and just says "oops something went wrong" when I try to sign in now.
Just as terrible and painfully slow as the website. Can't move past the sign-in page even though I made an account.

title: Restaurant Tip & Split Calculator Free
description:
Want to leave an appropriate tip (gratuity) at a restaurant, cafe, or bar, but can't do math quickly in your head?

Use our Restaurant Tip Calculator app to quickly and easily calculate the right tip (gratuity), new bill total, and the per person (split) amount if you are splitting the check between multiple people.  Easy, Fast, and Intuitive.  You can calculate the appropriate tip (gratuity) in seconds.  Tipping is a lot easier with this app.

With just the press of one button, you can turn on the Camera LED flash light if you are in a dark restaurant or bar to help you see the check/bill.

And there is a button at the bottom that will help you quickly create a text message to send to friends with their share of the bill plus the tip percentage, if you are splitting the check.

SAFE - We DO NOT collect any personal information with this app.  It only requests the minimum permissions necessary to perform its functions.  This is our free version of the tip calculator app.

You can now customize this tipping app by setting your own preferences such as the default tip, default split number, currency symbol, automatic rounding, and more.

Key Features:
1.  Allows you to set your own preferences including:  Default Tip %, Maximum Tip %, Default Split Number, Maximum Split Number, Currency Symbol, Automatic Rounding, and whether you want to save your numbers upon exiting the app.
2.  Calculates immediately and automatically after entering the Check amount.  No need to press additional buttons.
3.  You can do it the fast way by just entering the total amount OR you can enter the Check Subtotal and Sales Tax separately if you don't want to tip the tax.
4.  Slider Bars let you change the Tip % and Number of People (split) easily and quickly.
5.  If you're in a dark restaurant or bar, you can turn on the LED camera Light on your device with the touch of a button.
6.  Text the Per Person (Split) $ amount to a friend with the touch of a button.
7.  Using the Light Gray Up Arrow buttons to Round Up the Tip Amount, Total, or Per Person (split) amount.
8.  Using the Light Gray Down Arrow buttons to Round Down the Tip Amount, Total, or Per Person (split) amount. 
9.  Allows moving the app to the SD card.
10. Vibrates the device briefly when buttons are pressed.
11. Dark Screen Interface with high contrast that is Easy to Read and does not blind the user in dark restaurants and bars.

Please feel free to email any questions, comments, or suggestions to sunflowersoft1-a@yahoo.com.

comments: Very nice & easy to use. I like that I can leave a bigger tip then some apps calculate.

It works fine. I just find it too busy to look at and find what I am looking for. Maybe the white arrows are too large compared to the numbers in the boxes. The green bars are so bold that they scream like neon- making me avoid looking at them. I prefer up/down arrows instead of the slider for tip options, but appreciated being able to lock it in settings. Nice to have the adds out of the way st the top. Don't avoid trying this app. It could be the best one for you. I just prefer a subtle look.

This is a really good app it's very easy to use and understand. There's just one thing that should be different on it. The sales tax is expressed in $dollar$ amounts. I think it should be expressed in %percentages% so it could calculate your State's sales tax for you. But other than that it's a really good app. I especially like the fact that you can turn on your phone's camera light and use it like a flashlight I have never seen that in any other tip calculators. Bravo to the Developers.

The most versatile App of all I have tried! My congratulations for your effort in designing an almost perfect one. However, need to ask if you can design it for us to be able to set a Default tax, same as for the Tip. (Different states have diff taxes) Also there are times in which we would like to verfy how the merchant is computing it. Thanks! Eli.
Indispensable app!! Eliminates time-wasting and confusion.

title: FoodBooking
description:
Do you love to order food online from your favorite restaurant? Use this app to keep in touch faster, easier and better with the restaurant you eat frequently from. If you are a loyal customer of one of our member-restaurants, this is the online food ordering app for you. 

Features:
- order online your food from your chosen restaurant(s)
- based on location, the app automatically displays the restaurant(s) you order from   
- you can see if restaurant is ready to take orders now and quickly browse their menu
- your contact details will be pre-filled so next time you order easier and faster
- your order confirmation includes pickup/delivery time estimation, provided by the restaurant staff especially for you and your order.
- your order will be confirmed in real time as member restaurants are directly handling your order immediately. 

No middle-man, no confusing call-center, no over-promises. This is just between you and your chosen restaurant.
descriptionHTML:
Do you love to order food online from your favorite restaurant? Use this app to keep in touch faster, easier and better with the restaurant you eat frequently from. If you are a loyal customer of one of our member-restaurants, this is the online food ordering app for you.

Features:
- order online your food from your chosen restaurant(s)
- based on location, the app automatically displays the restaurant(s) you order from
- you can see if restaurant is ready to take orders now and quickly browse their menu
- your contact details will be pre-filled so next time you order easier and faster
- your order confirmation includes pickup/delivery time estimation, provided by the restaurant staff especially for you and your order.
- your order will be confirmed in real time as member restaurants are directly handling your order immediately.

No middle-man, no confusing call-center, no over-promises. This is just between you and your chosen restaurant.
summary: Enjoy food from the restaurant you love.
recentChanges: Improvements and bug fixes.
comments: Was good when I first used it over a year ago. Now it's a buggy mess it keeps on freezing and I have to close the app and start the process all over again. The website version of the site is just as bad it. When you add something to the cart it freezes and causes chrome to stop working so I have to close chrome and start the process once again. Its so bad its better off just ringing in my orders directly to restaurant. Very bad app!!

Once you open, it lets you enter your favourite restaurant. I accidentally chose the default restaurant. Once you're in, the only restaurant you can view is the one you have preselected. No option to change or add new restaurant. Not flexible app. It gives you the option to select your favourite restaurant ONLY. Does not allow you to view others. So you will end up uninstalling the app and re-downloading it if you want to choose other restaurants. Hence, I will never, ever download it again.

You need to do a whole lot more work on this app - it is very buggy - Restaurants disappearing, and just the way the CART works - make it one cart for all but prevent multiple restaurant orders at once (from a development perspective it should be relatively easy)
So far from good. Possibly the most half-baked food service app to date. Even menulog who uses a wireframe from 2008 does better.
Says I have no Internet connection, but other apps have no problem. won't start because of this.

title: Cheetah Wholesale Food Supply
description:
Searching for a quick, smart, and straightforward way to safely access wholesale grocery supplies for you or your business? The GoCheetah app allows businesses and now the general public to order food and pay for wholesome ingredients - like produce, dairy, and meats - on the go. No more waiting in lines at crowded grocery and warehouse stores, wasting hours of time, or getting ripped off by wholesale restaurant distributors. With Cheetah’s convenient mobile app, contactless pickup, and next-day fulfillment service, we’ve got your back.

Download the Cheetah app to save time and cut down on your food costs! Filling your storeroom or feeding your family should be deliciously simple.

How it works:
The Cheetah app lets you order all your groceries and supplies on the go from your phone: Just open the app, select what you need from the inventory list, pay, and you’re done. All your wholesale supplies can be ordered in the blink of an eye. Get your items the very next day by scheduling a safe, contactless pickup, or businesses can qualify for free contactless delivery.

Forget something? Need an extra order of produce? With Cheetah’s Live Cart feature, you can edit your cart up until the night before your delivery is scheduled. For quick re-ordering, you can build a shopping list of your most commonly purchased products. Businesses can even submit previous vendors’ invoices and Cheetah will build your shopping list for you to show you the savings.

Save time and money on wholesale supplies
Save time and money ordering your groceries the way the pros do. Shorten your food and grocery shopping process from 2+ hours to just minutes and know you’re getting professional quality at a wholesale price.

Bet you never thought Cheetah could offer easy ordering, quality products, and next-day fulfillment with the ability to save you money as well. We can! Cheetah offers businesses and individuals competitive pricing on professional quality ingredients from well-known suppliers.

The convenience of a simple app with the care of a global support team
Just when you thought it couldn’t get any better. Cheetah’s tech-forward app is both smart and user-friendly. Pay for your order with a credit card or a bank transfer. Need extra assistance, have a product question, or an inquiry for support? We offer a rare, 24/7 live Customer Success team to make sure you always get the care, savings, and quality foods you need.

developerAddress:
351 9th St
Suite 302
San Francisco, CA 94103
recentChanges:
Thanks for ordering from Cheetah! Here's what's new:
- Cheetah's experts now recommend products to you! Take a look at the Recommended tile in the catalog
- Filter & sort your search results to find exactly what you're looking for
- Introducing the Cheetah Plus member program - Look for it under Profile -> Plans
- Fixed some bugs and made under-the-hood improvements.
Please reach out to our support team if you have any questions, concerns or feedback.
comments: Greg was very helpful in explaining this simple process. 3 words Convenient Convenient Convenient!

Great customer service. Continuing to improve and expand products, esp consumer sizes. Shop for groceries at your leisure and customize until midnight the night before pick-up. Set pick-up times/dates vs delivery. Extremely happy with the service and would highly recommend

The app is a bit quirky as it seems designed for restaurants, not consumers, and the product selection is a mix of restaurant supply and home use, but the prices are great, quality is good, the search feature works well and the customer service is way better than I'm used to. It reminds me of stories my grandparents told me about the professional salesmen of their era. Every single page has a "Can't find what you're looking for?" button, and they are on top of that, usually responding to requests while I'm still browsing.
Good prices, easy to use app, quick and clear sign-up and checkout Pick-up service was great, will definitely order again!
Very convenient and pricing is fair.

title: Islands Restaurant
description:
Aloha! Sign up now to enter for a chance to WIN A TRIP TO HAWAII (through Dec 31, 2018) and start earning your way towards FREE entrées! Every purchase you make means more points earned toward your next reward AND additional entries to win.  Other perks include:
•	Receive FREE Chips & Salsa upon sign up
•	Earn 1 point for every $1 spent
•	For every 250 points earned, receive one FREE entrée.
•	Fast and easy take out ordering right from your phone. 
•	Exclusive Offers!

comments: Being able to easily order and.pick up curbside or have our favorite burgers delivered during the pandemic has been awesome, love the app and rewards!
Good deals. Delicious food. The servers are great. Wonderful personalities.
Fun and easy.
Great app. Easy use

No way to scan the receipt to verify purchase. One has to give the phone number to the server, who writes it down on a scrap of paper, then manually enters the number at the register. Get with it, Islands! I've uninstalled.

title: CraveHalal: find halal food & restaurants
description:
We are the top zabihah Halal restaurant guide and halal food finder app with 20,000+ tasty, local halal restaurants in the USA, UK and Canada. When you’re craving halal, find the perfect halal restaurant with CraveHalal

CRAVEHALAL 🍗 HIGHLIGHTS: 

🍗The most prominent zabihah halal food finder platform with more than 51,000 food pictures and 37,000 restaurant reviews. 

🍔 We call EACH restaurant to manually verify their halal status. No one else does this! We know it's tough to find halal food and we've done the homework for you. We regularly update our database and you'll be pleasantly surprised to find more zabihah halal restaurants in your area than you anticipated. 

🍕 Our database has more than 20,000 zabihah Halal restaurants in USA, UK and Canada! And this is just the beginning. Halal restaurants are growing at a rapid pace! We add dozens of new halal restaurants on a weekly basis. 

🍗 We have the most accurate database of zabihah halal restaurants: we use superior technology to eradicate inaccuracies. We strive to keep our data fresh and accurate. 

🌯 Browse the most popular halal restaurants in your area - or search for halal restaurants in any other city. Finding halal food cannot get easier!

🌮 Get accurate restaurant details (website, menu, business hours etc.). You can also search by cuisine and check if restaurants are open or closed. There's also a super cool map-view to show you how many halal restaurants are present near you!

DO YOU CRAVE HALAL? DOWNLOAD FOR FREE TODAY!
==============================================

recentChanges: Various improvements and fixes
comments: What you wanted Zabiha app to be. Up to date information, good interface, easy to navigate with a bunch of new options. Would like to see more user reviews vs generic help reviews. Great App!

Good concept. Had few places near me missing so ive submitted them. Also would be great to filter by fully halal only. Buts its good as a starting point. I normally have to use justeat or tripadvisor then filter for halal so this will be so much better once everyone starts using it and updating.
It's pretty easy to order and get what you want. However it stops my music when I'm on here
Missing some restaurants and no easy way of updating app to include those restaurants. However, this is the most comprehensive app I've found so far.

Good application and the information is correct about Halal cafes and restaurants. One minor issue that information about addresses in countries like Russians and other previous states of Russian Federation (so called before USSR) are sometimes not very correct, but one call can solve the problem. In a nutshell, I would like to thank people who created Crave Halal since it very authentic. People keep the good working going on. I would recommend it with all 5 stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐. Thanks again!!!👍

title: Crave: Live Deals & Discounts From Top Restaurants
description:
The Crave app shows you a live map of restaurants in your local area with deals!

All deals are on the total check, including the drinks.

Over 100,000 people use the Crave app every day to claim exclusive deals and discounts up to 70% off on 🍜 tasty food and 🍷 drinks to dine out at over 300 of NYC's best restaurants.

Hungry? Not sure where to go to lunch or dine out? Simply open the Crave app and you’ll see the best restaurants in your area. Save money 🤑 and eat great food! 🤤

If you are looking for a 🍕 tasty pizza or any kind of 🥘 delicious food at a local restaurant to dine out, and want to enjoy a discount when you order food and drinks (yes, deals are also on the 🍹 drinks!), you'll love Crave. The Crave app partners with top local restaurants in New York, so that you can dine in or get your food and drinks to 🥡 take away, for breakfast, lunch & dinner.

HOW IT WORKS:
✔️ New tasty food deals are uploaded by restaurants every day.
✔️ Claim a live deal in the app and book your table.
✔️ Once you find a live deal, simply claim it before the time runs out. Time to dine out for breakfast, lunch or dinner more often.

DEALS:
✔️ Great deals automatically appear to your Crave app map.
✔️ The faster you claim the offers, the bigger the discounts you can get.
✔️ Claim your 20%, 30% or even 70% off your food and drinks! 🥤
✔️ Choose what type of offer you would like.

RESTAURANTS:
✔️ You can filter what you feel like eating.
✔️ Choose from a range of local restaurants and bars with tasty live discounts to dine out.
✔️ Find what type of offer you would like to be shown.
✔️ Chinese, Italian, Indian, Thai, Japanese and many more! 🍲

Claiming a live deal is instant and once you've claimed your restaurant discount through the Crave app, you'll receive a digital voucher to display when you arrive to the restaurant. You'll get discounts on everything you order, including drinks! 🍻 Dine out more often!

Live in New York 🗽

Co-founded by celebrity chef, Marco Pierre-White.
Facebook: www.facebook.com/crave_app
Instagram: @thecraveapp
Twitter: @thecraveapp

recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: Happy again! I have really enjoyed this app and it has led me to restaurants that I wouldn't have gone to without it. (The discount makes the try less of a risk - or I might not have sought the place out.) I had an issue with their latest upgrade, reviewed and reported it. Crave got back to me, fixed the issue, and gave me a credit. I am back to loving this app! Thank you!

Only used it once so far - second time should be today - but it's really great so far. I got to try out a new place without having to spend like $15 on a meal I wasn't sure I'd like. No issues redeeming my reservation. No payment info needed in the app. Just go there, order, pay some percentage less than full price (depending on the restaurant's offer), grab food and go. This app accomplishes exactly what it sets out to do. A+.

Granted I downloaded the app at night, the app did not have many restaurants with deals.  That's understandable, but there also was not a large selection of restaurants available even greyed out. This app could be interesting in the future once more restaurants are added to the platform or they showcase past deals at restaurants to keep you checking back for the next one.

I used Crave for the first time yesterday and paid way less than the usual bill. Definitely useful and money saving. Highly recommend this app If you are tired of overpaying a bill. Thank you Crave!!! Excellent app!!

Good app but there needs to be option to switch off and customize (in different ringtone/vibrate) notifications! Really annoyed by getting bunch of notifications from favorited restaurants throughout the day.

title: Spontaan - Restaurant deals
description:
Spontaan is a must-have for those who love to go out for dinner!
You can find the best restaurants with their best price on Restaurant Today, so you can always go out for a spontaneous dinner.

With the free Spontaan app you have access to over 1000 restaurants. Every week over 100 restaurants are added for you to discover. Making a reservation is easy and can be done with just one swipe.
Grabbing a bite to eat after a day trip? Home late from work and don’t feel like cooking? There’s always a reason to go to a Restaurant Today!

With Spontaan you have:
- access to 1000+ restaurants where you can go for a last minute dinner at a great price
- every week 100+ restaurants are added, so there is always something new to discover
- an overview of all the best restaurant deals in your area
- easily booked your table for tonight with just one swipe
- the service and quality you’re used to, but now for the best price

comments: Waaay too many permissions needed, no explanation, no optional perms...
Kopie van Socialdeal
Jammer dat de beschikbaarheid van restaurants op de app niet overeenkomen met dat op de website. Breng aub geen software uit die niet doorgrondig is getest, er zitten veel bugs in. Gemiste kans.
De app is bij mij onbruikbaar: hij loopt na het starten meteen vast op mijn telefoon.
Niet in west-Vlaanderen

title: REZTO Le réseau des Restos
description:
Tout ce que vous voulez savoir sur les restos, avec de vrais avis-clients!
L’esprit de Rezto repose sur des valeurs de partage, de dialogue et de confiance, avec une approche différente dans le rapport restaurant / client
Concrètement avec Rezto, vous pouvez:
•	Rechercher un restaurant selon des critères très précis et des besoins                                                                                      
 #surmesure
•	Consulter des profils de restaurants très complets, ou vous trouverez tout sur leur identité, leurs équipements, leurs horaires… mais aussi, leur état d’esprit, leurs producteurs, leur équipe, bref leur savoir-faire   
#vivreuneexpèrience
•	Vous référer à des avis-clients de confiance et en déposer, en prenant en photo votre ticket de caisse                      
#aurevoirlesfauxavis
•	Écrire un message public pour la communauté Rezto et aussi un message privé, uniquement pour le restaurateur et vous    
#dialogueconstructif
•	Avoir un fil d’actualité dédié aux restaurants, pour partager leur savoir-faire, et découvrir de nouveaux endroits.  
#freshnews
•	Profiter des contenus sans publicité            
#cestmieux
•	Vous engager au côté d’une entreprise Française qui défend les valeurs de la restauration et remet l'humain au coeur de la relation digitale    
#frenchcuisine           

Rezto est une application gratuite pour ses utilisateurs. Les restaurants qui rejoignent notre plateforme, s’engagent à nos côtés avec un abonnement. Nous sommes au début de l’aventure et le nombre des partenaires augmente jour après jour. Join us!

title: Expedia Hotels, Flights & Car Rental Travel Deals
description:
Exclusive savings on hotels, flights, cars, and travel for the ultimate travel experience. 
Book your hotels, flights, rental cars, things to do and bundle deals on the app and get Double Expedia Rewards points! Over 500,000+ hotels worldwide  including some of the best hotels in the US, including boutique hotels, luxury hotels, airport hotels, hostels, B&Bs and resorts. Free cancellation on most hotels. Because flexibility matters.

From planning to booking, the Expedia App is designed to enhance your travel and hence acknowledged as Webby for People's Voice: Best Travel App. Save with mobile-exclusive hotel deals and stay one step ahead with flight, hotel and car alerts and view your trip details anytime, anywhere.

Save big when booking bundle deals:
- Select your perfect hotel and ideal flight 
- Keep an eye out for Unreal Deals
- View your flight and hotel details together and marvel at all you’ve saved 

Save big on hotel rooms:
- Save up to 25% with mobile-exclusive hotel deals for tonight, or any night
- Sort by price, free cancellation, deals or reviews to find a hotel perfect for you
- Read real reviews from verified hotel guests

Find your perfect flight:
- Choose from hundreds of airlines
- Sort by price, no change fees flights, duration or departure and arrival time
- Book all class types, from economy to first class seats

Get going as soon as you land:
- Enjoy round-trip car rentals from any airport – with no cancellation fee
- Reserve a car rental up to 30 minutes in advance
- Choose from our selection of standard car rentals, luxury autos, SUVs and more

Discover and book things to do:
- Browse and book activities for hundreds of destinations worldwide 
- Get tickets for tours, shows and theme parks, museums and more 
- Reserve airport shuttles and ground transportation

Book in a flash and get rewarded for your travel:
- Already signed in? Complete your booking in less than 30 seconds
- Earn double Expedia Rewards points on all your purchases

Your trip companion, no matter the device: 
- View upcoming trip details, hotel address information and get maps for directions 
- Receive alerts for flight delays, hotel check-out times and more
- Share itineraries with family and friends via email or text message
- Get inspired with our curated tablet travel collections

Download the Expedia App for hotels, flights, cars rentals, activities and bundle deals today! 

*Limited quantity, while supplies last. Terms and conditions apply. Only available for customers residing in the US.

*Savings based on all vacation package bookings with Flight + Hotel on Expedia.com from September 2013 through February 2014, as compared to price of the same components booked separately. Savings will vary based on origin/destination, length of trip, stay dates and selected travel supplier(s). Savings not available on all packages.

The Expedia app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.
descriptionHTML:
Exclusive savings on hotels, flights, cars, and travel for the ultimate travel experience.
Book your hotels, flights, rental cars, things to do and bundle deals on the app and get Double Expedia Rewards points! Over 500,000+ hotels worldwide including some of the best hotels in the US, including boutique hotels, luxury hotels, airport hotels, hostels, B&Bs and resorts. Free cancellation on most hotels. Because flexibility matters.

From planning to booking, the Expedia App is designed to enhance your travel and hence acknowledged as Webby for People's Voice: Best Travel App. Save with mobile-exclusive hotel deals and stay one step ahead with flight, hotel and car alerts and view your trip details anytime, anywhere.

Save big when booking bundle deals:
- Select your perfect hotel and ideal flight
- Keep an eye out for Unreal Deals
- View your flight and hotel details together and marvel at all you’ve saved

Save big on hotel rooms:
- Save up to 25% with mobile-exclusive hotel deals for tonight, or any night
- Sort by price, free cancellation, deals or reviews to find a hotel perfect for you
- Read real reviews from verified hotel guests

Find your perfect flight:
- Choose from hundreds of airlines
- Sort by price, no change fees flights, duration or departure and arrival time
- Book all class types, from economy to first class seats

Get going as soon as you land:
- Enjoy round-trip car rentals from any airport – with no cancellation fee
- Reserve a car rental up to 30 minutes in advance
- Choose from our selection of standard car rentals, luxury autos, SUVs and more

Discover and book things to do:
- Browse and book activities for hundreds of destinations worldwide
- Get tickets for tours, shows and theme parks, museums and more
- Reserve airport shuttles and ground transportation

Book in a flash and get rewarded for your travel:
- Already signed in? Complete your booking in less than 30 seconds
- Earn double Expedia Rewards points on all your purchases

Your trip companion, no matter the device:
- View upcoming trip details, hotel address information and get maps for directions
- Receive alerts for flight delays, hotel check-out times and more
- Share itineraries with family and friends via email or text message
- Get inspired with our curated tablet travel collections

Download the Expedia App for hotels, flights, cars rentals, activities and bundle deals today!

*Limited quantity, while supplies last. Terms and conditions apply. Only available for customers residing in the US.

*Savings based on all vacation package bookings with Flight + Hotel on Expedia.com from September 2013 through February 2014, as compared to price of the same components booked separately. Savings will vary based on origin/destination, length of trip, stay dates and selected travel supplier(s). Savings not available on all packages.

The Expedia app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.
summary: Book car, flight, package. Get instant access to hotel discounts and 2x rewards
developerAddress:
Becky Roth
Expedia
114 Sansome St. Suite 1100
San Francisco, CA 94104
recentChanges: We make regular updates to improve your travels.
comments: As others have said, the app is currently broken. You can only sign in after you reset your password, and even if you do, the app fails to load upcoming trips. Other things are customer unfriendly. For example, if I want to cancel a trip, you now have to chat with a bot (versus just being able to do a simple "click-and-cancel" request). I understand that it may help Expedia's contact deflection measures, but it feels needlessly complicated.

As of October 2020, the app has gotten much worse. Don't bother with it. Original comments: Works, but limited. You get a lot more choices on the webpage than you do in the app; so shopping for travel is mediocre. However, great to have your itineraries on the app. It would be nice if it stored full itineraries locally in case no connection.

Was a pretty good app. Now will not show trips after you book them.. dates change between starting seach and booking. Have had several booking only to show up to hotel or car rental place to find out my booking dates are wrong sometimes days weeks and even months away from the dates I chose. Expedia points not worth the hassles of miss placed bookings maybe time to use a new service if they don't fix this soon!!! Ridiculous that these bugs lasted more then a few days....

The app is very broken. When I open it I am greeted to a screen that is flashing and not responsive. When I go to close the app it opens back up and I have to fight with it. It was a good app before all this mess. Best part is my trip is in 3 days and I'm stuck using the browser on my cell phone. Just fix it.

I rated this app earlier 5 star because it used to work really smooth. Now whenever I try to log in, it makes me do the image authentication plus makes me log in again. I liked it when it was simple and kept me logged on. I want to give it 5 star, so please help me with this so I can update this rating.

title: Hooked Deals
description:
Hungry? Check Hooked!

Hooked is the #1 Food & Drink app in college towns across the nation.

Hooked is a free app that provides you with 100s of exclusive deals every day from the top restaurants & bars around you!

The app’s live feed features short term deals that are continuously changing throughout the day. You are able to see what kind of food & drink deals are happening nearby, how much you're going to save, and how long you have before the deal expires. Hooked is pioneering a new food and drink scene by helping you decide what & where to eat while saving you money at the same time.

Whether you are a student or a local resident, make sure to DOWNLOAD Hooked today & let us help you save time & money on those daily decisions!

Want to get in touch with us?

support@hookedapp.com

www.hookedapp.com

recentChanges:
This latest version includes new features, bug fixes, and performance improvements to help users save even more money at the best restaurants.

Discover deals faster with our new lists: tending deals, deals recommended for you, and non gold deals.

Included in this new version is Hooked Gold in select cities. Hooked Gold provides paid subscribers with access to exclusive deals, free food, and exclusive content.
comments: Neither the app nor the website has any option for you to change your password or delete your account. At best, this is just lazy design. Regardless of the reason for this decision, it presents a very serious security risk. This app should be removed from the Google Play store until this is fixed.

The app really became useless overnight when they released "gold" . I went back after months and it looks like they've done absolutely nothing whatsoever to adapt to the epidemic. There could have been tons of deals to get people to order during the virus but no, I log on to see $2 off an ultra dry looking sandwich and nothing else. Goodbye hooked. Thanks for helping me during the college days but you are a useless desecrated husk of what you used to be

The app used to be good but new update sucks. Used to have a barcode or QR code but now is just a screen that says "take $1.50 off" and I show it to cashier and they just stare at me like I'm joking. If not that then they say they no longer use the app yet it's still being advertised in their location. Thought it was an off chance or bad luck but has happened several times. They also changed the count down tumer from like 5 or 10 minutes down to 1 minute and a half, too short !
When I eat out a lot of times will check hooked before choosing. It's been a long time since I have used hooked but this survey is a great reminder it is hear for me. Ex

The app used to be great for deals, now unless you pay for gold status, there aren't very many deals you can use. The app was great a few years ago when i downloaded it and now it's turned into a money hungry app. You shouldnt have to pay money for a money saving app.

title: McDonald's App - Latinoamérica
description:
Enter the new McDonald's App and get exclusive discounts and coupons!

  Download our app and easily access special experiences, promotions and discounts so you can enjoy your favorite McDonald's products for much less than what you usually pay.  

You will receive alerts at the moment to find out in scoop of our new coupons and offers available to you.  

In addition, to help you choose your favorite product, we show you all the products with their nutritional information of your favorite hamburger or sandwich, desserts, beverages, salads and cravings.  

Do you want a Big Mac, a McNuggets or a Chocolate Sundae and you do not know where to find your nearest McDonald's restaurant? Through the app you can go to the section "restaurants" and you can see the establishment at a less distance from you and check our schedules and services.

Our app is available in Argentina, Aruba, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Curacao, Ecuador, Guadeloupe, French Guiana, Martinique, Mexico, Panama, Peru, Puerto Rico, Trinidad and Tobago, Uruguay and Venezuela *.

Access your account and place an order for delivery through McDelivery, in Colombia and Brazil.  

What are you waiting for? Download it now and enjoy the advantages offered by the McDonald's app! Happiness in the form of an app has arrived!

* Venezuela does not include offers or discounts, only combos, restaurant locator and nutritional information.

comments: Well it's my first experience with this app and I love it. It's a very good bargain to me
Does not allow to put your ID because it has "an incorrect format"
Good experience and easy to use
I expected so much more from you guys.. bugs, rework and coupoms that don't work. Looks nice though.
App keeps sending constant notifications despite being set to NO push notifications at all. Uninstalled until this is fixed.

title: McDonald's
description:
Just tap “install” to receive exclusive McDonald’s deals, coupons, offers and more! It’s as simple as that! Bring the App to a nearby participating McDonald’s and redeem your next meal deal.

Check out the Awesome McDonald’s App Features:
Mobile order your favorite McDonald’s meal, pay through the App, and then come pick it up or get it delivered to your door!
• Choose how to pick up your meal- Curbside, Counter and Drive Thru Pickup!
• View the full McDonald’s Menu to find your favorite food and drink items! 
• Order McDelivery and get your food delivered to your door
• Enjoy exclusive App offers and food deals when you download
• Find your closest McDonald’s store hours, location, amenities and more
• Customize your order and save your favorite foods to the App to reorder with ease 
• Earn McCafé rewards and redeem exclusive McCafé offers on your phone

Data rates may apply. Prices and participation may vary. Offers available only at participating restaurants. Check https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/terms-and-conditions.html for Terms and Conditions and more information. ©2020 McDonald’s

recentChanges: We’ve made some navigation enhancements to provide a better guest browse experience.
comments: Updated 10/31/20: The app is totally unusable. I uninstalled and reinstalled it, but I can't hit a single button on it. Completely useless. Original Review: Used to work great, but lately it has all kinds of bugs whether it suddenly decides it won't accept my payment method anymore or errors out when I try to place an order. It freezes and often forgets to clear my order bag after I've successfully picked up an order. So many headaches lately, I don't know what went wrong. Ued to love this app.

Constantly buggy and glitches. I've used it successfully but it typically requires constantly uninstalling and reinstalling the app or religiously clearing your cache. The deals screen often says you've already used a deal and have to wait an hour even when you haven't ordered in weeks. Overall, a frustrating experience for something that should be a convenience.

Updated 10/2020: I've done everything including uninstalling and re installing. The app doesn't work at all. love this app when it actually works. More than half of the time, I can't pull anything up on it, or it is frozen and nothing on it will work. "Connectivity issues" is what it stated. Those issues are not with my phone, because i have service and wifi. Please fix!!!! It's pretty hard to use the app while there when I can't even get in to it.

Fantastic app, works every time. Orders being automatically submitted and requiring "reopening" every time I switch apps is annoying but no big deal. One of the best developed fast food pre-order apps. The restaurants, maybe 1.5 star. They must be hiring illiterates, or they glance at the screen and throw in guesses for anything forgotten. The "hot&spicy" chicken patty isn't very spicy going down but DON'T LET IT BACK UP. Seems it turns into the fire of hades in your guts. Omg I cried, no joke.

Well, a couple years later, new phone, different Android version, still freezing on the opening screen. so unreliable (CLEARING CACHE DOES NOTHING!) - your food isn't that great that your app should be so problematic. Business 101 - don't make it difficult for people to do business with you. BK works great EVERY time - BYE!

title: Hostelworld: Hostels & Backpacking Travel App
description:
The world’s leading travel app for wanderlusters traveling on a budget (don’t miss our latest deals!) who want to stay in a hostel and mix with like-minded travelers as well as locals (our hostel speak feature will help you speak 43 languages fluently, you’re welcome!).


★ Find affordable accommodation in unmissable locations
+ Search over 17,700 hostels, across 179 countries worldwide 
+ From budget party hostels in Europe to picturesque eco hostels in Southeast Asia
+ Book private rooms or shared dorm rooms (mixed or all female options available)
+ Filter by location, price, room type, facilities and more 
+ Cheap rooms for any budget. Making travel possible for everyone.


★ Tried, tested and trusted travel app
+ Helping backpackers and solo travelers ‘Meet the World’ for over 20 years
+ Real reviews from over 13 million passionate travelers 
+ Rated on ‘value’, ‘location’, ‘atmosphere’ etc. by previous guests
+ Featured in Huffington Post’s round up of ‘Best Travel Apps’


★ Unforgettable experiences and events
+ Discover hostel events and local tours using the ‘Noticeboard’ feature
+ Find FREE activities, helping you meet like-minded travelers
+ Experiences to suit any backpacker or solo traveler. Walking tours, yoga, pub crawls and more


★ Packed with plenty of perks
+ FREE to download and use, forever! 
+ FREE cancellation on all bookings. (We know travel plans can change)
+ Translate up to 43 languages using the ‘Hostel Speak’ feature
+ Use your location to easily find the perfect hostel near you
+ Browse accommodation photos and view your future room
+ Get access to your booking info 24/7 with or without internet access
+ See where you’ve been on the interactive ‘My map’ feature
+ Get inspired by our ‘Top destination’ feature and discover top hostels in London, Amsterdam, Barcelona, Bangkok for a backpacking adventure or a gap year abroad.


★ Hostels for anyone, anywhere!
Literally, anyone…
+ Whether you’re a veteran backpacker, traveling around the world on a budget ƒ
+ A gap year student on your first ever backpacking trip
+ A solo traveler,  in a group or with a loved one on a romantic holiday
+ Looking for a cheap vacation, budget holiday or epic backpacking trip?
+ Our easy-to-use travel app offers you the biggest choice of accommodation at the best prices.
Literally, anywhere…
+ Anywhere is possible with the Hostelworld app
+ Find accommodation across 179 countries worldwide
+ Hostels on the beach, in the city, even in the jungle
+ Book accommodation all over the world in an instant
+ Book whenever, from wherever. Whether you’re backpacking in Thailand or exploring Italy, the USA or Spain… Access to the world’s best hostels, 24/7!


★★★★★
“Hostels are the best way to travel and Hostelworld is the best way to find them.” - Elite Daily


Want more travel tips and inspiration?
+ Hostelworld Blog 
+ Facebook 
+ Twitter 
+ Instagram 
+ Pinterest 
+ YouTube
Please take a moment to review us on the Google Play Store. Your feedback helps us improve our service for millions of travelers worldwide.

recentChanges: We’ve been working on improvements so that you can have a better user experience while using Hostelworld’s App! This update also includes some bug fixing.
comments: There was an error with the app and the same booking was made twice. When I contacted hostel World, they refused to refund the EXTRA money they had taken from my account for the second accidental booking, even though I said I wasn't cancelling and had just been double charged by accident. Would not recommend this app to anyone. Contact the hostel directly!

I love using this app to find and compare hostel prices. I love that I can save paces I like and compare them before booking in the ease of one app. I also really like the feature where I can see all the countries and places I have stayed and the reviews always help when finding a place to stay.

What a great app for discovering new places for my upcoming trips. Hostelworld apps always have me covered, the booking process is very simple with nice layout and interactions. Very cool being able to see where I've stayed as well on the map.

this appis virtually useless if i can't log into my account everytime the sign-in-page comes the app starts loading whatever and doesn't stop i cannot even enter my password there shouldn't be much to load beforehand only the two fields for email and password plus the to buttons for sign in and cancel
Brilliant app !! Nice layout, no fees, really easy to navigate and find cheap & good places to stay. I never use anything else when I'm travelling

title: Calorie Counter - MyNetDiary, Food Diary Tracker
description:
Discover the diet app that takes care of what the other apps don’t. MyNetDiary - sleek, smart, simple. It's your personal weight-loss, diet, and nutrition assistant.
 
Rated #1 mobile diet app by American Journal of Preventive Medicine. 
 
Recognized by The New York Times as “simpler… quicker… also, it looks nicer” comparing with other similar apps.

Also featured in ABC, USA Today, Fox, Consumer Reports, Chicago Tribune, and The Wall Street Journal

THE PROOF IS IN THE NUMBERS
● Over 9 million members. 
● Average active members lose a 1.4 lbs each week
● Active members demonstrate 27 lbs or over 12% body weight loss within the first 7 months
  
BEING HEALTHY HAS NEVER BEEN EASIER
● Set a weight goal
● Enter a target date ( vacation, wedding, or reunion )
● Get a calculated Calorie Plan
● Log daily meals and exercise 
● Follow daily Calorie Budget
● Reach your goal and live healthy

WEIGHT FORECAST AND AUTOPILOT
● Advanced recommendations suggesting diet tweaks
● Weight Forecast shows whether you are on target 
● Autopilot keeps you out of a weight plateau

SUPPORTS ANY DIET
● Focus on your Macros, Low-Carb, or Keto Diet
● Plan meals in advance to hit your Carb and Protein targets

MASSIVE FOOD DATABASE
● The best food database with restaurants, grocery stores, special diets, and ethnic foods.
● Snap new foods with PhotoFood tool and we will enter food's Nutrition Facts for you.
● The food database is verified and updated every day.
● Premium Recipes* created by Registered Dietitians.
 
BARCODE SCANNER
● Scan the food package for easy calorie and nutrients entry.
 
FRIENDLY REMINDERS
● Timely notifications to log meals, enter weigh-ins, sleep, and blood pressure. 
 
MACRONUTRIENTS AND NUTRITION
● Track up to 40 nutrients, more than any other app.
● Follow traditional or new USDA Nutrition Facts.
● Choose how much energy comes from fat, carbs, and protein.
● Select a target for every nutrient, and the app will provide feedback on your nutrition.
● Get insight into your dietary intake of saturated fat, sodium, fiber, vitamins and minerals.

FOOD SCORING MAKES THINGS SIMPLE
● Find best foods with a glance.
● Each food comes with an easy to read rating.
● Use it with barcode scanner for a perfect food shopping companion.

CHARTS WITH INSIGHTS AND MOTIVATION
● Plot your weight loss journey. 
● See how your body reacts to your dieting and exercise. 
● Visualize your calorie counter and macro statistics.
● Paint a big picture or zoom into your daily food log records.

THE BEST AND MOST CONVENIENT FOOD LOG
● Fastest calorie counter.
● Remembers foods and servings for quickest entry.

AUTO TRACKING STEPS AND EXERCISE
● App syncs Steps, Exercises, Weight, Water, Heart Rate, and more.
● Links* with Fitbit, Withings, and Garmin. 
● Works with Google Fit and Samsung Health.
● Use an extensive, over 500 exercises fitness database 
 
REGISTERED DIETITIAN BLOG, LIBRARY, AND COMMUNITY
● Learn healthy recipes, delicious meals, and dieting techniques.
● Read about the latest diet science from our team of Registered Dietitians. 
● Collaborate, seek advice, and share experiences with other MyNetDiary members.

HEALTH & DIABETES TRACKER
● Much more than a calorie counter - a complete health tracker.
● Track Blood Pressure, Heart Rate, Blood Cholesterol, Medications, Test Results, Symptoms and more.
● Diabetes tracker to monitor Blood Glucose, A1C, Net Carbs, Carb Count and Insulin intake.


CUSTOMIZE IT
● Adapt it to your unique needs.
● Customize dashboard: choose your nutrients, health trackers, and more.
● Access your food diary from the Home screen with MyNetDiary widgets and shortcuts.

Download MyNetDiary and be healthy for life!

Members that subscribe to Premium plan demonstrate better results, staying on target, and report losing 3 times more weight than free users.

*Advanced features require Premium subscription.

● Diabetes tracker to monitor Blood Glucose, A1C, Net Carbs, Carb Count and Insulin intake.


CUSTOMIZE IT
● Adapt it to your unique needs.
● Customize dashboard: choose your nutrients, health trackers, and more.
● Access your food diary from the Home screen with MyNetDiary widgets and shortcuts.

Download MyNetDiary and be healthy for life!

Members that subscribe to Premium plan demonstrate better results, staying on target, and report losing 3 times more weight than free users.

*Advanced features require Premium subscription.
summary: Easy, natural weight loss - with diet plan, nutrition log & calorie tracker
developerAddress:
811 Church Rd.
Suite 105
Cherry Hill, NJ 08002
USA
recentChanges: Accelerate your weight-loss with Premium Diets - plan and track net carbs, get special premium recipes, articles library, diet advice and guidance from the virtual coach, and all of the Premium tools in MyNetDiary.
comments: All I wanted was a food diary to add up calories. I found it knows how many calories in restaurant foods, brand name items in my pantry, even homemade stuff! I told it how much weight I wanted to lose and it gave me how many calories a day to shoot for. Easy! Then it suggested I add a little activity, which it has a complete table of excercises and calorie burn. I can even add in vitamins! Best free app on my phone! 9 pounds off in 3 wks, and before I couldn't seem to lose anything. Try it!

Started using this again and it is driving me nuts. Why can't EVERY item have the option of weight!!! Why cups??? Weight!! Then having created a meal and scanned all bar codes and weighed every item there was no where to say it's a meal for 4. So I get all 4 meals added for my dinner. And no way to edit it. Obviously I have not created my meal correctly but I shouldn't have that option. I could go on but I won't. So frustrating as could be very good

It's free and easy to use. Great way of tracking the energy that goes in (calories) and energy that goes out (exercise) and showing you what difference you need to be able to lose/sustain/gain weight. It scans most foods so quick and simple. I haven't yet for how to add a recipe (maybe due to lack of time and looking!?) I have recommended this app to people that want to lose weight.

Fantastic app for tracking calories! It's so easy to either scan a barcode, look up a food, or create one. Great planning tools as well. Premium is worth it if, say, you want to track more specific stuff or change your macro percentages. Two (display) features I want added are: 1. Ability to simply change the order (drag/drop) of foods logged because sometimes I'll log what I plan to eat, then add stuff that ruins the order. 2. Ability to organize the home screen (being able to drag widgets).

This app is so easy to use. I find that during this time of covid19 scare it works for me. I even went for the extended plan where I paid for the year and can't believe how great it is. My daughter inlaw also is on it. So far she has out done me. We're both on our final 18lbs to go. Now the race is on. I recommend very much the free version but I know once you get used to it you will want to try the extended. Now that i highly recommend.
