comments: This app is awesome. All the songs you could want, no commercials. You got the videos, everything I like about YouTube minus the commercial interruptions. And you know that YouTube has got some long commercials when you're trying to listen and do other things, you have to stop, go stop the commercial so you can hear music again worse than radio!! This app is rocking!! My YouTube replacement. Did I mention you can download songs for offline listening. And its free!! What else could you ask for?

I love that I can make playlists & edit songs within the playlist(s) by adding or removing songs, plus you can sort the songs in the order you want. I love this App ..and recommend it to others; I already recommended it to F&F!

This app is definitely worth it no question. Tons of music available for any mood. And really good quality as well. But what there's more!!! Seemingly endless music and the app is very easy to use. Wide selection and user friendly what more could anyone possibly want. In the world of digital everything it's a win win.

Listen almost exclusively to this. At work, gym and car. I conveniently find all my trance favorites without interruption. I can also access other items such as Google, etc while still listening. Some of the initial advertising is odd, but I click past that and play my music. I dont have to hsve this open to a full screen to listen to. Its great for me but im not into mainstream music, I'm strictly older trance music which I find abundantly here.

This app is excellent I love it just sitting here finding all my music I'm so 💯 happy I've been looking for an app that doesn't give me a hard time about this is it, it's so easy and words can't describe what is happening to me now it's the best 5 🌟 is excellent but not enough because this is more than I expected so much more to say keep it up much love and thank you ❤️❤️❤️ this app is awesome ☺️😘😘😘

title: Agoda
description:
Even lower prices than our own website! The Agoda app is your best tool for finding and booking the very best deals on any kind of accommodation or flights, anywhere in the world.


- *SHOP* See the deals we can’t show on our website. Agoda guarantees the best price and it can get even better when you view on the app.


- *SAVE* Get additional savings of up to 80% from Member Deals, Last-Minute Deals, Secret Deals, newly listed Home discounts, and more.

- *FLY* Search over 200 airlines worldwide for the cheapest fares on domestic and international flights, using our unique search engine that compares flights and prices in real-time so that you can find and book the best airfare deal immediately. Enjoy our 24/7 customer support for peace of mind.


- *DISCOVER* Search over 2,000,000+ hotels, villas, BnBs, and every kind of vacation rental in your own language and currency of choice.


- *DECIDE* Choose wisely. Agoda’s useful search filters, hi-res photos, map views, local experience information, and 15+ million verified traveler reviews help you find the perfect accommodation for your specific journey and budget.


- *NO STRESS* Get support. Agoda’s app saves your voucher, details, and maps right on your device for easy check-in and printer-free travel. You can manage or amend your booking anytime, anywhere. And if something goes wrong, Agoda has live agents ready 24/7 in multiple languages to make sure your journey is as smooth as it is cost-efficient.


- *START EARNING* Become a host and start earning. For Agoda Homes hosts, our app lets you manage reservations and communicate with your guests directly. If you haven’t listed your property yet, go to agoda.com/homes today. It’s free!


- *Agoda speaks your language* Whatever your language is you can get the best Hotel deals: فنادق أجودا,安可达酒店订房,Agoda酒店,Agoda訂房,อโกด้า,תי מלון אגודה, حجوزات,اجودا,агода.


To learn more about device information used in our App, including for interest based advertising and cross-device tracking, and to exercise certain opt-out choices you may have, please see our cookie policy.

summary: Deepest discounts on 2,000,000+ hotels & homes, plus flights from 200+ airlines
recentChanges:
Agoda now offers flights! Your trusted accommodation partner now brings you the very best updated deals on flights to your destination. So you can book your room and your flight from one great app, knowing you'll get the lowest price on both and 24/7 customer support.

Other recent improvements include:
- Send messages to a property when you have a question
- Easily recognize homes & apartments in search (pink stars)
- Host mode for Agoda Homes hosts

Explore, travel safely, and keep in touch!
comments: Great app for the person whom frequents hotels (whether because you want to or have to). Although I am a diamond rewards member with Wyndham, I check into this app every now and then to see if I can save a few bucks here and there. The last time I did, I ended up at a weird, unfortunate spot, but will be reviewing that place on Agoda shortly. Great app...very effective and a time saver in the end. GOOD JOB!

Great prices and easy to use. You people really have to read the Terms of Use before booking. If your room won't be like you expected, that's because the hotel itself didn't update the pictures. Agoda has nothing to do with that and many other things, such the price breakdown, which clearly states if the hotel tax and services are included or not! Your negligence. But I wonder why the "pay later through Agoda" feature, is sometimes so much cheaper compared to the "pay at the property" one.

Super easy and always providing great deals. I started using Agoda several years ago when living abroad and found that it offers very competitive deals right here at home too. The interface is intuitive, easy to navigate, and filters are available to help find the right place to stay (I've only ever used for hotels). Customer service has helped me several times and have always gotten me good to go. It has become my benchmark for comparison.

As a user of Agoda for almost 10 years now, it's just so bloody good. When in South East Asia, its unbeatable. And their booking system and how they keep improving the app, making it clear at every stage what your booking and when, is impressive.... Sounds obvious, but these guys have it well tuned. They don't rest on their numerous laurels! Swift cheap accommodation. You know exactly what you're getting. Keep up the great work (and amazing bargains), Agoda family 🙏🏽

Worst app ever my husband book hotel room from this app, he didn't gt any confirmation or mail or msg. Money has gone from his account but app is not showing any booking or any confirmation, it's a fraud app, I want my money back, don't give us any room, give my money back and m going to sue u, going to file police complaints against you in IT cyber cell, I'm police officer. I will not give u a half star.🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

title: MouthShut.com - Reviews & Ratings
description:
For every buying decision, MouthShut is your go-to app for consumer feedback and product discovery. Join India's largest consumer review portal to read and write reviews on almost a million products from twelve categories - cars and bikes, restaurants, mobile phones, kitchen appliances, hospitals, hotels, movies, books, fashion, travel destinations, real estate and electronics.
Discover what's nearby or what's trending in your city, read reviews and make an informed decision. Because a second opinion clears the dilemma of choosing the right automobiles, property, gadgets, hotel room etc., let the voice of 3.8 million consumers guide you. The new and improved user-friendly interface provides a hassle-free and pleasant experience.
 
 
With reviews posted every minute, MouthShut.com is the encyclopedia of user feedback. Over 200,000 users login to the website every day, and buy products after reading reviews.
 
You too can make a difference with your opinions. Love or Hate a product? Talk about it on MouthShut.com
 
The MouthShut app comes loaded with these features:
1. Read genuine and unbiased consumer reviews on products and services.
2. Write reviews to help others.
3. Resolve your grievances with Dr Batras, Berger Paints, ICICI Prudential Life Insurance, Caratlane, Frankfinn Institute of Air Hostess Training, Eureka Forbes, Nykaa and other corporates onboard.
4. Discover theaters, restaurants, spas, car and bike dealers, and even facilities like hospitals, schools, and colleges in the neighborhood.
5. Rate and share reviews with friends.
6. Participate to win prize money in the Write-Share-Win contest
7. Connect with our network of reviewers, create your own trusted circle and find the best products through them.
 
MouthShut app requires the following permissions to operate on your device:
1. Identity: For login functionality with Google/Facebook.
2. Contacts: To find contacts to 'Invite Friends'.
3. Location: For providing location-specific data.
4. Phone: To call establishments from the app.
5. Photos/Media/Files: Allows the app to cache images for a better performance and share images in a review.
6. Storage: For accessing external storage to save drafts as well as the recently browsed products/services.
7. Camera: Take pictures to upload on reviews.
8. Wi-Fi: To allow the app connect to Wi-fi for browsing.
9. Device ID & call information: To identify the device and uncover details of critical crashes.

We try to bring you an update every 2 weeks. Please continue to send your feedback at support@mouthshut.com and help us make MouthShut more useful for you.

Follow us on Facebook: (https://www.facebook.com/mouthshut)

or Twitter (https://twitter.com/mouthshut)
@MouthShut

or Visit https://www.mouthshut.com for more information.

comments: Its easy to use. And its services mean the working time is good.

Good application, we just have to write reviews about the products we know (our experience with the product good, bad, or something more about the products we know).. this can be smart earning source..
Many options to explore and quite user friendly.
This is good app to give reviews on it. So i refer to public that install this app and give reviews on it and yu can also earn the ms points.

If ur a good critic then this app is for you. As of me....I tried this app and not a single one of my 18 reviews got approved from mouthshut's side. They all got rejected and it's kinda not good knowing this. Anyways....I didn't like the app at all.

title: Casey's
description:
Order a famous made-from-scratch Casey’s pizza, for carryout or delivery, with the all-new Casey's app. Browse our menu, see the best deals, customize your pizza, and place an order fast! And when it's time to order again on Friday, you can reorder your favorites with just a few taps.

Download the Casey's app today – and create an account to join Casey’s Rewards – so you can earn points, save your favorite order, set a default credit card, and search for nearby gas prices.
descriptionHTML:
Order a famous made-from-scratch Casey’s pizza, for carryout or delivery, with the all-new Casey's app. Browse our menu, see the best deals, customize your pizza, and place an order fast! And when it's time to order again on Friday, you can reorder your favorites with just a few taps.

Download the Casey's app today – and create an account to join Casey’s Rewards – so you can earn points, save your favorite order, set a default credit card, and search for nearby gas prices.
summary: Order pizza and earn points
recentChanges: This Casey’s app update is all about our 3 million Casey’s Rewards members! Quickly see how many points you’ve earned for each transaction with the new Points History screen. You’ll also be able to browse your offers with an all-new category sorting feature, making it even easier to find the offers you’re looking for. Enjoy!
comments: I like the food ordering options but other functions are pretty clunky. As far as rewards and needing to save them, why not just have it tied to your phone # instead of having to electronically 'clip it'? I'm turning off push messages too........way too many of them. I get it, you're selling pizza but not everyday is pizza day. Loll

I like Casey for convenience and has a good variety of what they carry including gas. Their employees are always very courteous and friendly. I do wish their new app that they want you to update but I do not have enough space to do this on my phone. I think we should still receive our points until we can get our phone corrected. Our Cellphone Company is having problems getting their help to the customer so I am stuck. The store itself is great in El Paso and we go to alot of Caseys because we dr
Easy to place my order, see daily deals and save deals and view my points so I can choose to use them or to wait until I accumulate more points.

Seems mostly okay, but has one bizarre flaw - I arrived well before the scheduled time, tapped the "I'm Here" button, and instead of acknowledging that information and maybe reminding me of the promised completion time, I got a baffling message instructing me to try again closer to the promised completion time. It is impossible to even fathom the motivation behind that insane response, so I must assume it is a software glitch or a practical joke.

When I first downloaded and used the app several months ago it owrked fine. Now I cant log in or order anything. I have uninstalled the app and reinstalled to no avail. It appears that other users are having the same problem. For now I have stopped using the app or trying to order pizza. Your loss.

title: Restaurantguide Falstaff
description:
Erleben Sie die besten 3.000 Restaurants Österreichs sowie 9.000 internationale Top-Restaurants auf Ihrem Smartphone. Mit der neuen Falstaff Restaurant-App haben Sie Ihren Genussratgeber immer dabei - mit Bewertungen der 18.000 Gourmetclub-Mitglieder, Restaurantbeschreibungen und Impressionen der gelisteten Betriebe.

Die Falstaff Restaurant-App zeigt Ihnen die besten Restaurants direkt in Ihrer Umgebung und wie weit diese von Ihrem Standort entfernt sind – Sie können Lokale aber auch über die Kartenansicht suchen. Gourmetclub-Mitglieder können Ihre Erlebnisse direkt in der App bewerten und kommentieren.

Ihre Vorteile der neuen Restaurant-App auf einen Blick:
+ Entdecken Sie neue Restaurants in den Falstaff Empfehlungen
+ Vergessen Sie nie wieder ein gutes Restaurant, speichern Sie Ihre Favoriten
+ Verfügbare Plätze abrufen und einen Tisch reservieren
+ Kontaktieren Sie das Restaurant direkt aus der App
+ Bewerten Sie Ihre Erlebnisse als Gourmetclub-Mitglied
+ Teilen Sie Ihren Restaurantbesuch mit Freunden
+ Lesen Sie aktuelle Gourmet-News direkt in der App
+ Bleiben Sie über Falstaff-Events auf dem Laufenden

Erleben Sie die besten 3.000 Restaurants Österreichs sowie 9.000 internationale Top-Restaurants auf Ihrem Smartphone. Mit der neuen Falstaff Restaurant-App haben Sie Ihren Genussratgeber immer dabei - mit Bewertungen der 18.000 Gourmetclub-Mitglieder, Restaurantbeschreibungen und Impressionen der gelisteten Betriebe.

Die Falstaff Restaurant-App zeigt Ihnen die besten Restaurants direkt in Ihrer Umgebung und wie weit diese von Ihrem Standort entfernt sind – Sie können Lokale aber auch über die Kartenansicht suchen. Gourmetclub-Mitglieder können Ihre Erlebnisse direkt in der App bewerten und kommentieren.

Ihre Vorteile der neuen Restaurant-App auf einen Blick:
+ Entdecken Sie neue Restaurants in den Falstaff Empfehlungen
+ Vergessen Sie nie wieder ein gutes Restaurant, speichern Sie Ihre Favoriten
+ Verfügbare Plätze abrufen und einen Tisch reservieren
+ Kontaktieren Sie das Restaurant direkt aus der App
+ Bewerten Sie Ihre Erlebnisse als Gourmetclub-Mitglied
+ Teilen Sie Ihren Restaurantbesuch mit Freunden
+ Lesen Sie aktuelle Gourmet-News direkt in der App
+ Bleiben Sie über Falstaff-Events auf dem Laufenden
summary: Discover the best restaurants with the Falstaff Restaurant App
developerAddress:
Führichgasse 8
1010 Wien
recentChanges:
Wir haben für Sie verschiedene Verbesserungen und Leistungsoptimierungen vorgenommen:
- Erweiterung der Datenbank
- Öffnungszeiten berücksichtigen saisonale Änderungen, Küchen Öffnungszeiten und mehr
- Generelle Verbesserung der Darstellung
- Allgemeine Fehlerbehebungen
comments: Leider ein sehr beschränktes anzahl an Restaurants und Bars zu verfügung, auch nicht sehr leicht eine Suche durchzuführen um bestimmte Lokale zu finden in eine Zone. Vielleicht sollte Dieses verbreitet mit eine integrierte Google/Apple Maps bewertungen ansehen zu können und Alle Lokale unabhängig um wie viele Bewertungen die haben in system veröffentlicht bleiben. Ich finde es ist eine tolle App, aber fehlt an Funktionen und verbreitung daweil.

Benötigt zwingend Zugriff auf Kontakte. Startet ohne diese Berechtigung nicht. Sollte theoretisch kein Problem sein die App (wie viele andere auch) ohne den Zugriff auf Kontakte zu benutzen! Bitte entsprechend anpassen! Sollten Funktionalitäten nicht ohne Kontakt Zugriff funktionieren, kann man dies durch entsprechende Fehlermeldungen abfangen! Oder gebt zumindest genauestens in der Beschreibung an wofür ihr diese braucht... ich gebe nicht meine Kontakte frei um "In-App Anmeldungen vorauszufüllen" o.Ä..
Warum braucht diese App Zugriff auf meine Kontakte und Files/ Photos? Das finde ich nicht akzeptabel!
Sehr übersichtlich und leicht zu bedienen!
App is not working. It constantly blocks, when I want to input a rating a white screen appears, can't find kim kocht ' restaurant in the finder. Very disappointed!

title: foodpanda - Local Food & Grocery Delivery
description:
foodpanda – food and more, delivered
 
Craving something delicious from your favourite restaurant? Forgot to pick up the shopping on your way home? We deliver food and groceries in a flash – whatever you’re after. It’s our mission to bring everything you want, need or crave right to your door, whether it’s a meal from your favourite local restaurant or same day grocery delivery and cleaning supplies.
 
download the app to check if we're in your city
 
Our app is crammed with the greatest food experiences in the world. Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or super fresh sushi? We know the best food for every cuisine that your city has to offer. foodpanda is the best food delivery service in your city – so take the first bite and download now!

Plus there’s more to foodpanda than restaurants. Missing milk? Batteries? Detergent? Order from thousands of products with shops on foodpanda. It's online grocery delivery without the wait. Choose your favourite shops for everything from groceries to drinks to health to pharmaceuticals and even electronics.
 
how it works
 
First, enter your address (home/office/treehouse). Then, choose your favourite restaurant or shop and place an order. They prepare your items and, once they’re ready, our courier brings them to you. If you need something to watch, you can track your rider in real-time. Just sit back and enjoy.
 
what makes us special
 
Whether you’re looking for the biggest brands or your favourite local restaurant or shop, foodpanda works with the best spots near you. Pizza or sushi? Groceries or gifts? Whatever you’re after, our rider will be at your doorstep with a smile, while you save time to do something else you love. 
 
talk to us
 
If you’ve ordered with us before, we want to know what you think. Give us your food thoughts/confessionals at support@foodpanda.com


For further info, visit
https://www.foodpanda.bn
https://www.foodpanda.com.kh
https://www.foodpanda.com.mm
https://www.foodpanda.com.tw
https://www.foodpanda.co.th
https://www.foodpanda.hk
https://www.foodpanda.la
https://www.foodpanda.my
https://www.foodpanda.ph
https://www.foodpanda.pk
https://www.foodpanda.sg

We're always working hard to optimize our app with the latest technologies and best new features. This version includes a number of UI/UX improvements as well as stability enhancements.
Enjoy!
comments: Please improve the payment process. 100 out of 100 times after my credit card payment it shows blank screen, when I click back it tells me payment failed but it actually done. The order is still in my cart, this is very misleading. After my 1st and 2nd orders I learnt about this, so it's fine for me, but to new users this is very annoying. Anyway, this app provide good service and I appreciate it.

I have ordered many times via this app. It will work...IF YOU CAN GET IT TO WORK. Like today, I tried 7 or 8 times trying to PAY but I just couldn't pay. I am paying by credit card. I got to the screen and got the OTP and then I entered the OTP and then.... NOTHING. Waited for so long until the system tells me "TIME OUT". Seven or eight times trying. Giving up for today. Maybe try again tomorrow or maybe not at all. One more thing. If I somehow do receive the 8 orders, I will uninstall the app

The app is good, but it needs more adjustments, like the "add to cart" button and the "place order" button. I think it would be better if both buttons is in different position, because what if that customer of yours has accidentally double clicking the "add to cart" button, simply it will directly to "place order" button. and it doesn't have cancellation of order, you must add "cancel" button. And it would be nice if you add this app "checking order" before the order place it. Please notice.

This app definitely need to improve. I am regular user. The rider and food list all has no bad experience. HOWEVER! I most frustrated is to find LIVE support help. When I need urgent help I cannot find anything. FAQ no answer. When click "not answered" it goes bacK HELP CENTER. It goes merry go round. I spent close to 1 hour and yet I cannot find. So I gave up. I have clicked on all available function. WHERE IS YOUR LIVE CHAT OR TEL CONTACTS!!!!

Its great to order on cash on delivery but the ordering system needs more inproving and the gps as well. I constantly refresh just to see where my delivery guy is at. It's not a real time tracking monitor. And for ordering wanna get to see the pictures of the menu not just the words. Like i wanna see what i'm buying. But over all food panda is a good app.

title: Rovi - Sinhala Cafe and Restaurant Reviews
description:
"Rovi Cafe Reviews" helps you get the accurate information about Cafes and Restaurants in Sri Lanka. This is a Sin-Glish App that comes with a very simple and attractive User Interface that is easy to be understood by both English & Sinhala Speaking individuals. Categories are based according to the locations of these Cafes and Restaurants. Under each category, you will find Articles of each Place we have Reviewed. 

Our Review Library is growing Every Day. Our Main Intention is to give our Valuable Users a solid Platform to access genuine and unbiased information. 

All the Cafes and Restaurants are Rated under the following categories,

* Location & Parking
*Food & Drinks
*Ambiance
*Staff

NOTE: 

Your mobile device should contain Sinhala Language (Sinhala Unicode) in order for this App to Work.

We are enhancing the performance of our App Daily. Regular updates with bug fixes will be available.

"Rovi Cafe Reviews" කියන්නේ ඔයාට ගොඩක් වටින හරිම පහසුවෙන් හසුරුවන්න පුළුවන් Application එකක්. මේක හරහා අපි ඔයාලට ලංකාවේ තියෙන Cafe සහ Restaurants වල විස්තර ගේනවා. මේක අපි ඔයාලට අරගෙන එන්නේ Sin-Glish විදියට. Cafe එකකට යන්න කලින් එතන වාහන නවත්තන්න ඉඩ තියෙනවද? මිල ගණන් කොහොමද? කෑම වල රස කොහොමද? වගේ ප්‍රශ්න ඔයාට අනිවාර්‍යෙන්ම එනව ඇති. ඉතින් ඒකට විසඳුමක් විදියට තමයි අපි මේ App එක ඔයාට හඳුන්වල දෙන්නෙ. අපි තැනකට ගියාම එතන තියෙන ඔයාලට වැදගත් වෙන සියළුම දේවල් මුල ඉඳන් අගටම, අපි ලබපු අත්දැකීම, Category කීපයක් යටතේ මේ App එකට ඇතුලත් කරනව. 

* Location & Parking
*Food & Drinks
*Ambiance
*Staff


ඒ වගේම හොඳම කෑම ජාති සහ බීම ජාති අපි Recommend කරනව. Review Articles නිතරම අලුතින් එකතු කරනව. ඉතින් අපි ආරාධනා කරනව ඔයාටත් Rovi  App එකත් එක්ක එකතු වෙන්න කියල.

comments: I love this App. Good recommendations, User Friendly and a Nice concept. No hidden fees, just the daily subscription fee. They are very transparent about it. Highly recommended
This is a great App. We can get a nice idea about a place before we visit .Highly recommended.
This is a really good App. There's a lot of valuable and genuine info here for the people who love food. It's a subscription type one so it's not free. But totally worth it. Highly recommended!
Singlish and it is awesome. A really good App for the food lovers. You have to be a Dialog Customer to use this App. It is not free but the content in here is really worth it. Highly recommended.

title: Crazy Cooking Tour: Chef's Restaurant Food Game
description:
Welcome to you！！！Click to complete the cooking and serving, bring you the purest and immersive cooking experience, and become a top celebrity chef who is obsessed and crazy about cooking!

We abandon the cumbersome operations and fancy unrelated systems in most cooking games, kitchen games and restaurant games, and provide you with a fast-paced and simplified restaurant simulation game experience. You only need to focus on cooking and cooking in kitchens and restaurants all over the world to bring delicious food and dishes to your customers and fans!

Feel the joy of cooking delicious dishes with just your fingers, and realize your chef dream!

You are a celebrity chef! Foodies from all over the world have heard your story and come here to follow you to restaurants all over the world, just to taste your delicious food!

Download now for free ! Show off your cooking skills and enjoy the entire restaurant cooking world! 

Complete interesting cooking goals to easily pass the level!
Feel the joy of challenge and success in a relaxed mood!
All those things in the restaurant and the deliciousness of your tongue are at your fingertips!

unlimited fun is coming!
Do you dare to challenge the most discerning customers?

Restaurant goals

* Click the right ingredients to make delicious food
* Use the correct order to make customized dishes
* Match the exquisite dishes with the right accompaniment
* Serve customers to get gold coins and tips for

restaurant assistance

* Upgrade kitchen utensils and ingredients to make luxurious meals
* Open a new restaurant to learn new cooking skills
* Log in daily to receive rare items Help your service
* Complete daily tasks and achievements to get more prizes
* Make combos to serve dishes to get more generous rewards

Restaurant taboos

* Eliminate waste, don’t burn food
* Instant service, don’t irritate customers
* Dispose of dishes reasonably, Don't discard the delicious and

unlimited fun is coming!
Do you dare to challenge the most discerning customers?

The game features

real restaurants, real challenges! You will face the same challenge as the chef of a real top restaurant!

* Serve every customer in a timely manner at peak times
* Do not deliver the wrong dishes to customers
* Pay attention to the heat and color of the food on the cooktop
* Arrange the order of making the order reasonably
* Use time management skills correctly
* Use strategies to formulate the dishes

Food and restaurants in a unique order .

We can only provide you with the best: the best

cooking game!
The best chef experience!
The best game control!
The best kitchen utensils!
The best ingredients and food!

Make your index finger move! Great appetite!

Feel the unique food culture!
Cooking unique traditional delicacy!
Make a sweet and sweet drink!
Prepare for breakfast, lunch and dinner, assorted desserts and snacks!
Master frying, frying, cooking, frying, various cooking positions!

Tired of waiting for new levels? It won't happen!
Massive levels are waiting for you to challenge!
High-frequency updates of game content, restaurants, food and gameplay!

comments: was really enjoying this till level 161 when it froze and dont work now 😒 big shame Won't be playing this game no more tired to play it lovely then get to crab one and its not letting you make the pie , Think you need to check this app before releasing it to us to download to play .

title: Backbar
description:
Bar inventory is dull, but mismanaged inventory equals lost profits for bars and restaurants. Backbar, the only free bar inventory app, saves hours on inventory and simplifies bar management so users can ditch the computer and get back to hospitality. 

Backbar solves more problems than inventory management. Our solution helps users optimize every drop of their bar program.

Here’s what you can do with Backbar:

- Upload your inventory spreadsheets for fast and painless onboard 
- Quickly take shelf-to-sheet inventory with a simple and seamless interface
- Simplify purchasing with vendor and distributor ordering
- Generate reports to analyze and lower liquor costs
- Get organized with inventory locations
- Reduce workloads with collaborative inventory
- Spend less time on office work and get back to doing what you love with hospitality

Download the app today and make beverage management easier with Backbar

recentChanges: Fixes bug related to searching items with accents and foreign characters
comments: Can't get signed up. Tells me not a valid email but it sent me the code???

It's fairly robust especially when you consider it's free. Nice looking interface and the beverage database is pretty deep. My only complaint is when entering inventory on my phone the app tends to crash frequently and may not have recorded the last few entries so I've been writing it down then entering it on my laptop. Once that's addressed I really can't imagine why you would use any other inventory that you have a monthly subscription for. Nice job guys!

Wonderful user friendly interface. Only one problem, despite the online version works perfectly, on the app version every time we type in the search bar looking for an item the app crashes. Do you guys know what might be the issue? Edit: Fixed in less than 24h, these guys are great!

Signed up online after a google search and man am I happy i did. the inventory keeping on this app is awesome. Several of my friends are now using this for their home bars, including a brewhouse in my buddies backyard. We're using the cutom description to keep track of dry ingredients.Legit give this a try. If you are having trouble signing up through the app, head to their website and sign up there. Zero issues for me doing it that way.

Glad I found this app. It makes it so much easier to do my wine and liquor inventory. I tried other apps that required expensive subscriptions but they werent worth it. this app is free and I could do inventory much faster on my tablet than by hand writing things down.

title: Restaurant Journal: Personal Notes and Reviews
description:
Restaurant Journal is a personal restaurant tracker for food enthusiasts that want to track where they have eaten, what dishes they had, and their overall experiences.

Restaurant Journal allows you to rate, review and note details on all your favorite  
restaurants and takeaways.

Keeping track of restaurants has never been easier. Never forget your favorite meals ever again. Spend less time remembering and more time eating! Let Restaurant Journal decide your dinner.

Restaurant Journal will keep a record of your restaurants so you don't have to.
Add pictures of each meal, make notes for next time, add tags, write restaurant reviews, create a menu list and more!

Restaurant Journal will search the local area for "restaurants near me" and provide you with the phone number and address, which you can use to call or navigate straight from the app! 

Restaurant Journal will store all your meals and make it easy for you to decide on what to eat. Review each meal, and give it a rating out of 5. Sort your meals to find what you want.

Features:
★ Find and add local restaurants by location
★ Write individual restaurant reviews
★ Keep track of numbers and addresses
★ Call and Navigate directly from the app
★ Add your favorite meals
★ Add pictures of your favorite meals
★ Add tags to easily search
★ Simple, easy to use interface

title: Restaurant Tip & Split Calculator Pro
description:
Want to leave an appropriate tip (gratuity) at a restaurant, cafe, or bar, but can't do math quickly in your head?

Use our Restaurant Tip Calculator app to quickly and easily calculate the right tip (gratuity), new bill total, and the per person (split) amount if you are splitting the check between multiple people.  Easy, Fast, and Intuitive.  You can calculate the appropriate tip (gratuity) in seconds.  Tipping is a lot easier with this app.

With just the press of one button, you can turn on the Camera LED flash light if you are in a dark restaurant or bar to help you see the check/bill.

And there is a button at the bottom that will help you quickly create a text message to send to friends with their share of the bill plus the tip percentage, if you are splitting the check.

NO ADS.  We do not display any advertisements in the pro version of this app.

SAFE - We DO NOT collect any personal information with this app.  It only requests the minimum permissions necessary to perform its functions.   This is our paid version of the tipping calculator app.

Key Features:
1.  Pro version has no ads.
2.  Allows you to set your own preferences including:  Default Tip %, Maximum Tip %, Default Split Number, Maximum Split Number, Currency Symbol, Automatic Rounding, and whether you want to save your numbers upon exiting the app.
3.  Calculates immediately and automatically after entering the Check amount.  No need to press additional buttons.
4.  You can do it the fast way by just entering the total amount OR you can enter the Check Subtotal and Sales Tax separately if you don't want to tip the tax.
5.  Slider Bars let you change the Tip % and Number of People (split) easily and quickly.
6.  If you're in a dark restaurant or bar, you can turn on the LED camera Light on your device with the touch of a button.
7.  Text the Per Person (Split) $ amount to a friend with the touch of a button.
8.  Using the Green Up Arrow buttons to Round Up the Tip Amount, Total, or Per Person (split) amount.
9.  Using the Red Down Arrow buttons to Round Down the Tip Amount, Total, or Per Person (split) amount. 
10.  Allows moving the app to the SD card.
11. Vibrates the device briefly when buttons are pressed.
12. Dark Screen Interface with high contrast that is Easy to Read and does not blind the user in dark restaurants and bars.

Please feel free to email any questions, comments, or suggestions to sunflowersoft1-a@yahoo.com.

Does it all.. Including sales tax calculations

title: Best Restaurants Colombia
description:
The guide to the best restaurants in Colombia

Go out with the 160 best tables of Colombia in your pocket!

Practical, user-friendly, efficient, this app will allow you to find THE restaurant you have been looking for.

Want to go to the nearest best restaurant around?
Need a place for a business lunch?
Want to travel through ethnic food?

If you want to eat well, this app is for you.

We have curated more than 160 restaurants among the best in Colombia, to let you pick the one according to your needs, budget or location.

3 searching methods:
By criteria (cuisine type, restaurant type, city, keyword, ...)
By location, using your geolocation
By suggestion (ideas, recommendations based on your preferences)

The advantages:
Includes menu extracts from the restaurants
Prices and services offered are displayed
High definition photos
The Best Restaurants Colombia app is free, in English and Spanish.

title: Dinova Restaurant Marketplace
description:
When your business and mealtimes overlap, Dinova helps you find the perfect restaurants for your needs. Our network connects you to thousands of restaurant locations throughout the United States – whether you’re grabbing a bite on the road, hosting a client lunch, or taking your team out to celebrate. And if your company is a Dinova partner, whenever you eat in any of Dinova’s preferred restaurants and pay with your company credit card, you can earn personal myDinova rewards.

In addition to helping you quickly locate in-network restaurants, Dinova’s app now enables you to administer your myDinova Rewards account. Whether you’re traveling, in the office, in need of catering, or looking for a private dining event space, here’s what you can do with the Dinova App:
•	Register for myDinova Rewards
•	Manage your myDinova Rewards account – view dining transaction and points history, redeem points, and refer co-workers 
•	Find in-network restaurants close to your current location (new smart clustering in our map view makes searching easier)
•	Search for restaurants by location, cuisine type, and amenities 
•	Identify in-network restaurants that offer catering and private dining options
•	Review restaurant details and contact information
•	Connect for reservations
•	Contact the restaurant directly 
•	Save your favorites for future use
•	Use advanced keyword search to help narrow your options

Need to chat? If you have any questions, comments or suggestions for the app, we’d love to hear from you. Contact us at support@mydinova.com or give us a call at 1-888-DINOVA8 (888-346-6828).

Are you a restaurateur who would like to be a part of Dinova’s exclusive network? Learn how you can fill empty seats at www.dinova.com/join.

Do you work for a company that would like to earn rebates on your T&E spend by engaging with Dinova’s marketplace? Learn more and contact us at www.dinova.com/business.

To discover more about Dinova, visit our website at www.dinova.com.

Dinova is compatible with Android 4.4 and up.

Due to your continuous feedback, we work hard on providing the best experience for you!
Visit our channel to play more free hidden objects games!
Thank you for playing our search and find games, don't forget to rate them!
comments: I like the graphics of the game. The zooming option helps alot too, so I don't have to use hint much often. But rather than having to do the same level and same place over and over, why not giving sub level at different places or mini games? Or make the place more clutter with objects. Doing the same place continuously make me memorise all the objects quickly and make the game super easy. Some objects keep appearing through the whole game too. I'd like to see more challenging game.
I love this game. It makes you work but not so hard it isn't fun. Great visually and I even think the music is suitable.

I gave it four stars for the Artwork. But i became easily bored having to play the same scene over and over; even when it seemed I was scoring high. Just cannot hold my attention. I also find the background music annoying. They should try the copyright free YouTube tunes that people use for their vlog videos. That kind of music is exciting for the brain and gets you moving quickly!

Like I said in the comets I like the game but that's about it for this game. I say that because of the hints icon. It's always beeping and it's a little annoying if you were to ask me. But it's an okay game, I guess. The only problem I have with it is the beeping of the hints icon. Cause if the game thinks you're not quite sure where to look for a item it beeps and just! keeps on beeping. And I don't like that. But all and all it's a very good game I guess. Peace out!!!!!!
I love Midva Hidden Objects games! They're the only ones I like to play because they don't have any extraneous other games that you must play to advance; they're pure hidden Objects.

title: Mi Browser Pro - Video Download, Free, Fast&Secure
description:
Mi Browser is a fast and secure full-featured web browser for mobile devices. Top performance and amazing user experience allow you to surf the web, use search, watch videos, shop online, and play games. Additional trendy features, such as downloading images and videos from social media, file management tools, and private folder, will have all your needs covered!

Given our goal of providing world-class secure services and products to all users, Mi Browser Pro features many security functions to ensure safe browsing. The latest upgrade includes an option in incognito mode for all users to switch on/off the aggregated data collection, in an effort to further strengthen the control we grant users over sharing their own data with Xiaomi.

【Download videos from social media】
You can download videos and images from Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter. Mi Browser also lets you save WhatsApp statuses of your friends. Save all the important items and don't worry about things getting lost.

【Manage files】
Manage videos, audio files, and images stored on your device. Add items intended for your eyes only to a private folder.

【Translation】
Browse content in other languages, select words and translate them instantly. This feature is currently supported in India, Indonesia, and Russia.

【Incognito mode】
Incognito mode allows you to browse the web safely and privately without leaving any search or browsing history. You can also turn on/off aggregated data-sharing under this mode.

【Dark mode】
Switch to the dark color scheme to boost visual experience.

【Voice search】
Find whatever you need by simply saying what you're looking for.

【All the features you need】
Incognito mode, data saving options, Reading mode, and more.

About us
Mi Browser is a powerful web browser designed by Xiaomi for Android phones. If you like our app, please leave a comment. Feel free to drop us a line if you have any questions: browser-service@xiaomi.com.

As always, Xiaomi welcomes users to participate in our product development and advancement. Listening to feedback from users and letting them take part in Xiaomi’s future has been at the core of our company from the beginning.

recentChanges:
1. You can test network without leaving the app now.
2. Our browser now supports saving web pages as PDF documents.
3. We improved the Content feed refreshing algorithm.
4.You can download photos and videos from Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter by simply adding URLs.
5. We've added other minor improvements as well.
comments: Annoying bloatware forced on users who would never actually use this browser. Impossible to remove or even deactivate it, but I guess this is the price you have to pay when getting relatively cheap Xiaomi phones.

I use this browser as my default. And since the update of MIUI couple of days ago it keeps being disabled for to me unknown reason. I had a lot of home screen shortcuts and bookmarks which are all gone right now. Even though I enable the browser again, after rebooting my phone it is disabled again. I would like to have it working as before.

May I ask, why is it that since my phone updated to MIUI Global 12.0.02 a couple of days ago, this browser now constantly disables and my phone defaults to Chrome? I have to manually enable this app at least daily and overnight it automatically disables again. Very frustrating as I'd like to dedault to this app for browsing. Hope you can help, thanks.

Not as good as other browsers because I found some glitches: 1. Some apps are keep stop working if I had this app, includes Minecraft 2. Pictures will only display a picture symbol, symbol or emojis will display a square 3. Always want to set as default (if i click a link, it will go to this browser instead my default browser) 4. This is rare, but my phone will stopped working if I run this app. Please fix this bug, really this is quite annoying (I'm using Redmi, uninstalled using ADB)

No words to describe how much happy I do feel when using this awesome browser. Smooth, liquid like surflng the internet, as if the browser is not there, doesn't exist, is transparent. It is like looking at natural , beautiful vistas through a clean glass panel window. And that is definitely the true hallmark of a browser.

title: Aubrey's Restaurant
description: With the Aubrey's Restaurant app, ordering your favorite food to-go has never been easier. Simply open the app, browse the menu, select your items, and voila! Special features include: restaurant info, full menu access, order ahead, special instructions, tipping, and saving your account info as well as Android Pay for easy checkout. Download. Order. Eat. Repeat.

comments: Great food and atmosphere. Very friendly staff and super clean. Love the food. Fresh and don't have to wait long for your food.

title: zomato - restaurant finder and food delivery app
description:
Your safety is our topmost priority. Opt for Contactless Delivery and Contactless Dining to ensure minimum human interaction when ordering in or dining at restaurants. 
……………
zomato is a restaurant review, discovery, and food delivery app, with in-depth information of more than 1.5 million restaurants across 24 countries! 

Serving more than 70 million users monthly, zomato helps them find high-quality food at restaurants through its search and discovery services, and online food delivery in India, UAE, Lebanon and Turkey.

Install the zomato app and plan your next meal by browsing through restaurant menus, photos, ratings and reviews.

*Search for and discover restaurants: Search for restaurants, cuisines, or dishes on zomato! From Pizza, Pasta, Noodles, Biryani, Butter Chicken, Pancakes to Salads, Cakes, Burritos, Burgers, Dimsums, Sushi (..and a lot more) - we’ve got all your cravings covered. 

Use our search filters to discover restaurants near you for breakfast, lunch or dinner (and everything else in between), and refer to our theme-based curated lists called ‘Collections’ to find the best burgers, perfect date spots, or the top trending restaurants in town! 

*View menus and other details: Find restaurant menus, reviews, pictures, contact details, map directions, and all the other essential information you need for your next binge session. 

*Get food delivered (24x7): With online delivery across 500+ cities globally, you can order food and beverages, and get them delivered at your doorstep within minutes. 

*Get groceries delivered: Use zomato market to get your daily essentials, such as fruits, vegetables, dairy, eggs, meats and more, delivered at your doorstep in no more than 60 minutes. 

*Track your orders with ease: Easily track your order journey with live tracking on our app. Get accurate estimates of your delivery time and details about your delivery valet right after placing your order. 

*Rate and review restaurants: Add ratings and reviews for the restaurants you've been to or have ordered in from, and share photos of your foodie moments. Tell us what you liked, disliked, and what can be improved upon. 

*Avail zomato pro: Become a zomato pro member and enjoy discounts of up to 40% on your dining experiences. Also, view your savings with every pro transaction on the app to keep track.

*Book a table to avoid queues: Avoid standing in waiting queues at restaurants by booking a table in advance with zomato. Simply choose a partner restaurant, add the number of guests and select a slot to dine in for a seamless experience.

*Find and follow your friends: With zomato feed, you can find and follow your friends or top foodies to see where they're eating at and what they like best.

zomato is available across India, UAE, Portugal, Australia, New Zealand, the USA, Lebanon, the Philippines, Indonesia, Turkey, the UK, Canada, Ireland, South Africa, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Poland, Chile, Italy, Brazil, Sri Lanka, Qatar, Malaysia and Singapore.

*some features are live in limited locations only.

recentChanges:
Our latest app update comes with an exciting new feature! Introducing voice directions* — a simple way for you to make all your delivery experiences even more seamless.

Now help your zomato valet reach your location faster by simply recording voice directions on the cart while placing your order. You can even record these instructions once and save it for all your future orders.

*Live in limited locations only.

Update your app and give it a spin!
comments: Would have given 5 stars, bu for 1) Valet movement is not updated on real time basis in the app and this causes inconveniences. This is not an issue with any random valet for his connectivity issues. The problem persists for all orders. Valet doesn't move at all on the map at times. The issue persists even after latest update. 2) Even after the order is delivered, at the bottom of the main screen, it is displayed as Food is being prepared.

Great app. Lots of filters for ease of use. New update for one star on 30/10/2020. Pathetic approach. I ordered the food. Restaurant was ready with food, but no rider was allocated for an hour. Finally when I contacted customer care, they said sorry and added a credit amount for their mistake. I paid for service, not to get the credit. Finally, the restaurant itself arranged their own driver and sent the food and was never sent by Zomato. Regret to be a Zomato Pro member.

The new UI revamp is refreshing. The notifications and chats are handled well. The payment page fragment design can be improved. One can easily miss the promo section, if its not intentional. I would expect orders to be shown by default than favourites in the orders tab. The order tracking banner is well designed as well. Kudos to the designer.

Unfortunately with the recent changes in benefits of using this app, i stopped using it and membership fees were paid for nothing. Will never use it again simply not worth it. This is what happens when you make people pay for certain benefits of using the app and choose to wipe it all out but reyai the paid by members money.

When I started out new, it was an excellent app for food delivery. But now there are issues happening most of the time I want to order. The menu is not visible to me and it is showing that I can order. Half the time I want to order there is some kind of issue going on like not delivering to my location or switched off ordering but actually it is showing that I can order now. What the hell is wrong with Zomato?

title: Rescounts: Restaurant discounts
description:
Welcome to Rescounts

Ordering your complete meal in advance- appetizers, entrees, alcohol and dessert. Eliminating the wait time when dining in and skipping the line when you order pick up to go.

Rescounts brings convenience to your every day restaurant experience.
 
We all eat out every day, so why not get rewarded for visiting all your favorite restaurants. Rescounts is your everyday restaurant app that rewards you for ordering from your favorite local restaurants. For every dollar spent you earn 10 Rescounts Reward Points. The more you earn, the more free food you can redeem. These rewards can be redeemed at any of our Restaurant Partners in our network. Gain access to member only deals, specials, or promotions offered only to Rescounts users at participating restaurants.

Whether you are craving, sushi, burgers, beer and wings, Italian, pizza, Chinese, salad, Thai food, shawerma or a fine dining restaurant for date night; Rescounts can help you find it using our integral search functionality. At the tip of your finger, you can search hundreds of menu options at near by restaurants, for your morning coffee, your lunch, your afternoon snack on your way home and for dinner.

What you see is what you get. We promise transparent pricing with no surcharged hiked up prices or admin fees. This means, that the prices on Rescounts are the exact same as the ones you see on the printed menus at each of the restaurants. We offer multiple different payment options to fit your individual needs eliminating cash, payment is 100% digital using major credit cards, debit, Google Pap and Apple Pay.

Rescounts allows you to reserve a table, pre-order, and pre-pay for a hassle- free dining experience. That means no more time wasted waiting for your food or tracking down your server so you can pay.  Eating out on the go or dining in at your favorite restaurants has never been so easy and all 1 press of a button away.

comments: This app helped alot to find a place that offers patio and it made it so easy to reserve a table and order through the app! Highly recommended
Possibly one of the best customer service experiences on an app. Great discounts and great options.
There is a problem logging in, can't get into my account and can't reset the password or even create a new account. Basically can't do anything -.-

Super convenient app, I've used it a few times.  Great for when the restaurant is very busy and you don't have to wait to get a table.  Also great when lunch's a rush, saves you lots of time. Love this app ability!
One of the best apps out there. I love the point system applied to your account when you place an order 😊 make sure to checkout there deals on the app. Highly recommended it!

title: Harden's Restaurant Guide
description:
+ Avoid bad restaurants & discover brilliant ones
+ Trusted reviews and detailed ratings
+ Over 3,000 entries, updated in real time
+ Powerful search by price, food quality, cuisine
+ Book online (selected restaurants)
+ Journal meals out in your restaurant diary
+ Restaurant news, with constant updates
+ Browse curated collections of recommendations
 
Decide where to eat based on carefully curated ratings and reviews from 1,000s of fellow foodies, who take part annually in the our diners’ survey. Harden's editors then carefully weed this data for cheats and distil the feedback into statistically-derived ratings and short reports quoting from diner feedback.
 
With detailed coverage of the UK and London, the app features over 1,400 listings outside the capital, and more than 1,400 within London itself.
 
Since 1991, we've been "telling it like it is" based on one of the UK's most detailed surveys of restaurant-goers. For the 2018 survey, 8,500 ‘reporters’ (that's what we call diners who take part in the survey) contributed 50,000 reviews. And now you can even submit reports to us directly from the App.

— improved icons and interface
— clearer “expand map” facility to enable easier area searches

comments: Using their rating system as a guide: Food 5 (Exceptional); Ambience 2 (Average); Service 1 (Poor). The underlying information has never steered me wrong with useful restaurant reviews that provide inspiration. The app looks a bit basic but has a functional if not aesthetic design. The app however is barely functional adding a restaurant diary record, crashing constantly and crashing a lot anyway. Please stabilise your app so users can benefit from your excellent guide
unless you subscribe it's pointless. You cant search for anything nor will it give you a list for your location. Uninstalling.
Amazing guide
Excellent app from the restaurant lovers Bible, constantly updated by diners from all walks of life who appreciate good food, service and ambience.

title: SynchroLife: Best Restaurant Review & Search App
description:
Eat, review, and earn on SynchroLife, the app loved by eaters! Help us uncover the best restaurants worldwide and earn cryptocurrency for your reviews! SynchroLife lets you share your favorite restaurants and food adventures from anywhere in the world and discover the best local restaurant picks.

Browse the timeline to check out trending restaurants both nearby and wherever you travel, bookmark places to visit later, post reviews and photos, search to find the best local restaurants, chat with other foodies, and enjoy good food and good friends from all around the world! 

Don't waste another meal! Join SynchroLife today to discover and share all the best restaurants!

————————————
What makes SynchroLife special?
————————————

1. Cryptocurrency Rewards for Restaurant Reviews Worldwide

By posting reviews and photos of restaurants you've been too, you can build up a trust score and earn cryptocurrency rewards for your content!

SynchroLife is here to help you monetize your food photography and dining out hobbies.
Get started today by posting reviews of all your favorite restaurants and building your profile! 

2. Never Forget a Restaurant Again!

Spot a good looking restaurant? Add restaurants to your personal bookmark list with just one tap!

SynchroLife's search algorithm prioritizes your bookmarks so you'll never forget a restaurant again!

3. Digital Food Magazine

SynchroLife's timelines are like a gourmet magazine, picking up the best new restaurant reviews near you and around the world daily!

4. Artificial Intelligence Based Restaurant Recommendations!

SynchroLife gives you personalized recommendations by analyzing the tastes of each user. Check the AI Picks page for the best restaurants from our database! AI Picks are already available throughout all of Japan, with more locations coming soon!

The more you use SynchroLife, the smarter it gets! Restaurants you view and save are compared to recommendations from the biggest foodies to narrow down search results to the perfect restaurants for you.

5. Japan's Number 1 Social Food App!

With over 100,000 users in Japan already SynchroLife is your source for all the hottest Japanese food trends! And if you’re planning a trip to Tokyo, you deserve some good ramen and sushi. You can earn cryptocurrency cashback at participating restaurants in Japan too!

Discover reviews of the best restaurants recommended by locals in Tokyo, Osaka, Fukuoka, Sapporo, and all across Japan! 

————————————
Cryptocurrency for Restaurant Reviews: The SynchroCoin
————————————

The SynchroCoin (SYC) is a reward users can earn for contributing restaurant reviews, photos, and other high quality content to the SynchroLife platform. This new cryptocurrency project by SynchroLife aims to allow food lovers to monetize their content like bloggers and Youtubers.

In addition to earning SynchroCoin rewards for content and contributions, users can also earn SynchroCoin cashback for dining out at participating restaurants (currently available only in Japan).

————————————
Use SynchroLife worldwide, wherever your travels take you!
————————————

SynchroLife is available for use all across the globe!

Share restaurants from your home country, and wherever you go when traveling. Never forget a cool lunch or dinner restaurant from your vacations again!

SynchroLife is currently available in English, Japanese, Korean, and Chinese.

————————————
SynchroLife is recommended for people who...
————————————

• Want to eat good food!
• Love discovering new restaurants
• Tired of sifting through essay-length reviews and average scores
• Interested in exchanging info with foodies from around the world
• Would like to travel to Japan and try real Japanese food
• Want to earn money as a food and restaurant reviewer!

Enjoy dining out more than ever with SynchroLife!

Made by SynchroLife Limited.

With over 100,000 users in Japan already SynchroLife is your source for all the hottest Japanese food trends! And if you’re planning a trip to Tokyo, you deserve some good ramen and sushi. You can earn cryptocurrency cashback at participating restaurants in Japan too!

Discover reviews of the best restaurants recommended by locals in Tokyo, Osaka, Fukuoka, Sapporo, and all across Japan!

————————————
Cryptocurrency for Restaurant Reviews: The SynchroCoin
————————————

The SynchroCoin (SYC) is a reward users can earn for contributing restaurant reviews, photos, and other high quality content to the SynchroLife platform. This new cryptocurrency project by SynchroLife aims to allow food lovers to monetize their content like bloggers and Youtubers.

In addition to earning SynchroCoin rewards for content and contributions, users can also earn SynchroCoin cashback for dining out at participating restaurants (currently available only in Japan).

————————————
Use SynchroLife worldwide, wherever your travels take you!
————————————

SynchroLife is available for use all across the globe!

Share restaurants from your home country, and wherever you go when traveling. Never forget a cool lunch or dinner restaurant from your vacations again!

SynchroLife is currently available in English, Japanese, Korean, and Chinese.

————————————
SynchroLife is recommended for people who...
————————————

• Want to eat good food!
• Love discovering new restaurants
• Tired of sifting through essay-length reviews and average scores
• Interested in exchanging info with foodies from around the world
• Would like to travel to Japan and try real Japanese food
• Want to earn money as a food and restaurant reviewer!

Enjoy dining out more than ever with SynchroLife!

Made by SynchroLife Limited.
summary: Discover and review the best food and restaurants from over 190,000 reviews!

title: talabat: Food & Grocery Delivery
description:
Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app📱🍔🍟. Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you around Cairo with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

✅talabat is the new otlob 
Otlob has turned orange and is now talabat. Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

Pay online 💳 or in cash
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

Track your order from start to finish ⏲️
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

Find exclusive deals
Downloading the Talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and now in Egypt.

Happy ordering.

recentChanges: We've cooked up some performance improvements
comments: Many clutches, designed to have lots of control over the users profiles, i.e. they can switch off the benefits of applied discount for using specific credit cards no matter what you do removing and adding cards, they can switch off your default saved address to keep asking to provide the same while checking out.- by checking other similar apps noticed also the price of the same exact item from the same restaurant is always much higher. Extremely annoying! Already wrote customer service no luck!

The only thing I wish is for the change language to be there for any page. Sometimes while you're navigating you want to search a specific plate name or even the resturant name in another language, you have to give up your current state and go back to the home page, the settings menu to change the language. Where a simple language choice button at the top would have sufficed

Excellent Service. Great app. User friendly. So far no issues ordering medicines, groceries, fast food. Fast and efficient!!! Please add more food chains like Vietnamese restaurant in Bur Dubai, Pak Lyari Restuarant in Deira and Bur Dubai, Ravi in Deira. Thanks

Froad app. Please don't install. I am not able to login. Then i reset the password using forgot password option. Still it is saying password mismatch. I contacted the customer support and they said they can't do anything. I have billed 2000 rupees for nothing. I am not even able to use the app. The worst ever teams i have ever seen.

Pathetic customer service, UX and UI. I used the chat option and 6 agents changed automatically in less than a minute. Every time I start typing and a new agent appeared. Credit card offers don't mention the minimum amount of spend required. When you type in CC Number, it shows discount will be applicable but I get charged full amount. It is like you getting cheated but can't do anything. Customer service can't do anything as in their interface it shows minimum amount spend requirement.

title: Restaurant Roulette
description:
Have you ever had trouble deciding on one restaurant?

There is finally a solution that will help you find and choose a restaurant near you! Need directions or want to know their ratings? We've got you covered!

New Update 8/30/2019! Here are the updates:

-Displays a maximum of 40 restaurants on a given request
-Increased radius search limit from 10 to 25 miles
-Added gesture swiping to switch restaurants
-Changed maps navigation icon
-Shows number of restaurants listed in the list

title: Star Cooking Chef - Foodie Madness🍳
description:
Manage world’s top restaurants. Make the most classic food .👩👩

As a super chef, you’ve now gotten the chance to open your won top restaurant, decorate it and pick ingredients. Manage your restaurants and make different kinds of yummy food, such as hamburgers, pizzas, hotdogs, steak and so on. Meanwhile, lots of clients are attracted to your restaurant because of your remarkable cooking skills. They all appreciate your food ,and feel pretty satisfied and happy after eating. So are you ready to cook for your clients, providing them with the most classic food from all over the world? Come and show your super cooking skills, run restaurants, make delicious food , perfect your skills and open the wonderful global gourmet tour for clients.

The more money you make, the more restaurants you can open. Then, you can try the unique Asian food, wild American feast, exquisite Western food and charming local food. What are you still waiting for? Come and join us now.

title: TTRestaurants
description:
Trinidad & Tobago Restaurants comprehensive directory for dining out in T&T!

Our objective is to deliver a fully exhaustive list of restaurants in Trinidad & Tobago
and to promote Trinidad and Tobago Restaurant Week (TTRW) - the signature delicious event on the Trinidad and Tobago entertainment calendar - one which celebrates our culinary diversity, promotes the development of a vibrant restaurant ethos and encourages dining out among locals and visitors alike. The TTRW section of this app will help you make the most of this 10-day culinary celebration which is carded every year in September.

With this app you can:
-  Browse our directory of Trinidad & Tobago restaurants
-  Use filters to sort and narrow down your search!
-  Browse all TTRW participating restaurants
-  View individual restaurant profiles, see their contact info, location, directions, opening hours
-  Preview menus online
-  Create wish lists
-  Rate listings
-  Discover new and rediscover favorite restaurants in your locale
-  Share pictures of your meal over your favourite social media platform

During this TTRW, your favorite Trinidad and Tobago restaurants slash their prices up to 30% by offering specialized menus. Users can browse all participating restaurants, view individual restaurant profiles, create wish lists and tasted lists, discover restaurants in their vicinity and share pictures of their meal over their favorite social media platform.

Welcome to the concept of diverse and exciting dining in Trinidad and Tobago!

recentChanges: More improvement
comments: I like the concept of the app for persons wanting to discover new restaurants however there are only a handful of restaurants on this app, a suggestion would be an option such as "restaurants near me"
Some south restaurants so much better than d others. But for penal my only option is subway. Like that I can filter by location

The TTRestaurants app is user friendly and easy to use. It has all the information needed to assist with making a decision on the restaurant(s) I'd choose from. One feature missing is the ability to filter by dish type eg savoury or delectable, etc, but it has the filter option of sorting by price which is the same. I saw your website performs this feature and you made it easy enough with a one click portal to each of the TTRestaurants social media accounts. Thanks, big assist!

The filter option does not work. I love the idea of the app nevertheless. Wish I didn't have to skim through and pick point savory menus, instead of just filtering the search to get exactly what I want.
I don't think i should have to sign up with a login name just to check a menu....no thanks. Make this feature optional for those that want more than just checking a menu....Uninstalled

title: Best restaurants Maroc
description:
The guide to the best restaurants in Morocco

Go out with the best 180 moroccan tables in your pocket !

Usefull, user friendly, practical, efficient, this app will allow you finding THE restaurant you have been looking for.

Want to go to the nearest restaurant around?
Need a place for a business lunch ?
Want to travel through food ?

If you want to eat well, this application is made for you.

We have curated for you more than 180 restaurants among the best in Morocco, and let you pick the one according to your desire, your budget or your location.


3 searching methods :
• By criteria (cooking type, budget, area, keyword, ...)
• By location, using your geolocation
• By suggestion (advices, ideas, recommandations,…)


The advantages :
• You can see restaurant menus
• Clear display of prices
• HD photos

title: Swift WiFi - Free WiFi Hotspot Portable
description:
100 million installs strong, Swift WiFi is the #1 FREE portable WiFi hotspot app on mobile. Download Swift WiFi - Free WiFi Hotspot and enjoy the free WiFi app to let you find & connect to shared WiFi around the world. 
With millions of free WiFi hotspots shared by our users in the world, you can connect to free WiFi easily and safely with the WiFi Master - Swift WiFi: Free WiFi Hotspot.
Swift WiFi offers you nearby WiFi hotspot options, which include free WiFi hotspots and the passwords shared by our users all around the world. Before you get connected to a new WiFi, we suggest you use our Safety Test function to protect your personal privacy and property security.
Swift WiFi - Free WiFi Hotspot is not only a free WiFi sharing app but also a WiFi Master (WiFi optimization tool), which can improve WiFi performance, optimize WiFi connection by connecting to the optimal signal. 

Connect WiFi
Scan and search free WiFi hotspot around you, connect to WiFi hotspot just one click. WiFi conncetion is easy, qucik and safe.
WiFi Security
WiFi connection will be safe and trusted. We keep you away from unsafe WiFi hotspots and ensure the safety of connected WiFi when you are in an unfamiliar environment.
WiFi Speed Test (WiFi Master)
Show the real-time speed of WiFi hotspot you connected, know your speed status anytime. And we will provide you the optimal WiFi hotspots to ensure you a better internet experience.
Smart WiFi
With the Smart WiFi function, you can set specific mode to turn on/off WiFi under different circumstances so as to save battery.
Share WiFi
Share free WiFi hotspot: You can add Free WiFi hotspots by sharing the WiFi passwords with other users.
Share personal WiFi hotspot: Share mobile network to friends when your phone is acting as a portable hotspot.
Easy Share
No need mobile data, you can qucikly share files with friends face to face.

Features of Swift WiFi - Free WiFi Hotspot:
Free WiFi
WiFi connection is FREE. Swift WiFi - Free WiFi Hotspot provides millions of free WiFi hotspot nearby, and you can connect to WiFi hotspots without worrying about the passwords.
Safe WiFi
Swift WiFi - Free WiFi Hotspot provides trusted WiFi services and guards your WiFi safety. We don’t hack WiFi or do anything like WiFi hacker. All WiFi are safe, some are free WiFi hotspots, others are hotspots shared by our users.
Easy & Fast
Just one click to search for free WiFi hotspots and shared WiFi hotspots, then tap to connect WiFi hotspots.
Easy to Use
The interface is generous with simple operational method, and it is availble in 35+ languages across 223 countries and regions.
Around the World
With millions of free WiFi shared by our users all over the world, you can connect free WiFi when you are on the trip or in places such as cafe, subway station and other places.

OUR VISION: 
With the rise of sharing economy, things are no longer owned but shared. We aimed to become a No.1 WiFi sharing app on google play by building a trusted platform for everyone to share WiFi access with each other. With over 50 MILLION users sharing and contributing to our community, the availability of free WiFi is growing internationally day by day. So, come join the world’s largest WiFi sharing community today! There will be more and more shared WiFi with your help and help you in return to get connected!

Notice
If you were misled to download Swift WiFi(like Save your battery life, against viruses, adware), please give feedback to us and don't download our app. Meanwhile, it's really helpful if you could find out the trouble maker together with us. Our E-mail: swift.wifi.global@gmail.com

Contact Us
We value your feedback very much, if you have any questions or any new needs for this WiFi hotspot & WiFi sharing app, please let us know. If you like our app, please rate it 5 stars.
Like us on Facebook: 
https://www.facebook.com/wifitoolbox

All because I don't know why, when I'm picking my hotspot it doesn't do nothing when I create name and password. I'm even closer to wifi connection, it doesn't pick up around my room without loosing signal?
Best app for wifi sharing. There isn't any where I live in suburbs but in the city it rocks!

title: Zillow: Find Houses for Sale & Apartments for Rent
description:
Take control of your next move with the Zillow app. Our best-in-class features help you unlock life’s next chapter by getting into a home you love. 

BUY A HOME – Find your place with immersive photos, virtual tours, and the most listings, including things you won’t find anywhere else.

SELL A HOME – Whether you sell directly to Zillow with Zillow Offers™ or take a traditional approach, we’ll help you navigate the path to a successful sale.

RENT A HOME – From shopping on the largest rental network to automating applications, we’ve created a seamless online experience for renters.

The Zillow app gives you resources and tools you won’t find anywhere else, so you can shop smarter for your next home:

• The most listings and constant updates so you never miss out¹
• 3D Home Tours so you can picture yourself in a home and narrow down which houses to visit in person 
• Self Tour for Zillow-owned homes, with no appointment and no pressure. Stop by when it’s convenient and unlock the door with the app
• Zestimate®, the industry-leading independent home valuation tool, calculated daily
• Robust filters for school districts, views, pricing, pets, HOAs, and more
• Easier co-shopping: Tag your favorite home features and share your favorites to coordinate your search with a partner or roommate
• Push notifications to let you know when houses come to market, have a sale pending, or drop in price 
• Neighborhood details including restaurants, grocery stores, parks, and coffee shops
• Easy access to Zillow Premier Agents, local real estate experts who meet Zillow’s bar for quality customer service
• All the pricing and details you need to compare homes & apartments for rent 
• A personal renter profile so you can visit a house rental and engage directly with potential landlords and property managers who rent homes

1. Most listing based on direct site comparisons

1301 Second Avenue, Floor 31,
Seattle, WA 98101
recentChanges: We are always working hard to improve our apps. This is a small update to fix a few bugs. Please continue to send your feedback to androidfeedback@zillow.com. We appreciate it.
comments: Its ok. Its best for home window shopping. If you're seriously looking, it's less convenient. It assumes how much you're going to put down and what interest rate you've been approved for. There's no way to set those things so it gives you a more accurate idea of what you're paying each month. Plus, in my area theres a lot of 55+ communities and theres no way to filter those out, which is irritating.

I like this app, overall, but would really love to have the ability to hide or dismiss a property from my search, if it's not one that meets my needs. I like that I can save homes, but when searching later, homes keep popping up that I would rather not look at again! Also, if there is a way to get HOA/Space rent to be mandatory when there is one for the property, that would be great. I've looked at many that stated there was none, but that wasn't true. Thanks!

Zillow gave the option to turn off cookies, but did not bother to mention that it will erase all of your data when you do this. I went ahead and typed everything in once again, and it erased it AGAIN. Also, you can't add photos, videos, or tours with any Android phone -only i0s I want to know what kind of incentive apple is giving developers to leave these flaws in their designs..

I use this app almost daily, it keeps me up to date on homes that I am very interested in. We will be buying or building in the next 5 months, we are looking forward to building or buying our dream home. I love Zillow, I have found it to be more up to date than a Real Estate office. I highly recommend Zillow. Thank you, carolintallahassee

While the interface is the best I've seen out of all the other real estate options, the information is not accurate or up to date. If you try to get information from the listing agent on the app, a third party starts messaging you and sending your information to unrelated agents. I simply messaged asking about an open house and some random dude was trying to get me a new buyer's agent even though I already have one.

title: Swift Food
description:
Swift Food delivers Meals and Drinks from your favorite restaurants directly to you.
Order your favorite meals in the restaurant or from your delivery station and Swift Food will take care of the rest.
Have a look to at your restaurant(s) complete menu, choose the Meals/Drinks you want, make your order and simply wait for your delivery.
Enjoy your Meals and Drinks with Swift Food.
