title: Vietnammm.com
description:
Are you feeling like a delicious pizza, pho, salad, burger or kebab? You can easily order the most delicious meals from 1200+ restaurants in Vietnam. Order pizza, schnitzel, lunch, pasta, Chinese or Indian takeaway online: you'll be spoilt for choice! You'll have your meal within 30-45 minutes (depending on the restaurant's availability).

BENEFITS OF OUR APP;
✔️ Quickly order: Ordering food online is just a few steps away.
✔️ Find your restaurant: Map view available for all restaurants.
✔️ Popular food chains: Order at Burger King, Jollibee, KFC, Pepperonis and more.
✔️ Easy re-order: Log in with your account and (re)order easily.
✔️ Pick up food: Would you rather pick up your food? Switch to the pickup option to see which restaurants allow this feature

Works like this:
Ordering is very simple. Fill in your city & district name or simply let the app find your location automatically.

Follow your order to your doorstep:
Do you want to know where your order is? Follow your order from kitchen to doorstep with Food Tracker ®. We'll text you to update you about the status of your order. 

Order even faster:
Reorder in just two steps! Life can be so simple :-).

All advantages at a glance:
✔️ The design is clearer, cleaner and cooler than ever!
✔️ A better overview. Useful updates:
✔️ Better overview of opening times.
✔️ Delivery costs are clearly displayed.
✔️ Minimum order amounts are easy to find.
✔️ New! Choose whether you want to pick up your food or have it delivered.
✔️ More filters! Filter on reviews, distance, popularity, newest restaurant, price, product, delivery costs, alphabetical order and relevance.
✔️ Map view: see the exact location of every restaurant on a map.
✔️ Popular dishes: overview of the restaurant's most popular dishes.
✔️ Wide selection of cuisines: Vietnamese, Italian, Chinese, Thai, vegetarian and much more!
✔️ Landscape or portrait mode: the app will easily adapt.
✔️ The app is available in Vietnamese and English.
✔️ Log in with an existing account or create a new one.
✔️ Addresses: all your saved addresses will be available in the app for your next order.
✔️ Reorder: choose an order from your order history and reorder in no time.

We are constantly improving:
Loving it? Leave a review! The Vietnammm.com Android app has regular updates and new features. Do you have tips, ideas or any other feedback for our app? Contact us at androidapp@vietnammm.com, we'll gladly answer!

Bon APPétit 🍽️

comments: The app doesn't recognise that I have clicked on the confirmation email send to me. Tried it twice with one email address and once with another email address. I guess I'll use another delivery app.
The user interface needs some updating, along with the filtering options.

Great app for the most part, but I uninstalled it because of constant push notifications. I don't mind adverts when I'm actively using an app (when I have the app open), but push notifications are a PIA. If I can't opt out of push ads, I uninstall and look for an alternative app.

Decent app but erases delivery data when you leave the app to check something else. Be better to cache what has been typed. Also pictures do not always load. I installed app because your website was not loading for district 1 in Google Chrome tonight.

I placed an order and paid with card. Vietnammm says they never got the payment. When I paid I got redirected to their app and said payment not successful. My bank account has the money gone. After several attempts to resolve this and get my money back and nothing. All everyone says they can't do anything. I WANT MY MONEY BACK. Do not order from this app.

title: My Passwords - Password Manager
description:
Tired of remembering multiple passwords or annoyed of forgetting them?

My Passwords app helps you to store all your logins, passwords, and other private information safe and secure in an encrypted database. The only thing that you have to do is to remember a master password which is used as encryption key.
It is 100% secure since it doesn't have access to the internet.

FEATURES
• Quick and easy access
• Strong data encryption using AES-256 bit
• Backup and restore your data
• Auto backup to local storage
• No internet permission
• Built in password generator
• Auto exit when the screen turns off
• Multi window support
• Unlimited number of entries
• [PRO] Biometric authentication (fingerprint etc.)
• [PRO] Clipboard auto clear
• [PRO] Custom fields
• [PRO] Export and import csv files
• [PRO] Image attachments
• [PRO] Password history
• [PRO] Self destruction
• [PRO] Theme selection
• [PRO] Unlimited labels
• [PRO] Mass label assignment
• [PRO] Wear OS app

GO PRO
The optional PRO version is available with a single in-app purchase which unlocks all the additional features. You purchase only once! No additional monthly fees or subscriptions.

SECURITY
Your data is always encrypted using 256-bit Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) which has been adopted by the U.S. government and is used worldwide.
If you need a new strong password you can simply create one with the built in password generator.

BACKUP AND RESTORE
If you have multiple devices, you can share easily your passwords with all your devices without having to retype them using Dropbox, Google Drive or similar application. Simply create a backup on a device and transfer it to another where it can be restored using the same master password.

NOTES
• This is an offline password manager application and there is no automatic synchronization between devices
• If the master password is lost, the stored data cannot be recovered

comments: So far, so good. Easy to use and secure. I've only just begun to use this, to be fair, so I've not found any problem yet. Nonetheless, my needs are simple, and I expect this app will perfectly fill my requirements. 😊 UPDATE: Because I really like this app I have it installed on two devices, and would love to know if it is possible to synchronise them. Can you please advise me on this? It's SO tedious entering the details twice! Thank you in anticipation 😊

As an app it is nice. However if you don't buy pro version you can't export passwords in .csv format. Only .db format is available and there are no instructions from developer how to access the data (it's encrypted ofc). I tried everything that Google advised, still no success. Would like some instructions on data access in this .db file

I don't understand how it works? What is it supposed to do? Does it automatically fill in the passwords or what? I do not see where it explains exactly how the program works... Now that Ihave had some time to familiarize myself with your app I can see that it is actually pretty functional. You need to compose a concise tutorial that explains how the app works for new users.

I would give this a 5 star, however, the only additional feature that would make this nice (if already a feature I cannot figure it out) is to be able to have sub labels. Example: top label "Medical" then within that label have several other labels "Mine", "Hers", "Kids", etc... Kinda like a folder structure in Microsoft Windows. Right now, if I have a label named "Medical" then I have to put all in that one label which makes it unorganized.

I just started using this app and it is awesome! and I only have to remember 1 pass to get access to all my passwords! and if you are the owner of the app and Reading this can you please make a face id option so it will recognise you face? Remember face id not Touch ID because I'm using a Chromebook not an android phone so pleeeeeeeeeeeeas face id and also please not in pro version because I am a kid and I don't have any money. Just one more thing even though I've already said this this app is awesome!

title: Food Truck Chef™ 🍕Cooking Games 🌮Delicious Diner
description:
Cook tons of delicious chicken,  tacos, pies, pancakes, bagels🥯 pretzels🥨 bacon, pasta ,  hotdogs, lasagne, steaks, shrimp, sushi, tofu, sea food, eggplant, cheesecake - whatever your craves in fashion Roast tasty marshmallows, serve aromatic chocolate coffe, bake yummy ice cream cupcakes, sweet muffins & croissants🥐 Bake it, Cook it, serve it. It's the best food game - just cook it. 


Special features that make Food Truck Chef fun:

Build Your Cooking Empire 👑 
Get a taste of running your own Food Truck empire & start the cook off. 

Cook & Travel 🛫
Experience amazing gameplay with 700 tasty dishes from across the world, 680 fun levels & 17 exotic locations like Pasta street, Pizza street, BBQ street, Waffle Street, oriental street, bakers street, sandwich street, sushi street, salad bar, bacon street, cafe bar,  and more.

 Super Chef 👩🍳 
A brand new game mode where you get to experience, fully upgraded kitchens early, with 3 new boosters for Super-Fast & Super Furious Cooking. Bake it, cook it, serve it. 

 Bling your Truck 🚌 
Decorate your Food Truck to make it look super cool and get more tips!

Upgrade & Level Up ⏫ 
Unlock new items to upgrade your kitchen and equipment and be a better chef.

Up Your Game🏅  
Chase whacky achievements.

Food Wars ⚔️
Battle it out against other chefs at the Food Truck Carnival.

Party time 🎉
Earn gems by sending The Party Bus out on party gigs 

 To the Stars & Beyond 🌟
Collect stars and earn gems in the weekly Star Haul event with new themes every week.


Become a 👩🍳top chef 👨🍳in this addictive and ace time-management ⏱️food truck cooking game! Trump other chefs at fun Food Truck carnival and become the best gourmet cooking master. It is the best of all food games.

🛫Travel across the world and spread the Food Truck cooking craze, something a restaurant could never let you do! Grill succulent sizzling steaks & bacon at BBQ Street,  crunchy nachos & tacos at Tex Mex, toss oodles of noodles at Oriental Street or prepare a yummy bowl of broth at Ramen Street for dinner in covet fashion. Let’s cook

From exotic oriental fast food to delicious desserts, this fun Food Truck cooking game has more than 700 new ‘n’ tasty dishes and more than 680 levels to play with and a dash of challenge at every turn.  Tune in this fascinating story of the crazy cooking empire. This is one of the best among all the cooking games, comida games, diner games, food games, kitchen scramble & kitchen games out there. let’s cook.


Build your tasty restaurant empire with Flo & Emily at the sprawling Victorian mansion in Florence & enter the chef world. Unleash your inner chef and do a restaurant makeover for your prestigious restaurant at tasty hills dinertown. 

If you love playing restaurant games, cook games, kitchen game, kitchen scramble, cafe games, waitress games, Kitchen Challenges, Dairy games, Dash games, diner games or food games then you will love this crazy cooking madness with our mad chef Emily.
Help Flo,Emily & Victoria build their patisserie cafe and trump Peets Coffee as you serve rich lattes, extra-strong espressos, and mouth-watering coffe, mochas and mojitos and order up.

Do a cafe makeover, participate in covet culinary fashion and create masterpieces in this awesome kitchen game and become a hero chef and join the chef world. Take part in the cooking craze at your tasty restaurant and spread the cooking fever with Flo & Emily with a dash in the chefs' guilds. 

Level Up and Upgrade your kitchen appliances to cook quick and fast. 

Let’s fire up the grill! 🔥

‘Food Truck Chef™ 👩🍳: Cooking Games, Delicious diner’ is completely free to play game but some in-game items require payment.

***************
Privacy Policy
***************
'Food Truck Chef™'👩🍳: Cooking Games, Delicious diner respects your privacy, does not store any personal information and does not share this information.

title: Cooking Tour: Craze Fast Restaurant Cooking Games
description:
Open restaurants 💵 , diners or cantina, serve tasty food to customers and embark on a delicious journey!  Cooking Tour: Craze Fast Restaurant Cooking Games is a cookery game where you are cooking hot dogs, pizza, or other tasty food  🍴, and open restaurants (breakfast restaurants, dinner restaurants,  family restaurants, cantina, restaurant seafood) . comments: Great game but there are a few bugs that need fixing. On the next restaurant where it shows the lock and stars needed makes it seem like at that set amount of stars it will unlock but that isn't the case you actually have to get to a certain level to unlock it. Also on the fast food(restaurant 3) upgrade section I was unable to scroll and reach the last row. Once these issues are resolved it will be a 5 star game for sure.

I really enjoyed the game, couple glitches where the game. Froze up but i just clised out and restarted and all was fine. I'm giving 3* because the game says there are over 1000 levels to play, but i can't get passed level 60. I have completed all 60 levels with the maximum 3* on each level, but the next island is still locked. There are no instructions and the help button says coming soon.

This is the best game, each day I am so excited to play it, the only minor issue is that the upgrades use ALOT of coins, if you could lower the prices down that would be awesome! I love this game and DEFINITELY recommend it to every human being out there, download this game, it is definitely worth your time.

I'm only giving this game 1 star for now, because I have TRIED to play the game, but it won't even start up for me...when I open the game & TRY to play level one, it says that it's laoding but as soon as it gets to between 90%-97% it just freezes & will not load any further...I really would LOVE to try to play this game because it looks really cool, but it won't load all the way & let me play...PLEASE fix this issue sou that I can play the game & give it a better rating

It was fun but I finished every level in USA and have no idea how to unlock other locations. Please help! Edit: the BBQ restaurant is there. But every level before that doesn't work now so I can't even get the rest of the stars needed to open and play it...

title: Houston Restaurant Weeks
description:
Houston Restaurant Weeks is the largest annual fundraiser for America's largest food bank, the Houston Food Bank.

It's a five week dining extravaganza featuring specially priced lunches, brunches and dinners at restaurants from The Woodlands to Galveston, Texas.
descriptionHTML:
Houston Restaurant Weeks is the largest annual fundraiser for America's largest food bank, the Houston Food Bank.

It's a five week dining extravaganza featuring specially priced lunches, brunches and dinners at restaurants from The Woodlands to Galveston, Texas.
summary: Benefiting Houston Food Bank

title: Kosher GPS
description:
Jewish and Kosher Travelers in the US, England, France, Amsterdam, Australia and Canada! Are you looking to eliminate the stress of finding a kosher restaurant, a local minyan or mikvah when you’re on the go? Introducing the Kosher GPS App! First ever strictly kosher app (not from a public database.)
The Kosher App is your one-stop solution for all your Jewish and kosher needs. Updated DAILY, this android application spotlights everything kosher in your area, taking the guesswork out of kosher travel. So whether you’re looking to “Eat, Daven or Dip”, this Kosher app is your go-to source.
The Kosher GPS app also highlights deals and discounts offered by local restaurants. Take advantage of the discounts and you’ll see the App will be invaluable! Just show the manager or owner their discount listed in your APP and they will give you the discount. More and more restaurants are joining all the time. This will save you money.
We even send you periodic emails containing relevant information for things such as notifying you when locations open and close.
Search by name, address or zip code. Once you locate what you’re looking for, just click the phone icon and verify the hashgacha. To find places nearby just perform a "Near me" search. You can also use this app to find places not in your immediate location. Location can be address, state or zip code.
We will be adding features in the future and as our network increases so will the number of restaurants that give discounts.
The “Kosher” App is the ONLY App to offer:
- Information on 1000’s of restaurants, minyanim and mikvahs
- Live feeds and DAILY updates so any changes are seen instantly
- Verified listings that feature only the most reputable Kosher certifications or reputable private certifications (but still call to verify because things change very quickly) We do not take responsibility or condone any of the hashgachas
- FREE access to special deals and free discounts with restaurants in the area you’re visiting
Permissions Disclosures
The "add to contacts" feature in the details screen requires the READ PHONE STATE permission
For ease of use and automation, the method that we use to add you to our mailing list requires the GET ACCOUNTS permission
For more information please see our privacy policy: https://www.kosherrestaurantsgps.com/privacypolicy.html
Kosher travel has never been so easy!

title: Chef Craze : Restaurant Cooking Game
description:
Have you ever dreamt of becoming master chef by playing fun cooking game and serving delicious dishes to hungry customers in amazing restaurant games? Than Welcome to the Chef Craze : Restaurant Cooking Game, it is a FREE cooking game where you set off to play as crazy cooking restaurant chef by providing speedy service in food game to please customers with the most tasty food. Chef Craze : Restaurant Cooking Game is an addictive time management cooking game, that enhance you cooking skills moreover your time management skills as you take over the chef craze in restaurants games. Travel across the world and dash around the kitchen, use various ingredients to cook lots of delicious dishes like Donuts, Burgers, sausages, Pizza, Sandwich, Cake, BBQ, French Fries etc. Meet unique diner who visit your restaurant, serve and delight them with quality food and speed in order to win popularity and earn big tips. Dash from restaurant to restaurant and spread the feverish kitchen chef cooking games craze, something a restaurant games would let you cook in food games. Cook tons of fabulous cuisines & serve customers who visit your fun restaurant chef games with quality food and speed. Chef Craze : Restaurant Cooking Game is a beautiful kitchen chef cooking game that tests your cooking skills, time management & serving skills so as to serve the hungry customers & make them happy.

Chef Craze : Restaurant Cooking Game game teaches you how to cook delicious dishes and manage your own restaurant and become a true master chef in kitchen cooking world! Start your chef games craze in the kitchen games, use various ingredients to cook food with amazing recipes like spicy hamburgers, seafood, spaghetti, steaks, cola etc. You can cook food for multiple customers at same time in kitchen games to improve your cooking & time management skills. So kitchen chef take command of the cooking games and demonstrate the craze of a master chef. Choose the right ingredients & cook food according to your customer’s choice otherwise you’ll have to throw it in the trash. Decorate your kitchen to attract more hungry customers. By cooking delicious & tasty cuisine, please customers and make foodie paradise in this food game. In the world of master chef cooking game experience serve exotic flavors all over the world with crazy cooking chef games. Bake, cook, and grill meet unique customers, serve and delight them with your delicious food, and earn Coins and Tips in cooking games. Upgrade kitchen games appliances & produce an even greater variety of dishes & tasty cuisine with kitchen games utensils. Decorate your restaurant kitchen to attract more hungry customers. Remember don’t let the diner get angry at their food orders. So home chefs! get ready for a new kitchen story with an ultimate kitchen fever in food games.

Features:
* Cook, grill, and serve food by using simple TAP.
* Unlock new restaurants and grow your food menu.
* Exciting cooking game with many fancy restaurants
* Cook on multiple stoves and serve a variety of meals.
* Fulfill the orders of Hungry Customers in cooking world.
* Earn money and great prizes for finishing catering orders!
* It is a FREE game + No Wi-Fi is required to play this cooking game.
* Become the super star master of this kitchen game & cooking world!
* Unlock New Restaurants that pushes your Cooking Dreams to the next level
* Play in English, French, German, Russian, Italian, Spanish, Thai & Indonesian!
* Upgrade your Kitchen Appliances to speed up the food line and to Level Up & become a Super Chef!

If you’re hungry for a chef-cooked meal on Wednesday, GrabQpons partner restaurants are always posting midweek specials! ENJOY GREAT DINING AT CUT-RATE PRICES!

GrabQpons — so quick, so easy, so delicious! 

You’re one step closer to enjoying great food up to 50% off! Never miss last-minute deals. Get the free GrabQpons App!

 Choose from a variety of money-saving deals at your favorite local and national restaurants. Great coupon offers from the local restaurants you love! Feed your hunger when it strikes. 

MONEY-SAVING OFFERS, DEALS, AND COUPONS

ELITE MEMBER

title: Gluten Free Restaurants Guide for Celiacs
description:
CeliHack - The only gluten free restaurant and meal guide based on real recommendations from people with Celiac!

CeliHack was created by a Celiac - for Celiacs! It was created to perform as an actual gluten-free dishes collection from restaurants, where all the dishes are uploaded by us - Celiacs!

Suffering from Celiac disease? Living on a gluten free diet? Here's your solution for eating out! 
CeliHack is the best gluten free restaurant guide that is 100% based on actual recommendations! 
What does this mean? 

- If you enjoyed a delicious and safe gluten-free meal at a Celiac-friendly restaurant - upload your recommendation and let other people know!

- Had a meal that was supposed to be gluten free but suffered from Celiac side effects afterwards? Warn other people!

- Want to have a gluten free breakfast, lunch or dinner at a restaurant and you don't know which you can really trust? With CeliHack you can find out where Celiacs near you ate and marked as safe! 

Are you a Celiac too? Download the app and help us build the world's biggest gluten free dishes collection! 

Main advantages:

1. Presenting not just a list of restaurants which claim to serve gluten-free dishes, but actually showing those dishes, photographed and uploaded by other Celiacs who ate the dishes and shared how they felt after doing so!

2. Based on the wisdom of the crowd: each user can comment on others’ recommendations. So, if someone uploaded a dish that you already ate and had a different experience with it (for better or worse), you can add your review to the existing “dish card” and notify others about your experience too. 

3. The app may change the way restaurants handle our food… maybe they don’t even know their GF dishes are not actually GF.

4. Since the database should be built by us - Celiacs - it’s worldwide and can help us anywhere in the world.

In order to start making a difference, we need volunteers to start uploading gluten-free dishes in their location. Since the app is new, it pretty much has no dishes in it, so you’ll probably see this empty screen when first opening it, asking you to start contributing content… We hope you will!

The app is free and will ALWAYS be free to Celiacs!

If we all cooperate and share our recommendations - we’ll bring traffic to the restaurants which take care of us, and it may convince the ones who don’t to start doing so too!

Please help us by uploading dishes to the app. A strong worldwide community will help us all by raising awareness! 

How can you give back to the community?

- Opened the app in a place where no one has uploaded a dish before? Be the first to upload a dish there and help future visitors! 
- Got sick from eating, but not sure it is from gluten? Report it (anonymously) anyway; if the restaurant is good, others will balance it out in the future with their reviews.
- Came across inappropriate content (e.g. photo or text) in the app? Report the dish.
- Most importantly, keep sharing gluten free dishes you ate out and tell other Celiacs how you felt after the meal. 

Celihack Features include:

- Swipe through real recommendations of meals and choose if you like it or don’t like it
- Add meals to ‘My Favorites’ and save for when you get hungry and want to eat at a safe Celiac friendly restaurant
- Upload your own recommendations or rejections after eating a gluten free meal
- Find Celiac friendly restaurants near you

With CaliHack you can easily find gluten friendly restaurants around you! Download now and find restaurants that offer a gluten free menu and enjoy a gluten free breakfast, gluten free beer and more! 

This app was created by a Celiac, especially for people with Celiac, to help keep your gluten free diet safe!

CONNECT WITH US
We are always happy to receive feedback from our users to help improve the app: 

Email- celihack.team@gmail.com
Website- http://celihack.com/
Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/CeliHack
Instagram- https://www.instagram.com/celihack/
descriptionHTML:
CeliHack - The only gluten free restaurant and meal guide based on real recommendations from people with Celiac!

CeliHack was created by a Celiac - for Celiacs! It was created to perform as an actual gluten-free dishes collection from restaurants, where all the dishes are uploaded by us - Celiacs!

Suffering from Celiac disease? Living on a gluten free diet? Here's your solution for eating out!
CeliHack is the best gluten free restaurant guide that is 100% based on actual recommendations!
What does this mean?

- If you enjoyed a delicious and safe gluten-free meal at a Celiac-friendly restaurant - upload your recommendation and let other people know!

- Had a meal that was supposed to be gluten free but suffered from Celiac side effects afterwards? Warn other people!

- Want to have a gluten free breakfast, lunch or dinner at a restaurant and you don't know which you can really trust? With CeliHack you can find out where Celiacs near you ate and marked as safe!

Are you a Celiac too? Download the app and help us build the world's biggest gluten free dishes collection!

Main advantages:

1. Presenting not just a list of restaurants which claim to serve gluten-free dishes, but actually showing those dishes, photographed and uploaded by other Celiacs who ate the dishes and shared how they felt after doing so!

2. Based on the wisdom of the crowd: each user can comment on others’ recommendations. So, if someone uploaded a dish that you already ate and had a different experience with it (for better or worse), you can add your review to the existing “dish card” and notify others about your experience too.

3. The app may change the way restaurants handle our food… maybe they don’t even know their GF dishes are not actually GF.

4. Since the database should be built by us - Celiacs - it’s worldwide and can help us anywhere in the world.

In order to start making a difference, we need volunteers to start uploading gluten-free dishes in their location. Since the app is new, it pretty much has no dishes in it, so you’ll probably see this empty screen when first opening it, asking you to start contributing content… We hope you will!

The app is free and will ALWAYS be free to Celiacs!

If we all cooperate and share our recommendations - we’ll bring traffic to the restaurants which take care of us, and it may convince the ones who don’t to start doing so too!

Please help us by uploading dishes to the app. A strong worldwide community will help us all by raising awareness!

How can you give back to the community?

- Opened the app in a place where no one has uploaded a dish before? Be the first to upload a dish there and help future visitors!
- Got sick from eating, but not sure it is from gluten? Report it (anonymously) anyway; if the restaurant is good, others will balance it out in the future with their reviews.
- Came across inappropriate content (e.g. photo or text) in the app? Report the dish.
- Most importantly, keep sharing gluten free dishes you ate out and tell other Celiacs how you felt after the meal.

Celihack Features include:

- Swipe through real recommendations of meals and choose if you like it or don’t like it
- Add meals to ‘My Favorites’ and save for when you get hungry and want to eat at a safe Celiac friendly restaurant
- Upload your own recommendations or rejections after eating a gluten free meal
- Find Celiac friendly restaurants near you

With CaliHack you can easily find gluten friendly restaurants around you! Download now and find restaurants that offer a gluten free menu and enjoy a gluten free breakfast, gluten free beer and more!

This app was created by a Celiac, especially for people with Celiac, to help keep your gluten free diet safe!

CONNECT WITH US
We are always happy to receive feedback from our users to help improve the app:

Email- celihack.team@gmail.com
Website- http://celihack.com/
Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/CeliHack
Instagram- https://www.instagram.com/celihack/
summary: CeliHack: Gluten free restaurants guide based on reviews of people with Celiac

title: Meals On Wheel - Happiness Delivered
description:
Meals On Wheel allows you to search for and locate restaurants from which you can order or eat. See restaurant menus, user reviews and recommendations of where you want to eat.

Our delivery agents scatter throughout every nook and cranny of your town and take the ASAP term seriously. We also deliver food late at night at the same lightning speed. We also deliver food at the same rate.

Call the restaurant no more to check if your order is prepared or picked. At Meals On Wheel, you can track order from the restaurant to your door. 😊

Permissions Requested:
• Phone state - To identify cellular network information for optimizing performance on low bandwidth network.
• Camera - To take pictures food and restaurants for reviews.
• Location - Identify your position and show the nearest restaurants .
• Phone - Calls directly from the guest database to the restaurant .
• Contacts - To get your Google account information for signing in Eatiko via Google.
• SMS - To read OTP required for phone number verification while placing an Online Order.
• Storage - To store photos captured by you and to access photos to be published with your reviews.

Not in your city yet? We hope to be soon!

comments: Excellent customer service. Easy to navigate and choose your favourite meals. Super recommendable for quick and quality food services.

Very user friendly app. On par with other commercial food delivery apps for sure, if not better. The range of food is from few restaurants as of now, but the available food itself is good enough to use this app more than once a week for me personally. Hopefully will get even better in the future.
App is designed so well, Easy to use and perfect 😍 ah I forget about food ... Only one word is tasty also their delivery is so fast! I got my order under 20 mins. Must order 🙏
Loved the taste of food and very efficient service .
I genuinely loved the service and the food provided by this app.

title: Dineplan - Instant Restaurant Bookings
description:
Download the free Dineplan app to browse availability & instantly book your favourite restaurants in South Africa.

SEARCH & BROWSE RESTAURANTS
=============================

Search through our comprehensive list of restaurants by availability, name, area or show available restaurants based on your current location. 

To help you decide where to make your reservation, browse and explore restaurants by their customer rating, cuisines on offer, location, opening hours and various other booking options.

INSTANT & REQUEST BOOKINGS
===========================

There are two types of restaurants booking categories: INSTANT BOOKINGS (watermelon colour label) and REQUEST A BOOKING (turquoise label). Click on the 'Book Now' or 'Request' buttons to select a date, party size and time for your reservation.

Bookings at Instant restaurants are instantly confirmed. 
Request type bookings need to be accepted or declined by the restaurant. Note: keep a lookout for the 'medal icon' awarded to restaurants that respond promptly to booking requests. The restaurant's Average Response time is provided when tapping the turquoise label - top right on request restaurants.

YOUR BOOKINGS
==============

View your upcoming and past booking reservations, from the bookings tab. Share, edit or cancel any of your upcoming bookings; and review past bookings.

FAVOURITES
===========

Tap the 'heart icon' to save your favourite restaurants for quick & easy future bookings.

NOTIFICATIONS
=============

Instant bookings are confirmed via SMS and/or email. A reminder SMS is also sent 1 day prior and on the day of your booking reservation. Guests can confirm or cancel bookings by simply replying Confirm or Cancel to this SMS/Email message.

KEY PERKS & FEATURES
====================

☆ Real-time bookings
☆ Quick restaurant availability search
☆ Confirmation and reminders of your reservations
☆ Manage your reservations on the go
☆ Share your reservation and the restaurants Google Map directions with your party
☆ Create a list of your favourite restaurants, for easy booking

comments: It delivers on what it promises...and then some! It's fast, allows you to have a record of what has been confirmed at your fingertips and is VERY easy to use! My only gripe (which I discussed with the developer - and unfortunately it's the restaurants whom have requested this) is that once you have used the app to book a bar for pre-drinks you cannot use the app on the same day to book a restaurant for after the drinks?!

I really like the idea behind the application and would like to use it. BUT the application is very slow and selection sequence does not make sense or work properly. It feels like the team that developed the app does not use it themselves... obvious changes would make it usable.

A restaurant booking app that really works. Tight coupling with many venues means instant booking confirmations with reminder emails and sms's. UI is slick, participating restaurants are searchable by name, location, style, price etc. Clear winner in a difficult market.
What a pleasure to use. Simple and straightforward, no need to call the restaurant. Great that so many restaurants in Johannesburg are on here and take instant bookings.
As a guide, this app is super convenient, and makes my life a lot easier! Helps with making recommendations to guests too!

title: Restaurants Finder
description:
	Are you hungry and you are in rush? 
	You don’t have enough time to go to the road and find restaurants.
	You always want to explore new restaurants nearby you.


Restaurants Finder app help you to find and explore all available restaurants around you. Within 1000 meter radius all available restaurants will be in you mobile screen on a single click. Restaurants Finder is the best restaurant finder app in play store. No matter, where ever you are, it could be any county or any town all over the world, with a very simple user interface, Restaurants Finder app give you the complete list of nearby restaurants. If you are a traveler, if you visit new countries or new places, you don’t need to ask anyone for any restaurants. By using this Restaurants Finder, you always knew about the nearby restaurants. You will get tag on each restaurant on Google map view. You can select from any of those restaurants and get the name and address of that restaurant. By the help of Google map navigation button you will be navigate to that restaurant. 

Feature List: 
	Simple User Interface
	Single click restaurant finder
	Found all available restaurants around your current location
	Works on all over the world (any countries, any places)
	Top class restaurants which are listed in Google map
	Find Restaurants data is collected and organized through online resources.
	Low device memory and low internet data use

title: Cooking Fest : The Best Restaurant & Cooking Games
description:
Cook, serve and enjoy delicious food in Cooking Fest. This cooking game lets you serve out delicious food in beautiful locales, from a tropical restaurant to a cool ice cream shop to a seafood restaurant out at sea. 

Play free Cooking Games with levels that take you around the world. This baking game lets you cook up delicious food of all kinds: sushi, pizza, chicken, ice cream, cake, and so much more. Have a cookout and prepare your favorite recipes as a world-renowned chef.

Cookout with time management games and see if you can be the top chef of the kitchen. Restaurant games have you balance cooking, serving and timing as you try to keep all your customers happy.

Love restaurant games and want to be a top world chef? This cooking simulator is an addictive, time management game for girls and boys. Download Cooking Fest and run restaurants around the world.

Cooking Fest Features

Cooking Game
• Cooking fest is an addictive time management cooking game
• Cooking simulator with a realistic kitchen experience
• Cook food from all over the world, from pizza to sushi

Restaurant Game
• Food serving games put your timing and multitasking to the test
• Time management games where you can’t let your food burn or leave a customer waiting
• Run restaurants in exotic locations, from the frozen alps to lost jungles
• Unlock restaurants and new levels
 
My Kitchen
• Play Cooking Fest to cook amazing dishes in over 20 restaurants around the world.

comments: This is an awesome game but the gems are hard to get. It's not fair that it's only 2 gems/diamonds we are entitled to after each level. It gets very hard because you also have to upgrade with the gems/diamonds and it gets annoying that one cannot move from one level to the other because of an upgrade Nevertheless I still love the game and I hope that you increase the number of gems we get in each level to at least "15 per level" so that one can upgrade the equipment and buy a restaurant Thanks

So what is very disappointing about this game is that you cannot go to the next level without buying gems because it costs a ridiculous amount to go to the next restaurant, I feel after completing all levels in one area you should automatically advance to the next one, good game but uninstalling because of this

Good but I have questions. How do you make gems without buying stuff. It seems a lot of them and its a good game but how do I continue to next cafes? Having the ad after every round is silly too. This will just agitate people. I dont think I will play on much because Im running out of levels and getting sick of the ads.
Nice but needs too many diamonds for opening next level. Shd just open free for the number of stars reached.

I am saying if you have not yet played this game you are missing 😔 alot of fun but there is one problem if you are on the first stage and you press the bonus 🎁 you will stop getting free diamonds just like when you repeat a level for over and over again you will get diamonds but if you get press you will have to only play a level you have never but if not that 💯 sure it is great

title: CurEat: Local Restaurant Search
description:
No reviews, no ratings, no chains. CurEat cuts through the clutter to help you find independent restaurants and bars quickly when you travel in the US. We highlight the top chefs and restaurants in the area and you have the ability to further refine and curate your own search by creating lists of restaurants you recommend and following friends’ lists. Want to know where the chefs eat? Follow CurEaters, industry professionals, makers and artisans, to see where they dine, expanding your repertoire and palate. title: RV LIFE - RV GPS & Campgrounds
description:
RV LIFE is a community-powered ecosystem that connects over 875,000 RVers.  Our goal is to learn from each other's experiences & build the ultimate campground locator & RV GPS app.  Together we can make RV adventures safer, less expensive & more enjoyable.

Save hundreds of dollars by turning your Android into an RV GPS. No more worrying about low clearances or being routed over an unsafe mountain pass.

RV LIFE is the perfect RV trip planner companion. Our campground locator contains over 10 million data points including 350,000+ reviews covering over 18,800 campgrounds, RV parks, & RV resorts.

Built by RVers for RVers, it's the little details that make RV LIFE standout.

We know internet connections can be non-existent when you're camping.  We built our app to work offline.  You can download our entire campground knowledgebase including maps so the RV GPS will work, no internet connection required.

Our RV Park & Campground locator is the most comprehensive.  It covers all amenities, even cellular coverage. Our reviews are the most detailed. Filters make it the perfect tool for RV trip planning.  Allow you to find a campground, RV Park or RV resort that is a great fit for you.

You can filter to see only highly rated campgrounds & sort by the number of reviews to see the most popular.  Search for campgrounds by types such as National Parks, State Parks, KOA campgrounds, BLM campgrounds, or even find ones that are Big Rig friendly.  Find campgrounds that offer discounts such as Good Sam, Passport America or AAA.

Another useful feature of RV LIFE are tips left by other RVers.  With over 65,000 tips you are sure to hear about area attractions, tasty eateries & other relevant tidbits.  You can access tips by looking at any campground’s details page.

We teamed up with RV Trip Wizard, the popular RV trip planner. You can access your planned trips & use our RV GPS to navigate safely to your next destination.

No need to buy an expensive Garmin or Rand McNally RV GPS when our app can turn your phone into an RV Safe GPS with our Turn-by-Turn directions that work even when no internet connection is available.

RV LIFE includes access to thousands of articles on RVing.  The articles cover a wide range of topics including destination spotlights, DIY projects, RV hacks, product reviews, member interviews & more.  

Maybe you just bought your RV from the popular RV Trader or RVT websites?  Now it's time to learn how to use your new RV. We have articles to help RV owners succeed & enjoy their travels.  We even have articles where you can learn about other resources like RV Trip Wizard, Escapees, Good Sam, Passport America, AAA, Allstays, RV Parky, Campendium, Harvest Hosts, & Overnight Parking.

If it's about RVing, we cover it.

Our app is the perfect companion for RVers who are renting including Outdoorsy & RV Share customers.  Our free seven-day trial is long enough for most renters to enjoy all of our advanced features at no cost.  Your RV Rental will be more enjoyable when you use our campground locator & RV GPS.

OPTIONAL IN-APP PURCHASE
Introductory Offer: Annual Plan (best value) $19.99/year
Monthly Plan (pay as you go) $4.99/year

Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, & identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user & auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

CONTACT & DETAILS
Please send any feedback or suggestions to support@rvlife.com

Terms of Service — https://rvlife.com/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy — https://rvlife.com/privacy-statement

comments: It says it's supposed to work even when offline, but that it not the case. I have it installed on a WiFi only tablet. I downloaded the maps before leaving home, but here we are, on the road, and the app is stuck on Building Route, unless it errors with something like Unsupported Map Type. I had to enable the hotspot on my phone to get it to load. As a work around, I took screen shots of the turn by turn directions to get us where we are going. I'll be looking for an app that does what it says.

Update: The last update did not help , it still crashes and or it says GPS cannot be found. I have sent in crash reports numerous times, no response. DO NOT PURCHASE!!! This app has the potential to be a good app, but it crashes, all the time! Even had it crash in the middle of heavy traffic and to make matters worse our turn was a mile out. Like I said it has potential but not until the bugs are worked out, as it is now, not worth the paid subscription for my Samsung Galaxy Note 10 plus.

Update 10/6/2020, today the latest update came out. Crashes should be fixed now. To make this short, it works for me. It's not crashing anymore. The app works better now on all three Android versions I use. 9, 10 and 11. If it still crashes for you, try what I did. Wipe cache and data, before starting the app, turn on all permissions right from the app settings. For me the app has been stable. Initially the app was not able to get a location. Shutting down the app and starting it up again, solved that problem too. This is a great app. If you have issues, email the developer. The address is below in a response to my initial complaint. He will try to do his best to make it work. For my part, I will try out all the other perks that come with this app and a subscription. I still feel I should get some credit for the last couple of months that this app wasn't working. :-)

Signed up for trial on Oct. 23, on the 7th day I canceled subscription but was charged anyway. I don't want it. Was charged at 8 AM was notified by Google after that to allow me to cancel but when I canceled it says your subscription has been cancel as of Oct 30 2021. I want a refund now I complied with the 7 day cancelation requirement.

Not ready for general use. RV Trip Wizard integration in the app does not work. Only way to use the RV Trip Wizard is to access that directlyvia the website. That integration is this app is critical to use the integrated GPS app. RV Trip Wizard is great but this app is not usefulat all. Someone didnt test this app. Not recommend

title: DiningAdvantage.com
description:
Enjoy instant savings from your favorite restaurants! Dining Advantage® features over 100,000 2-for-1 and up to 50% off discounts at more than 55,000 restaurants across the U.S. and Canada. Search deals from popular chains and neighborhood favorites and use a Dining Advantage® code to save right from your phone.

Dining for less is simple!

Search – A variety of cuisines and dining styles for every palate. Check out restaurant information, location, and deals.

Select – Best in class offers powered by Entertainment®. New restaurant discounts are added daily.

Save – Easy to redeem, simply show your phone to save. Savings are with you wherever you go!

Hungry to save? Download the app today!

comments: It's basically just a coupon app w/o any great savings and more work. I got the 20$ credit from Tmobile. Every restaurant it showed me for my area had way better deals through their own sites or another party (ex. groupon). Overall, I've never "saved" 20$ that I'm estimated with the credit. At most it's 10$ because the offers are too limited, sometimes are not accepted or understood by vendors, and they over estimate savings a lot of the time (they est. 7$ but I saved $3). Not worth it.

All comments here have valid concerns. All replies to said comments are either "You can't read" or "We're sorry, but it's your fault not ours". Not to mention is nearly 2021 and comments dating back to 2019 are asking for a simple name change to the icon. I could do it in 5 minutes, why's it taking you guys nearly two years? This app is terrible too. I used the original, but now it's just a pain to use. With a 2.8 rating you'd think these people could grab a hint. Talk about blind and useless.

Terrible app, tells you estimated savings which are completely incorrect. I got the $20 credit from TMobile and got one coupon for one Smoothie King location which they didn't even accept. Also from seeing the other reviews they blame the users instead of fixing their problems or say sorry the app isn't up to our taste when we try to give helpful feedback. Better to just use RetailMeNot or Honey instead of this.

Hello, to whom it may concern I would like to say this app needs to be updated because its confusing the way it's now and not very welcoming app, so someone need to update with a better way to save money when using it. Also the codes aren't working, it should be change to some kind of bar scanner.

Downloaded app but after reading the amount of horrible experiences and the lack of attention to address the issues and correct them by the developer I'm dissapointed. Better safe then sorry. Focus on your customer service and improve the user experience. You'll retain your customers. Unfortunately, by the looks of things, youre to deep to redeem yourselves.

title: AwayTake: Compare nearby restaurant menu prices
description:
Are you outside and crawing for a food to eat outside in a restaurant? 

Why not to eat a better food with a better price in a closer restaurant?

Wouldn’t it be cool if you were able to compare and list restaurant foods around you based on food price, food specific rating & distance and navigate to the ideal restaurant food by car, on foot or see the transit steps?

AwayTake lets you compare restaurant foods based on food price, food specific rating & distance and navigate you to the selected food by car, on foot, by transit. AwayTake is your end-to-end solution partner for deciding the ideal food to eat out in terms of food price, food specific rating and distance. 

Other restaurant comparison apps enables comparison in restaurant level by providing general restaurant ratings & reviews and do not enable food comparison and that’s why we developed AwayTake - the only restaurant food price, food specific rating and distance comparison & navigation app.

Our food prices, food ratings, food availability and locations are always up-to-date. We do not provide expired menu photos like other restaurant comparison apps do. 

How does AwayTake work? 

Let's assume that you want to compare foods of nearby restaurants around Wall Markt ie. Wallmart:

1. Type the name of food that you desire to eat out (Burger, pizza, taco, burrito, sushi, lahmacun); share or specify your location and press ‘’Search Food’’ button. 

2. AwayTake lists all restaurant foods near you by food price, food specific rating & distance so that you can decide your ideal restaurant food in terms of price, food specific rating and distance. You can view all foods in nearby restaurants with their prices and food item specific ratings on map too.
 
3. Select the restaurant food of your choice and navigate by car, transit or on foot. Navigation that runs inside AwayTake will take you to your ideal food among the foods of nearby restaurants without needing any other navigation app. 

4. Arrive to your ideal restaurant food and enjoy finding the answer to ''how can I find the ideal pizza or pizzeria near me?'' and eating the best rated food that suits your budget and transportation type. 

AwayTake helps you to find and navigate to the cheapest, closest and top rated food of the restaurants that are nearby in following countries & cities by allowing you to compare food items of 63.000 restaurants: 

USA, Canada, Sweden, Norway, Finland, Romania, Bulgaria, Singapore, Philippines, Hong Kong, Thailand, Malaysia, Taiwan, Pakistan, Bangladesh. 

Top reasons to download AwayTake:
 
1. Compare restaurant food prices among 63.000 restaurants' foods near you in 15 countries and determine the ideal food nearest to you in terms of price, food specific rating.

2. Navigate to the ideal restaurant food that you have selected by car, on foot and transit via embedded navigation inside the app, without leaving the app.

In TakeAway food is delivered to people while in AwayTake we deliver people to the ideal food around.

Enjoy to match & reach your ideal restaurant food like a pro in 15 countries with AwayTake!

comments: This is a fantastic little app. It's immensely helpful, especially when you are traveling or somehow away from your base/neighbourhood. It gives you ratings for the *specific food* you wish to eat, not the restaurants serving it; so you no longer have to rely on the rating of the restaurant serving the food (and be disappointed in the end) because you can now make your choice by the metric that actually matters. What's more, it also shows you on map how far each option is away from you and even navigates you to your choice without leaving the app. A huge time-saver. Highly recommended!

I really love and recommend this wonderful application because I am a student who live in the hostel always wondering what to eat for the next meal, it helps me sorted the restaurant nearby based on the food price and food rating. It really save a lot of cost and time and even provides a guide for me to have my meal with cheaper price but in a good taste. Really appreciate this app and thank you😉

The only app to compare restaurant foods according to food price, food specific rating and distance. App also navigates you to the selected food via car, on foot and transit options with embedded navigation inside the app. While Yelp, Zomato and other restaurant comparison apps provide reviews and ratings and comparison in restaurant level, AwayTake is the only app to provide comparison in food item level. Inside navigation removes need to open other app to navigate to the food. You just write Burger, Pizza, Burrito, Taco etc , specify your location and app lists all food items related to your search query according to price, distance and food specific rating. Just click on the navigation button select one of the car, on foot, bike and transit options and app takes you to your ideal food. Definitely a ground breaking app in restaurant and food&beverage Industry.

Great nice app. It's compares the prices and shows us the best deals. Even other leading food delivery platform fails in this feature. Nice interface and good features. I m a foodie and I love to use this app on daily basis. Keep rocking team.

Great app with lovely features on how to compare food food price and show good location of a restaurant.It is easy to be used. It has really helped me a lot. I do like this awesome app. A responsibility of thankfulness is all together for developing this app

title: DuckDuckGo Privacy Browser
description:
Tired of being tracked online? We can help. At DuckDuckGo, we believe online privacy should be simple.

DuckDuckGo Privacy Browser has the speed you need, the browsing features you expect (like tabs & bookmarks), and comes packed with best-in-class privacy essentials:

Tap Fire Button, Burn Data — clear all your tabs and browsing data with one tap. 

Escape Online Tracking — automatically block hidden third-party trackers we can find lurking on websites you visit, which stops the companies behind those trackers from collecting and selling your data. 

Search Privately — our private search engine comes built-in so you can search the Internet without being tracked.

Enforce Encryption — force sites to use an encrypted (HTTPS) connection where available, protecting your data from prying eyes, like from unwanted snoopers and Internet service providers.

Decode Privacy — each site you visit gets a Privacy Grade (A-F) so you can see how protected you are at a glance, and you can even dig into the details to see who we caught trying to track you. 

Privacy, simplified.

About Us: https://duckduckgo.com/about/
Device Privacy: https://spreadprivacy.com/tag/device-privacy-tips/ 
Privacy Newsletter: https://duckduckgo.com/newsletter 
Privacy Policy: https://duckduckgo.com/privacy/
Open Source: https://github.com/duckduckgo/Android

Paoli PA, 19301
recentChanges:
Bug fixes and other improvements.

comments: I absolutely love this app! Moving away from the big tech companies is doing this human really good!! I don't like to be influenced in my advertising or my feeds. Nobody gets to manipulate me! every time I search I get exactly what I'm looking for and even more articles than Google would have ever provided! The best part is it's private! Nobody's sharing my information! Tell your friends take control of your life!!

I've been using this for quite awhile now & have made it my default browser. I love the privacy aspect- especially now that we're in the middle of the election. I don't get the SPAM emails that I do if I use the typical Android browsers. DDG has all of the functionality that other browsers do but the best one is being able to delete my browsing data without a trace, & it auto blocks cookies( which media & shopping sites don't like, but I think it's great.) It's also very user friendly.

I've been using this browser for 1 1/2 years with no problems until 2 weeks ago. When I tried to login to a site I use regularly I got a message saying it doesn't support Safari 4 and I keep getting this message since then. I could use chrome, but I don't want to. I sent 2 emails to the developers last week. They haven't replied. Disappointing! I tried uninstalling and reinstalling. Didn't solve the problem. If I had gotten a reply from technical support I would have rated it a 5.

All it really needs is a built in ad blocker and it would be the best private browser you'll ever really find. Its speed makes it an amazing "default" browser for quick use, and the ability for it to automatically erase your data after a period of inactivity is priceless! But until it can block ads, I still have to primarily use other browsers for YouTube and leisure browsing. Without that important function (which is a basic standard today), it still falls under a very niche browser.

Wowser Browser! DDG allows me options that none of the others do. For example, it allows copy & paste a host of things with ease much like Chrome without the peeking over your shoulder cookie monsters. It isn't such a hassle to save your favorite/ most visited sites. Sounds simple enough. But to my frustration with the exception of a few browsers, you have to literally manually save a site that you just want the browser to open up to automatically. I love DDG!

title: Feed Me Cyprus
description:
Feed Me is a free-of-charge online food ordering app that operates in North Cyprus.

Now, you'll be able to easily order any food from any restaurant you prefer, within seconds.

-> Register with your phone number
-> Select the restaurant of your preference
-> Add the products you want
-> Enter your address and submit your order

By using Feed Me:

- You can see the whole app in English or Turkish, including the menus of the restaurants, depending on your preference.
- You can specify your address easily, using the GPS of your mobile device.
- You can see all the up-to-date food and prices of all restaurants.
- Best of all; you can shop with no extra price!

Feed Me started with tens of restaurants in each one of Nicosia, Famagusta and Kyrenia; and we are constantly spreading around the remaining areas of North Cyprus, as well as welcoming new restaurants in the three big cities to our system.

Enjoy your meal...

good app really knows the requirements from menus notifying when order is taken which reataurants are open in addition saves your data if you really liked the dish keep it up guys i would request a mini map system to know how far the food is and the time it will take for the food to arrive

title: Los Amigos - Don Juan
description:
Download the App for delicious deals on a fiesta of flavors, super specials, and authentic family recipes from Los Amigos Don Juan Mexican Restaurants. With locations in Ann Arbor, Westland and Livonia, Michigan as well as Maumee, Ohio, Los Amigos spices up northern taste buds with freshly prepared food and bar fresh drinks. Add convenient online ordering for carryout and some mariachi music when you dine in with family and friends, for a true taste of Mexico. Check out the menu and other amenities when you tap the App for:
•	Easy online ordering
•	Exclusive specials and savings
•	Updates and notifications
•	Loyalty cards
•	And more!
The App is FREE, easy to use and keeps App-ealing savings and specials right at your fingertips for all six locations of Los Amigos Don Juan Mexican Restaurants serving Michigan and the Maumee, Ohio areas.

title: NYC Health Ratings
description:
Version 2.0 is finally complete.  This version is a rewrite with a more modern user interface that complies with current android development standards.

NYC Health Ratings for android allows you to search detailed inspections results for all 24,000 plus restaurants reviewed in New York City.  The data is published weekly by the city of New York Department of Health and Mental Hygiene.  Our app allows you to search by restaurant name or cuisine type, filtering by grade and location.  Location can either be specified by address, zipcode or current location based on either gps or network location.

This app is now integrated with FourSquare.  You can easily check in and share restaurant ratings as a tip or a shout when checking in!  

So use it before eating and spread the word to your friends.  
If you have any suggestions or notice any bugs please email me and Ill fix it.

Visit http://www.nychealthratings.com/nycrestapp/browse/ to browse restaurants by neighborhood and see additional statistics aggregated by borough and neighborhood.

title: ServeMe
description:
The ServeMe App is a revolutionary tool for faster, more efficient restaurant service. This clever App enables dine-in customers to scan the unique QR code for their table, and place an individual or group menu order at their own convenience.

Restaurant customers can note any special requirements on each menu item they order, check the order is correct before confirming, and be provided with updates of the order while they wait. Diners can even use the App to request additional, personal service from restaurant staff.

ServeMe makes communication a breeze, ensuring peace of mind for diners, and enabling restaurants to provide more efficient service.
descriptionHTML:
The ServeMe App is a revolutionary tool for faster, more efficient restaurant service. This clever App enables dine-in customers to scan the unique QR code for their table, and place an individual or group menu order at their own convenience.

Restaurant customers can note any special requirements on each menu item they order, check the order is correct before confirming, and be provided with updates of the order while they wait. Diners can even use the App to request additional, personal service from restaurant staff.

ServeMe makes communication a breeze, ensuring peace of mind for diners, and enabling restaurants to provide more efficient service.
summary: Ordering made easy

title: Tomato - Ukrainian restaurants
description:
Tomato is the best guide to restaurants, cafes and bars in Ukraine. We can help you find information about restaurants of Kyiv, Odessa, Lviv and many other cities. Look at the menu and pictures of a restaurant; read reviews and check ratings of other users; share your own opinion and pictures. Now you can always find out where the best pizza in Kiev is, where to watch football with a glass of beer in Odessa and savour the most aromatic cup of coffee in Lviv. We’ll show you if there’s anything worth seeing happening tonight. When you’ve made your choice  you can book a table without leaving the app. In addition, for your active participation  you get points, which can then be exchanged for discounts and various complimentary treats.


Tomato will help to:
- find nearby restaurants on the map
- find a restaurant by name, cuisine, type, distance and services offered
- view all the important information about the place - photos, address, menu, distance, time, work hours, ratings and - recommendations of other visitors
- book a table
- share your experience - leave your rating and review of the restaurant, add photos of favorite dishes
- learn about new promotions, discounts and interesting events
- earn points and spend them on various goodies
- make a list of favourite places

title: ریحون سفارش آنلاین غذا Reyhoon
description:
ریحون؛ سامانه سفارش آنلاین غذا

ریحون، سامانه سفارش آنلاین غذا با ۴۰۰۰ رستوران خوب در شهر های تهران، کرج، اصفهان، مشهد، شیراز، تبریز، رشت و قزوین است. این سامانه امکان سفارش غذا در کمتر از ۲ دقیقه را برای شما فراهم کرده است؛ به کمک ریحون منوی عکس دار رستوران ها در یک قاب در اختیار شما قرار می گیرد. از انواع غذاهای سنتی گرفته تا فست فود ها در ریحون به آسانی یافت می شوند. به کمک ریحون می توانید منوی عکس دار رستوران های اطراف خود را ببنید و پس از بررسی، غذای خود را به صورت آنلاین سفارش دهید.

امکانات ریحون:

- قابلیت مکان یابی خود کار

- منوی عکس دار رستوران‌ها

- امکان پیشنهاد رستوران

-امکان سفارش غذا از ۱۲ شب تا ۴ صبح همراه با پشتیبانی

- پشتیبانی و مرکز تماس از ۷ صبح تا ۱۲ شب

- قابلیت امتیاز دهی و مشاهده نظرها و نقد و بررسی رستوران ها


Reyhoon, All delicious food together.

Reyhoon is the online food ordering platform with more than 4000 good restaurants in Tehran, Karaj, Isfahan, Shiraz, Rasht ,Tabriz and Mashhad.

You can easily find a wide range of tastes, from Iranian traditional foods, fast food.

With Reyhoon you can check the menus of restaurants around you and order your food online!

Reyhoon features:

Automatic location search
More than 4000 menus with photos
Suggesting your favorite restaurants
Late Night Restaurants
7am to 12 midnight call center and support
Rating restaurants, order experience, and checking the comments and restaurant reviews.

title: Fasting App - Fasting Tracker & Intermittent Fast
description:
Fasting Tracker will guide you to a new lifestyle with healthy habits. You’ll lose weight effectively and feel more active! No diet and no yo-yo effect.

IS IT EFFECTIVE?
It’s proven that intermittent fasting leads to fast weight loss. During fasting, as your glycogen depletes, your body switches to ketosis, which is referred to as the body's "fat-burning" mode. This is an effective way to burn fat.

IS IT SAFE?
Yes. It’s the most natural and safe way to lose weight. Studies show that eating all the time makes your body unable to take a break from digesting, which can result in health problems, such as diabetes. When you fast, you just take a break from eating, it takes some of the load off your liver.

CAN I USE FASTING TRACKER?
With various fasting plans, fasting tracker is suitable for beginner and experienced, men and women. It guides you through your plan. No need to change your diet, you can easily stick to it. If you are under 18 years old, pregnant or breastfeeding, have health issues or are underweight, please ask your doctor for advice before fasting.

WHY INTERMITTENT FASTING?
√ Burn your body fat reserves
√ Start the process of regeneration and detox during fasting
√ Slow down the aging process
√ Benefit for controlling blood sugar
√ Reduce inflammation
√ Prevent numerous diseases, such as heart diseases and diabetes
√ Boost your growth hormone and increase metabolism
√ Make you feel healthier and more active
√ Improve your body and brain function
√ The most natural way to lose weight and keep fit
√ Lose weight without diet and exercise

FEATURES OF FASTING TRACKER
√ Various intermittent fasting plans
√ For both beginner and experienced
√ One tap to start/end
√ Customize fasting plan
√ Adjust fasting/eating period
√ Set notifications for fasting
√ Smart fasting tracker
√ Fasting timer
√ Track your weight
√ Check fasting status
√ Science-based tips and articles about fasting
√ No need to count calories intake
√ Losing weight has become so easy
√ Sync data with Google Fit

SCIENTIFICALLY PROVEN INTERMITTENT FASTING

Effectively Lose Weight
Your body switches into fat burning mode. You’ll burn body fat reserves and prevent food you eat from being stored as fat.

Natural and Healthy
When fasting, your body will actively burn fat, get into detox mode and start the process of regeneration.

Detox
Your body reduces inflammation. Cells break down viruses, bacteria and damaged components.

Prevent Diseases
Studies show that fasting can prevent numerous diseases, such as heart diseases, diabetes and cancer.

Cell Repair and Regenerate
Cells remove unnecessary or dysfunctional components. Damaged cells will be replaced with stronger ones.

Against Aging
Your body initiates autophagy, a process of detoxification, repair and regeneration. This has benefits against aging.

Control Blood Sugar
Fasting helps you become more sensitive to insulin. It’s beneficial for controlling blood sugar.

Increase Metabolism
During fasting, your growth hormone goes up, and your metabolism will be increased.

comments: Been using it for a little over a month or so. I have such difficulty sticking with fasting, but this app has really helped keep me accountable, plus it's simple and there's not a ton of ads or "extra features" in your face. The overlay timer is a great constant reminder, and I like the water reminders. Only improvement I'd want is an option for the timer to be counting down and not up.

Just started using this app yesterday, but I really like it so far! Best feature I've found is that you can totally customize the amount of water you're drinking. There are so many different sizes nowadays that the ability to adjust the number of ounces makes a big difference. I also love that it tells you what's happening at each stage of fasting throughout the day!

This was the second fasting app I installed, and the one I've stuck with. It's convenient, easy to track, and has most of the features I'm looking for. Previously I gave 5 stars because it seemed to be missing actual start and stop times in the history. But the feature is there, I just missed it. User interface could be improved to make that more obvious. It's a great app and works offline too. This is likely the fasting tracker I will stick with.

I really like the app, it's exactly what I was looking for. It says pay 2.99 for ad removal, but honestly I haven't experienced any ads, besides a very rare one up top. My only complaint would be the subscription, I would pay for it if it was a one time purchase, but I'm not interested in getting a subscription to an app, sorry! 5 stars anyway because the free material does it's job.

I like this app and I appreciate it. Just I have paid $2.99 for ads-removed from the app but the app still shows the ads and ask me to pay again for removing Ads!! I have already sent an email to the developer but I didn't get the response! I'm waiting for your reply as soon as possible. I appreciate your help and support. (UPDATE) I solved this issue by reinstalling the app. Thank you.

title: Foursquare Swarm: Check In
description:
Swarm is the best way to keep track of the places you go. From the new café downtown to that killer ramen spot in Tokyo, you’ll never ask “what was the name of that place?” again. Whether you love to be a local, or are trying to travel the globe, check-in so you can remember everywhere with Swarm.

• This is lifelogging made easy. Each time you check-in we’ll add a pin your personal map so you can look back on the places you visit. Help out your future self by adding a photo or a note to your check-ins to make the memories all the better.

• Indian Restaurant? Check. Karaoke bar? Check. Haven’t been to an Art Museum yet? Now’s your chance to go somewhere new! Explore more and collect different types of places so you can keep track and remember your history. You’ll earn fun Stickers along the way.

• Whether it’s your 10th week in a row at the gym, first time to Canada, or the 25th time you’ve gotten ice cream with your BFF, the more you check-in, the more helpful insights you’ll get as you track your habits and explorations. 

•Keep up and meet up with friends. Share your location with a checkin and see friends nearby. A serendipitous checkin can help you find friends when you’re out and about and see who’s here.

•Don’t have any friends nearby? Not a problem! Not only is this app a great way to lifelog and remember for yourself, but to keep track of your friends’ adventures as well, no matter how far far away they are. 

•Lifelog your adventures so your history is less questions, more remembering the good times.

*A note on battery. We’ve spent *years* developing the location technology that powers Foursquare Swarm, making it extremely power efficient. But, as with all apps of this type, continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

recentChanges: Android 11 support, bug fixes, and performance improvements.
comments: Swarm keeps nagging to add friends. They display a huge banner that covers the top half of the app with a link to add friends and there no way to dismiss it. Why do they feel they need to display two links to add friends. Isn't one enough? Now they invade privacy by require location to be on all the time.

All my stickers multipliers disappeared, my entire history of stickers is gone. Eg. I'm told i have to check in 8 more times to get my gym sticker. However looking at my history I've checked in well over 300x since 2009. The same goes for ALL of my other articles accumulated over the years, and I no longer get bonus coins for any of my check ins. I don't see my friends getting the same problem, what's going on?

Extremely buggy when adding photos. Preview/sticker editor often doesn't load photo properly and just displays black screen. Swarm app then becomes unresponsive. Please add confirmation for hold-delete on check-in history, or move delete to check-in details view like in the past. Lots of 'We can't find you!', even when other apps have no problems getting location.

Hostile permissions behaviour. Since a recent update the app constantly asks me to change my location permission from when using app to all the time. Checking in first makes the user click through a notice about this. Every time ... This is a dark pattern. If it's not changed back I'll be deleting the app.

You're now asking me TWICE every time I check in whether I want to let you always see my location. Seriously, stop it. I've used this since the beginning of 4sq, and I like the functionality, but I'm on the verge of finally deleting the app. You're completely disincentivising your core behaviour. Super annoying and disrespectful of your users' privacy choices.

title: Instafood - Find Great Restaurants Near You
description:
*THE FASTEST FOOD-FINDING APP ON ANDROID, 100% FREE AND AD-FREE*
 
Features:
- Open the app and it will immediately find an open restaurant near you
- Don't like what Instafood finds? Simply click the refresh button at the top of your screen or shake your device to have Instafood find a different restaurant. Don't like the shake controls? Then turn it off from the settings menu! 
- The chosen restaurant's location is shown in a Google map view at the top of the screen. Simply click it or the navigate button to start navigating there in your favorite navigation app such as Google Maps or Uber. Instafood also tells you how far away the restaurant is from you in your choice of miles or kilometers
- Looking for a specific type of food? Type what you want into the filter and click "Apply" to make Instafood do a new search.
- If you're using Instafood to find food for a group, use the share button to quickly share the chosen restaurant's information, including its name, rating, address, food type(s), and phone number
- Instafood returns photos of the chosen restaurant as well. Tap on any photo to open it in the app's cinematic full-view where you can pinch or tap to zoom in and out of your chosen photo
- Instafood also shows you reviews of the restaurant it finds so you can see what other people are saying before you head there yourself. Instafood shows the most recent reviews at the top, so you can get the best, most recent data for the restaurant
- You can also use the filter to control what Instafood shows you. Use the price controls to find only cheap places if you're budget-conscious or only expensive ones if you're looking for someplace nice. There's also a radius control, so you can find only nearby places if you're strapped for time. Lastly, you can use the filter to only show hot and new places or establishments with gender-neutral restrooms (or both). Instafood also saves your filter settings, so you don't need to enter them again and again across multiple sessions.
- If you don't want Instafood to have access to your current location, just tell us where you are manually. We respect your privacy, so if you don't trust us with that information, that's completely cool.
- Simple, clean, intuitive interface which supports both horizontal and vertical orientation
 
This app is open-source! Help us make it better at: https://github.com/Gear61/Instafood
 
This app is powered by Yelp: https://www.yelp.com/

title: UC Mini-Download Video Status & Movies
description:
