title: HOUND Voice Search & Personal Assistant
description:
Hound is the best way to search using your natural voice.

What do we mean by natural voice? Instead of talking like a search query "OK Hound… Find Chinese restaurants", just ask "OK Hound… What are the top rated Chinese restaurants near me?" You'll be amazed at the lightning-fast response. 

Want to try something more advanced? Hound can use follow-up questions and commands to filter, sort, or add more information to the original request. Give this a shot: "OK Hound… Find Asian restaurants rated 4 stars or more within walking distance of Times Square and exclude Chinese, Korean, and Thai"

But Hound isn't limited to restaurants and coffee shops. Use Hound to:

Search, discover, and play music:
- “OK Hound... What song is playing?”
- “OK Hound... Play the top hits by Echo & the Bunnymen”

Access Spotify with hands-free controls:
- “OK Hound… Show my Spotify playlists” 
- “OK Hound… Play my Discover Weekly playlist”
- “OK Hound… Skip to the next song”

Research and get trivia answers quickly:
- “OK Hound... When was Alexa Alemanni born?"
- “OK Hound... Tell me about the constellation Lyra"
- “OK Hound... Tell me about the Amazon River"

Set alarms and timers:
- "OK Hound… Set an alarm for 7am every weekday"
- "OK Hound… Set a timer to take out the chicken in 40 minutes"

Get the latest news:
- “OK Hound… Show me the latest news headlines”
- “OK Hound… Play me the latest news from NPR”
- “OK Hound… What is stock price of Amazon?”

Call, text, navigate handsfree:
- “OK Hound… Call Alexa at work"
- “OK Hound… Text Jeff ‘I’ll be there in five minutes’”
- “OK Hound… Show me directions to the nearest Whole Foods”

Get the weather forecast:
- “OK Hound… What’s the weather going to be like tomorrow at 6pm?
- “OK Hound… How about in Seattle in two weeks?”

Plan a night out at the movies:
- "OK Hound… What movies are playing near me around 7pm?"
- "OK Hound… What are the top action movies in theaters right now?"
- "OK Hound… What movies are playing in IMAX?"

Book an Uber:	
- "OK Hound… How much is an Uber to the airport?"
- "OK Hound… Get an Uber to the nearest movie theater"

Search for hotels and plan your travel:
- “OK Hound… Show hotels in Seattle that are pet-friendly, have a gym, and cost less than $275”

Numbers, calculations, and even mortgage estimates:
- “OK Hound… What is a prime number?”
- “OK Hound… What is the square root of 16 minus the square root of 9?”
- "OK Hound… Split a $96 bill two ways with a 15% tip"
- "OK Hound… What's the monthly payment for a $500,000 house with 20% down?"

What will you use Hound for?

Hound takes speed and accuracy to a new level thanks to our powerful Houndify platform, combining Speech Recognition and Natural Language Understanding into a single step. We call it Speech-to-Meaning (TM). Other assistants simply translate words into text, and they do a voice search the old way. But just recognizing words isn't fast enough! Hound, powered by Houndify, is the fastest and most accurate independent voice assistant in the market today.

End User Agreement: http://www.soundhound.com/hound-end-user-agreement

developerAddress:
SoundHound Inc.
5400 Betsy Ross Drive
Santa Clara, CA 95054
recentChanges:
With this new release, swipe left and you’ll find a collection of the most useful widgets to help you throughout the day.

We’ve also made it easier for you to continue to play your music where you left off. When driving with Hound In Car, quickly access your latest listening history–from music to radio to NPR news–just tap the ‘recently played’ card on top!
comments: I Like The Dashboard Its Very Easy To Click On What I Wanna See. And When I Want To Search For Something Its Found Real Quick👍

Its ok and simple enough to use to be user friendly. But its not as customizable as I would like it to be. I cant change the default search engine. I cant change the default map for directions. I cant make my own commands and connect it with other software. It also doesnt hold a conversation well enough. For 2020 Im expecting today's AI assistants to far surpass the ones from ten years ago and to be atleast as customizable as Saiy was. the UI is snappy and easy to use. Keep working on it.
"Play my music" does not play my local music files.

I love that it has lyrics to the songs! I would totally give this a 5 star rating, but for some reason, every time I try to get into one of my Spotify playlists on it, the app quits working and all my playlists disappear.
It's better than a Google sometimes like when you ask how to spell something it's much better than Google When I asked how to spell $185.25 Google you cannot bring it

title: Toca Kitchen
description:
Do you want to be the head chef of your very own sushi restaurant? Check out Toca Kitchen Sushi, the newest app from Toca Boca 👉 http://bit.ly/TocaKitchenSushi_GooglePlay

Ever wanted to play with your food? Now you can! Toca Boca brings you Toca Kitchen, where you cook, play with and prepare food for four hungry characters. Pick any ingredient and prepare it in your own way. Slice, boil, fry, cook, microwave or mix! Then wait for your hungry friend’s response.

We created this educational app for kids to give the mud cakes a new face, a complete virtual makeover which the kids will love! The characters fearful reactions to different meals will make you giggle. Does the cat like salty fish? Will the boy eat potatoes and greens? Mix and match your own meal! With no high scores, levels or time limits the fun doesn’t have to end in this cooking app.  

- Four cute characters to cook for - each with their own favorite food!
- 12 different ingredients that can be prepared in 180 different ways!
- Slice, boil, fry, cook, microwave anything you like! 
- Professional and fun kids app design!
- No rules or high scores!
- Kid-friendly interface
- No in-app purchases
- No third party advertising

What are you waiting for? Let’s get in the kitchen and start cooking!

Toca Kitchen is a free cooking app for kids that’s perfect for aspiring chefs. Kids will roleplay a chef in a kitchen, exploring ways to cook tasty and silly foods for hungry customers to eat. This fun cooking app is sure to deliver nothing but creativity and imagination for kids!

As with all Toca Boca apps, there are no high scores, time limits or stressful music. Rest assured this app for kids let’s kids play however they want!

***

ABOUT TOCA BOCA
At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids’ imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 130 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

PRIVACY POLICY
Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: http://tocaboca.com/privacy

comments: Ive read a lot of the other reviews and I don't have most of the problems that others describe. I did not expect much out of a free dating app though so it probably would've been hard to let me down... The "match" is terrible however. It wont show you who you've matched with, you have to hope that you happen to come across that person in the stack. Definitely a lot of bots but they are pretty easy to spot. Just be realistic about this and it'll be fine.

So far so good no issues. The only problem I have is when I check out profiles a lot of the profiles haven't been logged into in months. If these women haven't logged in in months POF should send them an email saying if they're not going to log into their account at least on a weekly basis the profile should be deleted. I hate leaving a message then I go and look at the profile and it hasn't been logged in three or four months. POF delete old accounts that haven't been logged in.

Does not distinguish between non monogamous and monogamous people. The search is fustrating as it's either 1 option at a time or all. ( 3 out of 4 not possible) It would be great if one could not see the same people over and over again, especially when not interested. At times, there appears to be a number of fake andor sex trade worker profiles. Other than that, this is the best free place to find your next ex. Happy fishing!

What disappoints me about this app and others is 3 things. #1.There are so many fake profiles. Unless you know what to look for you get spammed easily. #2. the inability to be more specific with your choices of what your looking for. But #3 disappoints me the most. I have X number of people that like me. Yet I have to pay to be able to even see the people who actually like me? You are going against the very purpose of the app, just to make money. No wonder people are only here for hookups. 🙄

After the latest updates seems they changed the format like where now you can't randomly choose a particular search area and for another instance you cannot unlike any of your ( likes) unless you're a paid member or unless only the person you had liked)pops up when you open the app,, then and only then you can choose to unlike the person or pay membership fee..

title: uDates local dating app: meet local singles & date
description:

comments: They are not real profiles!!! I tried to cancel and the send you to your play store. Once you get in it does not allow you to cancel. I had to go to my bank to cancel my card and get a new one so that I don't get charged again. You pay 15 for the month you get bombarded by girls (questionable) to chat. All mid 40s never married, no kids and all from the next town over. When you ask questions they don't answer and change the subject.

App is literally all bots. Every single profile is fake. Read the bios and you'll see what I mean. All responses make little to no sense, and if you try to take the conversation outside the app, every single woman refuses and thats just absurd. No shot 13 women are dead set on staying on the app only. Especially when they're reaching out to you first and sending you messages first. If they're that interested they wouldn't force you to stay on the app and buy more coins. Devs are scamming people.

Each text messages were charged by the number of letters in it, which was not mentioned at the time of purchase and no additional alerts for running out of credits. The people who acted as members seemed exceptionally enthusiastic and fast at typing, almost impossible for a human being.

They're all bots. Here's how I know: 1. For an app that has been downloaded only 500k times, there are a suspicious amount of people in my medium - sized city using it (you seem to be region-locked). 2. Without exception, every single profile I liked looked at mine after about 5 minutes and liked me back after a couple more. They almost always express interest in talking to you immediately, but then never reply. 3. Crass as it sounds, there are no remotely unattractive people on this app.

**Buyer beware** From my observations as a PAID member, most of the profiles appear to be from bots pretending to be from your location! The profiles are Staged! Don't trust the location of the so called members on the site! Once you pay your membership, you then have to keep purchasing tokens to continue your conversation. This site is definitely not worth it! And I am not an angry consumer, just providing an honest assessment! This site appears to have all bots! DON'T DO IT!!

title: Kiwi.com: Best travel deals: flights, trains, cars
description:
Find and book the cheapest trips with Kiwi.com
By connecting nearly a thousand airlines, train, and bus carriers worldwide, Kiwi.com can offer you the cheapest tickets to anywhere on the planet.
 
Best search in the travel industry
Try one quick search and you’ll wish that every travel website had our advanced, easy-to-use search tools.
 
Virtual Global Supercarrier
Our vision is to provide all travelers with the best range of door-to-door travel options, no matter the destination.
 
Flexible tickets
Book with as much flexibility as you want with our unique fare types ticketing. From the cheapest flights to the most cancelation options, Kiwi.com's fare types give you maximum flexibility, and they work across your full itinerary with multiple carriers including those that don't cooperate.
 
Global 24/7 customer support
We offer assistance in 12+ languages and we’re constantly innovating new ways for our customers to manage bookings and answer questions, right in the app, without even needing to contact a call center or wait for an email.
 
What the media says
“Kiwi.com will find you the cheapest international flights.” — Condé Nast Traveler
“So clever that once you understand how it works you cannot help but be impressed.” — Business Insider
“Kiwi.com helps you figure out where you can fly within your budget.” — The New York Times
“Kiwi.com gets the lowest price by finding connections that other search engines wouldn’t even consider.” — Peter Greenberg, Emmy-awarded travel journalist

Hi there.
Thanks for updating the Kiwi.com app. As always, we're doing everything we can to improve your mobile travel experience.

comments: Appalling. I paid for a plane ticket which is still stuck on 'pending' many days after my flight has actually left, so I was never sent the tickets! I got to the airport and had to buy new, separate tickets for every step of my journey. The refund section of the app does not work. The company have my money and have done nothing to refund me.

App isn't working now, I think they've pulled the plug and ran away with all the refunds and fees collected. Google needs to ban the people behind this app and company and report them to the authorities. They operate their back office in Eastern Europe, might be another sign of scammers. I've lost hope getting a refund from them.

Oct/2020: more problems with cancelled flights and rescheduling... alternatives were ridiculous, and it's impossible to reach support within acceptable time. Will not use Kiwi again. March/2020: My flight has 2 legs, both cancelled by the airlines, only one of them appear as canceled on my booking, I can't ask a full refund automatically, and was given 24h to request it... Refund is done in Kiwi credit, while companies are actually returning the money... I doubt that support will answer to me...

Pretty useful for manage most of your booking, however, a couple of functions are not showing, so for example to tick off all the necessary acknowledgement boxes you'll still need to log in you account using a laptop or desktop.

I have tried to use this app for the last week and it keeps telling me that "you must be offline" as this is the only app that's not working in my phone and I have also just done the update. Please get this fixed.

title: My Restaurant | A single restaurant application
description:
This restaurant app comes with a dynamic backend and eye catching material design that allows you to browse foods from multiple categories. Monthly coupons and exciting offers will take your love for food to a whole new level.  


This app includes maximum features what a complete restaurant app should have. A very compact but enriched homepage has been designed with all dynamic data. 

Basic functionalities are favorites, category list, featured items, offers, coupons etc. At top of the category list in home page, featured items and offers are shown to have an overall idea about the restaurant. Also by using coupons you can avail discounts on your meals.

 We have included a review option so that you can directly go through the comments to have an idea about the detail of the food. You can also add your favorite food item in the favorite list for future reference.

 This app also contains call now option followed by messenger that means you can contact for more information and for order/bookings.

We have included push notification too. Admin can push simple message to engage user. AdMob has been integrated with the project so that anybody can include Ad in any activity. Analytics has also been integrated to monitor the evolution, performance and impact to the app. 

Features:
- Complete native restaurant app
- Dynamic homepage and multiple categories
- Featured items in homepage
- Favorite List
- Easy navigation simpler UX
- Material design
- Ability to review foods
- Restaurant offers in homepage
- Monthly Coupons for discounts!
- Firebase analytics to analyze users behavior
- Complete  Admob integration (banner and full-screen ad)
- Push Notifications

title: Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit
description:
Count on Lyft to take you wherever you need to to go. Got an early flight? Need to get to the office to prep for the morning meeting? We’ll match you with a driver, help you find the quickest bus route, or show you the nearest scooter — you’ll be on your way in minutes.  If it gets you there, it’s in the app. 

Save time (and your sanity)
We’ll match you with a driver in seconds.  Your time is your money — having to tackle traffic and hunt for parking is a total pain. With Lyft, you can just sit back and relax.

You’ve got options
Choose from 9 different ways to go*, they’re all available right from your app. Whether you’re looking for an affordable ride, the most direct route, or a way to treat your crew — we’ve got the mode to suit your needs and mood.

Adventure all day and night
Have peace of mind knowing you can always request a Lyft ride 24/7 — and share your route with friends. Our Community Safety Program is designed to bring our riders and drivers greater protection — from in-person trainings to in-app features.

* Lyft ride types may vary by region. Check the app to see what is available in your city.

comments: I have been trying to use my lyft account for about 2 years. When I type in my debit/credit it doesn't not accept it error when I have triple checked it and still won't take it. I typed it in right. It pretty frustrating when you need a ride and can't even access your lyft account for a ride. This has been going of for 2 years now.

Up until tonight Ive loved the app, but as of tonight it charges me for the ride but after I go and order it it just goes back to the select destination screen it doesn't look for a car then it tells me I found a car and be ready in 18 minutes but there's no trace of it inside the app I don't know what's going on right now, I'm very disappointed and kind of stranded not because of this possibly unless this guy just shows up mysteriously in 18 minutes I have no clue if he's going to or not

I have had an account for years but have not used it since 2015. I moved to a new state recently and had re-download lyft and tried to attach my payment methods. I tried to attach every option that is offered and the app wouldn't let me. I even Uninstalled and reinstalled several times. There's is no proper customer service set up. I finally found a number that would keep me on hold then eventually hang up. This is why I prefer uber, I never have these problems with them.

Changed my address a week before downloading. My card didnt match my new address when adding it yet. Understandable. But now that my address is up to date, i still have to use a completely different card. I contacted support who told me my card wasnt working or they dont accept it _. I tried explaining it was my address, they sent me to a link that told me I need to use a new card. Its just very frustdrating. I gave it two stars because the drivers are always awesome and the prices are fair.

Terrible. Added my credit card a day prior and thought it was set to go. Now I request a ride and they want a second credit card that has matching address, provided this unnecessary info and rejected because could not validate, your problem not mine. Dishonest, unreliable, do not use if your ride is a necessity. Unbelievable. 0 stars if I could

title: OfferUp: Buy. Sell. Letgo. Mobile marketplace
description:
Buy. Sell. Letgo. - OfferUp and Letgo are now one big mobile marketplace.

Buy, sell and shop deals on thousands of unique items nearby! So whether you want to make some extra money by selling your used furniture or want to do some clothes shopping the choice is yours with OfferUp. 

OfferUp makes it easy to find great deals on the things you want and make money on the things you want to sell. Ditch the Classified Ads and garage sales -- this is the best way to buy and sell in your community or neighborhood with a mobile marketplace you can trust.

Cars, clothes, shoes, vintage fashion, and more! Here’s how shopping and selling with OfferUp works:

• Buy or sell anything; easily offer up your items for sale in 30 seconds.
• Find great deals and discounts on clothes, shoes, furniture, vintage fashion, cell phones, electronics, baby & kids items, sports equipment, used cars, home goods and more.
• Use reputation features like ratings and profiles to see who you’re dealing with and build trust.
• Shop local items for sale with thousands of new postings daily.
• Message buyers and sellers securely from within the app.
• Build your reputation with your unique seller profile page.
• Browse and shop items by image and sort by category or location.
• Join millions of people using OfferUp across the country.
• Skip the garage sale! OfferUp is the simplest way to buy and sell locally.

Fun facts about shopping and selling with OfferUp:

1. With OfferUp you can easily sell anything like clothes and shoes, used cars, electronics, vintage fashion, and furniture.
2. OfferUp shows you what’s selling nearby in your local community.
3. Communication between buyers & sellers happens through the app via secure messaging.
4. OfferUp is better than a garage sale; you can do your shopping right on your phone or tablet.

Be part of the community:

We’re making local shopping and selling an experience that everyone can try and trust. The community at the heart of our marketplace is what makes that possible. When you join OfferUp, you’re joining millions of people helping each other make money and save money around the nation -- and right in the neighborhood.

From shoes to cars, vintage fashion to furniture - unearth unique items that you can’t find anywhere else with OfferUp. Download OfferUp today and enjoy the mobile marketplace with plenty of hidden gems just waiting to be discovered.

The two leading mobile marketplaces in the U.S., OfferUp and Letgo, are joining forces to create a new powerhouse. OfferUp acquired Letgo on July 1, 2020.

comments: This app seems to be littered with dozens, if not, hundreds of ads that have been up for, in some cases, over 2 years. I sent one a message asking if it was available, and didn't receive a reply. After seeing that the ad was still posted, I also noticed that it was posted 2 years ago. I saw a few other listings that had the same story. I liked how LetGo didn't leave listings over a couple months old without asking the lister if it was still relevant.

This app is far less usable than Letgo was. The second I click on one thing to see what it is, I am immediately bombarded with listings of similar items from ebay. If I wanted to look on ebay, I would use that app. Don't assume I need to see 20 of that item. Prices aren't listed in the browse page so I have to click to find them. And when something sells, it doesn't disappear. It just stays with the other listings and says "Sold". I dont need to see all the things I cannot buy.

Over 70% of the messages you will get will be fraudulent scams (they are quite obvious, but it's annoying to deal with). There is not much support for when you have issues with the app and I kept getting my posts removed for items being "intangible", which was not true, had photos and descriptions of actual items and there was nothing I could do about it, so it just became pointless and frustrating to use. Stick with FB marketplace or CL or other platforms

Titles, descriptions, and prices of items are not shown in search results, leading me to click a bunch of images only to see that the item is not what I want or out of my price range. PLEASE add titles and prices to search results page. Also the gallery of pictures that are not in any order or in one grid make it confusing to look through listings. I don't get what the intent is... To have me looking through the app forever and never finding what I am looking to buy???? Please fix the UX.

The app already sucked, but now it's worse. Why would you combine 2 apps and not take the good from the other app? To many old listings, nothing expires. Messaging is a joke, you're better off talking to the wall. An speaking of messages, how can I sell something if I dont get notified? To many times I've had to open the app just to see multiple messages, days old, and the buyer long gone, thanks offer up. I remember when this app came out, that was its prime, now it's just garbage.

title: Chef City : Kitchen Restaurant Cooking Game
description:
Do you love cooking? Do you have a craze of playing cooking games? Then cook delicious meals and desserts for your customers in Chef City : Kitchen Restaurant Cooking Game. Dash into the madness, craze and fun created by Chef City : Kitchen Restaurant Cooking Game that will provide a challenge for even the master chef of restaurant games. Chef City : Kitchen Restaurant Cooking Game is a FREE cooking game where you set off to play as crazy cooking restaurant chef by providing speedy service in food game to please customers with the most tasty food. Meet unique diner who visit your restaurant, serve and delight them with quality food and speed in order to win popularity and earn big tips. Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world for your customers in restaurant kitchen. 

In Chef City : Kitchen Restaurant Cooking Game, cook tons of tasty cuisines and become a top chef in this addictive time management restaurant game that features endless play. Start your chef games adventure in Chef City : Kitchen Restaurant Cooking Game, use various ingredients to cook delicious dishes with amazing recipes like Donuts, Burgers, sausages, Pizza, Sandwich, Cake, BBQ, French Fries etc. Bake, cook, and grill meet unique customers, serve and delight them with your delicious recipes, and earn Coins and Tips in kitchen games. In the world of master chef cooking game experience serve exotic flavors all over the world with crazy cooking chef games. Upgrade kitchen game appliances & produce an even greater variety of dishes & tasty cuisine with food game utensils. Decorate your new restaurant kitchen to attract more hungry customers. Be the crazy cooking top chef in the world and please your hungry customers in this kitchen game. Make the best cooking strategy that will help you earn big tips so you can unlock exciting food items and kitchen appliances. Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes, in this way you may expand your restaurant chain & you may serve more customer in minimum time.

Chef City : Kitchen Restaurant Cooking Game Features:

• Bake, grill, and serve food by using simple TAP.
• Exciting cooking game with many fancy restaurants
• Many Fun and Challenging Levels where you can cook your craze off
• Unlock New Restaurants that pushes your Cooking Dreams to the next level
• Practice time management kitchen game skills in a variety of cooking world techniques.
• Upgrade your Kitchen Appliances to speed up the food line and to Level Up & become a Super Chef!

title: Amazon Photos
description:
Prime members get unlimited full-resolution photo storage and 5 GB video storage. Everyone else gets 5 GB for photos and videos. Use the Groups feature to privately pool and share full-resolution photos and videos. You can view and share your photos on nearly any phone, tablet, or computer, and you can set a screensaver on your Fire TV, Echo Show, or Echo Spot.

AUTO-SAVE AND BACK UP YOUR PHOTOS
Set the app to Auto-Save your photos and videos from your phone so they get backed up automatically. Once your photos are stored in Amazon Photos, you can delete them from your device to make room on your phone. This free photo storage app can help you keep your photos and videos safe, even if your phone is lost or damaged.

PRIME MEMBER BENEFITS
Amazon Prime members get free unlimited photo storage + 5 GB video storage as part of their Prime membership. They can also share their unlimited photo storage benefit with five others by adding them to their Family Vault, and search for photos by keyword, location, or the name of the person in the photo.

SEARCH FOR PHOTOS BY KEYWORD
Your photos are easy to find, because the app organizes your photos automatically. Prime members can quickly find any specific photos by searching for the things in their images, like "dog," "sunset," or "Seattle."

SHARE YOUR PHOTOS WITH GROUPS
Collaborate and share photos and albums with your friends and family by inviting them to a private, invitation-only Amazon Photos Group. You can pool everyone’s photos together from your latest family vacation, soccer team season, birthday party, friend’s wedding, or knitting club--or just share goofy photos with a collection of your favorite people.

ACCESS PHOTOS ON ALL YOUR DEVICES
Once your photos have been saved to Amazon Photos, you can access them from nearly any device. Finally move those family photos from your old laptop, your phone, and your desktop so they’re all together in one safe place.

Features:
- Auto-save photos for easy backup and to free up memory on your phone.
- Back up your photos and videos securely with Amazon.
- Share photos and albums via SMS, email, other apps, or privately with Groups.
- See your photos on your Fire TV, tablet, computer, or on the Echo Show, where available.
- Prime members can search photos by keyword, location, and more.

Amazon Photos offers secure online backup for your photos and videos. This free online storage app lets you store, view, and share your important photos right on your phone.

recentChanges: - General bug fixes and improvements.
comments: While I have always backed up my photos on Google Drive, it's nice to have the Amazon Photos complete backup as a failsafe. However, Google's photo software is not usable, and Amazon Photos has a couple of features that are outstanding. The user can place selected photos into any number of albums. An album can be selected as your tv screen saver. More importantly, it can be sent in an email, allowing the receiver to view all the photos in the album, hundreds if desired, with a single email.

I love how everything syncs to one place. Amazon photos puts different people in their own little album, so its really convenient if you are needing a picture of a certain someone all you have to do is go to their album and any picture you've ever taken and they are in it (even way in the background) it'll be in their. My boys looked identical as babies and we were so surprised amazon could recognize which one was who. Its also nice to have memories pop up from the same day 1-5years ago.

Since my Kindle HDX DIED with years of photos I couldn't print on it., This Amazing Amazon Photos APP helped me reconnect with the Majority most of the photos that were backed up.. This APP actually helped me reconnect with some photos I hadn't seen in years, because I hadn't realized that my photos were being Backed up each time I plugged it in to recharge the battery. So grateful for that. THANKS AMAZON 🐸💖STILL accurate information. I can STILL can go back to pictures I took 5+ years ago. A

I was invited by a friend to share pictures on this app. I thought what a cool idea. I HATE that this app copies all the pictures on my phone, and stores them. Now every picture i take goes to three apps: Gallery, Google Photos, and to Amazon Prime Photos! I also HATE that there is NO left navigational plane foe me to get into the trash can

Amazon photos is not only easy, it is convenient, take a photo and it instantly comes up on my Echo Show, it's like having a moving picture frame!! Also can watch on the TV and my Amazon tablet besides the Echo Show. Paid for additional photo and video storage, compared to having them printed!!

title: Housejoy-Trusted Home Services
description:
At Housejoy, we provide you with a variety of at-home services that simplify your everyday living. You can book a wide range of services from home construction to home maintenance, salon-at-home to home cleaning and appliance repairs delivered by well-qualified professionals from anywhere, anytime across 6 Indian cities.

Housejoy home services are available in Bangalore, Hyderabad, Chennai, Delhi, Mumbai, Pune.

Why Housejoy?
- Easy & Quick to book
- Highest Quality Standard
- Hassle-Free Experience
- On-Time Arrival & Delivery
- Certified, Background-Verified experts
- Guaranteed quality of service
- Transparent and affordable pricing
- Trusted by over 2,000,000 Indians!
- Caters to everything from Salon-at-Home Services to Home Construction & Maintenance

Construction Services: Your dream home needs excellent craftsmanship, and who better to give it life than our Top-Class home construction team! On-Time Project Delivery and a Hassle-Free Experience from Plan Approval to Handover Guaranteed. 

Renovation Services: Reinvent your home with our Top-Grade Renovation Services. Book renovation services for any part of the house ranging from bathroom to kitchen. Hassle-Free Experience Guaranteed from Plan to Handover.

Interior Services: Spruce up your living space with our All-New Housejoy Interior Design. Whether you have a 1BHK or a villa, our expertise and High Quality Standard leaves you with a Hassle-Free Experience from Design to Handover.

Salon at home
Our trained beauty experts use top of the line products and provide a range of beauty services like waxing, threading, massage, pedicure/manicure, hair cutting and colouring etc. at the comfort of your home. We also offer a range of beauty packages for skin care, hair care and other beauty services.

Home Cleaning Services
A range of home cleaning packages to suit your needs. You can order for bathroom, bedroom, kitchen deep cleaning, furniture and furnishing cleaning, floor scrubbing and polishing services as well as an all-inclusive Full Home Deep Cleaning.

Appliance Repair & Service at Home
Housejoy appliance repair experts will examine and repair your home appliances in no time. We undertake AC repair and servicing, washing machine repair jobs, TV repairs, Refrigerators repair, Chimney & Hob repair etc.

Painting Services 
Book interior or exterior house painting jobs for homes of all sizes starting at just Rs.7/sq feet.

Pest Control Services at Home
Choose from a set of pest control services like Cockroach control, Rat Control, Ant Control, Termite Control, General pest control etc.

Plumbing Services at Home
Find professional and trained plumbers for all your plumbing troubles like leaking pipes, dripping faucets, bathroom fittings, toilet and sanitary work etc.

Electrical repair services at home

Computer Repair Service at Home

Packers & Movers Services
Moving to a new house? We’re a one-stop-shop for all your end-to-end relocation needs - packing, moving, unpacking, cleaning, painting, plumbing, electrical help and the list goes on.

Massages for Men at Home
Need to destress at home? Our qualified therapists will come right to your doorstep! The use of aromatic massage candles will guarantee a rejuvenating experience.

Used, trusted and appreciated by over 1,500,000 happy customers, download the Housejoy App for all your home service needs now

If you have any complaints /suggestions, please write to us at complaints@housejoy.in

Why do they accept the requests if they are not available only. It was such a headache for me because I had to go somewhere in the evening and all other salons were fully booked for that day. Frst nd last experience.👎

Used app for first time, horrible experience. Person didn't had understanding of work assigned. broke my new lock and make shift arrangements were done which broke within one month. on contacting housejoy, no help was provided.

I tried to edit the house-no with the floor-no but not able to do it as it is allowing to set my address only via GPS. Allow users to manually type their address as well because at times the manual entry is more accurate than GPS generated house address.

For just saying there is a problem in AC stabiliser technician charged 900/- and after he lefts I got a message that the charges for the service is 143/- means he as taken 5 times high amount regarding which I have complained for more than 6 times.

title: Foodhub - Online Takeaways
description:
Looking for a takeaway? 

Want to see what’s on offer in your area?

Look no further! 

Download the free Foodhub app and get ordering from local takeaways and restaurants near you. We’ve got a HUGE variety of cuisines that you can choose from making your takeaway night as convenient and delicious as can be! Fancy a delicious mouth-watering Indian curry, or why not try a gorgeous deep pan pizza? Whatever the cuisine, kick back, relax and let Foodhub take care of you! We’re here to take the stress away!

Ordering from Foodhub using your smartphone or tablet couldn’t be any easier. 
Our handy little app can detect your location and display all your favourite takeaways and restaurants within seconds.

The takeaways and restaurants on Foodhub don't get charged any commission at all for the orders they receive which means in return they offer more exclusive discounts and offers that are not available on any other portal! Download and check it out for yourself, you’ll find so many takeaways and restaurants offering exclusive deals today

Service charge did we hear you say? Forget about it! We’re here to make sure you get the best value for your hard earned money that’s why we don’t charge any service charge on orders at all! Don’t say we never do anything for you :}

Not sure if you want to place an order with a particular restaurant? We’ve got you covered! Thousands and thousands of customer reviews ensure that you get what your’re looking for.

Payment couldn’t be any easier on the Foodhub app. You can pay by cash on delivery or collection, or by debit or credit card securely. You can now also save your card details and not have to manually input them every single time.

Tired of not knowing if your meal is en route or not? Our meal tracker allows you to keep up to date with your meal’s progress starting from the takeaway’s kitchen until it arrives to your front door!

We value your opinions and feedback highly, that’s why we listened and incorporated SSO (Single Sign On) allowing you to logon so much smoothly using your Google or Facebook login details. Ordering quickly couldn't be any easier!

Placing the same order again? We’ve got great news for you guys, you can now order your regular orders quickly from your order history!

We’d love to hear any feedback from you on how we can further improve and make the Foodhub app even better by asking you to send us an email at:

hello@foodhub.co.uk

Don’t forget to follow us on Facebook also: https://fb.com/Food-Hub-242594896161471

By downloading and using the Foodhub app, you are confirming your acceptance to our Terms and Conditions, Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy all of which can be found on our website  https://foodhub.co.uk

Fancy a delicious mouth-watering Indian curry, or why not try a gorgeous deep pan pizza? Whatever the cuisine, kick back, relax and let Foodhub take care of you! We’re here to take the stress away!

Ordering from Foodhub using your smartphone or tablet couldn’t be any easier.
Our handy little app can detect your location and display all your favourite takeaways and restaurants within seconds.

The takeaways and restaurants on Foodhub don't get charged any commission at all for the orders they receive which means in return they offer more exclusive discounts and offers that are not available on any other portal! Download and check it out for yourself, you’ll find so many takeaways and restaurants offering exclusive deals today

Service charge did we hear you say? Forget about it! We’re here to make sure you get the best value for your hard earned money that’s why we don’t charge any service charge on orders at all! Don’t say we never do anything for you :}

Not sure if you want to place an order with a particular restaurant? We’ve got you covered! Thousands and thousands of customer reviews ensure that you get what your’re looking for.

Payment couldn’t be any easier on the Foodhub app. You can pay by cash on delivery or collection, or by debit or credit card securely. You can now also save your card details and not have to manually input them every single time.

Tired of not knowing if your meal is en route or not? Our meal tracker allows you to keep up to date with your meal’s progress starting from the takeaway’s kitchen until it arrives to your front door!

We value your opinions and feedback highly, that’s why we listened and incorporated SSO (Single Sign On) allowing you to logon so much smoothly using your Google or Facebook login details. Ordering quickly couldn't be any easier!

Placing the same order again? We’ve got great news for you guys, you can now order your regular orders quickly from your order history!

We’d love to hear any feedback from you on how we can further improve and make the Foodhub app even better by asking you to send us an email at:

hello@foodhub.co.uk

Don’t forget to follow us on Facebook also: https://fb.com/Food-Hub-242594896161471

By downloading and using the Foodhub app, you are confirming your acceptance to our Terms and Conditions, Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy all of which can be found on our website https://foodhub.co.uk
summary: Foodhub being one of the best online food portal in United Kingdom.
recentChanges:
Hello Foodies,

In order to maintain security, we have included another level of authorisation for new sign-ups. You will have to verify your phone number with a One-time Pin (OTP) before placing your first order with us. Stay tuned for more exciting updates.

Team FOODHUB
comments: App takes 'ghost' payments which take 3-5 days to return to your bank. Order "failed" there nights in a row, but the money left my account and will eventually be returned. The first time, customer service offered me a £5 voucher and promised me it was a "glitch" that won't happen again. When the same happened again they just stopped replying to messages and have ignored me since. The cost of 3 orders has not yet been returned to my bank.

It's a simple, easy and cheaper takeaway app to use.....no hidden charges added on at the checkout like the famous main well known app everyone uses......its a cheaper platform for takeaways to use too.....admittedly it's not massively popular yet but once the takeaways who pay fortunes to the multimillion pound brands, open their eyes and see the benefits of this....then the choice for us the customer will naturally improve.

Great app in general with one exception for me and that is Notifications. Especially for money off codes. They appear on my phone home screen as a notification and when I click on it, it takes me to the app but my notifications are empty and then the notification will appear 2 days after the code has expired. Very frustrating indeed. The latest notification was today for national curry day. I have no idea what the money off code is or when it is valid until. Poor.

"UPDATE: As promised, I said I would edit my review once the below issue had been rectified which has now been implemented!" Love the discounts - keep em' coming! I've lowered my star rating because I've noticed that when trying to leave a below average review for any given restaurant it is suspiciously omitted? Once this issue has been rectified I will gladly rectify the star rating here. Ironically, Google play will allow me to leave this below average review because..that's how it should be!

Great app, better deals than just eat, some different restaurants Update: I've reordered twice now and there's been no collection issue, so upping rating to 5 ⭐. However, there's one problem of the app not saving my past orders (not a big issue as I've favourited my restaurants)

title: Cooking Fantasy: Be a Chef in a Restaurant Game
description:
Train you cooking talents in the best cooking games and enjoy the fever of cooking fast in this crazy and tasty city!👩‍🍳👨‍🍳

Cook & serve tasty dishes  FAST as a chef in Cooking Fantasy – Cooking Games - feel the craze of a chef frenzy!
Become a pro chef cooking hot food to your hungry clients in this time management 🍴 cooking 🍴 games. Dash around the kitchen baking pizza🍕, grilling tasty burgers🍔, and cooking world-class famous dishes in USA, Spain, Japan, Italy, etc. Are you ready to tap as fast as your customers order? Is the craze of a top chef!

Cook Up Frenzy Anytime, Anywhere
• Download restaurant content and start cooking
• A fast-paced kitchen with stuning graphics, the best in cooking games 2020
• Play Cooking Fantasy offline on your android device after initial content download
• ⭐Wi-Fi not needed!⭐

Become a famous chef in the cooking city!
• 💰 Dash through kitchen madness to cook in a rush and win big prizes 💰
• Cook customers breakfast, lunch, dinner, and MORE!
• Bake, grill, and prepare food by using a simple TAP and COOK mechanic, smooth and   addictive, the smoothest of all the cooking games!

Dynamic and smooth gameplay, the best in cooking games!
• Smooth gameplay very fast and addictive
• Scramble to cook fast for a large number of customers! Earns tips!
• Upgrade your kitchenware and become the richest of the cooking games!

Easy cooking mechanics
• Cook in a bunch of crazy restaurants
• Earn stars to beat all the levels and unlock new kitchens!
• Create delicious meals and 🍩 tasty foods 🍩

Fun & Powerful Cooking Boosts
• Time-management with fantastic boosts
• Double your tips using the Price Doubler!
• 🍳 Don’t let the food burn! Take care cooking hot! 🍳

Cook Classic Restaurant Dishes in this Free Kitchen Game

•  Cook with insta-cook boost to serve in your cooking diary!

The Chef’s Community – Join us!

title: eZee BurrP! Restaurant Management App
description:
eZee BurrP! Lite is a restaurant management app that simplifies operations of your restaurants’ all departments. The best part is that it automates all tasks in minutes and allows the restaurant staff to deliver their work by interacting with all departments instantly. This not only saves time but also helps serve their customers fast. The eZee BurrP! Lite app is for small, medium, and large restaurants that are planning to - streamline their operations, save time, and provide personalized service to their customers. 

The eZee BurrP! Lite restaurant management app is integrated with eZee BurrP! Restaurant POS system. Hence, all the operations that you perform will get synced with the software. With effortless navigation, straightforward operations and its easy user interface, the eZee BurrP! Lite app helps you run all your daily tasks right on your fingertips. This way, you can directly handle orders and track performance from your Android and iOS mobile devices.  

Below are the features of eZee BurrP! Lite app which can help you manage your restaurant business on-the-go:

Outlet settings
★ Set up multiple menus
★ Manage real-time inventory
★ Handle takeaway and dine-in
★ Customize orders and item modifiers
★ Discounts on items
★ Generate kitchen order tickets (KOT)
★ Synced with kitchen display system (KDS)
★ User privileges     
★ Control operations from one location   
★ Receipt operations
★ Take payments
★ Printing provisions  
★ Dashboard view  

You just need to install this eZee BurrP! Lite restaurant app if you’re already using our restaurant POS software. It is possible to take a free trial of this restaurant POS app along with our restaurant POS system - eZee BurrP!  

For more information, you can contact sales@ezeetechnosys.com.  

eZee BurrP! is a desktop-based restaurant management software designed to give restaurants all the tools they require to speed up service and increase the efficiency of operations. Modules and integrations that we offer in the restaurant POS software can be customized as per the restaurant type including fine dining restaurants, bistros, fast food chains, cafes, bars, etc. No matter what kind of establishment, eZee BurrP! helps the staff to complete their tasks efficiently in line with their operational style and business.

title: Grocery Shopping List - Listonic
description:
Shopping list that improves the quality of your grocery shopping by making it easier, faster, and most importantly smarter. It is all you would want out of a grocery list and more.

Besides making your shopping a breeze, Listonic provides a wide range of savvy food hacks, smart shopping tips, and overall grocery wizardry, to help you become a smarter shopper and a more conscious consumer. To make sure that Listonic saves you time and money, we focused on speed, simplicity and a user-friendly practical interface.

WHY USE LISTONIC

- We know you appreciate your free time, we know you want to make grocery shopping as fast as possible. And we know that about 70% of products on your shopping lists are repetitive. That’s why your grocery list now suggests your favorite products first. And you’re able to add quantities with one simple tap at the same time now!  

- It makes shopping with family and friends much easier. Your lists are synced, so any changes are instantaneously seen by others. Also, it's easy to share your shopping list with a friend who doesn’t use Listonic app via email or a text message!

- Need a change? Not in the mood for your fav zucchini pasta? Stop crying and start organizing your weekly menu with Listonic. Browse our catalogue: you will find many product inspirations categorized by aisle order. Easy swipe, easy choice!

- Now Listonic can recognize units! Write a number and a product, and you’ll get suggestions immediately!

- What’s bought and what’s not? Now you will clearly see! You will see how much you’ve already spent as well as how much you’re going to spend on missing products. 

- Your grocery list provides hundreds of useful tips and hacks on buying, preserving, and cooking to help you make healthy grocery list.

- Enjoy all our features for free!

Listonic for Android Wear is a smart shopping list app - exactly where it’s most handy - right on your wrist. Check off items without taking out your phone, get just-in-time notifications and use smart voice input.

Listonic supports all Android smartphones, tablets, Android Wear devices and is always available in your browser.
 
People all over the world are already enjoying the convenience of our grocery list – with over 8 000 000 products added to lists each month.
 
If you see anything we can improve, please, let us know! New reviews and support emails are really helpful to make our app better and smarter! Contact us via Twitter (@listonic) or at support@listonic.com.

recentChanges:
Don't be deceived by our silence. We've been working hard to improve Listonic. Even though you won’t see the changes we’ve made recently, they will help you use Listonic more efficiently.

Stay tuned, new changes are coming.
Let us know what you think. Rate us ☆☆☆☆☆ or contact us at support@listonic.com. Thanks!
comments: Does exactly what is promised. I've been using it for 6 months and it still works fine. It's intuitive and highly practical. There's a slight learning curve when sharing lists across different phone types (apple/android/Google) but that may have been just me and my partner. Nonetheless I still use this app every time I go grocery shopping. Highly recommend it.

So far it keeps the items I need in order. Now if it could just stop me from impulse buying it would be perfect. I guess I'll have to work on my self discipline. ET I have checked the others and this is definitely 5 stars. I had to play with it just like any other app/program that's new to you. I love it!!!. Get it now. It has saved me from dragging my daytimer and list into the store with me. My smartphone is with me all the time so my list is always with me. ET

So Helpful! We do shopping once and week, and without fail, we always forget something or my kids text me to pick something up AS I'M DRIVING HOME! We have now all downloaded this app and we add to it as we remember things we need. Since it syncs and updates automatically, my kids can add to the list even if I'm already at the store. The app is very user friendly too. I love using it.

We have been using Listonic for a while now. This is our second time buying the upgraded version. I highly recommend it because you can share lists. My husband and I linked a list called Grocery list so that either one can add to the list, and even send a last minute item if one is already at the store. We also created a separate Christmas list for each member of the family. Throughout the year, everyone updates their lists as they see things they like. It has made Christmas so much easier.

This app, is great. It let's me update my list and add anything to it when I think about it, because I usually always have my phone near me, while a list might be at home, and i might forget to put what ever I thought of on the list when I got home. I can also make multiple list for several different stores. I can also make lists for fast food places. It let's you see a list of items as you are entering items, so yo I can pick from the list. It learns you item you enter so it is easier next time

title: PinMe Smart Restaurant System
description:
PinMe helps merchants to set up online ordering system and saves labor costs and operating costs.

PinMe is suitable for many types of merchants, such as Tea restaurants, Small restaurants, Medium and Large restaurants, etc. The system is available in multilingual versions, including Traditional Chinese, Thai, Vietnamese, and English.

- Easy to learn and operate so that merchants can open their online restaurant quickly. 
- Support multilingual mode, it is suitable for locals and overseas tourists.

Fast, Friendly Delivery Drivers. Great Restaurant Choices. Buy Local Eat Local is a GREAT concept.

Love this company. Their fast and have great people. Some of the restaurants that go through them ruin the good 5⭐ customer delivery experience with cold messy food that just cost $40-$90. title: Super Chef Kitchen Story Restaurant Cooking Games
description:
Super Kitchen Chef, cook & serve delicious restaurant food to kitchen restaurant customers in time management restaurant cooking games. Cook super chef’s top restaurant food and serve delicious food truck steaks, scrumptious pizza, crazy burger and cooking food items in girls restaurant cooking games. Cooking queen, get ready to cook girls restaurant food and serve delicious meals in fast food management best restaurant cooking games. Own your fast food truck, tap to cook super chef restaurant food and serve customers in chef restaurant crazy cooking games. It is a wonderful game I had ever played it graphics background etc. Everything thing is perfect this game is very enjoyable and it is best for pass time
Way to many adds, time you get to level 4 already watched 10 ads, more time spent watching ads then playing game, plus it's slow slow slow

title: Kitten Match
description:
How can you refuse a helpless sweet kitten when she looks into your eyes? Help and care for the kitten, design, and decorate apartments by solving match 3 puzzles!

Welcome to Kitten Match! Here you can design and decorate the mansion with lovely talking cats by solving match-3 puzzles. If you think this is not fun enough, don’t worry, feed cats, dress them up and play with them, etc, we have what beyond your imagination! Come and join us now, cats are waiting for you!

Every sweet kitten deserves a nice human. Take care of the adorable kittens, restore mansions and adventure in the world of match 3 games!  Your beloved kitties will always be by your side!

Successful of beating colorful match 3 levels deliver you food, suits for the cats and materials that you can renovate your mansion. The more chapters you can unlock, the bond with your sweet kitten is more tightly! Don’t hesitate, meet your cute kitten pal and start your journey!

The game features: 
●Storyline: Decorate your mansions with your sweet kitten pal and encounter other cat friends!
●House design: Lights, furniture, wallpapers, floors, all on your decisions! You are the master of remodeling!
●Care for cats: feed kittens and dress them up! Pet cute cats and enjoy their purring!
●Exciting match 3 levels: challenge the puzzles, make powerful boosters, and blast gems!
●Communicate and compete with your Facebook friends! You can also send and receive free additional lives to/from them! 

Make yourself and your little kitten a cozy home and give them a feeling of family!  Thousands of pieces of furniture give you the freedom to inspire creativity and remodel when you want. Cuddly kittens will be proud of you!


Kitten Match is free to play, though some virtual items can also be purchased for real money.   

Having fun in Kitten Match? Follow us!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kittenmatch/

Questions? Contact our Tech Support team at kittenmatch_support@qiyi.com

comments: I really like it. It has a fun storyline, nice decor choices and overall a nice game. Its addictive and its cute. The cats are adorable and I love how you meet new ones as the story goes on. I really do like the idea of having a cat area built just for the cats and how people can come visit and like it. It's a fun, cute and addictive game and I really enjoy it.

I love the challenge! It surprised me that Kitten Match isn't a game geared for children. The levels start out easy but they get challenging as you win and move up to higher levels. The story line is adorable and there are many different facets in the game. It's kept me interested and actually looking forward to play it and help the kittens with a variety of tasks. Try it... you'll like it too!

Although this is one of my fave games which I only started playing in the last week and the story with the kittens is really adorable they just make it too freaking hard if you have no boosters to get through a level. Can't buy anything on this phone as I use my graphics handle so I'm like stuck and have no way to get any boosters when I really need them. I'm just devastated because I really really love the story and the renovation aspect of this game.

This is a fun game. I'm not a mad fan of matching games but this one plays fair. Rewards are generous, there is no constant stream of ads and decorating is fun. Not does it cheat - if you have to use coins to extend a game you usually only have to do it once. Graphics are good and the cats are cute. I like it.

Love playing the game. Love the cats and their costumes. The ads are not annoying. Just wish that when you play multiple boards that your bombs, ball etc. Would be able to go to next board. Also wish that it was easier to get rewards, some puzzles need more moves or if at the end of no more moves that if there are balls, bombs, line cleaners etc, that they could do a last blast. I am looking forward for the next update .

title: Amazing chefs Restaurant Life - Cooking Game
description:
Amazing Chef's Restaurant - Cooking Game 2020 kitchen game is here with the fastest cooking experience in a restaurant kitchen 🍔.

How fast can you cook a burger pizza and serve with a drink? Do you want to become the best cooking expert and love to cook delicious burger patties and serve to your customers within a limited time? 
This Game Contains All Kind of Foods From Fast Food to BBQ (Barbecue).
Fast Food is nowadays a favorite food of customers. People Like eating Burgers and pizzas with fries and cold drinks.  The problem with this type of food is that people are always in hurry they want their food quickly. Satisfying a Customer is a tedious task. Strictly follow ingredients and order by customer. If you missed any important ingredient from the order. You will be left with an unsatisfied customer. Restaurant's reputation is very important for every businessman 
We bring you an exciting cooking expert game to cook a meal for your customers and earn as much as possible. Feel the craziest and fastest experience of cooking with the cooking expert 2020 game.

Housewives love dining out and enjoy eating food prepared by someone for them. take your housewife to some good restaurant near you and order her favorite meals and amazed her with your cooking skills and show her your love and passion for cooking. 
Restaurants are places where people enjoy having food, celebrating their birthdays and wedding anniversaries. We have all sorts of sweet delights and frozen desserts for you. 

Cooking Kitchen Game Features
•25+ Unique locations in this fun new restaurant game
•Prepare Food Max and Become Chef & Cook 1000+ Different Tasty cuisine For Kitchen Lovers
•More than 1400+ levels to complete In this Cooking World Chef Game

title: Food Finder
description: Food Finder offers a variety of delivery restaurants and has many different cuisines and tastes to offer for your pleasure. No matter what neighborhood you're in, you can choose from almost any type of food your mind can think up. Feel like Chinese today? How about Delicious Thai, Indian or Sushi? Or is it a loaded sandwich or burger your belly craves today? If all else fails, Pizza and wings always hits the spot! All this and much more can come right up to your door, without even picking up the phone. Search by your address/postcode and find restaurants that deliver to you in any cuisine and any neighborhood near you. View restaurants menus and exclusive online coupons and discounts, read reviews and most importantly, order from any one of them online, with just a click of a button - easy, simple, and completely free!

title: Fast Free VPN – Kaspersky Secure Connection
description:
Kaspersky Secure Connection is an easy-to-use VPN service app – and a great alternative to a proxy server – that lets you explore the Internet privately and securely on your Android tablets and phones – and at super-fast speeds! Join us now and start enjoying a fantastic VPN experience, including secure data encryption and private Internet access.

Kaspersky Secure Connection – enjoy more Wi-Fi security, more internet privacy and more freedom to browse. 
• Uses secure VPN to protect you on risky public Wi-Fi
• Keeps your emails, photos, bank details & more private
• Lets you access more sites & content via fast VPN

Enjoy lightning fast internet
Get online through the fastest VPN server you can connect to. Simply select “the fastest server”* in your list of servers to browse like a pro with exceptionally fast VPN.

Be certain your data is always safe
Our Kill Switch* feature automatically cuts your Internet connection if your VPN app connection drops – ensuring your data is never exposed to unprotected Internet.

Broaden your Netflix horizons
Netflix’s hottest shows and movies* can often premiere in regions outside your own**. Explore the possibilities of bringing global entertainment to your devices with our borderless VPN.

Enhance your gaming experience 
Looking for a way to improve ping and FPS so you can enjoy better, faster gaming? Simply choose to connect through a server that matches the location of the game server.

Stay safe on public Wi-Fi
Our app auto-launches when public Wi-Fi hotspots are detected. Which means it’s simple for you to secure your Internet privacy in cafes, airports and other public places.

Gain the power of invisibility
Because our VPN service hides your IP address, you get to be a private browser any time you use it to connect – creating a privacy screen that makes you invisible to hackers.

Access unlimited sites & apps
With VPN unlimited* traffic at super-fast speeds you can stream all the music you want, or watch an endless supply of online movies, TV shows or live sports, even in HD.

Encrypt your online data
Protect all the data and communications you send and receive online – including files, emails, chats and video calls – with super-strong encryption.

Browse without borders
Want to unblock geo-restricted TV shows and live sports? Or access out-of-region website offers? Simply connect through a VPN server in a country where restrictions don’t apply.

*with Kaspersky VPN premium
**please note, you can unblock Netflix in the US and UK

Other things our users love
•	Alerts you after your VPN download to help you get started
•	One-tap connection – gain online privacy and security in seconds
•	Expanding network – over 300 servers in 25+ countries & counting
•	Bold new interface which displays your key personal VPN info
•	Fast & super-secure torrenting – part of our super VPN experience
•	Free, expert 24-hour support

What the review site say
“It’s one of the fastest services for those who need access to the US, something that’s still a challenge for many of its rivals…”
Trustedreviews.com | Feb 6, 2020

“Kaspersky Secure Connection is a low-cost, easy-to-use and torrent-friendly VPN service aimed at home users and the networking novice.”
Techradar.com | May 17, 2019

How does VPN work?
VPN technology creates a secure, encrypted tunnel between your device and a VPN server, so that all the data you send and receive online is completely unreadable. Which means nobody – including websites you visit, government authorities or even your own ISP – can view your information or record your actions.

To make the setup process faster and easier, we’ve removed all non-essential permission requests (such as geo-location on Android 9.0+ and accessibility requests). Instead, you will receive these as and when you use features that require them.

comments: I used the 200/300mb free trial version as a back up for several years in China. Finally decided to give it a shot and buying the premium. It worked for about 1.5 mo. Stopped working and never resumed. Customer support takes days to figure out anything. Sent me the wrong message about Kaspersky kid troubleshooting. Stear clear from this service, especially if you are in China.

The VPN always turns itself off. I find myself always checking to see if it's on. So many times I've noticed that it's off and I get to play the "how long has my data been un secured" game. Definitely won't be renewing my subscription as this app isn't trustworthy. Such a shame, as I've been using Kaspersky for years.

I've been using this app for a while with no problems on my S9 Plus, recently I updated to the Note 20 and it's not working on the Note 20 but still working on the S9 Plus. It says it has connected to said location but I still cannot access blocked content from the country I am in using my Note 20. Please fix this problem.

If you are paying for only getting this service on Android phones, don't waste your money. It only works on Windows and Android app is useless as it always fail to connect. For a whole year of subscription , it worked for few days on Android no matter what the device I use. They would reply that service is blocked in country while it works well on Windows all the time. Inexperienced support on mobile platform indeed.

Edit: already fix it, thank you.. First the app was working good and then (don't know when) the app fail to connect, try to restart my device but failed, then try reinstall but failed connect my subscription account, please fix it. Note: my another device just fine using it,

title: Virtual Puppy Simulator - Pet Dog Family Adventure
description:
Hello everyone!

Do you dream about pet animals pet animals? Do you love cats and dogs?

Are you ready to play one of the coolest online dog sim games on the store?

Then this is the perfect 3D pet simulator game for you. Roam around a huge 3d world as a cute puppy dog sim in this amazing virtual dog game. You could be louie the pug, a german shepherd or a Labrador, the choice is yours!

Live the life of a cute dog in this amazing virtual animal simulator game. 

This is not a simple talking dog louie the pug game- it is much more. Go into the world and play the game from the virtual pet dog's perspective. Your virtual dog needs lots of pet care – feed him, take him to the washroom, clean him up, bathe him and play with him. This may be the most amazing pet care and dressup game that you have ever played.

Remember, there is not only one pet dog in this cute pet game for kids. You have to raise a complete family of puppies and help the dog's kid to feed, dress up and provide amazing pet care in this home family adventure pet game.

Features:

Multiple different environments for your virtual pets
Clean up and dress up your cute dog
Many dream pet dogs to choose from

Hello everyone!

Do you dream about pet animals pet animals? Do you love cats and dogs?

Are you ready to play one of the coolest online dog sim games on the store?

Then this is the perfect 3D pet simulator game for you. Roam around a huge 3d world as a cute puppy dog sim in this amazing virtual dog game. You could be louie the pug, a german shepherd or a Labrador, the choice is yours!

Live the life of a cute dog in this amazing virtual animal simulator game.

This is not a simple talking dog louie the pug game- it is much more. Go into the world and play the game from the virtual pet dog's perspective. Your virtual dog needs lots of pet care – feed him, take him to the washroom, clean him up, bathe him and play with him. This may be the most amazing pet care and dressup game that you have ever played.

Remember, there is not only one pet dog in this cute pet game for kids. You have to raise a complete family of puppies and help the dog's kid to feed, dress up and provide amazing pet care in this home family adventure pet game.

Features:

Multiple different environments for your virtual pets
Clean up and dress up your cute dog
Many dream pet dogs to choose from
summary: Enjoy the life of a dog in this fun simulator game.

title: Restaurant Cleaning,Cooking and Shopping Game
description:
Cook delicious meals and desserts in this FREE addictive cooking and cleaning game! Practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use delicious ingredients to cook several tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen-wares and cook delicious food for your customer. Clean your restaurants to attract more clients. To make your customer’s experience more personal and memorable make your own cookies and cupcakes! Produce greater variety of dishes, clean those dishes and table-top and purchase goods required to run your restaurant from supermarket shop.

Your whole restaurant management experience is now at one place! At the end of the day, clean the restaurant kitchen, throw garbage into dustbin, wash dirty dishes, plates and cookwares, arrange them at right place. Now you are ready to cook some fast food. 

Have a look at restaurant kitchen cleaning games. It’s time to wash and clean your restaurant to attract more genuine customers. Make your cleaning services more efficient because you are hotel planner and organiser. Collect all objects from messy kitchen, put one by one perfectly on its place, clean hotel kitchen and dusting properly. Try the fever of kitchen cleaning and then experience the fast food cooking session. Play super market shopping game to purchase kitchen goods in this restaurant simulator game. 

Game Features
* FREE TO PLAY and FREE TO DOWNLOAD for lifetime
* Simple, Interesting, interactive and addictive game play
* Play offline
* Optimised for latest phones and tablets
* Clean kitchen using sponge, brush, broom
* Make kitchen neat and clean
* Scrub all mess off the counter and platform with sponge
* Clear up up any excess water lying on the platform
* Pick up any rubbish and throw it away in the bin to look kitchen nice and clean
* Clean your kitchen ready before you start delicious food
* Become a cleaner, buyer and restaurant manager at one place
* Cheerful background sounds with captivating user interface
* Many cooking recipes coming soon!

Try this fun kitchen restaurant clean up game today to have real restaurant management experience. Highly addictive time management game that’ll bring you the best digital cooking experience than other cooking and cleaning game available on stores. Practice your cleaning, shopping and cooking techniques and management skills. Serve delicious dishes to hungry customers in fast pace in this amazing restaurant. Put that chef’s hat and gram chance to manage tycoon restaurant. 

Travel through your cooking journey & make your dreams come true! Cool delicious recipes, serve quickly and win customers’ heart. Become crazy chef to cook most savoured cuisine. This game simulates your cleaning, shopping, cooking and food serving skills.

title: Papa's Hot Doggeria HD
description:
Serve seasonal stadium favorites in Papa's Hot Doggeria HD!

-- ABOUT THE GAME --

It's opening day at Griller Stadium, where you're in charge of Papa Louie's famous hot dog stand!  In Papa's Hot Doggeria HD you'll need to grill up juicy hot dogs, top them with a variety of seasonal condiments, and serve them to all of the rowdy fans.  You'll also have your hands full popping up fresh popcorn and pouring refreshing drinks for your hungry customers.  Each station in the restaurant is a hands-on process, and you'll have to multitask to keep up with your orders.  Keep the fans full and happy, cheer on your favorite team, and even take a swing in the Home Run Derby!

-- GAME FEATURES --

Celebrate the seasons with new holiday hot dogs!  As the seasons change at Griller Stadium, your customers will order their hot dogs with new seasonal ingredients and sides.  You'll unlock new buns, drinks, popcorn, sauces, and toppings for each holiday of the year, and your customers will love trying new flavors at the ballgame!  And don't worry when the air gets chilly and the baseball season comes to an end -- Griller Stadium also hosts hockey games during the fall and winter for year-round excitement!

Customers will occasionally bring you unique Special Recipes, which you can serve as the Daily Special at the hot dog stand!  Each Special also has a bonus you can earn for serving a prime example of that recipe.  When you serve enough Specials to master that recipe, you'll also earn a special prize!

Play as Taylor or Peggy -- or create your own custom character to run the hot dog stand!  You can also show off your holiday spirit with a massive variety of holiday outfits and clothing for your workers.  Choose unique color combinations for each item of clothing, and create your own style with millions of combinations!

Missing your favorite customer?  Why not send them some coupons with the help of your friendly mailman, Vincent!  Customers love a good deal, and will promptly arrive to order another hot dog.  Coupons are great for completing quests for Stickers and for strategically leveling up customers!

The customizable lobby is back, with new themes of furniture and decorations for each holiday of the year!  Decorate the restaurant with holiday decorations and your customers won't mind waiting even longer for their food.  Customers can also grab a table in the new Dining Area, where they can order a meal instead of returning to their stadium seat. 

Play Foodini's famous Mini-Games to earn new furniture for your lobby and new clothing for your workers.  You can also visit the Shop after each workday to find an extensive wardrobe of clothing, tons of furniture for your lobby, and a variety of helpful upgrades for the restaurant which you can buy with your hard-earned tips.

Papa's collection of Stickers return, which you can earn by completing a wide variety of tasks and achievements as you play.  Each customer has a set of three favorite Stickers:  Earn all three and you'll be rewarded with a brand-new outfit to give to that customer!

-- MORE FEATURES --

- Hands-on hot dog shop in the Papa Louie universe
- Updated and remastered for tablets
- Multi-task between grilling, topping, drinks and popcorn
- 12 separate holidays to unlock, each with more ingredients
- Earn and Master 40 unique Special Recipes
- 90 colorful Stickers to earn for completing tasks
- Create a custom chef and server
- Tons of furniture and clothing to decorate your shop and workers
- Purchase shop upgrades with your earned tips
- 111 customers to serve with unique orders
- Use Stickers to unlock new outfits for your customers
- Over 100 ingredients to unlock
- 7 exciting Mini-Games to play after each workday

** NOTE FOR PHONE USERS **

Papa's Hot Doggeria HD is designed especially for tablets, look for Papa's Hot Doggeria To Go for smaller screens!

title: Fammuk Restaurant
description:
Fammuk Smart TV App is an all-in-one solution for your restaurant's digital signage and menu management. Through our highly interactive app, you can present your digital menu board in various designs that help attract customers and help them order the food they crave easily.

The Fammuk Digital Signage Smart TV App gives you the option to edit, add, delete and display promotions, deals and notifications relating to your business with the simple click of a button and not only that through our app you generate revenue by promoting others businesses around you.

With state of the art interactive design and a user-friendly interface, you can schedule changes and edits for menu items, deals and promotions and control it all form an easily manageable admin panel. Our app is tailor made to help your restaurant perfect its brand image and digital presence.

Some of the Menu Design options you can choose from include:

Still Menu: Want a standard menu that isn’t constantly moving? Then our static menu is just the thing for you.

Animated Menu: Does your restaurant want a menu that is always in perfect motion? Our animated menu option allows you to edit and display a dynamic menu with moving slides.

Still Deals: Display your restaurant's signature deals within a perfectly crafted static design.

Animated Deals: Displaying deals in a dynamic design is no problem for Fammuk’s animated deals design. With slides that change and display all the top deals you have to 
offer.

Still Special: Have a special menu item that you want your customers to see. Try out our static special menu.

Animated Special: Display all your restaurant’s specials in the form of high quality, dynamic and ever changing slides to display the perfection of your menu design.
