title: Near Me Local Search & Places
description:
Looking for a local restaurant, pizza or coffee shop? Searching for the nearest sports lounge? Need quick residential services? If yes, Near Me Local Search & Places is the answer to these questions. 

Near Me Local Search & Places is a smart business finder app that lets you find any kind of business or service in your locality. All you need to do is enter the type of business you are looking for, your location, and the distance from your location within which you are searching for the business/service. With this app, you can search for stores and businesses quite fast. 

Features of the app:

1. The app has an intelligent search function that lets you look for a business/service within a specific distance from your location.

2. You can find diverse categories of businesses in this app, like restaurants, hotels, pizza stores, coffee cafes, tacos shops, bars and clubs, sports lounges, arts and entertainment centers, residential services, medical services and more.

5. The app has an intuitive, clean and smooth user-interface that makes searching for businesses easy.

So, simplify and quicken your search for local businesses and services with Yellow Mobi. Download the app now for free!

title: Food Map
description:
Feeling Hungry! But don't know your nearby food court, bars or restaurants around you?

The Food Map is for locating a restaurant or food court near your local area using Google Maps. Just open the app, Turn on your mobile internet or WiFi and location and then the app will automatically search for your nearest location restaurants, bars, cafes, grocery shop.

Features:
☆☆ Find out nearest restaurants, bars, cafe
☆☆ Food Menu or Interior
☆☆ Point out the restaurant from the Map
☆☆ Zoom map (in or out)
☆☆ Call restaurant official number from the app
☆☆ Visit official websites
☆☆ Explore in Google maps
☆☆ Material UI

*** Why you have to use this app ***

Easy way to find

Food Map is an application for finding restaurants in your nearby, you have to just open the app and Bingo

Restaurants reviews & ratings

Using Food Map you can see the rate and reviews of public for each restaurant. Based on reviews and ratings you can choose your perfect desired restaurants you want to go.

Routes, Distance & walk time

Using Food Map you can also see routes, distance and walk time to go restaurants from your location

Disclaimer
We have used user current location to find out only nearby food or restaurants (which is based on their current location). We do not intend to use user location on our personal purpose. We believe that it will create a violation in Google Play Policy if we use user location to track them for our personal gain. In this application, there are no features like sharing user physical location to another user.

title: Barcelona Restaurants - Offline Guide
descriptionHTML:
Barcelona Restaurants - Offline Guide by Restaurant Guru offers a complete database of Barcelona restaurants, which means you don’t need the Internet to use the application. All the best restaurants in the city are always at hand anywhere and anytime!

Paella, crema Catalana, croquettas ... The list of famous dishes that you can try in Barcelona goes on and on. Walking through this wonderful city, it is impossible not to notice the variety of restaurants and cafes that attract visitors to try delicious cuisine and enjoy the hospitality of the owners.

Barcelona Restaurants - Offline Guide by Restaurant Guru can help you find the best place to eat in, whether it is a gourmet restaurant or fast food. Take a stroll through the city streets and choose your place. Compare ratings from leading agencies, see photos and read reviews of visitors.

The app is suitable for:
gourmets;
snack lovers;
seekers of new tastes and interesting places;
just hungry tourists.

With Restaurant Guru you have the opportunity to choose the perfect restaurant using various search options:
Set the restaurant type (barbecue, snack bar, cafe, cafeteria, club, pastry shop, pub and bar, restaurant, steak house);
Choose the type of cuisine (from the most popular (pizza, sushi, vegetarian, Italian, Chinese, Mexican, French, Japanese) to exotic (Lao, Pacific, Filipino, Ecuadorian));
Filter the average check;
Read comments and reviews of visitors and experts from leading agencies of the world;
Find the place on the map and take a route to it;
Type the name of the dish (just indicate the dish you want to try);
Study the full information about the restaurant (menu, opening hours, contacts, phone numbers and addresses, photos, links to official websites);
Use the advanced search of restaurants and visitors’ reviews.

Travel with taste!
summary: All the restaurants in one place!

comments: Used to be good. But the non stop ads with annoying loud noise everytime you open an image is unbelievably a waste of time. Its non stop and continuous. Uninstalled. Edited: Thanks, at least the auto noise is disabled but now, every time you try to edit, there's a pop up ad, even if you are still editing the same picture. That's just too inconvenient and waste of time. Too bad. Found new app that at least lets user "use" their app without interfering.

I loved this app so much that I paid for a yearly subscription only to be told that after three months I needed to repurchase. I followed the instructions and tried to contact the developer with no response. Stupidly I purchased again for the 2 year subscription ( stupid I know) only to have the exact same problem. I tried to problem solve again with no resolution to this problem. Tried to contact someone with no response. I am out nearly $40 and very frustrated. Won't make this mistake again

Money grabber, of course. Allows you to use premium features that it doesn't label as such and THEN hits you up to start a free trial. $25 a year is not horrible, but I like the apps that give you a GOOD free version. And this one doesn't seem to have a good free version. I haven't decided if I want to support this app or not. I'll keep looking for sure. It also makes you sign up immediately with no guest option that I saw.

I like this app , it's amazing and easy to use. It's very creative, adjustable, let.you choose from alot of different veiws how you can design your photo. I just really like it , I'm glad I finally found an app for my photo's I'm always looking for photo apps. I really.enjoyed working with it.

So much design,options, color choices, and fantastic frames. This app definitely keeps me up all night! And, you don't need to be an artist or color professional. Designs and makeup applications you choose and can be proud of. The shades and lighting blend so easily. And with a plethora of filters and effects you are sure to be pleased and proud everytime. And list option gives you the recipe for your looks and makeup Choices. From brands to shadow patterns, and brow shapes you chose.

title: Shreveport 318 Restaurant Week
description:
Shreveport-Bossier, La., is home to hundreds of unique, local eateries. 318 Restaurant Week is an opportunity for local foodies and visitors to discover new restaurants while taking advantage of special $10 lunch specials, $20 dinner specials and several exclusive one-night-only dining experiences, which vary in price. The 2020 edition of 318 Restaurant Week happens March 16-21.

The 318 Restaurant Week app is a FREE download to help you discover participating restaurants, visit their websites, get directions, share with friends and family, and more, all from your mobile phone. You can even earn entries into a prize drawing by checking in when you visit a participating restaurant.

Share Shreveport-Bossier’s culinary offerings far and wide by using the hashtag #Eat318. Follow 318 Restaurant Week on Instagram at @318restaurant.

For complete details visit www.318RestaurantWeek.com.


Key features:
- Explore restaurants offering fixed price specials
- Discover one-night-only dining experiences
- Get directions to restaurants
- Check in to earn entries in a prize drawing
- Share experience with friends and family


Shreveport-Bossier, La. is a metropolitan area of about 350,000 people. It is ideally situated on the Red River in the northwest corner of Louisiana. What began life as a log-jammed river port has now become home to a splendid convention center, six riverboat casinos, thoroughbred horse racing, year-round festivals and a riverfront shopping/dining/entertainment venue.

The people are charming and the dining is unparalleled, mixing the wide-open Texas spirit with the spicy Louisiana Cajun attitude.

The area has a lively arts, craft brewery and music scene. The diverse museums tell the story of famous musicians, galaxies, cultures, and explorers. The festivals showcase Louisiana’s traditions of good music, great food, and all-night entertainment.

title: Daily Yoga - Yoga Fitness Plans
description:
We’re here for you! Daily Yoga opens a Free Collection for you to provide 6 programs and 13 sessions free to everyone, plus the up to 80% Special Off of subscription. We hope to help users to stay safe and keep positive during the uncertain time!

If you're a beginner to yoga, Daily Yoga App provides various guided classes to help you learn the basics before diving into more advanced classes and flows, and if you're advanced—there are plenty of the world - class teachers you want to follow with.		

Featured as “Works with Google Fit”,“Top Developer”,“Clear Your Mind， Engage Your Body”, “Keep Calm & Carry On” in Google Play, 
Voted as” Best Yoga App” of the year 2016-2019 by Healthline, 
Awarded by The Wall Street Journal as the “5 Addictive Fitness Apps”.

Various Classes Fit Your Goal 
Daily Yoga offers 500+ asanas, 70+ yoga programs, 500+ guided yoga, pilates, meditation sessions plus the largest yoga pose library for man and woman that suit yogis from beginner to advanced. Not only helps you stay with yoga every day, but also provides health benefits for both your mind and body.

Follow the World-Class Master
Altogether 20 yoga masters who are globally respected or the initiator of yoga styles focus on yoga for weight loss, beginner to advanced, better sleep & full relax. Aim to make it easier & convenient to yoga workout and provide programs that align with your current goals. All sessions are taught in English. 

Motivated by Community
The community in Daily Yoga App brings yogis from all over the world closer to one another. Yogis gather here to discuss their practicing experience under the topics, tag and encourage each other to finish the challenge, follow the Yoga Tips to improve their techniques, prepare the weight-control meals according to the selected recipes. Never feel lonely, and become more limber with other motivated yogis around you.

Create Private Yoga Plan
Don’t like to choose  the default plan? You can create yours. Private Yoga plan is a cycle of 7 days. Set the workout days and rest days according to your own schedule. Then you can combine yoga sessions to each workout day according to your need. If you know your body well, please give it a try to make your workout more efficient.

Adjust to Your Habits 
Multiple choices for session duration varied from 5 - 70 minutes to fit your schedule, and 7 languages available worldwide (English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Chinese, German, French). Support for Dark Mode to help to prevent eye strain.

Track Your Activity
Personal data from various devices can be tracked in App. With smart watch, you can track your exercise duration and calories burned and heart rate to contribute to your activity rings and meet your daily goals.

While you are waiting for the update to install, try this easy abdominal breathing: draw your abdomen inward to stabilise your core. As you inhale, bring your fingertips to touch in front of the belly. As you exhale, open your hands out to the sides. Inhale the future, exhale the past. Have fun with it! 

Find out even more at http://www.dailyyoga.com;
Contact:
Email: support@dailyyoga.com
Instagram: @DailyYogaApp
Facebook: facebook.com/DailyYogaApp

Privacy Policy: http://www.dailyyoga.com/privacy.html 
Terms of Service: http://www.dailyyoga.com/terms.html

recentChanges:
You can enjoy the new Smart Coach now, with 7 categories and over 400 sessions waiting for serving your personal preference.
1. SCHEDULE supports the retake of missed sessions in history now. Try and get more circles.
2. Another upgrade! Tap the screen to check the pose list while exercising. It's much easier to browse and switch poses now.

comments: I keep using the app often. However, it has many bugs to be fixed. The smart coach shows sessions I did as not done. The time is off by a day so I cannot start my training at the correct day. The contact link connects to a share experience link instead. So how to contact you directly? Navigation through the app is not intuitive and it is congested with a lot of ballast. I'd appreciate very much a simplified version that is more straightforward to use.

Smart Coach was available for silver members. Now they have changed it only for gold members. It is like changing the game rules during the game. May be they will take away other things!!! Very poor taste of business. Although I love the app, I am thinking of switching to the other app just for this reason. Lack of business ethics, and in a yoga app. Another issue with the program. Now they have created a schedule to schedule a program. But there is no reschedule option for the missed days. 😭

The programs and variety are good, but the app is bad. Buggy, and the material you want to get to - ie sessions - is difficult to get to. Constant ads and notifications you can't turn off, even with the Gold subscription, and the support staff's response is either ignoring criticism or suggesting you delete your account. Would suggest looking elsewhere.

This is the best yoga app I have ever tried and worth every penny if you choose to become a gold member. I tested it for a while now. I get usually bored easily with the same routine and this provides loads of options including levels, specific needs, length, time of day, goals,... The list is long and easy to organize with favorites and home page featured workouts. I will be renewing my subscription for sure!

This was my very first time trying yoga, and this was my first session... as a beginner I think it went pretty well. Could really feel my muscles stretching on some of those poses. But I was afraid I wasn't going to hear what the pose was correctly so I tried to keep my phone within eyesight so I could watch the instructor, but I think once I get the hang of it I won't need to look at my phone anymore and I can concentrate more on my poses.

title: FrostWire: Torrent Downloader & Music Player
description:
FrostWire is an easy to use yet feature packed torrent client for Android. Unlike other torrent downloaders, it has a true built-in torrent search, an advanced download manager, music player and a media library. 

All these features are wrapped into one free app, so you can find what you love easily, download music, movies and video directly to your phone or tablet - fast & with no download size or speed limits, and then create playlists to play your music offline without wi-fi or mobile data.

FrostWire downloads super fast using a distributed peer-to-peer  (P2P) file sharing torrent network. By splitting the file into multiple chunks and downloading from many sources at the same time, it allows you to download media files as large as high-quality (Flac or wav) full songs or entire music albums, HD movies and 4K video many times faster than conventional methods. As a true free file downloader, FrostWire downloads all file types, so even though it is designed with primarily audio and video in mind, it can also download books, pdf documents, games, software, images and more!

NOTABLE FEATURES:
✔  True built-in torrent search
✔  Easy one-tap download & seed (share)
✔  Play while you download (sequential downloading)
✔  Open any .torrent file or paste magnet link in Transfers to download any file you want
✔  Select File Storage Location (Internal Storage or SD Card)
✔  Download on Wi-Fi only (preserve mobile data)
✔  Auto-pause downloads with VPN drop
✔  Built-in fully featured music player with gesture support
✔  Built-in media browser (rename and delete your files from within the app)

For more detailed list of features see http://bit.ly/frostwirefeatures.

USERS NEW TO TORRENTING
FrostWire is a torrent downloader - it is not a content provider. The search results provided come from multiple torrent indexes across the web. If you can’t find what you are looking for, do a Google Search with a .torrent appended to it. Download your .torrent file or copy a magnet link and open it in FrostWire. 
The content availability in search and the download speed greatly depends on your internet connection. For best results use non-public stable Wi-Fi connection.


ABOUT FROSTWIRE
As an open source community based project, FrostWire has been a quality choice among the best mp3 music downloader apps and torrent clients alike for over 10 years. You can find all Android and desktop versions & download them FREE from our website - http://www.frostwire.com or contribute to the code at http://github.com/frostwire. 


SUPPORT
FrostWire is a community based project - your feedback is very important to us! 
Don’t hesitate to shoot us an email at support@frostwire.com if you have any issues or feature requests! We can help especially if you are not getting enough search results.

If you are rating us less than 5 stars, please leave a review telling us what you didn't like in the app so we can fix it.

Looking for FAQs or guides to get started? Check out http://bit.ly/1aAzcIw or support.frostwire.com. You can also get support from our online Community Forum http://forum.frostwire.com or via chat http://www.frostwire.com/chat

CONNECT WITH US:
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FrostwireOfficial
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/frostwire
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/frostwire/

title: Vivino: Buy the Right Wine
description:
With 42 million users, Vivino is the world’s largest wine community and the ultimate destination for discovering and buying wines. 

HOW IT WORKS
• Scan: Take a photo of any wine label or restaurant wine list or search by wine
• Learn: Instantly see detailed information about the wine and all available purchasing options
• Review: Community powered wine ratings, reviews, average price, food pairings and more provided on every wine
• Buy: To purchase, tap the green buy button and have it shipped to your door - always buy the right wine
• Rate: Add your own ratings and reviews to build your wine profile and enhance your personalized recommendations
• Track: Easily keep track of wines you have tried, including personal rating, notes and date consumed
• Store: Free cellar tracking to always know what wine you have on hand in your collection

STATS
• 42 million users 
• World’s largest wine library with 11.9 million wines
• 2 million wines viewed daily on average
• 1 billion wine labels scanned to date
• 220,000 wineries featured

KEY FEATURES
•  Wine Buying Made Easy: Vivino is the ultimate online destination for all your wine buying needs - the largest wine selection, personalized wine recommendations, free shipping options and honest community ratings and review. 
• Crowdsourced Ratings & Reviews: Leverage reviews and ratings from the world’s largest community of wine drinkers to always select the best wine. 
•  Restaurant Wine List Scanner: Always select the best wine from any restaurant wine list menu.
•  Quick Compare: Pick the best wine right at the shelf by scanning multiple wine labels to instantly view ratings, region, price and food pairings all on one page.
•  Taste Profile: Track and organize your scanned and rated wines to determine your personal taste profile, discover new wines and see how you rank against friends and the Vivino community.

• 42 million users
• World’s largest wine library with 11.9 million wines
• 2 million wines viewed daily on average
• 1 billion wine labels scanned to date
• 220,000 wineries featured

KEY FEATURES
• Wine Buying Made Easy: Vivino is the ultimate online destination for all your wine buying needs - the largest wine selection, personalized wine recommendations, free shipping options and honest community ratings and review.
• Crowdsourced Ratings & Reviews: Leverage reviews and ratings from the world’s largest community of wine drinkers to always select the best wine.
• Restaurant Wine List Scanner: Always select the best wine from any restaurant wine list menu.
• Quick Compare: Pick the best wine right at the shelf by scanning multiple wine labels to instantly view ratings, region, price and food pairings all on one page.
• Taste Profile: Track and organize your scanned and rated wines to determine your personal taste profile, discover new wines and see how you rank against friends and the Vivino community.
summary: Trusted by millions to discover and buy the right wine every time
developerAddress:
Njalsgade 21E
2300 Copenhagen
Denmark
recentChanges:
For every moment, we help you discover the perfect wine. In this update:
— Introducing Taste Profile — a better way to find the right wine for you. Easily set your preferences including grape, region, style and more. Quickly see what wines you've liked (or disliked) and we'll help you discover new ones. Try it now by tapping on your photo in the profile section!

Contact our customer support team at vivino.com/​support or select "Help and Support" from the Vivino app (under Profile > Settings).
comments: I really have nothing else to say. The app is a lost cause. I made a point many years ago when the app was first launched about the app kept messing up the syncing process between the quantity or record of a wine entry with the record at the database server. This problem was never fixed! Today I found the same error with the quantity of a wine I have just couple days ago, and I found the quantity of the wine was unchanged. Can u trust a tech company can't even get its database syncing right?

This should allow two ratings. For looking up wines and getting descriptions and reviews, this app is great. You can even take a photo of the label and most of the time it'll find it. This has kept me away from accidentally buying sweet wines (not my gig). Love it for this use. Then I used Vivino for ordering wine - I have done it twice. Once the order was placed and weeks later it didn't ship. No notice why or if it would be shipped. Cancelled that. Later I tried again, ordering a case of one of my go-to wines from a different sub-retailer in Vivino. The order was shipped in a very reasonable time this order, but upon opening it they had substituted for the entire case with a different wine. No warning, just did it. Were it one bottle, I would be (only) ok with this, but for a case, without warning, this is unacceptable. The thing that has ended my ordering on Vivino is that, having had this happen, I can't get Vivino to even answer an email or respond to the 'contact' tab on their site. I frankly don't know if anyone works there anymore, certainly nobody is manning the email address or contact input. I have reached out both ways for the third time today and will be calling the credit card to have the charges reversed.

Why only 4 stars?! The application is good, pretty sure I'll use it for several times, but the 1st thing I noticed, that the tutorial after the "see how it works" button is completely unreadable (at least for me it is..). Light brownish background with small grey text. Please take into consideration to change it. :)
Love it and recommend it often. It's a great way to broaden your palette. I've tried so many new wines based on a decent rating and generally been happy I did. Also helped me to avoid a few bad ones.

Used to be a good app, but now it's just annoying when it takes over your screen to install a non-existent update, that usually comes along a week after the first red screen appears. Suggestions to remove the annoyance have gone unheard (contacted via the app)

title: دليل المطاعم والمقاهي
description:
مميزات التطبيق 

- التطبيق لا يحتاج الى شبكة انترنت .
- تعرف على خدمات اهم المطاعم والمقاهي مما يسهل عليك اختيار المطعم المناسب لك .
- صفحة مخصصة لكل مطعم ومقهى تعرض اهم المعلومات والخدمات الخاصه بالمطعم .
- يمكنك البحث عن أي مطعم لرؤية وسائل الاتصال و خريطة موقع المطعم .
- معرفة مصادر اللحوم وهي موثقة من طمني .
- سوف يكون هناك تحديث مستمر للتطبيق لزيادة عدد المطاعم و المقاهي.
- تمت إضافة مطاعم المدينة المنورة المطمونه والموثوقه من مدونة خدمة طوبى.

title: Shorty's
description: With the Shorty's app, ordering your favorite food to-go has never been easier. Simply open the app, browse the menu, select your items, and voila! Special features include: restaurant info, full menu access, order ahead, special instructions, tipping, and saving your account info as well as Android Pay for easy checkout. Download. Order. Eat. Repeat.
